RoomType: Phòng Gia Đình Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The staff were incredibly friendly, attentive, and went above and beyond to ensure we had everything we needed. They were also very accommodating, allowing us to check in early. The rooms were spacious and clean, featuring a modern design and breathtaking ocean views. Overall, we had a really pleasant stay.
Review_Title: Our stay was fantastic, with friendly staff, comfortable rooms, and stunning views.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The hotel is really nice and very new. Hotel staff is also quite committed. The location is directly at the beach and close to the peninsula. We got a motorbike which we easily could park in the garage of the hotel.
Negative_Review: Just small improvements: more hooks in the bathrooms are really, really necessary, sometimes the staff at the breakfast buffet was a little too overzealous when cleaning the plates and on the other side the breakfast buffet was not filled up reguarly when something was empty. Also sometimes the staff couldn‘t really understand english properly. What was unfortune but probably issue to the off-season was that the rooftop was closed. We could go up but there was neither a restaurant nor a bar.
Review_Title: Little improvements but still a recommendable hotel!

The facilities were also very modern and clean. Bed was super comfortable and food at breakfast was delicious. Pool has a superb view over the beach too. We’ll be back! Such great value.

Positive_Review: Breakfast was very good. I lived on 17 floor with excellent view to the beach. Around the hotel (back of it) in 5 min walking distance lots of local restaurants, even bike rent shops 50 m from it.

the sea water was a bit blurry, but if you don't dive much its not a problem.
Unfortunately, I had to discover myself that it's better to go beyond the hotel to the parallel street (not the main street left or right) where lots of nice local restaurants. I wish I was told that the very first day by the hotel staff.

Positive_Review:
excellent hotel! good location, sea within walking distance, restaurants and cafes next to the hotel! The rooms are clean and have a great view of the local beach and sea!
I WANT TO SAY A HUGE THANK YOU TO THE GUY WORKING AT THE HOTEL AT THE RECEPTION RESERVATION! His name is Nathan^_^ Thank you very much, he always helped us choose a good restaurant, call a taxi, and also helped us in organizing our vacation and choosing the best places to visit.
See you later Nathan! Thanks a lot^_^

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển Từ Phía Bên Cạnh
Positive_Review: The hotel is spotlessly clean and comfortable. The staff are very helpful and friendly. Will stay again. Highly recommend.
Negative_Review: Shame the pool is covered not so inviting.

RoomType: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Everything. 
Our room was on the 23rd floor and we had the best ocean view.
The hotel is very new, so all the facilities were nice and new and that includes the linen.
Best coconut coffee 😆
Negative_Review: Nothing to declare 😆

RoomType: Phòng Giường Đôi có Ban công và Nhìn ra Biển
Positive_Review: Great location. Helpful staff speaking English fluently. Modern design.

RoomType: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Quite simply, a fantastic experience at what must be one of the best hotels in Danang. The hotel feels very new, and the quality of everything is there to be seen...from furnishings and fixtures to the quality of the bathroom & shower areas. Our room was outstanding, could not fault anything about it, and the view is unbeatable, looking straight out over the ocean. A small thing, but another big tick, even the in-room fridge was set nice and cold...sometimes the small fridges are not cold enough, with no way to amend the setting, but these were bang on.
As with all our Vietnam hotel stays (this was our 5th in 2 weeks) the staff go out of their way to make you feel special and welcomed to the hotel. (Special mention to young Ferb on Reception) The breakfast offering was top notch, well worth a visit even if not staying at the hotel. The pool area is also very nice, with an infinity view out to sea and plenty areas for the kids to play, as well as having an in-pool bar for the grown ups. Genuinely, full of praise for the Awaken, we had only booked 1 night as part of our trip home, but I wish we'd been able to extend it longer.
Negative_Review: Could not fault a thing, it was just a shame the hotel was not busier, as it certainly deserves to be. Once high season kicks in, I'm sure it'll be full regularly.
Review_Title: Fantastic hotel, 5 star quality, highly recommended.

RoomType: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Everything was excellent
Negative_Review: Nothing

The hotel is brand new with highest quality fixtures and design.

Audio visual system is good even has Netflix. An easy way to change the language would help.
Negative_Review: The pool is open air but inside the building i.e. no sun hits it so won't be a winner if you like pool side sun bathing. The hotel should have more loungers in the terrace areas that surround the pool.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển Từ Phía Bên Cạnh
Positive_Review: Everything! The place is brand new and spotless! Very decent size and a great bathroom. Can't pick anything to criticise on. Very rarely that the place loves yp to the photos. Also, a special mention to Ferb Nguyen who was so friendly and attentive ensuring I all my needs were met but the same goes for all the staff at Awaken, I've never been to a hotel with such friendly staff!!

RoomType: Phòng Gia Đình Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: THE STAFF

RoomType: Suite Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Beautiful view(ocean view- Suite). Comfortable beds. Cold pool- very refreshing at hot days.
Negative_Review: There was a firealarm running from 10am to 5pm. We were not informed prior to the alarm and had to take the stairs from the 20 th floor. Elevators were nevertheless running and were stopped when the Alarm went on- also without any kind of Information so that you were stucked. We got a „gift“ from the Manager which was a fruit plate. Most of the staff couldnt speak good english. You can get the View in every other Hotel at that Beach!

RoomType: Phòng Giường Đôi có Ban công và Nhìn ra Biển
Positive_Review: Hotel is in great location, new and modern. Sea view is wonderful, administration staff very polite and friendly.
Negative_Review:
The biggest things I didn't like is constant control of my movement.
Administration staff is wonderful and polite but hotel management should improve a lot:
1. Once you take an umbrella because it rains you need so sign a contract, once you give the umbrella back you need to write your signature (!).
2. Every bill you pay, you should sign with signature, why you should still do that in 2024?
3. We ordered a breakfast for 1 additional person day before and hotel staff called us 21:30 PM once we were already sleeping to ask how we would pay - at the buffet or during checkout. It was nonsense to ask such a question once we asked by ourselves day before that we would need additional breakfast and will pay an extra for that...
4. During the checkout we were asked to wait while our room will be checked, we waited 20 minutes and went to the parking garage, then we were stopped to wait again and later staff apologised for all that once they checked our room.
5. Second night there were some construction noise in one of the floors.

The hotel staff forced us to feel like we are some criminals but we didn't do anything wrong and didn't have any intentions, I have visited many 5 stars hotels but this one lacked a lot of professionalism and should improve if they want to keep its status.
Review_Title: Great location with wonderful sea view but terrible hotel management

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển Từ Phía Bên Cạnh
Positive_Review: Hotel is in great location, new and modern. Sea view is wonderful, administration staff very polite and friendly.
Negative_Review:

Administration staff is wonderful and polite but hotel management should improve a lot:
1. Once you take an umbrella because it rains you need so sign a contract, once you give the umbrella back you need to write your signature (!).

4. During the checkout we were asked to wait while our room will be checked, we waited 20 minutes and went to the parking garage, then we were stopped to wait again and later staff apologised for all that once they checked our room.

Negative_Review:

RoomType: Phòng Giường Đôi có Ban công và Nhìn ra Biển
Positive_Review: Das Zimmer war schön eingerichtet und vor allem das Bad gut angeordnet. Die Lage direkt am Strand und mit einem 24/7 Supermarkt am Ausgang. Es war alles sehr sauber und ordentlich.
Negative_Review:
Hier gibt es mehrere Sachen zu bemängeln: 1. wir bekamen nicht das gebuchte Zimmer mit dem Upgrade auf Meerblick, sondern nur den seitlichen Meerblick. Auch wie ich darauf ausdrücklich hingewiesen habe wurde mir unmissverständlich klar gemacht, dass dies unser Zimmer ist. Am Buchungszettel war unser gebuchtes Zimmer per Hand durchgestrichen. 
2. Das Zimmer war nicht um 14:00 Uhr bereit zu beziehen. Wir mussten fast 15 min warten. Auch der checkout dauerte dann eine Weile. 
3. Das Gutscheinsystem mit den inkludieren 200K Verzehrgutschein funktioniert nur 1x und der Restbetrag wird nicht notiert oder weitergegeben. Hinweise darauf fehlten komplett. 
4. Beim Frühstück (welches sehr gut war) wurde nicht nachgeräumt, obwohl es bei unserer Ankunft um 9:00 Uhr noch 1h offen sein sollte. 
5. Der Pool schließt um 20:00 Uhr, was schon sehr früh ist unserer Meinung und Erfahrung nach.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố - Minibar Miễn Phí
Positive_Review:
Wow, what a hotel! Probably one of the most iconic rooms we stayed in for a while. The hotel is located on the city side of Da nang, not the beach strip so beware of that. The hotel is brand new, they have the most incredible gym we’ve seen all across Vietnam, all with newest Technogym machines. We tried massages at the spa and that was also a fantastic experience.

The room is extremely comfortable and super beautifully designed. The staff are super attentive and lunch/dinner at the hotel are also great.
Negative_Review: My only point would be maybe having a bit more European food at breakfast, but otherwise it was a 10/10 either way.

RoomType: Phòng Premium Có Giường Cỡ King, Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Và Bồn Tắm - Minibar Miễn Phí
Positive_Review:
This is a new hotel, opened like a year ago. All facilities are top notch: lovely room, modern, everything perfect. Very friendly and helpful staff. The gym was the best I ever had in a hotel and even better than most official gyms! Great view from the room and no outside noise. Location pretty close to the city centre. Free minibar is a nice extra. good choice in breakfast. Great value for money!

9 out of 10

10 = I want to live here
9= I don't want to leave
8= Would love to come back
7= It was ok
6= just enough
5 or less = I regret staying here.
Negative_Review:
Minor things: 

- Gym is state of the art, but it doesn't look like the AC is adapted to the room. During cardio I sweated like a pig after only 15 min.
- Pool is a bit small and with a dull view.
- I was informed there were constructions going on on the top floor from 10 am, but it started at 8 am. I have understanding for this inconvenience, but please inform your guests correct.
Review_Title: Great place to stay in Da Nang!

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố - Minibar Miễn Phí

Not so centrally located if you want to walk it to the Dragon bridge but the staff were always quick to get a taxi fir a few minutes short ride to anywhere. These are all just relatively small anomalies, as for all the rest a really great hotel, all trying to make one's stay terrific.

RoomType: Phòng Premium Có Giường Cỡ King, Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Và Bồn Tắm - Quyền Sử Dụng Club Lounge
Positive_Review:
First, the location, hotel is in city center and near Han river. So you can easily get a grab to restaurants nearby, as well as to My Khe beach all within less than 10 mins away. The surround quiet unlike hotels near the beach area.

Next, in terms of comfort, the room I stayed is King Club room which is in the 25 storey. Great views from the room especially at night, can see the glittering lights coming off buildings and the bridges. The room smells good, bed is comfortable, toilet and showering areas are separated with 2 basins for washing up.

Breakfast is not fantastic, but having it on the 24 floor club lounge provides good views. But the cocktails session from 5.30pm onwards food tray and drinks are nice. If you want a good breakfast, try the Eco bar at My Khe beach. They serve local Vietnamese and Western breakfast. Sit by the beach to enjoy the breakfast, views and sounds of the waves are amazing.

Staff service is fantastic. At check in, I was greeted well, provided early check in, and was walked to my room and briefed by the staff about the amenities I would enjoy.
Negative_Review: Breakfast is not delicious, I would eat somewhere else.
Review_Title: I really enjoyed my stay at the hotel, from the friendly and attentive staff, to the hotel comfort.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
Positive_Review: Room was clean and comfortable.
Negative_Review: Everything was nice. Location and staff
Review_Title: Overall a nice and comfortable stay at the hotel. Staff was great

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố - Minibar Miễn Phí
Positive_Review: I was at another Hotel at first but it didn’t satisfy me at all so I had to look for a new one. This Hotel exceeded all my expectations. It starts with the lobby, it looks fantastic. The view from the room is amazing! And I absolutely love the glass wall bathroom. The room was excellent, clean and very comfortable. The staff were very friendly throughout. Thank you very much!

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King, Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Và Bồn Tắm - Minibar Miễn Phí
Positive_Review:
Mein Freund und ich haben hier vier Nächte verbracht, da wir in Vietnam ein bisschen auf der Durchreise sind.
Wir haben uns für dieses Hotel entschieden, weil wir uns mal ein bisschen was gönnen wollten - wir wurden nicht enttäuscht! Das Hotel gehört eindeutig zur gehobeneren Klasse.
Die Zimmer waren 1A sauber, wunderschön eingerichtet und auch der Service war top. 
Frühstück war auch sehr gut, für Vegetarier ein klein bisschen schwierig, da in fast jedem Gericht Fleisch ist, aber das ist in so gut wie fast jedem Hotel der Fall.
Der Fitnessraum in diesem Hotel ist der mit Abstand beste, den ich je in einem Hotel gesehen habe! Sehr sauber und top Geräte!
Da es keine Balkone gibt, gibt es für Raucher nur zwei Orte: einmal auf Ebene des Pools, und einmal vor dem Hoteleingang.
Negative_Review:
Als mein Partner abends eine rauchen gegangen ist, ist ihm beim Rauchen eine Schabe entgegengekommen. Das ist nicht unbedingt ein Zeichen mangelnder Hygiene, in Da Nang waren allgemein abends viele Schaben unterwegs..
Ansonsten war es ein äußerst angenehmer Aufenthalt!

RoomType: Phòng Premium Có Giường Cỡ King, Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Và Bồn Tắm - Minibar Miễn Phí

Positive_Review:
식사도 굉장히 맛있었고 김치볶음밥이 일품입니다. 여기서 먹은 쌀국수가 저는 개인적으로 제일 맛있었습니다.
숙소 크기나 퀄리티도 매우 좋았고 화장실도 깔끔합니다. 무엇보다 발리생각해서 필터샤워기 가져갔는데 안해도 될정도로 필터변화가 없었어요. 다만 호이안쪽 숙소가서는 리조트라 그런가 2일정도 쓰니 필터 색 변화가 조금 있었습니다만 베이캐피탈은 색변화가 없이 물 좋았어요. 5층 스파도 진짜 잘하시더라구요. 머무는동안 한시장쪽 스파 여러군데랑 호이안쪽 스파2군데 가봤는데 베이캐피탈에서 받은 스파가 제일 프로페셔널 하다 느꼈습니다. 근막 찾기 고수입니다 ㅋㅋ 얼굴마사지도 정말 시원하고 잘해주셔서 좋았어요~ 
숙소 등급이 높아서 24층 라운지를 이용할 수있었어요. 굉장히 고급지고 4층 식사하는데는 좀 붐비고 정신없었다면 24층은 럭셔리하고 뷰도 좋았어요. 
여자 총괄매니저님이 계셨는데 엄청 친절하면서 멋진 분이었어요. 프로답게 모든걸 처리해주시고 어버버 하는거없이 커리어우먼 그 자체... 제일 감명깊었던게 매니저님의 프로다운 각종 대처들이었어요. 프로는 다르구나 하고 생각이 들 정도로 배워왔습니다. 감사해요! 다음번에 또 다낭오면 중간에는 택시이동하고 숙소는 베이캐피탈로만 쭉 머물것같습니다.
Review_Title: 프로페셔널한 매니저와 좋은 신형 시설, 친절한 서비스, 맛있는 밥, 프로페셔널 스파 모든게 감동

Positive_Review:
ツアーのための車の手配や旅行中の些細な困り事などをとてもよく対応してもらった。
また、滞在中に忘れ物をしてしまったが２日経った後でも探し出してもらい、無事に送ってもらうことができた。とても嬉しかったのでまた、泊まりたいと思う。

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố - Minibar Miễn Phí
Positive_Review: Personal sind sehr nett, hilfsbereitem . Ich habe Probleme mit dem Flug check in , sie tun alles um mir zu helfen. Ich war sehr erleichtert. Danke nochmals an das Personal

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố - Minibar Miễn Phí
Positive_Review: Personal excepcional, muy atento en todo momento. Desayuno increíble, la piscina muy buena . Las habitaciones con unas vistas fantásticas , mini bar gratuito . Recomiendo esta cadena de hoteles para viajar en Vietnam, hemos estado en otros 5 estrellas y no se parecen en nada .

Negative_Review:
Бронировали номер премиум с угловым окном, а заселили в обычный делюкс😕
На ресепшен при выселении попросила удалить фото номера из букинга, так как оно не соответствует реальности, но они отказались, может считают это ок🙁

Также сломалась дверь в туалет

Positive_Review: Không gian phòng ở vô cùng rộng rãi thoải mái, mà với không gian như vậy thì giá quá hợp lý luôn, mọi thứ luôn được giữ sạch sẽ. Đội ngũ nhân viên toàn các bạn trẻ nhưng nhiệt tình chu đáo và chuyên nghiệp. View bể bơi cũng rất tuyệt vời. Khoảnh cách từ khách sạn đi sang biển cũng tiện lợi nữa.
Negative_Review: Gạch sàn khi ướt sẽ khá trơn, nên phải cẩn thận.

Positive_Review: khách sạn gần biển , có các tiệm ăn ngay con đường sau lưng . Khách sạn hiện đại , tiếp đãi phục vụ chuyên nghiệp.
Negative_Review: không có gì đáng thân phiền

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
they gave us welcome drink and flower garlands. spacious room and shower. breakfast included but we wanted to try locals. lovely pool view. staffs were great, parked our rental motorbike for us overnight, brought me allergy cream to the room in the middle of the night right after I asked for,… beachfront and there’s a chill bar across from the hotel with live music at night. easy access to corner shops, restaurants,…

khách sạn đẹp, phòng ốc rộng rãi sạch sẽ. nhân viên nhiệt tình và dễ thương lắm ạ. đến vào mùa mưa nên thời tiết ko thuận lợi lắm nhưng bể bơi xinh, biển ngay trước ksan nên thích lắm ạ. ko có gì để chê đâu ạ
Negative_Review:
wish I could stayed longer

ko stream đc ở tivi nhưng e ngại hỏi lễ tân nên ko sao ạ

Positive_Review: Our favourite accomodation of the whole trip. Review_Title: Beautiful resort w/ great location, fantastic views and great staff!

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Absolutely stunning hotel in an amazing location. The staff were very friendly and catered to our needs. The views from the pool and room were stunning! Reasonably priced and they even do some laundry for you free of charge.
Negative_Review: There weren't very many sun beds by the pool but we typically didn't have to wait very long for them. The laundry service is free for 5 individual items of clothing but after that it's very expensive and you're better off going around the corner to one of the local laundry services. They did slightly shrink one linen shirt but everything else came back ok.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The guest relationship officers were excellent. Our room was facing the beach. There's an open-air nightclub/disco about 150 meters down the road. They were blasting their music late into the night which disturbed our sleep. The next morning, the GRO asked us whether we had a good sleep. My wife casually mentioned it's noisy and couldn't sleep. The GRO immediately took action and offered to change our room to a higher floor which we happily accepted. We had a good sleep after that. Next morning another GRO came looking for us while we were having breakfast. It was a pleasant surprise. She asked how was our sleep after we changed room. We told her we had a good sleep. The same thing happened when we checked out. Another GRO asked us the same question and hoped we had a good stay. We happily said yes. We're super happy with the excellent services of your GROs. They made us feel at home. Keep up the good services.
Review_Title: Hotel is clean, excellent services and good location.

Positive_Review:

The restaurant was fantastic and the food was lovely. Breakfast was fantastic. The girls at breakfast even got to know what type of coffee you had. Excellent service from Nan. She was so kind and sweet. 
The rooms were clean and spacious.
Negative_Review: There really is nothing that stands out

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Awesome staff, they really give their best. Room was nice, we even received an upgrade on the view. Breakfast was really good and the restaurant too. Loved the pool and the skybar. We also used 2 of their shuttles and it saved us a lot of planning. They also helped me by secretly decorating the room for my partner's birthday while we were out. 😍 We also used their laundry service twice - they comped some of the stuff, which was a really nice touch.
Negative_Review: They gave me a bit of anxiety before arriving because they refused our credit card just 2 days before the start of our stay because it was on my partner's name and not mine. I would have appreciated a question instead, but we solved it quickly so no harm done.

Review_Title: Lovely location - tip eat breakfast in bar

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review: I don’t give top marks very often but this place was great. The area was excellent with the beach on one side and the little streets of Au Duong at the back. The room was huge and had no noise from neighboring rooms at all. Staff were, as is always the case in Vietnam, excellent. We were on the 22nd floor and did get a bit of street noise but didn’t bother us too much at all and I’m very sensitive to noise. Lower floors might get a bit more. Breakfast wasn’t included in our booking but it looked good. We just went to a little French bakery for a croissant (excellent) and coffee. Suited us to have a break from the big breakfasts we’ve been having.
Negative_Review: Nothing.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
I loved this place - will come back here! I booked 20 nights in the TMS hotel and I loved everyone of them.

It starts with a very warm welcome where you're greeted with a friendly smile, a refreshing cocktail and a Hawaiian like flower necklace. When they asked me if they could take my photo I was a bit hesitant, but when they gave me the printed photo in a lovely welcome frame I was sold.

My room was as hoped. Large, huge bed, huge bathroom with super nice walk-in shower with a big rain shower-head. I had booked a room with city view and that's what I got. I stayed at the 23rd floor and the views were fantastic, I had a nice balcony with seating options and it was simply perfect. What I also loved is the AC which was very sensitive, but in a good way. You could really fine tune the room temp by changing it only 1'C degree up or down.

My room was also very quiet and when the sliding door the balcony is closed you shut out 99% of the outside noises.

I didn't spend much time on the rooftop even though it is a lovely terrace with a good restaurant (I ate here once). The rooftop infinity pool is very relaxed, but it only offers a few beach beds so if you want to spend some time there you have to be early. I couldn't care less as right in front of the hotel there's a long-stretched white sandy beach where you can enjoy the sun and sea in a perfect way. For only EUR 1,35 you can rent a bed for the day and get some refreshments too. The beach wasn't crowded when I stayed there and there's a lot of space if you want to have some more space. But again, this beach is plenty big and you will never feel crowded.

What else? Well to my opinion the most important was the genuine feel of the hospitality in TMS hotel. Each and every team member was fantastic and incredibly service oriented and friendly. A big shout out and THANK YOU to Thanh Thào working in the small coffee corner in the lobby.
Review_Title: I Loved every minute of my stay

Positive_Review: We stayed in a spacious family room with 2 bathrooms. It had an amazing sea view which we could enjoy from the comfort of the balcony. The room was not speckless clean, but it was comfortable for us during our short stay here. The staff were responsive to our requests for room service and reservation for spa. Breakfast buffet spread was good, but the quality was just alright. We enjoyed an hour of Oriental Hair Washing at a discount since we were guests there, the service staff who attended to us were really great and professional. Will consider this hotel if we return to Da Nang for its sea view and great service.
Negative_Review: There was a musty smell in the bathrooms when we first checked-in, but was gradually gone after a night there. Food quality at the breakfast buffet has some room for improvement (for example the rice rolls were served cold so they tasted quite stale...not a good representation of the delicious Vietnamese food we had in Da Nang). The food overall was also too greasy for my liking.

Positive_Review:
From the check-in, till last minute we stayed there, which was 23 days I think 🤔, we liked everything, the reception made us feel everyday very welcome ,including the guys at entrance ,who gave us the beach towels,the staff at the restaurant , from the Chef and all the waiters, were polite ,very caring, clean,and amazing food ( I worked 30 years in this business ) we ate there many times and the food was every time exceptional, already miss the (Pho noodles ,and bahn xeo,the sea food soup too ,the vegetables spring rolls,..really the whole menu..
The Spa staff, very professional, we had massages and Sauna to the hotel and some other places too, we like the most at the hotel and one another place, to the hotel the whole package from the Sauna ,the massage rooms, the staff ,the massage beds, very clean and always smelling perfect, thousand percent recommend that place 😀 
Over all the best 5 star I've stayed so far, in the top of all ,just can't stay without mention her, the most charming and professional executive assistant manager, -miss Phuong ,-thank you for making us feel ( me and my cousin)very welcome everyday ,asking us every time if we needed anything, just to make sure we've got everything to make our holiday unforgettable in that place 😊
Till next time TMS ,see you soon...

The hotel was spotless throughout from room to reception to toilets etc. Of all the hospitality we have experienced, this stands out by a mile. It is a 5+ hotel for an extremely good price. We had a junior ocean suite and had the best view of the ocean. Free laundry service everyday day, free sauna / steam bath at the spa and more. Would recommend over other bigger brand hotels like the Sheraton / Hilton etc. They also offer tours that are cheaper / same price as other external tour operators and tell you when a tour may not be needed but recommend a taxi / driver / entrance fees instead.

A beautiful hotel at the perfect location of Da Nang Beach. Our sea view corner room allowed us to enjoy the beauty of this place in a perfect way. Roof top pool and bar are gorgeous and it is worthwhile spending time up there. 
Rooms are very nice and clean and staff is very friendly and always supportive. Breakfast is offering big selection and much off it freshly cooked. We really enjoyed our 5 days stay and will certainly come back.

The hotel was accommodating and even though Bamboo delayed our flight such that we lost a night at TMS, staff were kind and understanding, allowing us to cancel a night. 

Upon arrival, staff were friendly and helpful.

Everything is priced reasonably and the spa and massage facilities were excellent and good value. There was a promotion where I had 2 hour massage for 795k dong.

We had a family suite which was very spacious and well planned out plus had ocean views. The suite allowed for space and privacy for our 3 kids.

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
We stayed 5 nights during raining season and had an ample room with ocean view. Da Nang’s bay is quite beautiful. So many interesting sites to visit in the area: Hoi An, Huè… We enjoyed our time very much, even if the weather was not helping.
The staff was friendly and very helpful in making special arrangements. Outstanding facilities (albeit we were not able to use the pool) and great spa services.
The breakfast buffet was very good, they served delicious steak every morning!, and changed the offer daily.
Negative_Review:
I would recommend avoiding rainy season for this visit. 
The breakfast buffet at times was a bit too busy and noisy. 
We did not understand why they had fake drawers in our bedside tables. They could have been useful to keep the room organized. ;)

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review:
- Outstanding attention to the customer experience. 
- Rooms are huge and the view is incredible (premier double room with partial seaview). 
- Gym has all you need (weights, trademils, yoga mats etc.). 
- The pool view is as good as in the pictures. 
- There is a fancier restaurante on the roof top with good food and an incredible view.
- You literally cross the street and you are on the beach. Behind the hotel there are a few nice streets and a food market with unbelieavably good and cheap seafood/lobsters etc. Scooter rental is 100m from the hotel. 

What a fantastic experience!
Negative_Review: Could be ideal to have a better organized way to allow people to enjoy the pool (I think there are only 10 pool beds or so available). Perhaps the hotel can set a time limit (like 1h) so more people can enjoy the view and the experience. Not a big deal as I did manage to seat there and and enjoy, just more like a suggestion

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review:
We had such a great time here!! The hotel is splendid but what makes it a really great hotel is the staff. 
They are helpful, kind, hospitable,...I cannot highlight them enough!
The restaurant is top-notch (price/quality is very, very good) and the restaurant staff is super professional and so kind. Chef Hung is a really good cook. (There wasn't a single dish we did not enjoy. Bur for me the ribs were chef's kiss. The meat fell of the bone.)
I also did a few treatments at the wellness which were wonderful. Trang Anh and her colleagues are excellent masseuses and the welcome you get is so kind and relaxing. 
The staff at the front desk (shout out to duty manager Jason who was super friendly and very funny), as well as all the other people working at the hotel, deserve praise. Not a single one did not greet you or was unkind. And whatever question you have, they are always there to help you with a smile.
The rooms are spacious and very clean. Big thumbs up for the cleaning crew!
We absolutely loved it here. Cannot recommend this hotel enough.

Negative_Review: I can’t think of any negatives.
Review_Title: Wonderful stay. I would book this hotel again.

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review:
Loved the modern building, the restaurant and amazing food. The roof top terrace pool has fabulous views of the beach, sea and the city. 
The location is great, right across the street to the lovely beach. You are also about 30 minutes from Hoi An city. 
The staff are lovely, welcoming, friendly and extremely helpful. They always make sure your needs are looked after. 
It was my birthday while in Vietnam and the hotel made me a Birthday cake and gave me a card 🎂. Wishing me Birthday greeting . 
The large rooms are modern. I have amazing view of the city and beach from my room. 
I loved my stay at TMS hotel and can't wait to return.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Booked the Ocean View suite, lets just say the view was phenomenal!! All the staff were friendly to us, smiling and greeting whenever we bumped into any one of them. Breakfast was good especially the pho station. Amazing location as well being right opposite the beach, also walking distance to a lot of nice restaurants, bars and cafes. All and all we had a wonderful experience and no doubt will be the go to hotel if we're planning to visit Da Nang in the future.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Đại Dương - Ưu Đãi Spa
Positive_Review:
Breakfest was very delicious with a very good selection. The rooms were very large and spacious and the bed were very clean and comfortable. the Bathroom was very clean . The shower was very large and water pressure was great.
The location is amazing. Beachfront location with a rooftop infinity pool.
Negative_Review: The customer service from some of the staff was amazing from some staff members and in some case very lacking. I would want the brought to the attention of the hotel manager. I can cite a specific issue. I contact the front desk about the electric golf carts that take guests on sightseeing tours and we were told that we do not need to book in advance because the carts will come within 5 minutes as soon as we request one. So we said we would be down right away to request a sightseeing tour. We proceeded to go downstairs within 5 minutes of the phone call to the front desk in order to request the sightseeing tour but than we were told that the electric carts were on a break for 1 hour. Additionally we asked who we spoke with at the front desk to find out why we were told incomplete information and no one was able to say who we spoke with. I think that the Concierge/ front desk staff could use some training when it comes to local tours and attractions. and if they do not know any information they should be able to put us on hold to research for us.

RoomType: Suite Grand 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Our oceanview room on the 23rd floor was modern, spacious, clean and had a fantastic view of the Da Nang beach coastline. Nice rooftop bar and pool. Location was excellent, just across the street from the very nice Bac My An beach. This was one of the nicest, cleanest public access beaches that I have visited compared Phuket, Hua Hin, Bali and Sentosa. There were also bars and restaurants within walking distance and attractions such as Dragon Bridge and Marble Mountains were just about 15mins by a short taxi/Grab ride. Also, liked that this areas is slightly quieter than the beach area further up north where the restaurants and hotels are more densely packed.
Negative_Review: Location near beach bars meant that we could hear the music from our room, but these were promptly turned off at 11pm each night and didn't disturb our sleep. Breakfast selection was average; during breakfast peak hours, it could get a bit crowded due to tour groups but it remained a pleasant dining experience.
Review_Title: Overall, an excellent hotel and we would definitely consider TMS hotel Da Nang again.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển

Positive_Review:
TMS Da Nang is a wonderful hotel, we liked it so much we extended our stay there by a week. The rooms are spacious, quiet and modern and the staff couldn’t be more helpful. It’s conveniently located right in front of the beach and within walkable distance to lots of great restaurants. 

I also have to give a special mention to the spa team who provide excellent services - I especially recommend the herbal massage.

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển

My room was huge with such a comfy bed. Its right in front of the beach so perfect location for what I needed (a chilled couple of days at the beach). The pool and bar on the roof is incredible, with views of the sea and city. The breakfast is lovely with a big selection of options.
Negative_Review:
There's only a dozen sun loungers by the rooftop pool as it isn't a big space but the beach is just in front so not too much of an issue. 

The music from the beach bar in front of the hotel was quite loud in to the night but that was one night so I don't know if thats something that is a regular occurance.

Positive_Review:
The staff at TMS were fantastic. From our arrival to departure their hospitality was a highlight. 
We wanted to stay on the beachfront and the location didn’t disappoint, we could cross the road and step onto the beach. In addition, there were lovely eateries and cafes within walking distance in the quaint streets behind the hotel. 
Our rooms were lovely with a spectacular view. 
Unfortunately as it was chilly and drizzling we didn’t make use of the swimming pool, but in the right weather conditions it would be an amazing place to cool off and enjoy the views of the Da Nang beachfront. 
We only stayed for 1 night, but wish we could have stayed longer.

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review: Had a great stay at this property and will definitely stay here again. Hotel is just across the beach. The room was spacious, modern and everything looks new and nice and Korean. Shower room was phenomenal and spacious with the large view window. I was assigned the upper floor with a balcony that has partial view of the beach. Many thanks for the ashtray on the balcony. Room has minibar. Also has nice and comfortable seating areas and a work area. Wi-fi is fast and stable. Rooftop restaurant has amazing views of the city. Infinity pool has views of the beach. Check-in was a breeze. Staff greeted me with a flower lie...sweet. Staff were amazingly friendly and helpful. The room service was excellent. Truly Korean hospitably at it's beast. Not a big fan of the Korean menu and I mostly eat outside as great restaurants are nearby. Other shops like convenience store, laundry and pharmacies nearby.

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review: We had a partial sea view room which was great, you could see the beach and sea so it was great. The room was very large and the air con was excellent, very comfortable bed, we slept really well, Wi-Fi was good no issues at all, the shower was amazing didn’t want to get out. Huy Hoang was absolutely brilliant, his English was brilliant and he was really funny, he made our stay great. Thank you (Tom) which is what he called himself, the hotel could do with at least another 5 of him. Breakfast was ok, plenty of it but a bit of a bun fight in the mornings. Rooftop pool was amazing, fabulous views up and down the full length of beaches and happy hour with the cocktails and food was delightful. Fantastic hotel. Would definitely stay again and would highly recommend.
Negative_Review: A little noisy from the street at night as there are obviously beach parties and a lot of partying Koreans until early hours, this didn’t affect us much as we were always tired enough to sleep after full days exploring so not much of an issue for us, but if you don’t like the noise I’d suggest earplugs. That said it’s not massively loud.
Review_Title: Fantastic hotel, fabulous staff and a rooftop pool view to die for

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Overall the hotel was fantastic with lovely, airy, clean rooms with amazing balconies overlooking the beach and sea. The rooftop pool is just stunning and the top floor restaurant also has great food with amazing views over the city, particularly at night. The staff were great and very helpful in helping us organise trips to Hue and SunWorld for our daughter's birthday (highly recommend for a fun afternoon/evening)

Breakfast is great in the hotel, but there are plenty of other options nearby too if you want to get out and about. Our girls loved Crazy Cow ice cream and we also visited the Dragon Bridge on the Saturday night. Be prepared though as it was very busy on all the surrounding streets, so if you don't like crowds, you'll have to see the fire-breathing from a distance !!
Negative_Review:
This is isn't a criticism of the hotel, but be aware there is a lot of development going on in Da Nang and lots of construction site. On one of the days there was a lot of drilling and banging coming from a nearby site and there is a stage on the beach directly below the hotel that plays loud music most night until 11pm. 

Also be prepared for noise form the street outside (tooting of horns, etc) and also the fact the beach is packed at 5.30am with people watching the sunrise. None of these things can be controlled by the hotel though and they didn't detract from our stay. In short, if you want peace and quiet Da Nang is probably not the place for you....
Review_Title: Really, lovely hotel and great location on the beach

Beds were very good. Because of it being an ocean view room, there was a bit of noise from the main street of traffic, but not to much of a hindrance compared to other places in Vietnam. Rooftop infinity pool and restaurant/bar with amazing view. The pool is clean and a good size. Breakfast is good, not to much variety, but for me a first time, steak with breakfast.

The room was so clean, spacious, ocean facing was stunning. Management was great. There was music playing on the beach till early morning and they sorted it out.
Fabulous experience and highly recommended. Bicycles on offer. Lovely surprise of offering 5 pieces of laundry daily on the house. Rooftop bar had wonderful sunsets. They need to order tonic water for gins. Also make sure there are adequate towels at all times on the rooftop. Minor complaints for improvement to perfection.. This Hotel was close to perfect with friendly staff, excellent facilities, cleanliness, great proximity....Thank you

RoomType: Suite Grand 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Very good location. amazing views from the room. As we took the Family connecting rooms (we actually got a gorgeous view of BOTH the city and the Ocean). The bright airy feeling of the rooms was a plus and watching the sunrise and the gorgeous moon from the balcony was a major highlight of our stay. Right across (2 min walk or less) from the beach. Being one of the tallest hotels along that stretch also meant that the sea right in front of the hotel was suitably sheltered (if the sun was too hot). The staff were all very friendly and helpful. The Night View from the bar at the top - the city lights is also amazing. This was an excellent accomodation - and a lovely welcome to Danang for us :)

Positive_Review: Our stay at TMS Da Nang was incredible. Firstly, the staff were the kindest, most helpful, welcoming hotel staff I have ever experienced! Five stars also from room view, cleanliness, breakfast, facilities & location (on the beach). Only thing to note is that it is a 10 minute drive away from the city centre - but the ocean view is worth it! If you are sensitive to noise, I will say that we had a the suite with the ocean view, and you can hear people on the beach all night, but this was not an issue for us. Thank you, TMS Da Nang - you truly made our trip to Da Nang so, so memorable!

Most hotels on stretch dont hv the balcony. we choose this hotel only because of the rooms & its view from balcony. Their breakfast buffet is huge. This is the best hotel in my lifetime. The staffs are so good and they always ready to help & whatever we needed they served us. Thanks TMS for making our stay wonderful. Would like to stay in your hotel in future again.
Negative_Review: Nothing is there which I didn't like.
Review_Title: Best Hotel in Danang with good sea view rooms

Positive_Review:
I liked the staff - very polite, friendly and helpful - espescially I would like to thank the manager Tom who is very attentive and gave us tips where to go and what to see. 

The hotel has a very nice rooftop with pool and good cocktails for reasonable prices.

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố

Takes 1M bond money and only returns the money back if you can produce the receipt you have been given when you checked in. This is weird, if someone loses the receipt, they are doomed.
The lift is pretty slow. Room us bit noisy in late evening, if you are facing to the city, Pool is not that clean.
Review_Title: Good stay, bit noisy if you are facing towards the city, make sure you dont lose the Bond receipt!

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển

Corridors floor need retouches

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review: Amazing staff, breakfast, clean room
Negative_Review: Too many group tourist.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: The room was modern, nice minimalist style. Breakfasts were rich and of high quality. The location is great: there are numerous restaurants, bars, coffee shops, convenient store, pharmacies.
Negative_Review:
Minimalist style has it cons - no place for your clothes (only 4 hangers and no shelf at all).
Absolutely no noise protection, I could hear everyone in the corridor and next door. Also some kind of noisy water pump kept on switching on and off. The minibar was cooling nonstop and was very loud. And most annoying: endless waiting for a lift! Only 2 lifts in such a big hotel were not enough.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Lovely staff, the hotel pool and breakfast were very enjoyable
Negative_Review: The rooms are quite dated and the elevator is horrible and very slow

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Very big room and very nice breakfast. The staff was very helpful
Negative_Review: If the rooms don’t have sea view then you can see a lot of buildings and trash - not the best view. The room is quite minimalist and not very pampered. If it’s only for day or two then it’s nice but if you looking for more resort place it’s not.

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Negative_Review:
Sand in bed sheets - problem in all bedrooms. Staff changed but even fresh sheets appeared to have sand in them. Mattresses also very uncomfortable and need to be replaced.

Gala dinner was a waste of time and over priced. 

Breakfast okay but very busy.

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Negative_Review: Not happy with stay, I don’t ever write reviews but felt I needed to this time. I paid for 2 rooms, clearly stated on my booking that it was for 3 adults and 1 child (9years old) upon arrival they told me I had to pay extra for the bed and that the booking was free for 6 and under even though the booking clearly shows 9 years old. Reiterated this to them and they still made excuses saying i will still have to pay even though the room was already paid for. The room showed clearly 3 adults, 1 child (9 years old) I shouldn’t have paid extra for a bed that I have already paid for. They said the room was only for 3 adults when clearly it wasn’t. Massive rip off because they think they can charge you any price they want. Definitely not staying here. Absolute hell, cockroaches in the room also.

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review: Room, service very good
Negative_Review:
Breakfast area smelly, noisy, crowded, food quality very average.
Overall expensive for the quality

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The property was very clean and breakfast had a wide variety to choose from. The pool was small but lovely
Negative_Review: The welcome was lovely but over the top especially when all you want is to check in and go to your room. The drinks prices at the hotel and mini bar were excessive for Vietnam standards. When the hotel is full waiting for the lifts becomes a part time job

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review: NIce hotel in a good location. Lots of nice restaurants around and the beach just across the road
Negative_Review: Cleaning was very random, sometimes early in the morning, sometimes late in the afternoon and sometimes not at all and we would have to remind them. It is so loud at night with all the music and street noise, the rooms are not sound proof.

Negative_Review:

Negative_Review: quite pricey hotel for Vietnam and instead they ruined some very expensive shirts while dry cleaning them : they delivered them all stained / shrunken. had to throw them away . as a way of apologise they sent someone who couldn’t even speak English. stay away, very poor hotel management, not worth the money

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The location of hotel is great and room is spacious.

Front desk staff too rigid. Reluctant to give extra room key and refused to give extra complimentary water. 

Hotel breakfast is terrible. 
 Taste and variety is not worth the price. Doesnt come with coffee from machine. Service by pot. Detox water heavily added with syrup.
Review_Title: Won't stay in the same hotel again

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Breakfast had a good selection, freshly cooked breads, an egg and pho station with other delights available.

We took a family room, it was very spacious and had most of the amenities we needed. View of the beach is decent and appreciated the fresh fruit on the first night.
Negative_Review:
To improve the breakfast: the coffee needed to have been drip/filter rather than mixing up instant granules. 

To improve the room layout, the wardrobe needed to have been placed in the rooms rather than the entrance way. We had one surprise, a giant cockroach appear the 2nd night, it jumped from the curtain to the bed where we finally bound it up in a tissue. 

We are in the 25F restaurant twice. The food was good, service was too, apart from the last night we waited a very long time for the banana sago and then even longer to get the bill. We had young children who had to be taken outside… then the room before we could settle up.
Review_Title: Good all-round hotel, but would consider a slightly different area next visit.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Breakfast limited in choice. Espresso you need to pay for in compare with other comparable properties nearby. Room was not that great either.
Negative_Review: The property was kinda new but the service was not that great. The pictures they show of the room was not what it look like. I was not impress with the money that paid for.

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The sea view is magnificent. The bed is comfortable.
Negative_Review: The kitchen dustbin was not empty despite we throw foods inside and eventually my husband put all the bin right in front of the toilet door to ensure they clear the bins. The floor is not clean with chocolate stain in the room once we first enter the room and the floor is sandy despite we did not visit the beach on that day.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Wide rooms with nice views (even city views), good restaurant/room service and hotel very well located on My Ke beach
Negative_Review: Lack of management and staff training for a hotel that brands itself as 5 stars, rooftop swimming pool closing at 7PM is too early

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Beach facing room, spacious room, nice rooftop bar, but 1 free 1 cocktail during happy hour.
Negative_Review: Not sound proof, able to hear sound from clubs at night and car honking, water pressure low for shower, no black out curtain, hence room facing beach becomes bright at sun rise.

the services.
at the breakfast place, they told me to get the foods first, they keep the table for me. but turns out someone was using my tables. I had to sand and wait in the middle of bunch of ppl with holding my foods. 
When I checked out, we didn’t touch anything at the mini bar, but they told me “actually, you drank one Heineken”. omg, they tried to charge me beer, even I didn’t touch anything. cannot believe

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
perfect location- the hotel is located next to the beach, lots of seafood restaurants, street food stalls and bars around the area. 
cleanliness- hotel room was very clean, house keeping service was fast and efficient.
staffs- extremely helpful and friendly, they helped us with map translations, looking for a cab, and giving suggestions on sightseeing places.
( + the breakfast in the hotel was really good especially the pho noodles soup!)
Negative_Review: all of the staffs are very friendly and extremely helpful but unfortunately one of the staffs I encountered at the hotel Spa centre was kinda rude and frustrated when me and my mom were trying to figure out the prices of the spa services) , she got annoyed at us despite giving us wrong information and was brushing us off asap, I got really disappointed and had to cancel the booking in the end.
Review_Title: it was really good and worth every penny I spent.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển

Negative_Review: 沒有不滿意

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Lækre værelser, dejligt hotel og skøn pool. God beliggenhed lige ned til den dejlige strand.
Negative_Review: Træningscenteret var meget lille. Hotellet var lidt upersonligt og morgenmaden og tøjvask var ret dyrt, derfor var det noget i fravalgte.

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review: Petit déjeuner très varié tant continental qu'asiatique. Très belles chambres et propre avec vue sur la mer. Très proche de la mer à peine 30 mètres. Le restaurant au dernier étage et la vue panoramique de la plage et de la ville. Sa situation géographique nous permet d'être entre Hoi An et Hue, ainsi que de nombreux petits restaurants aux alentours. Pas besoin de ramener de serviette pour la piscine c'est l'établissement qui les fournies.
Negative_Review: La piscine est un petit rectangle où l'on ne peut que patauger à 10 personnes maximum. L'eau est très sale quelque soit l'heure de la journée on ne peut pas voir les carreaux au fond de l'eau. Très peux de chaises longues (6).

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Le petit déjeuner est incroyable

RoomType: Suite Grand 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: 立地が良く、近くのカフェやレストランに歩いて行ったり、道路を挟んですぐ海なので、気軽に海遊びを楽しむことができた。

RoomType: Suite Grand 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Locatie prachtig. Mooie grote kamer met uitzicht op de oceaan. Balkon. Mooie badkamer. Mooi zwembad. Rooftop. Heel vriendelijk personeel. Ontbijt super. Als we weer naar Danang gaan dan zeker hierheen.
Negative_Review: Niets

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: 早餐自助选择比较多挺好的，游泳池的风景也不错，很舒服，员工的态度很好。整体卫生也很干净这些都很喜欢。
Negative_Review: 菜单看不到图片，对面粉过敏的人有些难选择食物

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Frühstück super, Personal sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Matratze war zu weich wurde sofort gewechselt. Zimmer sehr gross und grosse Dusche
Negative_Review: von außen etwas laut bis 24.00 Uhr

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review:
Perfekte Lage: über die Straße der lange Sandstrand, auf der Rückseite des Hotels ein Viertel mit hübschen kleinen Straßen und vielen netten Cafés und Restaurants.
Unser Zimmer mit seitlichem Meerblick im 24. Stock geräumig und angenehm auch für unseren längeren Aufenthalt. Letzte Etage darüber der Pool und das gute Bar-Restaurant mit tollem Blick auf Strand und Stadt. Ausgezeichnetes Frühstücksbuffet mit einer breiten und wechselnden Auswahl sowie Stationen für Eiergerichte und asiatische Frühstücksstandards. Dazu die Top-Mannschaft, die auch bei morgendlichem Andrang den Überblick behielt, nach 2 Tagen unsere Tisch- und Getränkevorlieben draufhatte und uns zudem mit guten Besichtigungstipps versorgte. Das Personal war generell ausgesprochen freundlich und hoch motiviert. Die Rezeption hat uns sehr geholfen, eine von einer ATM eingezogene Kreditkarte schnell von der betreffenden Bank zurückzuerhalten. Wir können das Hotel nur empfehlen und würden hier gerne wieder buchen.
Negative_Review: Das Hotel hat keinen eigenen Beach Club. Am Besten eigene Strandtücher dabeihaben.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Tolle rooftop bar und Pool. Sehr schöne Zimmer und sehr guter Service, direkt am Strand
Negative_Review: Keine Strandliegen vom Hotel, kann man haben sehr günstig dort mieten

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển
Positive_Review: Chambre très spacieuse. Très bon petit-déjeuner. L'emplacement est idéal et le personnel serviable et très sympathique

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: ビーチが目の前で、窓からの景色が何も遮るものがなく、最高でした。屋上プールもちょうど良いサイズで、スタッフの方の対応もありがたかったです！
Negative_Review: しいていえば、部屋に電気コンロがありましたが、フライパンや包丁などがなかったので、調理用具など揃ってると最高だったなと思いますが、食べに行く場所もたくさんあるので、逆にコンロがなくていいのかなとも思います(^^;

Positive_Review:

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: wir hatten ein tolles Zimmer mit Meerblick, der Sonnenaufgang ist dort einfach ein Traum ! Das Zimmer ist sehr schön und geräumig, das Internet funktioniert prima und das Frühstücksbuffet ist super gut. Das Personal ist ausgesprochen freundlich und hilfsbereit. Besonders wollen wir hier Tom (Management Buffet) für seine nette Art danken ! Siehe auch das gemeinsame Foto ! Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder !!!
Negative_Review: da gibt es eigentlich nichts zu meckern ... etwas überraschend war, dass wir trotz der Höhe - wir hatten im 24sten Stock ein Zimmer - relativ viel Straßenlärm auf dem Blkon gehört haben. Aber dafür kann das Hotel natürlich nichts.
Review_Title: Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder und freuen uns schon auf den nächsten Besuch !

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển

Negative_Review: 虫

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: L’emplacement
Negative_Review: La musique d’ambiance très monotone et la nourriture pas au top pour le prix.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Super obsługa, powitanie jak na Hawajach kwiatami :). Cały czas uprzejmi, pomocni i uśmiechnięci. Śniadania super, każdy znajdzie coś dla siebie. Pobudka na wschód słońca warta w 100%! trochę mały basen, ale po drugiej stronie ulicy masz morze :) Fajna propozycja na pobyt w Da Nang.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
직원들이 미소를 지으면서 최선을 다해 서비스하겠다는
그 모습에 감동을 받았고 최선을 다하는 직원들께 감사한 마음을 보내드립니다 
가족들과 2일간의 휴가를 보내면서 너무 즐거웠고 좋은 추억을 남기고 떠납니다 
하늘이 도와주셨는지 날씨까지 완벽했던 휴가였습니다
다음에 베트남에 또 휴가를 온다면 TMS호텔에 숙박을 잡아서 숙소 바로 앞에 있는 미케비치해변에서 시간을 더 즐기고 싶네요~
가족들과 좋은 시간 좋은 추억을 만들어 주시는데 도움을 주셨던 TMS호텔에 계신 직원분들께
감사하다는 말씀 올립니다~~ THANK YOU SO MUCH

체크아웃(오전11시)후에도 짐보관 서비스 참 좋았습니다

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
Das TMS Hotel Da Nang Beach ist wirklich toll. Die Lage ist unschlagbar und ermöglicht einen bequemen Zugang zu allen wichtigen Orten. Die Einrichtung ist zeitgemäß, ohne Anzeichen von Abnutzung, was den Aufenthalt besonders angenehm macht.
Insgesamt ist das TMS Hotel Da Nang Beach eine ausgezeichnete Wahl für Reisende, die nach einem modernen und gut gelegenen Hotel suchen. Mit kleinen Anpassungen könnte es noch mehr glänzen, aber insgesamt war unser Aufenthalt super.
Negative_Review: Die Bar könnte jedoch freundlicher gestaltet werden, um eine einladendere Atmosphäre zu schaffen. Das Rezeptionspersonal könnte von zusätzlicher Schulung profitieren, um den Service weiter zu verbessern. Trotzdem bleibt das Personal stets höflich und hilfsbereit.
Review_Title: Angenehmer Aufenthalt im TMS Hotel Da Nang Beach: Modern und Zentral

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: 방에서 일출을 볼수 있으며 해변, 맛집, 마사지 등 걸어서 모두 해결할수 있어서 위치가 정말 좋다.
Negative_Review: 침대 매트리스가 조금 꺼져있었던 점

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: 방문해서 외관을 보고 관광호텔인데 비싸게 한건 아닌가 싶었는데요, 청결도와 직원서비스 등 식사 모두 그 가격만큼 괜찮았어요~ 오션뷰는 꼭 해야할 것 같아요. 그게 이 호텔의 장점같습니다^^ 바로앞 바다가 보이는데 최고였어요~ 물론 그만큼의 소음도는 있어요. 그렇지만 방음은 괜찮았습니다~ 한국사람들의 니즈에 맞게 조식도 괜찮았어요. 3일 식사했는데 조금씩 종류가 달라져서 지루하지 않았어요. 부모님하고 사용했는데(엑스트라 베드 추가) 좁지 않았습니다^^
Negative_Review: 1.수영장이 좀 더 크면 좋겠어요.. 객실 수에 비해 수용하기 어려운 사이즈라는 생각이 들었습니다~

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: 櫃檯員工很親切，忘帶房卡還麻煩人員幫我們開門很貼心。早餐十分豐富，每天都很期待吃早餐。泳池雖然不大但景觀遼闊也很好拍照。SPA課程還不錯懶得出門可以直接預約。過馬路就是美溪沙灘，任何時間都可以去沙灘玩耍。
Negative_Review: 房務清潔不一，前2-3天整理的很整齊，就感覺後面幾天只是折個棉被換毛巾而已。小房間的床旁桌灰塵有點厚。

Positive_Review:
人気で人が多いですが、ルーフトッププール。日陰はないので日焼けします。
19時～21時ごろのルーフトップバーは、普段お酒を飲まない初心者でも居心地よくダナンのキラキラの夜景を見ながら楽しめました。
周辺もお店が多く過ごしやすかったです。
シティービューの部屋にしたのですが、夜は夜景がきれいに見渡せて良かったです。おすすめです。
Review_Title: The Da Nang オーシャンビュールーフトッププール＆バー

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
お部屋はとても広々としていて清潔でした。朝日の見えるオーシャンビューもよかったです。
朝食も種類が多く充実していました。小さなボールプールのあるキッズスペースや屋上のプールなども子供は大喜びでした。
立地的にも周辺にレストランも多く、便利でした。
チェックイン時はウェルカムドリンクとフラワーレイで迎えてくれ、チェックイン時間も早めていただけました。スタッフも親切で全体的に大満足です。
Negative_Review: 夜になると周辺の音楽の音がズンズンと響きます。「うるさくて眠れない！」というほどではありませんが、神経質な方だとダメかもしれません。
Review_Title: 広々清潔なお部屋、充実した施設

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Café da manhã bem diversificado.
Atendimento espetacular.
Souberam que meu filho havia feito aniversário e levaram um bolo para ele de presente.
localização perfeita.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: L’accueil est sympathique et professionnel, le personnel est à l’écoute et efficace, l’équipement est conforme, la restauration est d’excellente qualité, la nourriture est variée et gastronomique, le café vietnamien est excellent, j’ai adoré le café au lait glacé, le phở ( bouillon de bœuf ) vermicelle au petit déjeuner…c’est une tuerie, les plats cuisinés par le chef Hùng sont d’excellente qualité, succulents et simples comme à la maison mais merveilleusement cuisiné. Le personnel est attentif et attachant, merci à toute l’équipe pour sa gentillesse et sa disponibilité. Nous avons gardés un attachant souvenir, je leur souhaite une bonne continuation et un avenir radieux à tous.
Negative_Review: Pas grande chose à redire en fin de compte, tout est bien géré, rien à signaler.
Review_Title: Courte séjour mais avec beaucoup de joie.

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
Chambres très spacieuse avec grand balcon. Personnel ADORABLE...on a été accueilli avec couronnes de fleurs. Juste à côté de la "Tourist Street", on y trouve tout plein de bar, restos, massage, manucure, supermarché ... EN FACE de la mer. Petit air de jeux pour enfants.
SUPER PISCINE EN ROOFTOP ...vue à couper le souffle ! Je recommande !

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: 部屋がとても広く、プールもあってよかった。ビーチまで歩いてすぐで近くにマートもありとても便利だった。
Negative_Review: 特になし

RoomType: Suite Grand 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Hôtel propre, personnel disponible et gentil, top emplacement face à la mer et commerces, petit déjeuner copieux et varié
Negative_Review: Rien

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Bardzo uprzejmy personel, świetna lokalizacja, piękny widok na plażę i morze. Śniadanie było bardzo smaczne. Restauracja i bar na dachu serwowała świetne jedzenie i cocktaile. Wyjątkowym udogodnieniem była możliwość skorzystania nieodpłatnie z pralni każdego dnia pobytu, co przy upalnej pogodzie i kąpielach w morzu było bardzo praktyczne. Jeśli kiedykolwiek wrócę do Da Nangu, zatrzymam się w tym samym miejscu.
Negative_Review: W zasadzie wszystko było super. Nie polecam jednak opcji z obiadokolacją. Personel nie jest zbyt elastyczny przy wyborze dostępnego menu dla rodziny. Niezrozumiały jest też zakaz wieszania ręczników i mokrych ubrań na balkonie.
Review_Title: Fantastyczny hotel, chętnie do niego wrócę

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Personnel avec un grand sens du service, des professionnels toujours souriants et courtois.

Персонал просто потрясающий, всегда помогают, всегда советуют, всегда стараются помочь.

Номера большме и просторные. Кровати огромные и удобные.


Докупайте завтрак он прекрасен. 

Бар на крыше прекрасен, а шеф и су-шеф у него большие молодцы. 

Вид из бассейна прекрасен.

Positive_Review:
Wir wurden sehr freundlich empfangen und bekamen bei unserer Ankunft ein leckeres Begrüßungsgetränk und eine Blumenhalskette. Das Zimmer (22. Stock Stadtblick) war super schön und sauber. Das Personal war sehr nett und immer hilfsbereit. Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt sehr genossen. Absolutes highlight ist der rooftop infinity pool.
Danke für den tollen Aufenthalt!

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Отличное расположение отеля на берегу моря. Шикарный вид из окна, много ресторанов вокруг и магазинов! Супер отличный обслуживающий персонал отеля, очень вкусные завтраки-любой может найти тут все что захочет поесть.Абсолютно все на высшем уровне!!! Шикарный бассейн на крыше с оболдеными видами!!! Хороший спортзал. Пользовались услугами СПА. Остались очень довольны! Благодарю за гостеприимство! Дальнейшего Вам процветания!!!❤️

Positive_Review:
깨끗하고 매트리스 엄청 편해서 꿀잠 잤습니다.
미케해변이 장점이기도 하고 단점이기도 하더군요. 저층에 묵었는데 파도 소리가 밤새... 
샤워부스 따로 있고 수압 엄청 쎄서 피곤이 다 풀리더군요. 로비 직원들 모두 친절합니다.
Negative_Review: 저희가 묵은 날만 그랬는지 모르겠지만 낮에 뜨거운 물이 잘 나오지 않았어요. 저녁에는 아주 잘 나왔구요. 다른 불편함은 없었습니다. 날씨가 안좋아 미케해변을 제대로 못 즐겨서 아쉽긴 하네요.

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển

Negative_Review: 마지막 날 온수 시스템이 고장나서 체크아웃할 때까지 찬물로 씻었습니다.. 그 점이 유일하게 아쉽네요.

Positive_Review:

뗏기간을 모르고 예약한거라 사실 비행기도 룸 가격도 다른 기간 대비 많이~~ 비싼 가격에 했어요. 맛집등등 문닫은 곳 많았구요. 하지만 그랩 잘 잡혔고 그럼에도 문 연 식당과 마사지샵 있습니다. 뗏차지 붙어도 베트남 물가 저렴합니다. 

시설 조식 서비스 룸 상태 다 훌륭합니다
로컬 반미 맛집이 근처예요.

Positive_Review:
- Lage, direkt am Strand 
- Sauberes großes Zimmer

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
모기에 엄청 물렸었는데, 직원분이 약도 주시고 방청소 추가로 해준다고 하셨고, 모기약도 뿌려준다고 하셨어요^^1박남은 날이라 방도 옮겨주신다고 하셨지만 괜찮다고 제가 사양했습니다. 수영장이 뷰가 멋졌는데 너무 바람많이 부는 날에 가서ㅜㅠ 추웠어요ㅜㅠ
오션프론트 정말 뷰가 환상입니다^^
바다바로 앞이라 위치도 좋았구요~
그리고 마지막날 11월2일 아침번 여자직원이셨는데
저희가 다낭공항을 국내선으로 잘못 그랩잡아서 4만동 가까이 현금이 부족한 상황에서 비행기시간은 다되고ㅜㅠ우왕좌왕하고 있으니 
(카드등록을 못한데다 베트남돈 다쓰고 온다고 호텔 비용지불하면서 다썼거든요ㅜㅜㅡ)
그냥 돈을 주시며 가라고 하셨어요ㅜㅠ
제가 카드결제하겠다고 했더니 괜찮다고 정말 괜찮으니가시라고 웃으며 응대해주셨어요ㅜㅠ
진심으로 감사드립니다~

RoomType: Suite Grand 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
오션뷰가 정말 좋았어요. 
옥상의 수영장은 생각보다 작았지만 한낮에 땡볕에 사람이 아무도 없어 가족들만 여유롭게 이용했습니다. 
(한낮에 땡볕이어도 물에서 놀면 고층이라 은근 싸늘합니다. 그러니 땡볕 더위 걱정마시고 사람들 없는 이 시간에 즐기시길 추천해요!)
인생 사진도 찍을 수 있는 멋진 뷰였어요~
조식도 괜찮았습니다. 재 방문의사 있어요~
Negative_Review:
바닷가에서 밤12시까지 가수 공연? 등이 있습니다. 
부모님모시고간 여행이라 일찍 자야하는데 문 닫아도 꽤 잘 들려요. (12층)
그래서 고층으로 요청하라는 후기 보고, 저도 고층으로 요청했는데요.
방이 없다며 처음에 5층?을 주더라고요.
3박 예약이라 그럼 하루 자고 내일은 고층으로 바꿔달라 요구했더니 
내일도 방이 없다. ??? 체크아웃하는 사람이 아무도 없다고? 정말? 진심이지?? (살짝 표정 썩음)
그랬더니 잠시만 기다려달라며 한참을 뭘 어쩌고 저쩌고 하더니
12층으로 주더군요. 원래 다른 사람 방인데 주는거라며
?? 층수도 미리 지정해서 예약이 가능한거였나?? 아직 체크인이 안된방이니 날 준걸텐데
다른사람 방이라는게 무슨말이지?? ???? 
물음표가 엄청 남았지만 부모님도 기다리고 계시고 더 얼굴 붉히기 싫어 고맙다하고 체크인했습니다.
혹시라도 고층 요청했는데 낮은층 받으신분들은 좀더 강하게 요청하세요. 
12층이었지만 음악소리 차 소리 은근 다 들립니다. 
저층이었으면 더 시끄러웠겠죠.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: オーシャンビューの部屋は素晴らしく、スタッフが親切で色々と相談に乗ってくれた点。チェックイン時にもらったレイ(花輪)が嬉しかったです。
Negative_Review: たまたまですが、屋上のインフィニティープールがメンテナンス中で使えなかった点。楽しみにしていたので残念でした。公式HPではインフォメーションされていたようなので、予約時にプールが使えない旨連絡が欲しかった。
Review_Title: ホテルスタッフのおかげで気持ちよく過ごせました。

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
더 할 말이 없습니다. 가격대비 다낭 최고입니다. 
직원들은 매우 친절하며, 영어는 기본입니다. 호텔로비에서 바다까지 5초걸립니다. 방이 매우 넓습니다. 돈 조금더 보태서 해변뷰 방 잡으세요, 아니면 후회합니다. 그리고 바로앞에 서핑보드 빌려주는곳 있는데 생각보다 파도 좋습니다. 사람도 없고.

***매주 토요일 저녁, 루프탑에서 바베큐 파티를 엽니다. 저도 우연히 일정이 겹쳐서 신청해봤는데 (추가금액있음), 조식 뷔페와는 비교도 안되는 식사가 제공됩니다. 무조건, 무조건 가보시는거 추천합니다. 솔직히 다낭자체는 하노이나 호치민에 비해 할게 없어서 실망스러웠는데 이 바베큐파티 하나로 다 위로받았습니다.
Negative_Review:
호텔자체의 세탁서비스는 정말 엄청나게 비쌉니다. 근처에 호텔 세탁 픽업, 드랍까지 다되는 외부업체 있는데 거기다 맡기세요. / 시내와 멉니다. 걸어서 용다리 까지 30분 또는 그 이상 정도 걸립니다. / 테라스에 재떨이 있는데 금연이에요 피우면 돈내요.

***가끔 시끄럽다는 후기가 있는데 호텔 위치 자체가 어쩔수가 없습니다. 해변가 공연장 바로 앞에 위치해 있으며 호텔기준 조금만 오른쪽으로 가면 해변클럽과 공사중인 옆건물이, 바로 왼편에는 규모가 좀 있는 펍이 있습니다. 하지만 그만큼 문화적으로 활발한 위치에 있다고 보시면 되요, 저희는 맨날 앞에서 공연보다보니 공연하는 밴드랑 친해져서 옆 펍에서 술한잔 했습니다ㅋㅋ 밤귀가 예민하신 분들은 힘들수도 있지만 솔직히 그렇게까지 신경쓰일정도는 아닙니다. 완전히 해외여행온 분위기라 오히려 좋았습니다.(해운대 같은 느낌 전혀 아닙니다.)

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
El desayuno está muy bien, muy variado.
Las habitaciones están genial y el personal nos ayudó a contratar excursiones.
Negative_Review:
Pese a que no es un hotel barato, me pareció que está un poco sobrevalorado para las 5 estrellas que tiene.
Otra cosa que no me gustó fue el temas de las bicis, te las dejan gratis 2 horas y a partir de ahí, pagas.
Veníamos de otro hotel en el que estaban a libre disposición.
También tienes que dejar un depósito al llegar (no nos pasó en el resto de hoteles del viaje...)

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
건물이 현대식이고 깨끗해서 7월의 찌는 더위에도 쾌적하게 지냈어요. 직원들 전부 친절합니다.
아래에 적은 단점에도 불구하고 다시 간다해도 TMS 갈 거 같아요.
Negative_Review:
저희는 총 객실 두개 예약했고 그 중 하나는 패밀리 투베트룸인데 (사진에도 나와있지만) 방 2개가 아니라 방1개에 거실겸 방1개로 침대 하나는 거실에 나와있어요 ㅎ 물론 인지하고 간 사실이긴 하지만 통상 생각하는 투베드룸이 아니라는 거 ㅎㅎ 저희는 가족들끼리 간 거라 상관은 없었지만 참고하셔요^^
해변가에서 밤에 행사하거나 바 같은데서 음악 크게 틀어놓은 날은 밤 10시가 넘어도 시끄러워서 잠자는데 좀 거슬렸네요^^
이 부분은 다낭 해변가 호텔 어딜 가도 비슷할 듯요.

RoomType: Suite Premier 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: 2년 전 혼자 방문하고 가족들 데리고 재방문함! 쾌적하고 수영장 피트니스 다 좋음~!! 조식도 최고 거의 조식이랑 수영장 가려고 옴 해변도 바로 앞이고 넘 좋음
Negative_Review: 없음

RoomType: Suite Gia Đình 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
2번째 방문이었는데 3년전 대비 살짝 연식은 느껴졌으나 그래도 여전히 깔끔하고 관리가 잘되고 있어서 만족했습니다.
직원분들도 다 친절하시고 조식도 상당히 훌륭한 편입니다. 주변에 맛집이 많고 위치가 매우 좋으며 객실 발코니나 루프탑에서 바라보는 바닷가 전망은 최고입니다. 루프탑 레스토랑도 가격도 괜찮고 음식 깔끔해서 추천..
Negative_Review:
체크인이 몰리는 시점에는 리셉션이 바쁘고 경황이 없어서 대기가 좀 있을수 있으며
가장 큰 문제점은 호텔 자체의 문제는 아니나 앞쪽 해변가 클럽에서 늦은 밤까지 음악, 노래 소리가 크게 들려서 소음에 예민하신 분은 추천하지 않습니다. 그것만 빼고는 매우 만족스러운 호텔입니다.
Review_Title: 여전히 만족스럽고 좋은 호텔이나 주변 소음은 있음

RoomType: Phòng Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Một Góc Biển

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
오션뷰 최고에요. 돈 더 내고 오션뷰 방 선택할 만한 값어치 있어요. 하루 종일 바다만 보고 있어도 힐링 될 정도로 뷰가 짱이에요 진짜!!

밤마다 해변가에서 파티해서 시끄럽다는 후기를 읽고 갔는데, 생각보다 그렇게 시끄럽지 않았고 잠귀 밝은 편인데도 시끄러워서 깨진 않았어요. 대신 복도랑 방음이 잘 안돼서 밖에서 떠드는거 잘 들려요. 특히 쥥귁인

직원들 모두 너무너무너무 친절해요. 룸 청소 안 한 날에는 오늘은 클리닝 서비스 필요 없는지도 확인전화해주시네요.

조식은 매일 메뉴가 조금씩 바뀌는데 늦게 가면 맛있는 거 못 먹어요.

인피니티풀이 사진으로 보는 것보다 작아서 좀 놀랐지만, 선베드랑 타월 공짜로 제공돼서 좋아요. 근데 걸터 앉아서 사진 못 찍어요 못 앉게 합니다.

Positive_Review: Die Lage und das sehr große Zimmer
Negative_Review: In den Flurgängen war leider ein sehr unangenehmer Geruch. Das Frühstück ist sehr stark asiatisch gehalten und obwohl das Land sehr starke Auswahl an frischen Früchten hat gab es in der einen Woche die ein und selbe Sorte und leider nicht unbedingt frisch. Hat man nicht erwähnt, dass man kein privaten Chauffeur will sondern ein ganz normales Taxi wurde man mit der teuren Variante leider über den Tisch gezogen. Die Betten sind leider auch sehr unbequem und sacken komplett ein nach paar Tagen Aufenthalt.

RoomType: Suite Premier Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Sehr schönes Zimmer, toller Blick vom 22. Stock auf das Meer. Freundliiches Personal. Angenehmes Restaurant am Rooftop mit Blick auf die Stadt. Speisen sehr gut, nervige Musikbeschallung wurde auf meine Bitte sofort reduziert. 
Beim Frühstück gab es Espresso aus der Maschine und nicht wie sonst üblich aus dem Automaten.
Negative_Review:
Es sind viele Kleinigkeiten, die sich in der Summe doch nervig gestalten, in dieser Kategorie und Preislage (knapp über 100 Euro pro Nacht), eine Auswahl:

Laundry sehr teuer 

Frühstück: wer gerne Video-Telefonate und Gäste im Gym-Outfit neben sich hat, der hat keine Probleme. Enormes Angebot - für asiatische Gäste, das westliche Angebot ist sehr überschaubar. Weitere Eindrücke empfehle ich der Phantasie...

Postkarten konnten nicht entgegen genommen. Mir wurde jedoch die Adresse vom Post Office notiert, für den Taxifahrer...

Sehr unbequeme Balkonmöbel. Kein Stauraum im Schrank (3 Kleiderbügel)...

Zimmer wurde erst am Nachmittag gemacht. 

Handwerkerarbeiten (Bohren, Hämmern) im Nachbarzimmer vor 8 Uhr. 

Wollte an der Rezeption einen Geldschein über ca. 8 Euro für Trinkgelder (Zimmer, Bellboy...) wechseln lassen. Nicht möglich. 

Nochmal: alles Kleinigkeiten, nur bei dieser Roomrate/Kategorie darf das eigentlich nicht vorkommen.
Review_Title: Schönes Hotel am Stadtstrand. Leider mit einigen Kratzern.

RoomType: Suite Ở Góc Có 1 Phòng Ngủ, 1 Giường Cỡ King, Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review:
Quầy bar, hồ bơi trên tầng 36 và các tiện ích ở tầng 35. Nhân viên trên này rất niềm nở, thái độ phục vụ rất tốt. Đặt biệt là các bạn trong phòng spa và sauna (nam).
Bữa ăn sáng buffet ngon.
Negative_Review:
Check in phòng quá trễ. Tận 16h mà chưa có phòng. 
Bạn nhân viên trưởng ca tự ý chuyển phòng tầng cao xuống tầng thấp mà không hỏi ý khách trước. Chúng tôi đã phản hồi ngay lập tức sau khi nhận ra (tầm 3 phút). Tuy nhiên, bạn tiếp tân trả lời do khách đòi nhận gấp nên sắp xếp như vậy, phòng kia dành cho khách khác rồi. Chúng tôi cảm thấy không được tôn trọng.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 1 Giường King, Hướng Biển, Ban Công

Negative_Review:
- Không xứng đáng với 1 khách sạn 5*. Không có nhân viên chào, mở cửa, bê đồ. Không có welcome drink.
- Sảnh lộn xộn, thang máy chờ quá lâu.

Positive_Review: Mọi thứ đều ok cho đến khi thanh toán, họ trừ thẻ của tôi 5 tr đồng cho 1 đêm nghỉ, hứa sẽ hoàn trả nhưng đến giờ tôi vẫn chưa nhận được tiền hoàn trả

RoomType: Phòng Superior 1 Giường King, Hướng Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: Vị trí thuận lợi, view rất đẹp, có thang máy bằng kinh trong suốt để ngắm cảnh
Negative_Review: Phòng ốc bt, khi đặt phòng đã ghi rõ ở booking là có trẻ 6 tuổi và đc ghi là miễn phí cho trẻ nhưng đến lúc check in ksan nvien lại bắt đăng kí thành viên thì mới được miễn phí??? Giờ check in rất muộn 15:00, và k có cả welcome drink cho khách, trong khi mấy khách nước ngoài thì vẫn có? Mặc dù ghi rõ có thêm trẻ 6t nhưng thêm 1 cái khăn tắm trong phòng cũng k có. Bể bơi bé như bể vầy
Review_Title: Chất lượng dvu ko tương xứng với giá tiền

RoomType: Suite Ở Góc Có 1 Phòng Ngủ, 1 Giường Cỡ King, Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển, Ban Công
Negative_Review: Khách sạn phải xem lại việc hợp tác với hãng taxi. Lái xe taxi có thái độ rất mất dạy, chửi khách, doạ đánh khách. Không thể chấp nhận được!

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King, Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: Nhân viên nhẹ nhàng, nhiệt tình, chu đáo. Làm việc đúng nguyên tắc!
Negative_Review:
Thứ nhất là không có dép đi trong nhà, phải liên hệ mới cung cấp!
Thứ hai là dọn phòng không cung cấp thêm giấy vệ sinh (tối thiểu phải có 1 cuộn nếu như tiết kiệm)! Phải yêu cầu mới cung cấp
Thứ ba là khách sạn ko kiếm soát được vấn đề của 1 số khách, để 1 số cá nhân hút chất kích thích (cụ thể là cần, cỏ) khiến không gian hành lang sặc mùi khó chịu. 
Thứ tư là không nên để nhân viên lễ tân là nữ chuyển đồ và vali cho khách. Vì con gái khoác màu áo lễ tân không nên làm 1 số việc của 1 người mặc áo bảo vệ.
Review_Title: Tất cả là sự góp ý trân thành nhất!

RoomType: Phòng Superior 1 Giường King, Hướng Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: Room with ocean view
Negative_Review:
My experience with Four Points by Sheraton is generally good (fast check-in process; friendly and dedicated room service and bar staff). However, during my last morning at the hotel, there were issues at the buffet breakfast restaurant (level 3) that made my experience incompleted:
1. As I couldn't eat much and didn't want to waste food, I only took a small amount, just enough to eat. After putting my food on the table, I went to get water and when I came back all my food had been thrown away by the staff. I feel uncomfortable with this behavior. The staff should have asked my opinion before throwing all the food away like that. Furthermore, I feel that the staff works like a machine, only focusing on clearing the table without being tactful, not paying attention to customers and wasting food unnecessarily.
2. At the beverage counter, there are several types of vegetable and fruit juices. I saw watermelon juice but there was only about half a glass left. I asked the staff if I could have watermelon juice? The staff replied that that was it, watermelon juice was only for private room. Because they still have leftovers, they leave them here for other guests. I asked the staff that I had seen watermelon juice served in previous sessions to all guests and they said it was watermelon juice mixed with other juices, not pure watermelon??? It's funny that watermelon, a fruit that is so popular, low cost, and very common in every hotel restaurant, is a rarity at a hotel like Four Points. Besides, the staff's response made customers feel unappreciated and feel like a kind of secondary guests. I will consider whether I should return to Four Points for my next vacation.
3. And finally, I would like to privately feedback the above to Four Points but cannot find a channel to contact (email, phone or QR code...). I went to the website to find a contact but couldn't find it. So, via Booking.com's survey, hope the hotel can read it.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 1 Giường King, Hướng Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: Right across from the beach, nice staff, lots of services and useful facilities on site. A swim in the rooftop pool was a great way to start the day.
Negative_Review: For the star rating and price of the hotel, I felt like certain things were a little basic, such as the quality of the toiletries. Also, I went to use the sauna / whirlpool room about an hour after it had officially opened, and the steam room and sauna hadn't been turned on yet. None of these are huge complaints - I just thought it would all feel a little more luxurious.
Review_Title: Useful if you want to be right at the beach, but value for money is a little questionable

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King, Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: The staff is super friendly and helpful, always available for any request/ question. The location is great and nearby many seafood restaurants.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 1 Giường King, Hướng Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: The spa was amazing, the therapists were highly trained. Seeing the reviews and having bad experiences in the past, we were a bit skeptical to go in for a massage at the hotel and fortunately we decided to give it a go and were really impressed with the service. The hotel also have incredible ocean views and we could see the lady Buddha statue from our room.
Negative_Review: The lift sounds were too high and we could hear ‘ding dings’ the whole night with people going in and out of the hotel at all times. This really disturbed our sleep. At peak time 6 - 10am the lifts would be so busy and crowded that it takes you around 15 mins to get to the breakfast buffet. There were no chairs in the balcony for us to sit down and enjoy the views. The bathroom needed a good clean to get rid of stains, mould and dirt in the grouts. It was really disgusting to look at the shower tiles and bathroom sink. There was a foul smell in the lobby and hallways at all time which was really unpleasant.
Review_Title: Good views, comfortable but needs proper cleaning
