RoomType: Phòng Có 1 Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Biển, Tầng Cao, Ban Công
Positive_Review:
1. Great rooftop pool
2. The breakfast buffet was good
3. Clean room and service from room attendants was fast and efficient.
4. If you don't spend too much time in the room and are mostly out doing activities then this place is fine. 
If you plan on staying in and lazing around then it could become cramped. 

5. The sauna and spa- seperate one for Males and Females. Sauna fits 2/3 adults. It's tiny BUT the view is of the city floor to ceiling glass- quite awesome.
Both sauna and spa are old and need a little fixing up. 

6. High tea- great selection of little treats. Loved it.
Negative_Review:
1. Rooms are too small and cramped. I was on level 31. 
2. Toilet didn't work and needed the plumber to come by to fix it
3. Bathroom- there were old grout stains and felt worn and dates
4. Had some booking issues with the front desk girl trying to explain to me the extra room charges. Took me 5 attempts to explain it to her. 
She wanted to charge me -extra person fee, room surcharge fee .... It didn't make sense at all. 
Took her 30 min before calling the manager to solve it in 2 minutes. 
Tara- manager on duty. She's the best. 

5. Movie night- they played the wrong movie for my 8 and 10 yo to watch. We watched the movie anyway because it was another cartoon. Comfy bean bags for you to sit on. 
6. As soon as you walk into the lobby area there is a distinct smell..... Disinfectant/smelly socks/toilet smell (this is what my kids called it) but there is an odor of some sort. Could be the De Nang smell, not sure.
Review_Title: It does the job for a young family of 4

RoomType: Phòng Superior 1 Giường King, Hướng Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review:
Wonderful breakfast, very nice hotel and amenities. Used the pool and sauna. 
Right across the street from the beach.
Negative_Review:
It would be very nice to have something to sit or lay down in the sauna area. It is a bit funny to have to sit on the stairs between two rounds of sauna. 

The communication flows in the hotel have severe room to improve. 
My partner got stuck in an elevator with 9 people. They rang the bell and asked for help. They heard someone but nothing seemed to happen. No ongoing communication to keep people from panicking, no action. 
Only when I alerted the rooftop bar an engineer sprang I to action. But even at that point no communication flow to the people inside nor to me. Luckily my partner had his phone and I was able to give him and the people inside updates on what I saw happening. Please have standard procedures with good communication put in place for things like that. 
Afterwards they offered us a complimentary tea time, which was very nice.
Review_Title: Very nice hotel and amenities. Great location.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King, Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review:
Beach view, beds - OMG so comfy. The team working at the hotel were amazing at all times. Nothing was too much trouble and they were always subtly looking out for you to make sure everything was looked after. I had a rude guest trying to repeatedly push past me in quite a full-on way in the breakfast queue, the lady checking people in for breakfast noticed this and personally made a point to serve me first and escort me to my own table. All without making a fuss. 
Also, Tai deserves a shout-out - he was so helpful both on my arrival and also with some internet questions I had (the internet was fine and fast btw).

For the gluten-free, GF bread was available at breakfast, often sweet varieties (with berries etc).
Negative_Review: All I can fault are the lifts. They are slow for a hotel of this standard, It's a big hotel with a lot of guests but the lifts seem to run really inefficiently. And on a couple of occasions, all of the floors pressed cleared and we ended up going the other way for a while. First-world problems but not in line with the rest of the hotel experience.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 1 Giường King, Hướng Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: The staff are lovely and friendly.
Negative_Review:
We could not stand another night! Left earlier than we booked for and decided to stay at a hotel nearby. 

The issue was black mould on the walls. Terrible upkeep of this supposedly upmarket hotel. The entire building has a musty smell that is covered by a staff member continuously walking around with deodoriser. 


Details we want to share but you may not want to read:
My wife has severe allergies to any mould. The first room we were given was appalling (see photos) and her allergies broke out immediately. We returned to the Lobby and waited over 2 hours for them to find us another room. 
When they found a room my wife inspected before we moved our luggage and it also had mould. They showed us a 3rd room and it was better (still had some mould but not as bad). The manager tried to suggest the black was "glue" from the wallpaper... Glue doesn't cause her allergies to flare up, mould does. 

After 2 sleepless nights we couldn't take anymore and decided to cut our stay short and find another hotel with vacancies in the area. 

Acknowledgements:
The manager did try to help us. He also gave us 2 free massage tickets. Although, he took one of them back after realising each one was for 2 people. He then explained how we "have to appreciate how difficult it has been for him." (Direct quote He said to me). After taking back the massage voucher he then gave me 2 free beers in the lobby bar. 
Seems they lack understanding that we were the customer and weren't getting sleep because of the atrocious state of their rooms. Expecting us to have sympathy for him somehow... 

We would recommend you choose very carefully and consider some of the other hotels in the area. Our experience with Four Points by Sheraton was horrific and we would not want anyone else to have a similar experience.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 1 Giường King, Hướng Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: Staff were lovely
Negative_Review:
The ocean view rooms are very noisy with traffic noise until midnight and then starts again around 530am.
The design of the room has the smoke detector directly above the bed, which flashes all night long. When the lights are out it is magnified. The hotel is aware of the problem and offers an eye mask.
Staying on lower floors means you have to wait for elevators repeatedly (full from higher floors), especially at peak hours, which in the morning if you're trying to leave at a specific time for a work meeting is very frustrating (walking 8 flights of stairs not a preferred option).
Review_Title: Noisy and not restful rooms. Wouldn't stay here for work travel again.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 1 Giường King, Hướng Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: Location, facilities, view, breakfast
Negative_Review: The room was humid, so much that the bedsheet were wet and the carpet a bit smelly. We dried the bedsheet with the hair dryer the first night, because we arrived at midnight and were too tired to ask for a new room. We did it in the morning but they said they had no more rooms available (with so many rooms I doubt it, but still). They offered to deep clean the room and change the bedsheet. We said we preferred to have a different room as the humidity was clearly non going to be solved by cleaning the room, but no chance, that was the only option. Well, the room was cleaned so and so, the humidity was the same (all my clothes were wet, the passport cover bent) but we didn't tell anything anymore as we stayed only 2 nights and there was no point in spending our holiday complaining. Also, there was not much collaboration from the hotel staff on the matter. However, that's no way to solve an issue in a high quality hotel like that and at such an cost. Ah, they offered us 2 small beers for our trouble..

RoomType: Suite Ở Góc Có 1 Phòng Ngủ, 1 Giường Cỡ King, Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển, Ban Công

Staff were friendly.

Negative_Review:
Hotel was inflexible as the booking was made via Booking.com.
During reservation, Booking.com said breakfast was included, but hotel said only for 2 guests, kids need to pay, even though kids was included in the reservation w booking. 
Also, in Booking.com, a sofa bed was listed, but upon arrival, Hotel Staff said its a sofa and not a sofa bed. Blamed everything on Booking.com.
Additional Bed will need to be charged. 
After a friend intervened and contacted the hotel manager, then was a bed provided FOC. 

Upon checking into the room, a stain was noticed in the tub. It was cleared after informing the hotel.

Lift were slow in the hotel. During peak hours, took pretty long to reach the lobby if there are many stops in between.
Review_Title: Passable. Next time do not book via Booking.com

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn, Nhìn Ra Thành Phố, Ban Công

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast. Nice cosy hot tub.
Negative_Review:
1. This property is dated and needs freshening up. The rooms are dated, and the bathroom fixtures, fittings, silicone needs an update.

2. Not centrally located, you need a taxi to go to the centre as it is quite a long walk away.

3. The glass auto-sliding doors at the front of the building does not have a sticker on them. In certain light conditions, it looks like the door is open, even though it is actually closed. Unfortunately, I walked straight into the glass door at speed (in the afternoon on my way out), and bruised my knee on the first day. I reported my injury in the evening to the front desk and even stated the date/time when it happened so she could check, but the staff did not understand a word. She asked me to use a translator app and I typed into the app. . I specifically asked for medicated oil to help rub into the bruise (next day is ok too given that I stayed for 3 nights), and I provided feedback that they need to put stickers on the door to avoid similar future incidents. The staff I spoke to, said they will put stickers on the door during the next day. I received no compensation, no medicated oil, and no sticker on the door. I am utterly disappointed by the staff in handling this matter. At the very least, I would have expected them to make the doors safer for other customers, but that did not happen during my stay.

4. Partially blocked view of the sea, largely due to the unpleasant view of the high rise building construction happening next door.
Review_Title: Fab breakfast, but let down by the dated accommodation, and the handling of the auto-sliding doors that caused my bruise

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review:
ホテル内や部屋がとても綺麗でリーズナブルな価格もよかったです！朝食もとてもおいしかったです。
雨が降っていて傘を持参していませんでしたが、受付で無料で借りることができました。
ホテルからの移動はタクシーが基本なので、タクシーがホテル横に常時待機していて助かりました
Negative_Review:
部屋に入ったとたん冷房ガンガンで、12月末で寒く感じたので切ったところ快適に過ごせました。
タクシーがホテル横に停車してるのですが、なぜかハエがいてホテル周りも衛生面改善されるといいなと思います。ホテル内はとても清潔なので、中での衛生面不満は全くないです。

Positive_Review:
21Fのオーシャンビューのお部屋にアサインされました。お部屋から見る景色は大変すばらしく、日の出を楽しむことができました。ビューバスも最高でした！
また、スタッフの方は、みなさんとても親切でさすがシェラトンと思わせる対応でした。

頂樓的餐酒館價格公道，口味中上，對於想要待在飯店內享用設施不想他出飯店的人是好選擇，鄰近濱海，櫃台也都可以租借毛巾跟預定水上活動行程。
飯店內spa服務非常好，對於住客的額外折扣性價比很高。
Negative_Review: 靠海容易反潮。

조식. 적극적 써빙 도움에 감사합니다~.

약간의 아쉬운 점은
1) 한국사람이 너무 많아요...인기는 좋음
2) 조식은 좋았으나...질좋은 빵종류가 부족합니다
요거트는 없음?
3)룸의 카펫이 더러움...오염상태 많음
4)엘리베이터 ..많이 기다리고, 복잡
5)체크인할때...보증금 추가한 초과 계산 방식이 이해가 어렵군요

Positive_Review: 바닷가 바로 앞. 호텔 찾기 쉬움. 서툴지만 한귝어 가능한 직원이 있음. 직원 친절도는 케바케. 식당의 직원들은 매우 친절했음.
Negative_Review: 룸이 계속 습함. 화장실 블라인드 고장. 샤워기에서 물 뿜듯이 샘. 사진과 느낌이 다름. 조식 생각보다 먹을게 별로 없음. 보증금이 방값보다 비쌈..

Positive_Review:

잔반적으로 친절 했습니다
Negative_Review:
1.아침 조십 뷔페가 일반 4성급 호털과 별다르지 않음
 여러가지 갯수만 만지만 빵이 너무 많고 막상 쌀국수
 오무라이스 외 먹을께 없다는 평가입니다
2. 침구류가 먼지가 많아 조금 청결하기가 아쉬움점
3.한국 사람 많이 찿아뵙는 호텔 5성급인데 
 통역 사가 24시간 상주가 없어 많이 불편했습니다.
 비상시 안내테스크에서 응대해주시는분 있어으면 합니다....
4. 마지막으로 호텔외부 흡연 구역좀 부탁 합니다

Positive_Review: Ausstattung und Lage

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn, Nhìn Ra Thành Phố, Ban Công
Positive_Review: 4일 숙박했지만, 조식 메뉴가 차이가 거의 없어서 아쉬웠다.
Negative_Review: 객실 청소가 생각보다 깔끔하지 못했고, 조식이 아쉬웠다. 몇몇 시설은 운영이 제대로 되지 않아서 지불한 금액대비 아쉬웠다.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King, Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: 床很舒服。
Negative_Review:
早餐選擇性太少了，沒有甜點，客人太多 所以餐廳座位不夠，需要等。

我住16F, 每次搭電梯下樓，需要等很久。再者，房間內提供餐具不足，只有杯子，刀叉湯匙都沒有。

這些小細節，都會影響住宿體驗。但總體來說，除了這些以外，還是很舒服的。

RoomType: Phòng Superior 1 Giường King, Hướng Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: ロケーションが良かった。海沿いに立っているので綺麗な朝焼けが見えました。
Negative_Review: 洗面台横のコンセントの配線が悪いのか、ドライヤーを使おうとプラグを挿しても動かなかった。また、レインシャワーも使えなかった。
Review_Title: 良い点も悪い点もあって差し引きゼロ

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: 櫃檯服務人員很親切
Negative_Review: 早餐種類看起來東西很多，但都是很廉價的食材，最搶手的就是煎蛋….

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: 員工的服務品質
Negative_Review: 潮濕和霉味重
Review_Title: 飯店有些年份，尤其又有撲地毯，非常容易吸濕氣，就算工作人員努力的噴芳香劑還是難掩飾霉味，而且地毯潮濕易滋生細菌，建議換掉地毯，還好工作人員服務都很貼心，挽救了一切，不然住第一晚就想離開了

RoomType: Phòng Superior 1 Giường King, Hướng Biển, Ban Công
Negative_Review:
분위기 칙칙 쿰쿰 습습
조식도 그닥,,

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển, Ban Công

Negative_Review: 早餐不好

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: 朝食はおいしかった。部屋はきれい
Negative_Review: 27階であったが、排水、トイレの流れがよくなかった。フロントの英語が聞き取りにくく、お陰てクレジットカードを紛失してしまった。

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: 朝食が美味しい
Negative_Review: 毎回、韓国人と間違われて部屋も同じフロアでうるさくて迷惑だった。

Positive_Review: 전망은 좋음
Negative_Review:
객실 환기가 별로 꿉꿉한 냄새

조식

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển, Ban Công
Positive_Review: 깔끔하고 핀절하고 가성비 좋은 호텔
Negative_Review:

짓다만 건물이 오래되어 흉물스라움.

Positive_Review: Vị trí đẹp, phòng đẹp, view đẹp
Negative_Review:
Cơ sở vật chất tệ, không xứng với ksan 4 sao chứ đừng nói là 5 sao.
- các bình đựng xà phòng (dầu gội, sữa tắm, nước rửa tay) đều gỉ sét và tan ra xà phòng
- muối bồn tắm cũ, mùi hắc và chảy dầu, bết dính
- cân và điều khiển TV k hoạt động phải thay
- tủ mát hoàn toàn k hoạt động, làm hỏng hết hoa quả mua về

Nhân vân chán
- k ai hỗ trợ tí nào việc xách đồ vào, lên phòng hay lên xe. Đây là tối thiểu ở ksan 4 sao chứ đừng nói là 5.
- khi phàn nàn thì xử lí chậm
- muốn phản ánh thì chỉ nhận đc 1 cái card và bảo “bạn cứ lên đánh giá trên mạng” rồi xin lỗi qua loa
- nhân viên trực booking thì k trả lời. Nhắn tin hỏi trc khi đến ksan (ngày 6/7) thì đến trưa 9/7 check out rồi mới trả lời

RoomType: Suite Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Dòng Sông
Positive_Review: view và tiện nghi
Negative_Review:
- mình hay lui tới ở đây, thời gian trước mình sử dụng quầy minibar mọi thứ đều là free, nhưng lần này quay lại thì khách sạn tính phí quầy minibar đó khá cao trong khi giá phòng thời điểm hiện tại mình book là 3800, mình không biết là do đổi tập đoàn quản lí nên dịch vụ cũng đổi hay sao đó
- máy sấy để ở vị trí không được linh động lắm, mỗi lần sấy phải dùng tay ấn nên rất khó, đây là thứ mình muốn khách sạn thay đổi
- còn lại mọi thứ rất là oke

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Negative_Review: Dịch vụ 5 năm nhưng nhân viên rất tệ. Khi hỏi mượn kéo/dao, đã nói nếu bên mình không cho mượn vật nhọn thì nhờ nhân viên mang lên hỗ trợ nhưng nhân viên lại nói bên em không có?!. Việc dọn phòng ở đây cực kì tệ, có những ngày 2:30 chiều phòng vẫn chưa được dọn, hỏi thì nói là thời gian dọn phòng đến 5pm. Mình chưa từng thấy ks nào 5pm vẫn còn đi dọn phòng, bạo biện cho sự chậm trễ và qua loa của nv dọn phòng, và nhân viên dọn rất qua loa, rác dưới sàn vẫn còn, 2-3 hôm vẫn còn nguyên, phòng tắm xà phòng hết nv ko refill. Mỗi lúc cần nv hỗ trợ gì thì rất khó khăn, luôn làm khó phải đợi mình lôi policy ra nói mới hỗ trợ. Rất thấy vọng về dịch vụ 5 sao của khách sạn này.

Nệm lò xo bị lún không đều tạo cảm giác đau lưng khi ngủ khiến nhà tôi ngủ không ngon giấc. Tôi không gặp tình trạng đó ở những khách sạn khác. Ở khu vực ăn sáng không có khăn để khách lau tay, lau miệng, chưa bao giờ thấy tình trạng này ở những khách sạn có kèm buffet sáng.

Positive_Review: vị trí, khách sạn 5*
Negative_Review: Nhân viên lễ tân quá coi thường khách hàng, từ người quản lí, làm 1 cách khó chịu đến người ở, tỏ ra như mình làm quản lí là 1 đẳng cấp khác vậy. checkin thì rờm rà, phòng trống thì đầy, mà cứ khăng khăng mình vô cái phòng đó. Bao giờ làm căng vì đợi quá lâu thì mới đổi qua phòng khác. Bước vô phòng thì mọi thứ ok, nhưng view không phải mà mình đặt, rất khó chịu !!! Mong chấn chỉnh lại cái đội ngũ nhân viên để khách hàng còn quay lại !!! Đừng vì 1 số thành phần mà khách hàng phải quay xe 180 độ !!!!

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Đường Chân Trời
Positive_Review: Vị trí trung tâm.
Negative_Review:
Nhân viên đông nhưng checkin lâu.
Nhân viên tự ý vào phòng khách vào buổi tối khi khách đi ra ngoài.
Đồ ăn gọi lên phòng không ngon. Ko ăn đc nên gọi đồ ăn bên ngoài.
Nhờ nhân viên đem đồ lên phòng giúp do ko tiện ra ngoài nhân viên từ chối giúp. (Bạn mang lên giúp thì khách vẫn biết tip mà). Nên 12h đêm mình về tới ksan tự lấy mang lên.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: Vị trí tốt, phòng đẹp
Negative_Review:
Thiếu tính cá nhân hoá trong cung cấp dịch vụ 
1. Email toàn trả lời tự động, k hề có phản hồi cụ thể nào theo request của khách hàng. Thậm chí tin nhắn phàn nàn cũng không hề có phản hồi. Mình ở nhiều khách sạn từ 0 đến 5* nhưng chưa bao giờ thấy cách phản hồi khô cứng như thế này. 
2. Chính sách cứng nhắc: Chính vì chính sách cứng nhắc nên dẫn đến thiếu tính cá nhân hoá trong cung ứng dịch vụ. Gia đình mình yêu cầu phòng cùng tầng, tin nhắn tự động trả lời là “tuỳ theo tình trạng phòng”. Đến lúc check in, báo phòng ở tầng 20&30 trong khi gia đình có cả ngừoi già và trẻ em. Khi mình k đồng ý, nhân viên bảo đợi đến 3h30 chiều nếu muốn ở cùng tầng. Vâng, cả nhà vạ vật mãi từ trưa đến 3h30 trong khi đã đi một chặng khá dài và xa. Nếu ngay từ đầu khách sạn trả lời Not OK, gia đình sẽ chủ động tìm phương án khác thay vì mất mấy tiếng vật vã ở tiền sảnh.
Tất cả phòng ốc, thiết bị, vị trí… đều xứng đáng 5* ngoại trừ các điểm ở trên không hề giống với dịch vụ 5*.
Review_Title: Khách sạn 5*, dịch vụ thì không

RoomType: Suite Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Dòng Sông
Positive_Review: We loved everything about the hotel, easily our favourite hotel ever. The staff were amazing (big shout out to Julie and Tiffany in particular) who made us feel so welcome, though all the staff were equally as nice. We felt we were special guests of old friends, always welcomed back with big genuine smiles. The location is simply amazing - Da Nang is the most impressive city to arrive in at night - and we had the best room in the hotel, with the best view in the city, on the 26th floor with huge panoramic windows overlooking the river and the famous dragon bridge. Not only would I stay there again but would even arrange a holiday to include it.
Negative_Review: Wish we had booked longer, didn't want to leave. Can't fault it in any way.

Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel, lovely big, clean rooms and amazing views. Loved our stay.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
The hotel was amazing and way bigger than expected. Everyone of the staff is really kind and helpful. They always made sure that our stay is perfect and comfortable. Thoa and Huong helped and took care of us the most. They are very kind and sweet. 

The breakfast has a lot of options. I felt like you're at a restaurant. There is a Spanish, Korean, Indian and Vegetarian corner besides the Vietnamese one of course. Everything is very clean and the rooms are very big.

The facilities such as the outdoor en indoor pool are also nice to cool down during the hot days.

10/10 I would definitely recommend this hotel.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
The staff in incredible. It was my birthday the day after my arrival and they upgraded my room, I had a birthday cake sent to my room and the night before I left Thoa brought me a great cookies and tea, and the cleaning staff had a gift for me.
When I first walked across the river one of the girls (I know she lives in Canada, but I don't remember her name) walked with me to the bridge to make sure I was on the right side of the bridge. The staff is the best staff I have ever met in a hotel.
Negative_Review:
The restaurants. I tried to book a table on the 37th floor, but it was fully booked and I was escorted to the bar where I could have table on a bar chair facing the window-I said No thanks as I am travelling alone and I want to see other people.
I finally booked a table on 3rd floor, and I was the only client in the restaurant most of the time. I tried to order Gin and tonic, but the waiters (they were 7 there) did not know what I was ordering and I tried for 15 minutes to explain to them this famous drink, bot no they did not understand. I finally had very bad hamburger and sparkling water.
Review_Title: The Hotel is great and the greatest staff ever, but restaurant on 3rd floor might be better.

Positive_Review: My experience did not start out well but it ended up almost perfect. They threatened to cancel my reservation simply because my credit card has my full name (first, middle & last) but my reservation did not have my middle name. They apologized after I sent them an email. Location was very good, facilities are new and clean, room was spacious, breakfast buffet has many options, GYM equipment was clean and new.
Negative_Review: Dinner at the restaurant was not so good. Presentation was beautiful, with a mixture of different colors of vegies, the salmon was grilled to perfection with crispy skin. However, the rice was extremely dry and hard. The salmon was very small, and I ended up ordering a second dish of salmon. The rice came out again very dry, not eatable.
Review_Title: Almost perfect, except for the rigid reservation staff and extremely dry rice at dinner.

RoomType: Suite Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Dòng Sông
Positive_Review:
The room is clean and very comfortable. Bed is extremely comfortable. Shower facilities are great too 

We have a clear view of the Han River, the Dragon Bridge (not able to view the Dragon breathing fire show from the room; partially block by another building, but it is a short distance to walk to the Dragon Bridge) and the Han Bridge (unfortunately the bridge is under maintenance works and did not rotate on the Saturday night) 

Great location: walking distance to the night market, Dragon Bridge and Vincom Plaza where you can go for food and shopping

The service at the hotel was exceptional as well. Staff are helpful and pleasant. I had a wonderful experience. Please give Thoa and Uyen your staff awards. They are extremely helpful, helping me with the planning of the tour trips, excellent recommendation of trip, tour guide and bookings of the vehicle

I stayed for a total of five days, and I am not disappointed with the breakfast buffet which is provided at the restaurant: with a variety of food to choose from, and they even change the breakfast items to provide more choices 

Food at the Han River restaurant is excellent, with very friendly staff
Review_Title: Overall, I had a great experience, friendly staff and the amenities are great

Negative_Review:
Unfortunately there is a construction site next to the hotel and they are working all night through. And I think I have never slept in a bed more uncomfortable. At first, we had a kingsize bed and every time my friend moved just a little, I could feel the whole bed vibrating which together with the construction noise was accountable for a sleepless night. For the second night, thanks to the amazing work of the staff, they offered us a twin room (which we originally booked but it was not available at first) where we could sleep much better. 
At breakfast, we would have been happy about more vegetarian/vegan options as especially vegan food was very very limited.
Review_Title: Great staff, amazing views, but sleepless nights

They did try to overcharge us for our car transfer, and only give you one bottles of water a day which makes it hard to brush teeth and have water for night. The location isn't great either. The other side of the River is much nicer. It's a short walk but a hassle.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: I loved the coffee in the lobby bar. Some of the staff was very friendly, others not so much. Amazing view from my room on the 28th floor. The ladies in Hahn River 1 were very friendly.
Negative_Review: The bathroom was grungy; around the shower floor needs updating, the shower didn’t drain properly and then leaked all over the bathroom, the mirror was very dirty upon arrival. I chose this hotel because it boasted 2 pools and 4 restaurants but one restaurant was only open for breakfast, one was closed (buffet), and that left a fancy steakhouse for dinner or the a la carte menu. I have a gluten allergy and was looking forward to a variety of food to choose from, which did not happen. The second pool was also closed for a period of time. Also, be aware that it was hard to communicate in English.
Review_Title: Not really a five star hotel

RoomType: Suite Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Dòng Sông
Positive_Review: Location is great. Views are nice, but dirty windows take away from views.
Negative_Review: This is the 4th and worst Meliá hotel I've stayed at in Vietnam. No welcome drink offered to us, although other guests being served in front of us. Dirty windows in panoramic view room. Shower drain clogged, almost 3cm of water in shower floor during showers. Room door lock failed. Went down to lobby to change keycards then tried door still not working, called service from hallway phone explained no keys worked so it's not a key issue but a lock issue. Waited 30min in hallway for "engineer" to arrive, called 2 more times to ask for help. He finally shows up with only a keycard, no other tools, surprise it didn't work. We went down to lobby to explain the issue again, drop off a bag we couldn't put in room, let them know about shower drain, and went out without being able to freshen up in the room. Staff acted polite but didn't do anything to help after nearly an hour dealing with this. During checkout receptionist tells me they will check room (common) and for me to come back to counter in 10min, 5* hotel tells guest: you guest come back to counter, all other hotels they come let the guest know, To top it off during checkout they tried to charge me for snacks in the room, room never had any snacks or drinks besides free coffee packets. I wouldn't complain about any of these if single issues but together they show poor service and attention to detail. I won't be back.

RoomType: Phòng Grand Premium
Positive_Review: convenient location, great river view from my room
Negative_Review: long check-in, staff did not assist to find the correct elevator, I was struggled with the locker and card. Towel and floor seemed not very clean. I got a stomach problem with the breakfast on July 21, suspected mild food poisoning.

RoomType: Suite
Negative_Review:
I booked the suite room in the hotel for 5 nights and my experience was terrible to say the least. On checking in I was given a room which was completely different from the photographs shown online and was infact the smaller room and not the bigger suite which I had booked. I complained and they said that the pictures online were wrong. I asked for a refund, but they finally agreed to give me the the suite which I had booked originally. I wish my troubles had ended there but it was not to be.

My room was not cleaned even once during my stay even though it was mentioned to the reception multiple times. They said they were too busy and short staffed ( this coming from a major 5 star hotel and any random boutique hotel amazed me.) They promised everyday that my room would be cleaned the next day but that didn't happen. Because of this I didn't receive my complimentary water. I tried calling the reception multiple times to get water but no one answered. I would be out the whole day exploring Danang so they ample time to do basic housekeeping but clearly this was not important to them. I did receive a note of apology on the 5th morning of my stay promising to take care of the situation however when I returned at night the room was again not cleaned as usual.

I'm not one to leave bad reviews normally but I can't imagine how one a hotel as big as this can't do something as simple as basic housekeeping.

The only good thing were the views from my room, which I almost didn't get if i didn't ask for a refund so in short great location, good views but horrible service and terrible staff. Won't be back here for sure.

Negative_Review:

the rooms are equipped with kitchens including stove, yet there is absolutely no dishes, utensils or pans ! Why have them ?
the staff are all absolutely wonderful people, yet their training is over the top, far too attentive which makes it too much sometimes.

Positive_Review: 여행 첫날 약간의 문제가 있었지만 성심성의껏 해결해주시는 모습과 체크아웃때까지도 신경써주시는 모습에 정말 감동했습니다. 호텔의 모든 직원분들, 그리고 특히나 어시스턴트 프론트 오피스 매니저님께 진심으로 감사드립니다. 호텔 시설은 말도 못할 정도였고 조식도 매일 메뉴가 조금씩 바뀌며 맛있게 먹었습니다. 다음 다낭 여행을 계획할 경우에도 반드시 이 호텔에 머물면서 좋은 추억을 만들고 싶습니다. 다시 한번 저희 가족에게 최고의 추억을 선사헤 주셔서 감사합니다.
Negative_Review: 개선점은 하나도 없습니다.

RoomType: Suite Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Dòng Sông
Positive_Review:
Beautiful view from the window, very conveniently located in the centre, close to the night market, massage parlours, shops and restaurants. Very nice and caring hotel staff. 

Прекрасный вид из окна, очень удобное расположение в центре, вблизи к ночному рынку, салонами массажа и спа, магазинами и ресторанами. Очень милый и заботливый персонал отеля.
Review_Title: Beautiful view from the window, very conveniently located in the centre.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
الغرفه واسعه و الحمام يوجد فيه شطاف السرر مريحه ونظيفه والمخدات ممتازه 
الموقع لا باس فيه حيث انه يوجد مول خلفه وجنبه تماما قهوة ملاصقه له قريب من السوق الليل مشي على الأقدام 5 دقايق بالاضافه انه قريب من جسر التنين
Negative_Review:
التنظيف سئ لايام تنظيف الغرفه بشكل جيد عند عودتنا لم يتم إلا ترتيب السرير مع وضع مستلزمات الحمام لكن الارضيه والطاولات لم يتم تنظيفها حتى انه كان يوجد مناديل مرميه على الأرض لم يتم تنظيفها ..
حتى انه كانت توجد أطباق تم طلبها عند العوده وجدتها بقرب الباب الغرفه على الأرض لم يتم اخذها كان شي مقزز ..
بالاضافه ان الموظفين لا يتكلمون الانكليزيه بشكل جيد ولا يفهمون علي فوسيلة التواصل صعبه …
Review_Title: لا باس بالمكان لكن لا ارجع السكن فيه …

Piscina, ginásio e serviços existentes. Serviço do restaurante e bar do roof top. Atenção dos funcionários no tratamento próximo e individualizado.

Positive_Review:
מלון מדהים 
כבר מהכניסה מרגישים את השירות הטוב והמקצועי, מלון מהמם ומצוחצח עם ריח ממש טוב
מיטות נוחות בצורה שתקשה עליכם לקום בבוקר 
אני שילמתי 250 (+-) ללילה ולא האמנתי לתמורה שאני מקבלת
מקלחת עם זרם מטורף ומים רותחים.
שידרגו לנו את החדר וגם הנוף היה עוצר נשימה.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
Красивый вид из окна, хорошие хоть и дорогие бар с рестораном на территории. 
Приезжали на выходные, так случилось что все время шёл дождь и пришлось провести время в отеле. Большой спортивный зал, два бассейна.
Negative_Review: Нет стола для работы в номере, на первом этаже есть какие то помещения, но они скорее подходят для переговоров, один большой круглый стол без розеток. До стен далеко и там розетки сломаны. Вообще отделка в отеле из дорогих материалов, все чисто, но часто эта отделка сделана не аккуратно или не продумано.
Review_Title: За эту цену нормальное место, красивые виды из окна

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
모두 너무 친절하시고 깔끔합니다.
비행기에서 스튜어디스가 딱히친절하지않아서 베트남에대한 서비스 기대치가 낮은 상태였는데

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
Wir haben ein Upgrade auf die Grand Zimmer erhalten, die eine Küchenzeile und einen Wohnbereich haben. Das große Bett war sehr bequem mit hochwertiger Bettwäsche. 

Das Personal an der Rezeption ist sehr hilfsbereit, hat uns bei der Organisation eines Ausfluges zu den Ba Na Hills sehr geholfen. 

Das Frühstücksbüffet mit viel Auswahl ist gut und beginnt schon um 6 Uhr morgens. 

Pool fand ich ebenfalls gut. Man kann gut Bahnen schwimmen. Mitarbeiter an der Poolbar hat uns freundlicherweise an Happy Hour erinnert. Preise sind angemessen.
Negative_Review:
MiniBar war täglich nur mit 2 Flaschen Wasser gefüllt. Ich fand es schade, dass es keine anderen Getränke gab, für die man hätte bezahlen können. Meines Erachtens für ein 5 Sterne Hotel nicht passend. 

Außerdem gab es auf dem Zimmer keine Wäscheleine oder Ähnliches zum Aufhängen von z.B. nassen Badesachen.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: 맛있는 아침
Negative_Review: 없음

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
Das Hotel Personal war sehr freundlich und sehr hilfsbereit. 
Wir haben ein Upgrade des Zimmers bekommen, mit einem fantastischen Blick auf den Fluss.
Die Betten waren wirklich sehr bequem. 
Die Klimaanlage hat sehr gut funktioniert. 
￼Wir konnten glücklicherweise zu einem günstigen Tarif auch auf Late Check out umbuchen. ￼
Negative_Review: Das Frühstücksbuffet war zwar sehr umfangreich, allerdings sollte für die Kosten (200.000d pro Person) die Qualität der Gerichte besser sein.

RoomType: Phòng Grand Premium

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
A great location to visit Danag downtown. The staff is friendly, the price is great. There's a small shopping mall in 10 mins walk, and can visit most spots via walking. You can book airport pick-up service in advance. The pool is wonderful, amazing view! The SPA is great, more expensive but the service is wonderful.
就在峴港市中心，河邊的飯店! 服務人員友善(英文不太好但是可以溝通)，大廳有時會提供免費飲料，很多韓國的遊客+空姐。價格很划算，房間超寬敞，飯店內就有SPA中心，服務很好，無邊際游泳池很好拍照，走路大概5-10分鐘有一個shopping mall可以逛。沿著河和橋走，基本上市區的景點都可以抵達，不想走路櫃台也可以叫車+機場接送。
Negative_Review:
You can tell the room is a little bit old, and it could be cleaner (there were some sand on the floor). 
房間有一點舊舊的 地板上有一點沙子 但是整體來說還可以

Positive_Review: Wir haben uns die Suite gegönnt und es war jeden Cent wert. Der Ausblick ist einmalig. Wir würden es direkt wieder machen und können es nur jedem empfehlen ein bisschen mehr zu bezahlen. Das Personal ist super freundlich und hilfsbereit und man fühlt sich mehr als nur willkommen. Frühstück lässt keine Wünsche offen.

RoomType: Phòng Grand Premium
Positive_Review: 멋진 뷰에 조식 맛있어요 다음에 놀러오면 또 묵을거에요

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
Struttura accogliente, pulita e fornita di servizi come Piscina, 
Ristoranti (ottima qualità del cibo), Spa e Palestra.
Le camere sono spaziose e luminose, letti comodi e biancheria pulita.
Vista pazzesca sul ponte del drago e sulla città.
Negative_Review:
In generale pecca un po’ il servizio, il personale è molto cordiale e disponibile. Unico problema (o meglio scomodità) non ti accreditano sulla camera i servizi di cui usufruisci e devi pagare subito, anche il servizio in camera che non accettava carte, fortunatamente avevamo dei contanti. 
Oppure in piscina o al ristorante, se fornisco il numero della camera non capisco perché non possa pagare un conto unico finale.
Inoltre tempi lunghi, la camera è stata rifatta alle 15pm dopo 2 richieste.
Review_Title: Rilassante, struttura pulita, da rivedere il servizio.

RoomType: Suite Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Dòng Sông
Positive_Review: 숙소에서 보이는 경치는 아침 점심 저녁 모두 좋았고 어디로든 이동하기 편리했다 공항 접근성도 굿
Negative_Review: 조식은 아쉬웠다. 베트남에는 아침 일찍 문여는 곳도 많고 맛집도 많아서 혹시 다음에 이용한다면 조식은 이용하지 않을 것.

지난번에 파노라마 스위트룸이였는데 이번에 디럭스룸 예약했는데 룸 업그레이드해줘서 이번에도 용다리뷰로 아주 만족했습니다~ 룸깔끔하고 수영장도 나쁘지않고 빈컴마트도 옆이라 좋아요 조식은 코로나땜시 이용하지않았어요
다음에도 또 숙박할거에요~~

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: 笑顔のスタッフ、明るく開放的なホテルフロント、ハン川沿いで夜も静か、とくにカラオケやディスコの騒音がなく快適に過ごせました

RoomType: Suite Junior
Positive_Review: Schöne Suite, waren im 30. Stock, Aussicht Richtung Meer. Gutes Frühstücksbuffet, gute Lage. Liebe Geste zu meinem 30. Geburtstag bekam ich ein Törtchen aufs Zimmer und einen lieben Brief vom Front of House. Tolles Fitnessstudio! Haben einen Abend im Restaurant gegessen - PERFEKTES STEAK! Großes Lob an die Küche bitte nochmal!
Negative_Review:
Sind als "Backpacker" angereist, d.h. mit Rucksack, aber ordentlich, ganz normal gekleidet!
Wurden an der Rezeption extrem skeptisch begrüßt, mussten den Welcome-Drink im Stehen trinken, während jeder andere erst Mal in der Lounge willkommen geheißen wurde - und das alles obwohl wir eins der teuersten Zimmer des Hotels gebucht hatten, um dort meinen runden Geburtstag zu feiern! 
Das Hotel hat da direkt in den ersten Sekunden einen negativen Eindruck hinterlassen und konnte dann nur noch verlieren. Da sieht man Mal was eine gute Rezeption ausmacht, der erste Eindruck ist so wichtig; wir kommen selbst aus der gehobenen Gastronomie und wissen wovon wir reden. 
Wir wurden auch nicht aufs Zimmer begleitet wie üblich, sondern mussten den Weg zum Aufzug und zur Suite selbst suchen. Dort war es dann ganz hübsch, allerdings wie gesagt, nach so einem ersten Eindruck fallen uns dann ganz andere Dinge auf: leere Wasserflasche mit alten Zigarettenstummeln vom Vorgänger auf dem Balkon, Staub unter dem Esstisch, dreckiges Handtuch im Bad. Reklamiert haben wir nur die Zigarettenstummel, welche entfernt wurden samt Entschuldigungsschreiben.
Beim Frühstück ist noch anzumerken, dass es sehr schade ist in einem Hotel dieser Klasse, dass nur am Morgen der Tisch eingedeckt wird. Kommt man etwas später (halb 9!) liegen schon keine Stoffservietten mehr auf den Plätzen und ab halb 10 wird begonnen das Buffet abzubauen/für den Abend einzudecken, was eine recht ungemütliche Stimmung macht. 

Alles in allem war es okay, aber unsere Erwartungen waren deutlich höher. 
Preis/Leistung stimmte für uns leider nicht ganz.

RoomType: Suite Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Dòng Sông
Positive_Review:
위치는 한시장까지 산책겸 걸어가도 될 정도의 거리라 좋았어요
파노라마뷰 스위트룸에 머물렀는데 전경은 매우 좋았다
Negative_Review:
조식 쌀국수말고는 먹을거 없어서 아쉬워요
룸 메이크업을 대충하시는듯,,, 화장실, 거실, 침실을 보면 청소를 하다 만 느낌이 강하게 들었음
침실 시트는 교체 안하는게 확실. 화장실 어메니티 교체 또는 리필 안해놓아서 카운터에 직접얘기해서 받음 등...

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
4개룸, 3박했습니다. 8명중년남자들 자유여행이었습니다.
호텔만 한정하면 깨끗깔끔했습니다.
한강뷰도 좋았습니다.
Negative_Review: 시설은 양호하나, 위치만 보고 예약한것은 큰 실수였습니다. 호텔주변에 아무것도 없습니다. 간단한 식사나 간단한 음주가 안됩니다. 무조건 택시타야합니다. 차라리 팜반동 저렴호텔이 나을듯요

RoomType: Suite Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Dòng Sông
Positive_Review: So so
Negative_Review: 욕실에 샤워기 없음

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: 다낭 시내라 이동이 편했어요.
Negative_Review: 방에 들어가자마자 쿰쿰한 냄새가 나서 환기를 하고 에어컨을 다시 켰지만 그래도 나갔다가 들어올때마다 냄새가 났습니다.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: quasi tot
Negative_Review: desconfiança per part del personal a l’hora del checkout. Havent pagat per transferencia el dia que vaig emtrar, el noi no es refiava. En lloc de consultar primer amb el seu banc si havia cobrat (que ho havien fet) em va assetjar amb preguntes sobre dades oersonals. Fins aquell moment tot era perfecte. Pero no tornaré. Em van fer sentir com un delinqûent
Review_Title: Perfectes instalacions per un personal molt amable pero carents de professionalitat

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: 방이 크고 나름 깨끗, 옆방소리는 전혀 들리지 않아 좋음. 친절한 편임
Negative_Review: 위치가 별로예요. 그랩없이 도보로 갈 수 있는데가 빈콤플라자 빼고는 없는 듯 해요. 고층임에도 통창이 방음이 안되는 듯함. 한강 앞이라 새벽 두세시까지도 노래소리 때문에 시끄러워 잠을 잘 수 없음(조용한 사이드로 얻는 것을 추천). 방 키가 노후되어 잘 작동안됨. 투숙객에 많아서 그런지 체크인이 너무 오래 걸림

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Negative_Review:
(English below) (아래 영어)
Nhân viên lễ tân không hề cung cấp thông tin khi check in. Khi hỏi có cần đặt cọc hay không thì lễ tân bảo không cần, sau đó khách gọi thức uống và yêu cầu thanh toán lúc check out thì nhân viên bảo do không đặt cọc nên không thanh toán lúc check out được và gõ cửa và làm phiền 3 lần mặc dù đã quá 23h đêm và khách phải gọi điện 2 lần cho lễ tân để yêu cầu không làm phiền lúc nữa đêm.
-----------
The receptionist did not provide information when checking in. When asked if a deposit is needed, the receptionist said no, then ordered a drink and asked for payment at check out, the staff said that because there was no deposit, it could not be paid at check out and knocked on the door and bothered 3 times even though it's past 11pm and the guest has to call the front desk twice to ask not to disturb at midnight.
-----------
프론트 데스크 직원은 체크인 시 안내를 해주지 않았습니다. 보증금이 필요하냐고 물으니 리셉션 직원은 아니라고 하고 음료를 주문하고 체크아웃 시 결제를 하라고 했더니 직원이 보증금이 없어서 못 해준다고 하더군요. 체크아웃할 때 지불하고 밤 11시가 넘었는데도 문을 두드리고 3번이나 귀찮게 하고 손님은 자정에 방해하지 말라고 프론트에 두 번 전화해야 합니다.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Phòng rộng, giá cả hợp lý. Ăn sáng ngon và nhân viên chu đáo.
Negative_Review: Thiết kế khách sạn nhìn chung hơi cũ.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
- vị trí ks rất đẹp, trước mặt biển và bãi tắm, rất thuận lợi để tắm biển và đi dạo.
- đồ ăn sáng tại nhà hàng ks đa dạng món và hợp khẩu vị.
Negative_Review:
- ks ko thay khăn tắm trong suốt 3 ngày nghỉ tại đây mặc dù đã viết giấy note yêu cầu thay khăn.
- nhân viên tư vấn và book xe điện cho gia đình mình đến ăn quán hải sản quá đắt, bị chặt chém. mọi người nên tự đi, ko nên tham khảo nhân viên.
- khoá cửa bị hết điện, ko mở được cửa, gọi nhân viên đến rất lâu mới được hỗ trợ

RoomType: Phòng Premium Đôi nhìn ra biển
Positive_Review:

buffet sáng phong phú đồ ăn ngon

Positive_Review: vị trí đẹp, phòng rộng. nhân viên nhiệt tình
Negative_Review: chất lượng nội thất không xứng đáng 5 sao. nhân viên khách sạn 5 sao không ai biết lái ô tô, khách phải tự đưa xe ra vào bất tiện vì khách sạn quá rộng, vị trí để xe xa

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển

Negative_Review: đếm hơi sạn và điều hoà ko mát lắm

Negative_Review: TV chỉ có cáp thường, không có Netflix. Nhà ăn buffet hơi nhỏ so với số lượng người, khó tìm bàn để ngồi.

RoomType: Suite Junior - Hướng Biển
Positive_Review:
- Điều mình thích đầu tiên là nhân viên cực kì nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Ai cũng nhẹ nhàng và chu đáo với khách hàng. lần này mình đi em bé nhà mình mới đi nhà trẻ, đúng giai đoạn khủng hoảng nên có làm ồn và làm phiền cô chú nhân viên (nhất là khu vực nhà hàng) nhiều. Thật may vì mọi người vẫn niềm nở khiến vợ chồng mình bớt ngại.
- Vị trí quá tuyệt vời để tận hưởng kì nghỉ, view phòng nhìn ra biển siêu đẹp. Bạn bé nhà mình cứ ngủ dậy là đòi tắm biển và tắm bể bơi cá heo.
- Tiện nghi trong phòng rất tốt, phòng sạch, giường rất dễ chịu. Gối thì cao quá đối với gia đình mình nhưng có vẻ ks nào cũng dùng cái gối cao quá ấy. Khi mình yêu cầu cũng được hỗ trợ mang tới 1 cái gối vừa hơn và có cả gối cho em bé.
- Bữa trưa phục vụ tại phòng rất ngon. Giá tiền bữa trưa này rất hợp lí. Buffet sáng khá ổn.
- Có lẽ nếu k thông qua booking mình chưa chắc đã book được phòng đẹp mà giá rẻ như vậy. Lần này đi ĐN mình ở 2 ks đều tốt, nhưng DLG mình đánh giá cao hơn hẳn. Giá tiền k chênh lệch quá nhiều (chỉ chênh lệch 250k/đêm) nhưng trải nghiệm cao cấp hơn rất nhiều.
Ảnh là view từ phòng của mình. View ưng cực kì ạ.
Negative_Review: Giá giặt là của ks quá cao và không niêm yết trong tài liệu ở phòng. Giá của dịch vụ này sẽ có ở tờ giấy nhân viên đưa trước khi khách gửi giặt nên mng có thể xem kĩ trước. Nhưng mình thấy giá giặt vậy là cao quá (nhà mình giặt đồ có khoảng 20 cái khăn xô của con, mấy bộ đồ tính ra khoảng 3-4kg đồ khô nhưng giá lên tới 1.2tr, khi hỏi đã đc lễ tân giai đáp và các bạn ý cũng hỗ trợ giảm 30% giá giặt). Giá dịch vụ giặt chưa phù hợp chính là điểm trừ duy nhất khiến mình k rate đc 10 điểm.
Review_Title: Sự lựa chọn khá tuyệt cho kì nghỉ. Mọi người nên chọn ạ

My whole family really enjoyed our stay at the resort. The only issue we had was a karaoke bar next door to the resort. The singing and music did eventually stop around 11pm. Although not the worst thing in the world, it would have been nice to have known beforehand. 

Some of the pool staff were smoking cigarettes, which was a bit off-putting.

Every time I took a shower the water would leak to the toilet floor. I did report it but the guy who came to check the room just wiped the floor and didn't switch on the tap to see what was really causing the problem. That was very uncomfortable as I had to pick spots of where to stand after taking a shower as the floor was wet. 

Shower leak was the only problem other than that everything else was great

RoomType: Phòng Gia Đình Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: 2 great pools, one where the young kids could stand up in. Rooms were of good size, although instead of a desk, somewhere to put our bags on would be good
Negative_Review: The staff dont understand enough English (apart from the front desk), which makes it hard to ask questions, especially about food. I am vegan and gluten free (gf) and gf is not catered well for at DLG, it would be good to have some gf cereal and vegan milk options
Review_Title: We had a great stay at DLG and would return again. The staff were all so nice and the facilities very clean, thankyou

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Loved the pools, the WIFI was excellent, the breakfast was a great mix of Asian and western. Ordered room service 3 times and it was fabulous and pricewise better than I would get in Australia. Had my laundry done. Ordinarily I wouldn't do this as it's too expensive, but Vietnam is cheap to eat, live and do laundry and the quality of all three was evident at this hotel.
Negative_Review: I tried to book a tour to Bana Hills through the hotel but they wanted to send me to the train station or bus station to make my own way there. I went online and booked it and the tour company took care of the rest.

RoomType: Suite Executive - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: This is one of the best hotels we have ever stayed. The location is perfect: directly across the street from a nice swimming beach and a short walk to find restaurants, shopping, massage, etc. The hotel is beautiful and deserves its 5 star status; great gym, 2 pools, afternoon tea and a fabulous breakfast. Our room was very large, clean, cool and quiet The employees were always smiling, helpful and polite. There were two employees who really were very helpful and deserve special recognition. They are Ngoc who is a hostess in the dining room and Henry who is the front desk manager. We extended our stay several times and Henry was always very helpful and kind in looking out for our comfort. Ngoc is a very special person indeed. She realized early on that we are vegetarians and made sure that we had special vegetarian options available on the breakfast buffet and she introduced us to local vegetarian specialties. She is a kind, thoughtful, generous person and we will always remember her. She is truly an asset to DLG Hotel. We highly recommend this hotel in Danang.

RoomType: Suite Executive - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Two pools , beach front location with a lot of restaurants nearby. Hugh breakfast selection with a lot of vegetarian options clearly marked.Spacious lobby area, very clean and well kept garden plants and surroundings. Our room had a seating area and bedroom with large bathroom with bath and separate shower area. The room was spacious and good views of the front beach area. All staff are approachable and friendly.Highly recommend and will definitely stay here again. Value for money
Negative_Review: Could do with a few more sun beds especially on the poolside on 3rd floor.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Location and foods and staffs
Negative_Review: There’s was 2-3 mosquitoes in room I got bitten 3 spots on my leg, arm was very uncomfortable 😭 but everything is excellent.

Positive_Review: Friendly staff capable of communicating well in english, location near the beach and easy to walk around, hotel and room clean and very beautiful and comfortable. Positive_Review: Fabulous location to explore Da Nang. Hotel staff friendly and helpful. Rooms are large with very comfortable beds. Showers had good water pressure and quality toiletries. Best feature was the wonderful breakfast buffet. Both western and Vietnamese options to choose from. Great way to sample foods that are new to you. Both an egg station and a Pho soup station. We also enjoyed afternoon tea and the two swimming pools.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển

Positive_Review:
They have two options of swimming pool, very friendly and helpful staff. The location is the best part, right in the heart of Son Tra district. Dragon Bridge, SonTra night market and other shopping / food areas are a short walk away.
They have a breath taking view of the beach which is amazing. The food at the cafeteria is good too, lots of options at the buffet to choose from.
Negative_Review: To be honest, nothing really.

Positive_Review:
Perfect Location, very peaceful nights sleep comfortable beds. Absolutely loved the sea view and the sounds of the ocean. So relaxing.

Great selections available at breakfast. 

This was a perfect place to base ourselves during our visit to DaNang

We really enjoyed ourselves 

Thanks
Negative_Review: The weather.....not that the wonderful staff could change 😀 that

RoomType: Phòng Premium Đôi nhìn ra biển
Positive_Review: The hotel was one of the best I've had the privilege of staying at. From my first contact with customer liaison, I requested rooms near each other, to arrival, greeting drink, a blessing when you have been travelling. A birthday cake organised by the staff for my niece, the hotel and all the staff are amazing. The accommodation was spacious, immaculate, and comfortable. The breakfast catered for all tastes, I have to mention the pancakes as we ate copious amounts. Particular shout out to Joy the liason officer, Thank you for all your help. To the ladies in the bar we ate there a couple of evenings, always friendly and helpful. Last shout out to the young front of house team, whose recommendations for eating out and "must sees" were thoughtful and on point. Thank you for a fabulous holiday.
Negative_Review: No negatives.

RoomType: Suite Junior - Hướng Biển
Positive_Review: What a fabulous Hotel, we extended our stay here, and it felt like home to us. Every request met with kindness and friendly attitude, a happy manner by all. Every need was met. Outstanding service. A very safe hotel to stay. Close to everything. Assistance with cars and tours is very easy and helpful. Prices are fair and reasonable. Staff predicted our needs and knew who we were in every moment and catered accordingly. Thank you. we will definitely return with our extended family in the future. By far, our best stay in Vietnam. Stay at this hotel you won't regret it!

They have a great book inside the room that gives you options to visit with the distance and time it would take to get there which was incredibly helpful. Hoi An was also only a 30 minute taxi ride away which was a great visit for a day (it’s much more touristy where Da Nang is more peaceful).

Positive_Review: We like absolutely everything about this hotel. I have total respect for the Buddhist station and the incense burning in the morning but the smell is rather strong in the afternoon. People who are asthmatic or partially asthmatic have a hard time breathing around the prayer stations. Most businesses have never thought about this until they have a team member who's asthmatic. I think you should consider moving it to a place with better ventilation.

Positive_Review:
I really enjoyed my stay in the hotel:

-First and foremost, hotel staff was great. They always welcome you with a smile on their faces and are so kind and helpful. Be it the security waiting outside, receptionists or staff in the restaurant, they were all so nice and helpful.

- The cleaning staff did a great job, room was as clean as it could be! It was not cleaned the first two days and it turned out I pressed the “do not disturb” button on the wall, next to the lights while looking for the lights. So if you check in late night as I did, FYI! 

- The hotel has a great location. You cross the street and you are on the beach. The only issue is, traffic lights or respecting the lights is not a thing in Vietnam. Thus, crossing the road is a little bit risky for fellow westerners who are not used to cars/motorbikes driving on you and honking while you try to cross the street. But it will be the same wherever you go on that beach line.

- It is also walking distance to the restaurants. Get out of the hotel, turn left and you will see famous seafood restaurants in a few minutes. But I would recommend you to turn right, walk 10-15 minutes and try other seafood restaurants which are basically 30%-50% cheaper for the same fancy seafood like giant lobsters and you will not have to wait an hour to be served. Unfortunately I discovered it on my last night!

- I used the airport shuttle from the airport to the hotel and highly recommend it. I took a taxi on my way back to the airport and it is half the price of the shuttle service. They are both cheap anyway but when you take the shuttle from the airport to the hotel, you know you will not be scammed as opposed to taking the taxi. 

- I also asked how I could visit Lady Buddha statue and reception arranged me a car to do some sightseeing. I also recommend that since the driver will wait for you while you are visiting those places and you will have a comfortable trip.
Negative_Review:
- Breakfast was a hit or miss. It was a giant ASIAN food buffet. And as you may know, Asian breakfast is not much different from Asian dinner. Thus, you will love it if you are okay with having fried rice, sauted beef with oyster sauce and veggies or sushi for breakfast. Or else it will be a bit challenging.

- Also, you will see that the food is not replaced with the same food when it is finished. Thus, breakfast around 7:30 am is slightly better than breakfast around 9am. Likewise, there were some people who were literally taking all the papaya, rambutan and pineapples to their tables (around 2kg each) which were being replaced with watermelon. It is kind of annoying if you want to have one of those fruits and see the same people taking all the fruits to their tables everyday!

- If you decide to take the tuktuk, reception can arrange it for you. However, check the price with the reception before getting in the car since the driver tried to charge me more than double the amount I was quoted. It was still cheap but knowing you are being overcharged was unsettling.

- Unfortunately smoking is allowed in the hotel. You will see people smoking in the lobby or Sonata restaurant. So it might be an issue if you intend to spend some time there and are sensitive to smoking indoors.

- The worst part of my stay was sleepless nights. I had horrible neighbors on the floor. An English speaking family coming to the room from 3am to 5am, fighting with their little son to make him go to sleep and then fighting with each other since the boy did not want to sleep. And unfortunately calling the reception at 5am to remind those guests that people were sleeping did not work either. A Vietnamese family with at least 2 boys going to breakfast/beach around 7am in the morning, arguing with the father and each other and shouting on all their way in the hall. A Korean family doing the same around 8am. So, as you can imagine, I had many sleepless nights despite the comfort of the bed.
Review_Title: Definitely recommended, hopefully with less noisy guests on the same floor!

Positive_Review: great location , breakfast varied and well replenished . crispy bacon would be a welcome addition for the western pallet . Rooms very comfortable and staff very friendly .
Negative_Review: All was good however really disappointed with a strict smoking policy of outside only which seemed to be totally ignored by whom I assume were local patrons . People smoking by the lifts and openly smoking in the indoor bar area . I smoke but feel important I don’t impose that on others . if you have a smoking policy you have to enforce it or it’s all a bit pointless ! I informed reception but it would appear to fall on deaf ears and it took ages for ashtrays to be emptied by the lifts . just remove them ! it kind of sends the wrong message . Another point to note for hotel is when watering plants the access water drains out onto slippery marble and is a real safety hazard for slips . This sounds all a bit negative but overall I would stay again , just points for improvement . also the welcome drink was around the same quantity of mouthwash I use in the mornings before brushing my teeth . The bar restaurant served good food at a reasonable price although you could better use the outside area for seating to encourage patrons to also eat there .

Positive_Review:
Beach front location

Negative_Review:
I don’t understand how this is a 5 Star Hotel. 

Poured a bath and yellow water came out… didn’t dare bathe in it. 

No room service menus in our room so rang the restaurant, she brought up a menu but made me take photos of every page on my phone and then give the menu back… Not very “5 Star”. The food was entirely subpar. Ordered 2 pizzas and they were literally inedible. Ate in the restaurant downstairs and there were fruit flies everywhere. 

Had the staff wake us up by starting to call our room from about 8am telling us there was going to be maintenance and the elevators were going to be down, and then they called again and didn’t know what time this was going to happen, and then all of a sudden it was happening now. We had a flight to catch and the power went out with the maintenance so we had no choice but to take the stairs with all of our luggage. Brutal. 

The whole place is totally outdated. Looks nothing like it does in the photos. it’s dark and dingy. I’d never stay there alone, gives me the creeps.

RoomType: Suite Executive - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Utrolig godt utvalg ved frokosten. Endte likevel vel opp med å benytte "egg-disken", hvor du kunne bestille omelett, eggerøre, m.m. Hadde mye varmmat, men personlig er det litt tungt å spise nudler, kylling, o.l. til frokost. Det var alltid flere vegetar-alternativer, kaker, oppskåret frukt, musli, youghurt (visstnok hjemmelaget). Fikk to små flasker med vann hver dag på rommet. Vi hadde sn suite og der var sengen stor og god. Hotellet delte ut svært gode og tykke håndklær ved bassengene. Når noen forlot solsengene, så byttet hotellet ut håndklærne me en gang. Dette gjorde at ingen kunne okkupere solsenger hele dagen uten å bruke dem :-) Godt treningsrom med aircondition. Vi hadde flott utsikt fra hotellrommet vårt. Gode gardiner som holdt ute alt sol-lys. God aircondition, både i "stue" og soverom.
Negative_Review: Vær så snill og dropp den reklamefilmen og musikken i heis og matsal. Den reklame-musikken gir meg fremdeles mareritt. Romvasken var litt slapp. Kunne gjerne vært noen kroker eller stenger til å henge opp klær på badet. Var en innbygd stang, men det var generelt vanskelig å få tørket klær og håndklær. Kunne gjerne vært noen flere solsenger, og solsengene ved bassenget i 3. etg var ikke gode å ligge/sitte i.

RoomType: Phòng Premium Đôi nhìn ra biển
Positive_Review:
スタッフは全員とても親切でした。朝食も種類が多く、美味しかったです。
立地はビーチ沿いで、美しいシービューの部屋、申し分ないです。歩いていけるところにシーフードのレストランとかも沢山あります。ダナンの市内にも車で10分ほどの近い場所にあります。
建物は少し古びた感じはしますが、掃除も行き届いており、エアコンの効きもよく、バスタブも立派。メンテナンスは良かったです。
Negative_Review:
前の人が脱ぎ捨てたパンツが床に落ちていたので、ゴミ箱に捨てておきました。見落としたのでしょうね。
プールやジムはホテルの規模の割には小さいような気がしました。写真では大きく見えたのですが。
Review_Title: ビーチ沿い、便利快適な滞在でした

RoomType: Phòng Premium Đôi nhìn ra biển
Positive_Review: Wir waren sehr zufrieden, es gab nichts zu bemängeln. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Das Hotelzimmer war sauber und gemütlich. Wir werden auf jeden Fall wieder kommen.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Beliggenhet.Bra service.

RoomType: Suite Junior - Hướng Biển
Positive_Review:
Das Hotel ist in einem Chinesischem Stil. Das bedeutet schwerer Marmor, gemusterte Teppiche und dunkle Holzmöbel... ein bisschen Prunkvoll. Für manche mag das 80er Jahre Stil sein, in z.B. China, obwohl hier Vietnam normal. Das Hotel und die Ausstattung sind in einem tadellosen Zustand. Es ist nichts verschlissen oder schmutzig. Man kann es kaum glauben aber alles war Tip Top. Ich war 5 Nächte im Hotel und hatte eine Executive Suite mit Meerblick, das ist natürlich Luxus aber es gab bei Booking.com ein Super Angebot.... daher war ich am Anfang sehr skeptisch, weil sich hinter 50% Angeboten meist etwas negatives versteckt. hier aber echte ***** 5 Sterne.
Das Zimmer bzw. die Suite sehr geräumig, 2. Toilette separat, Das BadDusche und Badewanne, 2 Waschbecken, Bademäntel, Handtücher und Pflegeprodukte. Alles sehr sauber und gepflegt. Das Bett groß und bequem, im Eingangsraum Tisch und Couch. 2x Swimmingpool outdoor einmal im 3. Stock und einmal im Erdgeschoss vor dem Hotel mit zusätzlicher Terrasse, abgetrennt und erhöht aber direkt an der Promenaden Hauptstraße. Die Liegen sehr bequem, dicke Polster. Große Strandtücher werden am Pool ausgegeben. Am Strand gibt es leider keine Hoteleigenen Liegen. Hier muss extra bezahlt werden wie so überall. Das Frühstücksbuffet ist reichhaltig mit kalten, warmen und süßen Speisen. Zusätzlich gibt es frische Eier/Omelett und Asiatische Nudelsuppe. Die Lage des Hotels ist für diese Gegend sehr gut, Quasi direkt am Strand. Der Strand ist weitläufig, das Meer immer ein bisschen unruhig bis auf ganz Früh am Morgen oder am Abend. Restaurants, kleine Supermärkte, Food Trucks sind in 3 bis 5 Gehminuten erreichbar.
Negative_Review:
Was mir nicht gefallen hat das hat hier nichts zu suchen. Man soll schon sachlich bleiben.
Es hat nichts mit dem Hotel und der näheren Umgebung zu tun.

Das Hotel kann ich ohne Vorbehalt empfehlen und würde es wieder buchen.
Review_Title: Zuerst skeptisch, hat alle Erwartungen übertroffen TOP

Positive_Review:
ทำเลที่พัก ใกล้ทะเล เดินข้ามถนนเพียงเล็กน้อย หาดทรายกว้าง สะอาด ทรายละเอียด เล่นน้ำทะเลได้

RoomType: Phòng Premium Đôi nhìn ra biển
Positive_Review: Именно то, что я ожидал от отеля. Очень хороший завтрак с азиатскими и европейскими блюдами, десертами, все блюда пополняют до самого конца завтрака. Лучше приходить ближе к концу завтрака, за час-полтора до конца, так как в самый разгар в ресторане полная посадка туристов, которые потом едут на экскурсии. Кстати, несмотря на большую загруженность отеля, с другими постояльцами мы почти не пересекались, в отеле было тихо, и мы были удивлены, когда увидели сколько народу на завтраке. Несмотря на то, что отель находится на первой линии перед морем и дорогой, в отеле очень тихо, так как перед отелем есть парковая зона. В отеле 2 бассейна. Отель идеально подходит для романтического путешествия. Вид на море просто отличный! Рядом в пешей доступности находятся очень хорошие рестораны и бары. Отличное соотношение цены и качества. Это, конечно, не 5*, но и стоимость в 3-4 раза ниже, чем у «настоящих пятёрок» в городе. Персонал приветливый, говорит по-английски. Особенно хочется поблагодарить M Hieu, Duong Giam, Anh и Ha за их помощь и содействие во время проживания.
Review_Title: Очень хороший отель с отличным расположением.

RoomType: Phòng Grand Gia Đình Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
직원분들 서비스가 너무 좋았어요. 모두가 친절하고, 최상의 서비스를 제공해 주셨어요.
FRONT DESK 직원뿐만 아니라 도어맨, 벨보이, 청소하시는 직원분까지 모두 나이스하셨어요. FRONT DESK에 있는 직원분은 체크인부터 체크아웃까지 모두 담당해주셨는데 너무 잘 대해주셔서 정말 감사했어요.

2박을 해서 두번째날 오전 청소를 맡겼는데 너무 깨끗하게 잘해주셔서 놀랐고, 세탁물을 맡겼는데 세탁도 잘 해주셔서 부모님이 좋아하셨어요.

뷰가 너무너무 좋았어요. 룸도 오션뷰였고, 풀장에서도 미케비치가 바로보여 너무 좋았습니다. 
방도 전체적으로 깔끔하고, 밝고, 에어컨이 방마다 있어 시원했어요. 타월도 깨끗하고 수압도 괜찮았어요.
Negative_Review:
화장실에 물빠지는게 이상했어요. 안빠지다가 갑자기 엄청 잘빠지고 그래요. ㅎㅎ

조식은 보통이었어요. 엄청 맛있다도 없고 맛없다도 없는? 근데 종류가 많아서 다양한 음식을 접할 수 있어요.

밤에 들려오는 알 수 없는 음악소리가 좀 시끄러웠는데 이건 피곤하면 그냥 잠들 수 있는 정도의 소음이었어요.
Review_Title: 로컬이 많이 있던 호텔, 추천 추천

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Das Hotel ist sehr gut gelegen, der Strand ist direkt vor der Türe und sehr schön. Feiner Sand und man kann sehr weit ins Meer laufen. 

Das Frühstück ist reichhaltig und schmeckt sehr gut. Alle Sehenswürdigkeiten sind gut mit dem Auto zu erreichen. 

Das Zimmer war sauber und das Personal sehr aufmerksam man hat uns mit einem tollen Service den Urlaub sehr angenehm gemacht.

Ich kann dieses Hotel absolut empfehlen es hat ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ verdient.

Wir hatten bei Nguyen Hoang VI unter (0787 139567) einen top Mietwagen gebucht und diesen 3 Tage genutzt um alle Sehenswürdigkeiten zu besichtigen. Preis und Service war sehr gut. 

Es gibt zahlreiche Massagesalons und jede Menge Seafood in der direkten Umgebung. 

Wir kommen sicher wieder
Review_Title: Top Hotel mit extrem aufmerksamen Personal -- absolute Empfehlung

RoomType: Suite Junior - Hướng Biển
Positive_Review:
En couple, nous avons séjourné dans la "Suite Junior - Vue sur l'océan" : très spacieuse et vue sublime sur l'océan.
Totalement conforme aux photos et à nos attentes. En bout de couloir, parfait pour le calme.
Chambre très spacieuse dotée de tout le confort nécessaire une douche immense, une baignoire, 2wc, lavabo double vasque, 2 TV etc ...
Le personnel est très courtois et souriant.
L'Hôtel est à proximité immédiate de la plage.
Nous avons apprécié notre séjour, et si nous devions revenir à Danang, je choisirais à nouveau cet hôtel.
Contrairement à certains avis négatifs que j'ai pu lire, nous avons beaucoup apprécié le petit déjeuner qui est complet et très garni, proposant un large choix de plats chauds ou froids (spécialités vietnamiennes ou européennes).

RoomType: Phòng Premium Đôi nhìn ra biển

RoomType: Phòng Premium Đôi nhìn ra biển
Positive_Review: 海岸の目の前で、道路を渡ればすぐに海岸でした。お風呂は熱いお湯が出て、バスタブに溜めてゆっくり入ることができました。エアコンも、効きが良く涼しかったです。朝食も種類が多く、暖かい卵料理や麺料理もすぐに作ってくれました。日本語で会話ができる従業員もいて楽しかったです。アーリーチェックインもしてくれてとても助かりました。また宿泊したいです。
Negative_Review: （良くなかったわけではないですが）できれば、テレビのHDMIにパソコンから接続できれば良かったです。大型テレビで日本のテレビチャンネルはありましたが、移りませんでした。パソコンが接続できれば、YOUTUBEなどを見ることができたので、更に良かったと思います。

Negative_Review: 베개가 너무 높아 불편했다

RoomType: Phòng Premium Đôi nhìn ra biển
Positive_Review: Wygodna wanna, pokój premium ma widok na lady Buddha. Bell boy bardzo na plus, bardzo pomocny, mówiący po angielsku, wychodzący na przeciwko potrzebie, nigdy nie trzeba było na niego czekać
Negative_Review:
To nie serwis na 5*. Fatalne wysokie poduszki, nawet w 3* hotelach są dwie - niska i wysoka - do wyboru. Tutaj nie dało się spać. Okna przepuszczają dźwięki ulicy. Hotel pomimo braku gości nie oferuje późnego wymeldowania i dolicza za to dodatkową opłatę. Fatalna obsługa na śniadaniu, kręci się dookoła siebie; gadają, rozmawiają, jakby byli na pokerze - a w ogóle nie zwracają uwagi na gości. Z brudnymi talerzami siedziałam ponad 40min, nikt ich nie wziął aż sama odniosłam - a na sali było więcej kelnerów niż gości. Bufet słodki bardzo słabej jakości, same gotowe marketowe ciasta; najgorsza kawa jaką piłam, brak wyciskanych soków.

Wszystko zdecydowanie poniżej 5*.
A najgorzej zachowuje się obsługa na śniadaniu. Nawet nie wymagam żeby ktoś podszedł i zaproponował kawę (jak to robią w hotelach 5*), ale sama musiałam odnosić brudne talerze bo liczni kelnerzy zupełnie ignorowali gości i jedynie sobą byli zajęci.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: gute Lage; ruhiges Zimmer ; Köche beim Frontcocking Top!
Negative_Review: Beim Frühstücksbüffet wurde am ersten Tag nichts nachgefüllt! Als wir um 9 Uhr kamen waren einige Behälter leer! …kein 5 Sterne Frühstück! Sehr viel Personal stand gelangweilt herum ohne sich um das Nachfüllen zu kümmern! Sehr unpersönliche Atmosphäre im Hotel und distanziertes Personal! …das geht besser, wie wir in anderen Hotels in Vietnam kennen gelernt haben! Ach ja und besonders nervig ist beim auschecken, dass man auf einen Zimmercheck warten muss, bevor man gehen darf! …nervig wenn man zum Flughafen muss!
Review_Title: na Ja! 5 Sterne Hotel geht besser!

RoomType: Phòng Premium Đôi nhìn ra biển
Positive_Review: 海岸が道を渡ってすぐ近くにあり、ビーチ用のタオルも無料で貸し出してくれました。市内へ行くのもグラブタクシーやバイクで近くとても便利なホテルでした。朝食も美味しかったです。
Negative_Review: 当初Bookig.com経由でメッセージで確約してもらった部屋に、満室のため、低層階の部屋になったのは残念でした（窓には薄いカーテンも無く、遮光カーテンのみだったため、つけてもらいました）。翌日は部屋の移動ができましたが、結局、その日は14:00までホテル近くに待機となってしまいました。４回ほど宿泊しましたが、こんなことは初めてだったので残念でした。

RoomType: Phòng Premium Đôi nhìn ra biển
Phòng Gia Đình Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
ビーチが目の前で便利、部屋からの眺めも素晴らしかった
部屋は広く静かで、落ち着いて過ごせた
簡単なキッチンやダイニングがあり便利だった
スタッフの対応が良かった
午前に到着したがスーツケースを預かってもらえたので観光に出かけ、チェックインも早めに対応してもらえた。
夜は疲れていたのでルームサービスを頼んだが、おいしかった
朝食はフォーやドーナツがおいしかった
Negative_Review:
枕が高くてあわなかった。ベットサイドや壁のスイッチが青く光っていて眠る時に眩しい。シャワールーム狭め。バスタブをリクエストしたが眺めの良い部屋にはバスタブがなかったのでバスタブ目当てな場合は要注意です。
ドライヤーが壁に備え付けで使いづらい。

朝食がビュッフェだが団体客が食べ物に向かってしゃべりながらおかずを取っていたので、衛生上気になってあまり食べられなかった。ベトナム名物のはずが朝食のコーヒーがあまりおいしくなく残念。
Review_Title: 贅沢なオーシャンビュー

RoomType: Suite Junior - Hướng Biển
Positive_Review: 위치, 수영장
Negative_Review:
주니어 스위트에 숙박했는데 변기 물이 잘 안내려가고, 세면대 배수가 잘 안됨.
체크인 시 레이트 체크아웃 14시 무료로 가능하다고 답변을 받았으나 마지막날 레이트 체크 아웃 시 추가금 납부해야된다고 말이 바뀜. 
5성 호텔로 되어있으나 고객 응대, 시설, 조식은 실망스러움.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Negative_Review: REALMENTE SUCIO

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
위치 
Good Location
Negative_Review:
호텔이 매우 더럽습니다. 
5성급 호텔이라 로비는 화려하지만 숙소는 엉망입니다. 
어떻게 이런숙소가 5성급인지 알 수 없습니다. 
먼지 엄청많고 여기저기 더러운곳 투성입니다. 제발 다른곳을 선택하세요 

This is the worst hotel I`ve ever stayed in Danang 
Room condition is the worst. 
A lots of dust, Dirty thing everywhere. 
Please choice another option. 
I feel like they give up running bussiness. 
Not many tourist these days and don`t have enough money to care the hotel.

RoomType: Suite Executive - Nhìn Ra Biển

Negative_Review: 部屋が埃っぽかった

ont c’est fait voler 150 euros dans la chambre… 
faites très attention à vos affaires!!!
bien sûr on c’est fait passer pour des menteurs

고쳐지지 않았다.

Negative_Review: Camera un po’ sporca e con aria condizionata maleodorante

RoomType: Phòng Signature Wink Gia Đình Hướng Sông Nhìn Ra Cảnh Hoàng Hôn
Positive_Review: Modern and one of the best hotel room layouts I’ve ever seen. Also liked the laundromat and absolutely loved the rooftop pool and lounge area. The chill out music up there added to the great vibe. While I didn’t like Danang city much at all, it was always pleasant to come back to the hotel and feel like I could relax in peace up at the pool. The General Manager, an Australian expat, was super helpful and invested in checking in on guests whenever he was passing by. Other staff were courteous and friendly, although Google Translate helps with communication.
Negative_Review: They have a stunning rooftop pool and lounge/bar but the pool closes at 7pm!! It seems ludicrous to close it so early when they have such a great city view at night and it is too hot for many people to be up there before the sun goes down. My son and his friend missed out on using the pool because the only time it was comfortable for them to be up there was after dinner.

RoomType: Phòng Signature Wink Gia Đình Hướng Sông Nhìn Ra Cảnh Hoàng Hôn
Positive_Review:
It is a brand new hotel with interesting techy-concept. We were staying in the river-view family room which is not very big, but was nice and comfortable, with an excellent view of river, city and Dragon Bridge. There is a laundry room where you can wash (for 2 USD), dry (for 2 USD) and iron your cloths, which was big plus for us. It was not very clear how to pay for the laundromat with credit-card, but we called for help, and they came to assist us in couple of minutes. 
There is also very nice terrace at the roof. Hotel is 5 minutes walk away from the Dragon Bridge and night market. Also, there is a great shopping centar "Vincom Plaza" few minutes walk from the hotel (in the direction opposite from Dragon Bridge). We really liked our stay in this hotel, and would warmly recommend it to others.
Negative_Review:
It was rather chaotic in the dining room during the breakfast, and not very clear what is available for breakfast, and where to find what to drink and eat Also, it was very difficult to find table to sit. 
There is no ability to open any kind of window in the room. We were staying in the hotel for just one night so it didn't bother us much, but for a longer stay I would prefer to have ability to open the window and not depend just on air conditioning. 
Hotel was bombarding us with too many promotional messages, and many of those were not relevant for our stay in the hotel, so at the end we stopped reading them eventhough some of them might have been useful.
HotelName: Wink Hotel Danang Riverside - 24hrs Stay & Rooftop with Sunset View

Positive_Review:
Very comfortable bed in a well designed room. Good sound-proofing between rooms and along the corridors.

Breakfast buffet was well stocked and catered for many tastes.

Room was spotlessly clean. Staff were very pleasant.
Negative_Review:
The incessant, thudding "music" during breakfast was headache inducing and far from the best way to start the day.

One coffee machine is insufficient for the vast breakfast area - a queue forms. The same could be said for the fried egg station.

While it is good to have washing machines available, a full laundry service in-house would be an advantage.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Positive_Review: New hotel, funky, colourful, vibe. Amazing river views, especially at night from the rooftop or bedroom window. Large gym. Self-serve laundry (three washers and three dryers, iron etc). Rooftop pool. Bar area. Walking distance to Dragon Bridge, etc.
Negative_Review: Biggest let down was breakfast. Nothing Western, everything was Asian with the exception of the egg station, cereals, bread and fruit. Everything was either rice, noodles or curry. No kettle in room, need to request. Not all TV channels working. Aircon temperature appeared fixed, especially in laundry room very hot could not adjust.

There was a lot of choice for the breakfast (even ice cream???), but it was mainly geared to Asian guests, but then, you are in Vietnam...

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Positive_Review: The view from the room was nice and also the location was really good.
Negative_Review:
To begin with, the bedrooms are just too tiny. There is not enough space to place our luggage, so we had to put it on the floor and therefore, no space to walk on the room. We actually put the label outside the door of "no disturbing" so we didnt have to take our luggage from the floor for the cleaning ladies.

The bathroom was also really tiny (so tiny that the door to close the bathroom is the same to close the shower). While in the shower, with the closed door, there was no light inside. The shower was just too complicated to use. We left our stay without understanding how to use it. Why complicate?
Please, equip the bedrooms appropriately. 

The worst part came in the end. We wanted to use the pool and the staff told us there was "a private event" going on in the rooftop and therefore, guests could not use the pool. This is not from this planet. How is it possible to do "private events" on a hotel proibiting guests to use the hotel facilities????? When we booked this hotel, one of the filters was having a pool, and here we are, being rejected by our own hotel to relax during our stay. The staff was super rude when comunicating this. 

We will never for sure come back to this hotel or any other "Wink" hotel.
This is the 5* star hotel more boosted we have ever seen. For us this was a 3* hotel at most.
HotelName: Wink Hotel Danang Riverside - 24hrs Stay & Rooftop with Sunset View

RoomType: Phòng Premier Có Giường Cỡ Queen Hướng Sông Nhìn Ra Cảnh Hoàng Hôn

Positive_Review: Semplicemente WOW! L'hotel è nuovissimo e ultra moderno, in una posizione strategica e con una vista eccezionale. Colazione ottima e variegata, rooftop con piacina bellissimo di notte e dulcis in fundo LETTO SUPERLATIVO. Camera accessoriata e con una vetrata sul fiume che ti fa venire voglia di tornare in camera per godere del panorama, eravamo al 14° piano. Inoltre avevo prenotato una camera vista città, pensando fosse meglio, invece la migliore vista si ha dal lato del fiume, per vedere lo skyline, così ho chiesto di poterla cambiare e me l'hanno cambiata senza alcun supplemento. Grazie ha fatto la differenza!
Negative_Review: Nessun difetto, se devo cercare per forza, un aspetto appena negativo, potrei solo dire della dimensione della camera, ma solo perché avevamo tanti bagagli, quindi colpa nostra 😅
HotelName: Wink Hotel Danang Riverside - 24hrs Stay & Rooftop with Sunset View

RoomType: Phòng Premier Có Giường Cỡ Queen Hướng Sông Nhìn Ra Cảnh Hoàng Hôn
Positive_Review:
Tämä hotelli poikkeaa monesta muusta hotellista, koska tämä tuntuu hieman omatoimi hotellilta, jossa toiminnot on automatisoitu, mutta tämä on vain hyvä asia. Hotelli on uusi ja sen kyllä huomaa kaikessa. Uloskirjautumisaika on sama aika kuin sisäänkirjautumisaika, joten tämä on erinomainen niille matkustajille, jotka sisäänkirjautuvat myöhään. Hotellissa on pyykinpesumahdollisuus noin 2€ per koneellinen/kuivaaminen. Pyykinpesukone annostelee pyykkiaineen automaattisesti ja maksu suoritetaan kortilla automaattiin. Hotellin kuntosali on parhaita kuntosaleja verraten Da Nangin muihin hotelleihin. Maittava aamupala hyvillä jokinäkymillä. Hotellissa kattouima-allas baareineen, mistä pystyy ihailemaan Da Nangia. Hotellin lähettyvillä sijaitsee Son Tra Night Market ja Dragon Bridge ja monia ravintoloita. Valitsemani hotellihuone oli juuri sopivan kompakti yhdelle/kahdelle hengelle. Huoneen isoista ikkunoista pystyi iltaisin ihailemaan kaupungin valaistusta sekä jokiristeilijöitä.

Joen vasta rannalla sijaitsee saman yrityksen toinen aivan vastaava hotelli. Jos haluat oleskella hieman rauhallisemmalla alueella ja hotellissa, jossa on kattouima-allas niin valitse tämä hotelli. Jos haluat, että lähettyvillä on ravintoloita ja yöelämää niin valitse vasta rannalla oleva hotelli. Itse yövyin molemmissa vaihtelun vuoksi. Itse pidin tästä hotellista enemmän, koska täällä oli vähemmän asiakkaita, parempi kuntosali, paremmat näköalat ja biljaripöytä.
Negative_Review: Sijainnin puolesta parhaat ravintolat ja yöelämä hieman kauempana, joten pitää käyttää Grap kyytiä.
HotelName: Wink Hotel Danang Riverside - 24hrs Stay & Rooftop with Sunset View

Positive_Review:
地點很方便，去熱門景點都很近，房間比較小一點點，但非常漂亮且乾淨舒適，電視有很多頻道可以選擇，飯店幫忙免費升級，房間窗戶就看得到龍橋，整體來說很愜意放鬆。

早餐是buffet，很多樣可以選擇，河粉很好吃。

整個飯店很有設計感，很漂亮看了心情很好，很多地方都可以拍照。

有洗衣機、健身房、游泳池可以使用

服務人員很親切，晚上12點有問題傳訊息詢問飯店，都有人會回！超棒！！很讓人安心！
HotelName: Wink Hotel Danang Riverside - 24hrs Stay & Rooftop with Sunset View

RoomType: Phòng Signature Wink Gia Đình Hướng Sông Nhìn Ra Cảnh Hoàng Hôn
Positive_Review:
フォーなど、地元の料理もある朝食はどれも美味しかった。
私のつたない英語でも、ていねいに対応してもらえました。おすすめのレストランを訪ねた際も要望に合わせて数店舗教えていただけました。
special thanks,Thu
Negative_Review:
ハン川の東岸に位置しているので、街歩きや食事に行こうと思うと、西岸の街には遠かった。歩いていけなくはない距離ですが。途中の道が楽しいわけでないので、いちいちタクシーを呼んでいました。
アプリを使えばすぐに来てくれるし、ぼられることもないのですが、少し面倒でした。
HotelName: Wink Hotel Danang Riverside - 24hrs Stay & Rooftop with Sunset View

RoomType: Phòng Premier 2 Giường Đơn Hướng Sông Nhìn Ra Cảnh Hoàng Hôn
Positive_Review: 청결하고 조용하고 위치와 뷰가 좋은 숙소입니다. 가성비 추천이예요.
HotelName: Wink Hotel Danang Riverside - 24hrs Stay & Rooftop with Sunset View

RoomType: Phòng Premier Có Giường Cỡ Queen Hướng Sông Nhìn Ra Cảnh Hoàng Hôn
Positive_Review: Fantastisk beliggenhed og smuk udsigt over Han River og bl.a. Dragebroen. Virkelig lækker morgenmadsbuffet med alt, hvad man har brug for. Personalet står på spring for at hjælpe og komme med ideer til aktiviteter og udflugtsmål døgnet rundt. Lækkert værelse med den bedste udsigt.
Negative_Review: Madrassen i sengen gled konstant ud fra væggen, når man sad op i sengen. Men man lå til gengæld fantastisk i den.
Review_Title: Perfekt beliggenhed, lækre faciliteter og virkelig sødt personale
HotelName: Wink Hotel Danang Riverside - 24hrs Stay & Rooftop with Sunset View

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Positive_Review:
・部屋はコンパクトながらも機能的にデザインされており、快適にすごせました。
・タオルはふわふわ、シーツはパリッとしており気持ち良かったです。
・Riverfront viewの部屋はとても眺めが良かったです
Negative_Review: ・雨の夜は、窓の外についている鉄製の飾りのようなものに雨粒が当たってうるさく、目が覚めてしまいました。
HotelName: Wink Hotel Danang Riverside - 24hrs Stay & Rooftop with Sunset View

RoomType: Phòng Gia Đình Signature Wink Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
