RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Positive_Review: wir haben ein kostenloses Upgrade bekommen, ohne danach zu fragen. So hatten wir einen wunderschönen Blick auf den Fluss und die Skyline. die Mitarbeiterinnen waren sehr freundlich, vor allem Hàng hat uns total gut beraten, welche Aktivitäten wir machen können & wo wir mit dem Roller hinfahren können. Apropos Roller: wir konnten vollkommen problemlos einen Roller über das Hotel ausleihen. Super einfach & entspannt.
Review_Title: Ein entspannter, sorgloser Aufenthalt mit einem einzigartigen Ausblick.
HotelName: Wink Hotel Danang Riverside - 24hrs Stay & Rooftop with Sunset View

Positive_Review: khách sạn còn rất mới, nội thất hiện đại và rất đẹp

RoomType: Phòng Executive - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: gần biển
Negative_Review: k có bãi tắm riêng

RoomType: Suite Executive Ở Góc - Nhìn Ra Biển
Negative_Review: buffet sáng không ngon và quá ít món

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: thức ăn đa dạng , họp khẩu vị
Negative_Review: Thang máy của khách sạn quá chậm , hành lang của thang máy quá hẹp , khách lên xuống rất bất tiện .

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: Phòng đẹp, tiện nghi , nhân viên thân thiện lịch sự . Ngay sát biển.

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Negative_Review:
Hơi ít cầu thang cho số tầng khá lớn nên đôi lúc phải chờ hơi lâu.
Việc sử dụng thẻ welcome drink hơi bất tiện vì thẻ phát ra từ lễ tân mà không kí xác nhận thì quầy bar không phục vụ và yêu cầu quay lại tìm lễ tân để xác nhận, gây bất tiện cho khách trong khi đây là quy định nội bộ.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe - Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: Khách sạn sạch sẽ, buffet ngon và nhiều món, nhân viên rất nhiệt tình. Ấn tượng đĩa trái cây quà chiều.

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Địa điểm tuyệt vời, view đẹp
Negative_Review: Hệ thống điều hòa và bữa sáng không hấp dẫn

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe - Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: Vị trí đẹp,sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Nhân viên cực kỳ thân thiện, phòng ốc sạch đẹp
Negative_Review: Thang máy phải chờ rất lâu, ăn sáng khá ít và chán

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Vị trí ok
Negative_Review: Phòng không có bồn tắm. Nhân viên tiếp thị quá nhiều hơi bị phiền.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Negative_Review: Lễ tân cứ nói theo ý kến của mình , không chịu tiếp nhận lời của khách

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Nhân viên thân thiện. Vị trí gần biển và khu mới nên rất đẹp. Nhân viên thực sự dễ thương. Đồ ăn sáng cũng khá ngon
Negative_Review: Điều hoà kêu quá to. Thoát nước của phòng vệ sinh rất kém, bị tắc nước luôn. Cơ chế hoạt động của thang máy cũng chưa hợp lý nên mỗi lần đợi thang máy đều rất lâu (mình cũng thấy nhiều người phàn nàn về điều này). Thêm nữa nệm cũng chưa thực sự êm. Mong khách sạn nâng cấp và lưu ý hơn về cơ sở vật chất.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe - Nhìn ra cảnh thành phố
Positive_Review: Phòng đẹp, phù hợp với giá tiền.
Negative_Review:
Điểm trừ là nhân viên lễ tân quá cứng nhắc, không linh hoạt trong việc xử lý tinh huống. Chúng tôi muốn sử dụng dịch vụ sauna nhưng do spa ko có lịch trống sớm vậy nên chỉ xác nhận cho chúng tôi lúc 11:00, chúng tôi nghĩ rằng nếu chúng tôi sử dụng dịch vụ sauna xong thì có thể sẽ bị muộn giờ check out nên có xin hỗ trợ check out muộn 5 đến 10p nhưng thật bất ngờ khi lễ tân gọi lại xác nhận là chỉ hỗ trợ cho chúng tôi trả phòng muộn từ 1 đến 2 phút, cho minh hỏi 1 đến 2 phút có đủ thời gian để thang máy khách sạn đi từ tầng 6 xuống sảnh không vậy ạ? Vậy nên chúng tôi đành hủy lịch đi spa và kéo vali ra khỏi phòng lúc 11:57 để kịp đung 12:00 có mặt tại sảnh trả phòng theo như chính sách của khách sạn.
Góp ý thêm là nhân viên spa làm việc chưa được chuyên nghiệp ban đầu xác nhận lịch cho chúng tôi là 11:00 nhưng sau đó khi tôi gọi lại spa kiểm tra lại dịch vụ thì báo rằng đã báo nhầm khung giờ cho chúng tôi, khung giờ trống là 11:30, do không thể trả phòng muộn nên chúng tôi báo luôn là hủy không sử dụng dịch vụ sauna, sau đó ít phút thì spa lại gọi bảo là đã thu xếp cho chúng tôi lúc 11:00 nhưng lúc đó chúng tôi không còn thấy hứng thú nữa nên đã từ chối.
Thật tiếc khi chúng tôi không có nhiều thời gian trải nghiệm hết dịch vụ của khách sạn nhưng mong góp ý của chúng tôi sẽ góp phần làm cho dịch vụ của các bạn ngày càng tốt hơn.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: The best part of the stay was the breakfast. It’s a great buffet with plenty of options- both European and Asian. The food was hot, freshly cooked and in abundance! Also, the room was quite spacious- with very comfortable bed and huge bathroom. The location is nice - fairly close to the center, just opposite the beach.

Negative_Review:

No electric power to blow dry hair in the bathroom, I had to blow dry my hair where my bedside table was with no mirrors.
The pool water was too cold to swim during our stay, if only the pool was heated or have a jacuzzi.
Key cards didn't work 
Staff not very experienced with check in and check out
Review_Title: We really enjoyed our stay and was happy with our room apart from the above.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: Nice views
Negative_Review:
There are no local shops or markets within a 1 km walking radius of this hotel.

This means it is necessary to take a grab taxi anywhere like a restaurant to get some food.


But this is okay for two or three nights, but no more.
￼￼
Review_Title: Great view and pool on top floor

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Nice clean and comfortable

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: The breakfast was not great as the selection was not wide enough. It would have been great to see more local selections like Bánh mì or Cơm Tấm and even Bún Chả. Drinks like Coconut coffee or even egg coffee.
Negative_Review: Clearer instructions on the phone, like how to call from room to room or reception. Wifi was very slow. and the television was not set to English which was a bit of a frustration for us. Know we are a traveling party of 3, staff should have provide toiletries and towels for 3.
Review_Title: It was an averagely okay stay.

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
*Our day manager Ms. Sunny was lovely. She was able to help us out a few times with getting a stronger hairdryer and getting more towels.
*Breakfast is excellent. Lots of choice and they leave the ingredients out so you can mix and match.
*The pool is pretty cool and looks like an infinity pool from the right angle making it great for photos.
*The massage was much better than anticipated. In particular, my masseuse (Ms. Thu) massively outperformed. It may be the cheapest and best massage I got during my holiday.
*Loved the bed, nice balance between hard and soft
*The location right next to the beach is both the best and worst thing (see below).
Negative_Review:
*If you are coming from a country that is ahead on time be careful as the area is really noisy until about midnight, unfortunately we had to try to sleep with a literal nightclub outside. 
*Don't use the Booking.com app to communicate, it's useless. We ended up in a telephone game about the taxi that could have been resolved much quicker with direct contact.
*If you have long hair, use the hairdryer outside the bathroom as the power in the bathroom is really weak and fluctuates a lot.

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Thanks for the service
Review_Title: The hotel facilities and service was excellent

RoomType: Phòng Gia Đình - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: the pool, view and rooms where spacious
Negative_Review: street noise at night

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The breakfast was excellent and the staff friendly and helpful. We had a small issue which was dealt with by the manger very well.
Review_Title: Very nice hotel excellent location and wondeful staff

RoomType: Phòng Gia Đình - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Great location & beautiful rooms & pool area. Nice staff, great breakfast, good cocktails, wonderful views.
Negative_Review:
Noisy area with lots of festivals going on. 
Not hotels fault - but there mustn’t be any noise level restrictions in Vietnam / much soundproofing as the concerts along beach were ridiculously loud & booming up to our hotel room on level 16 & down the road a fair bit - even with windows shut - right through till like 2am! So hard for kids & us to get to sleep. Not a hotel fault - just something to be aware of in summer festival times.
Review_Title: Loved it, lots going on in Da Nang during our stay. Wish we had longer.

2nd day, Cleaners not provide enough toiletries. 
Using right card to open the door but even the light is green it not opened, everytime.
Staff didn't seem sorry for that.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: Very new and modern
Negative_Review: Room too small as was pool area . Some staff were helpful and friendly. The rooms weren’t cleaned properly and done in 5 min . No replacements of glasses

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: I was informed that my Double Twin Room have no view and was suggested to upgrade my rooms. I was afraid that a bad room may ruin my vacation, actually the room was not bad at all and we all please with it. So if you are going to travel a lot on daytime, save your budget on something else.
Negative_Review: I booked a discount room's version on Booking (which is auto arranged 1 adult in a room with 2 beds), and I must pay more for additional person. I think we should make it more clear here, at first I think a room with 2 beds is of course suitable for 2 adults.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: Everything except the staff they are very rude ( specially HOAN and SARAH )
Negative_Review:
The staff , from the beginning till the last minute 
Specially with Hoan and Sarah .. this is my story

There is an employee named HOAN. We called and asked for a little delay in leaving and we got half an hour at exactly 12:30, but I was surprised by a call from this rude employee at 12:15 telling me that if I did not come down within 5 minutes, I would be fined an amount of money, I do not remember exactly How much was it, but I think 50 or 100 dollars, this is rude, I am a respected guest and I am not a thief for him to talk to me in this way, if one day I decide to not living here he will be the reason. 
I hope there strict action with him.

The second story

There is an employee her name is SARAH
When we went down to check out from the hotel, we were delayed by this employee, there was a spoon missing, and is it my problem? I told her that everything on the table, i used it on the first day to eating and put it on the table and the other one was new and I did not use it, but she insisted that the loss was from me and I just ate and put it in the same place on the table so it is the problem of the cleaning staff not me, and why would I steal a teaspoon ?? It annoyed me with a lot of asking and this was something abnormal.
Hope to teach her how to speak with the guests.



HOAN .. i will not forget how rude he was !!!
Review_Title: Everything is nice except the reception staff

The beach view rooms come with one little drawback: music playing through the night on the beach audible even on the higher floors with windows closed.
For guests with light sleep, city view might be a good consideration (not a bad view anyhow - see photo).
Closing time of the rooftop bar at 22:00 is something guests have to count with. We arrived late in the evening and had no option anymore for a drink or snack in the hotel.

RoomType: Suite Executive Ở Góc - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
We booked an Exec room, so it was nice and spacious with a small living space. Beds comfy, great views.
Staff were very professional and very eager to help. They stored our luggage for us when we went to Hoi An for a couple of nights. And allowed us to shower when we returned soaking wet after riding in a storm for an hour!
Negative_Review: The Exec Lounge. Staff seemed unsure about opening times and what we were 'allowed' to eat and drink. Turns out we were allowed one glass of wine pp only, or 2 beers each. No other drinks on offer and very small slot of cold food available. Had to ask for cutlery. Not worth the extra$.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe - Nhìn ra cảnh thành phố
Positive_Review: The hotel was great value - a modern, clean, comfortable room with an incredible view. Very freindly and helpful staff. Breakfast was "wow" - extensive.

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: I really like their infinity rooftop pool and the bar! The view is amazing both at daytime and at night. The location is good too, pretty central and next to the beach. However, every time we go to the beach, beach staff were asking money from us just to enter the beach. I hope Radisson could sort this for their guests.
Negative_Review:
The food at the bar was disgusting. I never seen such a bad food ever in Vietnam. They brought me raw shrimps, after I returned the order they brought me dry overcooked shrimp back. Not even a solution was given (discount, offer this dish on a house). So I had to somehow swallow and pay.
Also, they still need improvements on sauna area, at least the staff need to learn to how so switch it on and make it hot for guests.
Review_Title: Great choice of hotel for short time stay near the beach in Danang

Review_Title: Beautiful stay, perfect hotel! Would definitely return

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
Everything was great basically. We had a fantastic vacation in Danang. The hotel is well-located, though it's not in the city center, the dining options around are limited, but it's easy to reach by taxi (around 10-15 mins) to and from the city center. 

The view is amazing, even with the partial sea view room. Room is clean and tidy. Elevator needs keycard to acess which is great. Breakfast is delicious with a lot of options, both local, Asian, and western. The restaurant is wonderful with several vegetarian options. 

The highlight for me would be the spa. We had a complimentary sauna for >3 nights of stay and I booked the massages twice - amazing experiences, very professional and of great quality. The massage rooms are sea front, which is another plus. 

So in general it's really great for a relaxing vacation with family or friends or partner. The price for the room and other activities and services in the hotel is very reasonable.
Negative_Review: Nothing much. If I have to pick, I'd say the room is a bit small for a high-end hotel in southeast Asia. And the rooftop bar is right beside the pool, which can be a bit messy when it's busy.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: We only stayed one night in Da Nang but the Radisson hotel was perfectly good. Our room was on the smaller side but really nice. The staff were super helpful with our travel arrangements. They booked us a Taxi driver who took us on a great tour over the Hai Van pass - well worth it if you're heading north and have the time. The rooftop bar has stunning views even if the pool looked a little small. The beach is huge and seems to be the main attraction in Da Nang. There's not that much else to do, and not much else near the hotel, but Taxis are cheap and easy to book on Grab to go to more lively areas.
Negative_Review: Vegan options at breakfast could be better but this was pretty much on par with other hotels in Vietnam.

I attach picture, maybe others not be scamed like me for deluxe room.
In danang for the money i payed for one night in Raddisson ,i could stay easily at another 5 hotel stars , 2 nights.
From the room you can hear all the traffic outside.

Negative_Review: The card machines were not working. Faced a lot of trouble to close out this issue. For such a brand of hotel, the facilities available were limited and not of the expected quality. The hotel also quite strangely asked for a deposit apart from the room charges in case of damages which I felt was unnecessary even before any incident. The bathroom door did not have a locking mechanism which is not suitable for a family vacation. The food options available also were limited especially for vegetarians. Quite strange given that the hotel is a global brand. The room was also not as shown in the app as the balcony was just a door no seating space or place to stand. Just a namesake view. Room cards were issued without activation and the lifts are pretty narrow and pound noise of the lift when you get off at your floor.

RoomType: Suite Executive Ở Góc - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Delightful 5 night stay in a corner suite with amazing panoramic sea views. Great location, right on the beach. It's a fairly quiet area (which I loved) but an easy walk to restaurants and a local market. Fantastic breakfast with so many mouthwatering dishes to choose from. Staff were lovely, especially Nhi who provided exceptional customer service, delivered with such genuine warmth. She made me feel so welcome and was always on hand to provide unbiased advice on tours, attractions & transportation. I will definitely be back.

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: We wanted an ocean view and got it. The room was well appointed, very clean. The staff including Ms Sunny, Mr Huu Anh and Hao, and many more were very helpful, warm and attentive. Good breakfast!

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Great view from room, great breakfast and very friendly and helpful staff
Negative_Review: This isn't a 5 star hotel but more like a 3 star youth hostel. The hotel is too small for the block it's built on. Lifts are crowded and the pool / bar area is a joke! Beware, the room doesn't have a balcony. Instead, it's a ledge that you walk out on. The room is not sound proof. The noisy Karaoke bar across the road is very disruptive. We booked an ocean view room but had to move to a room at the back of the hotel for some sleep. We stayed in two rooms, both of them the air-conditioning didn't work. Although staff were quick to respond, it took hours on both occasions to fix.
Review_Title: Beware, this is not a 5 star hotel

RoomType: Suite Executive Ở Góc - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: We settled on a corner suite with sea view, wow! Really clean with its own living area and large bathroom plus a coffee machine in the room really makes a difference on a morning. The staff were very professional along with a good understanding of English. Breakfast was a thing of beauty. From a good English to some of the best noodles I had in Vietnam. The VM coffees were perfect. We tried the spa and was very pleased with our treatments. sad to check out.
Negative_Review: Tourism has not recovered properly since the pandemic so at time we were the only foreigners around. The restaurant on an evening was closed due to the lack of clientele. Also as an executive member we got pre-drinks (1 glass of wine or 2 beers) on the 20 floor, please give us the option to purchase more.
Review_Title: Relax and unwind by the beach.

The elevators are very dirty, and the floor carpets in the room are dirty as they don't vacuum and on top of this breakfast closes exactly at 10.00am and if for example they run out of a specific dish the refill is not done. I definitely don't recommend it.
The rooms pictures.on the website are not reflecting the reality the room is very small.

Review_Title: We stayed here as part of of our anniversary trip and the hotel and staff went above and beyond to make it special for u

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
Attentive, discreet & courteous - Radisson Hotel Danang

I was warmly greeted with an amazing drink followed by a precise introduction to all the facilities - that included a rooftop bar, an infinity pool with a breathtaking view, a fitness center, and a spa area.

The staff were courteous, friendly, and really attentive. At this point I would like to express a special thank you to Ms. Vy who assisted me by any matter with such professionalism & effort.

The breakfast was excellent! There were plenty of food options (also vegetarian and vegan options), pastries, and freshly squeezed juices. What really amazed me was that there was a cook who prepared warm meals (Phở, Bún Bò, ...) or an omelette by order.

My room was modernly equipped and clean - there was nothing to complain about. At the push of a button, you could call the staff, have the room tidied up, and much more. Bottles of water, tea, coffee, and fresh fruits were provided every day.

I appreciate your hospitality and the four restful days. 
I will surely return!

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: 깔끔하고 루프탑 수영장이 있는 곳을 찾다 가격대가 나쁘지 않고 위치도 괜찮아 오션뷰 시티뷰 반반 룸으로 2박에 VND 3,204,360에 예약을 했습니다. 방 컨디션은 너무 좋았고 화이트 톤으로 되어 있어 더 넓고 깨끗해 보였고 창은 통유리로 되어있어 너무 맘에 들었습니다. 화장실 옆에 전신 거울도 설치 되어 있었으며 TV는 삼성 스마트 TV로 Kbs1,2, Mbc 채널도 있었고 Youtube도 시청 가능했습니다. Wifi는 비밀번호가 없이 바로 연결 가능했고 침대는 슈퍼싱글 침대 2개를 연결해 놓아 넓게 사용 가능 했습니다. 루프탑수영장은 오전 6시~ 오후 9시까지 이용 가능했고 물이 차갑다는 말이 있었지만 그렇게 차갑지는 않았고 다만 해변가이고 21층에 있다 보니 해가 호텔 뒤로 사라지고 그늘이 많아지면 바람이 많이 불어 좀 추웠습니다. 루프탑에 있는 Bar에서 음식을 시켜 먹진 않았고 500ml 물 한 병을 시켰는데 VND51,000으로 좀 많이 비쌌습니다. 직원들은 대체적으로 친절했으며 일 처리 속도는 빠르지 않았습니다. 엘리베이터는 3대로 고층까지 이동하는데 많이 기다리거나 하는 불편함이 없었고 방키가 있어야 로비에서 다른 곳으로 이동 가능하였습니다. 조식은 너무 많이 기대했던 건지 기대만큼 아주 다양하진 않았습니다. 체크인 전, 체크아웃 후 둘 다 짐을 맡기고 루프탑 수영장을 이용하였는데 방 키가 없으니 그때마다 직원들이 엘리베이터 버튼에 키를 대주었어야 했는데 귀찮은 내색 없이 다들 친절하게 해주었습니다.
Negative_Review: 베트남이 커피가 맛있다는데 조식에 제공되던 에스프레소 머신의 커피는 너무 맛이 없었습니다.

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Das Hotel ist sehr modern und überzeugt mit seiner zeitgemäßen Ausstattung. Die Zimmer sind äußerst sauber und haben eine ordentliche Größe, was den Aufenthalt sehr angenehm macht. Besonders hervorzuheben ist das freundliche und zuvorkommende Personal, das stets bemüht ist, den Gästen einen schönen Aufenthalt zu bereiten.

Das Frühstücksbuffet ist umfangreich und bietet eine große Auswahl. Lediglich die Auswahl an Käse- und Wurstwaren könnte noch etwas verbessert werden, um auch hier eine noch größere Vielfalt zu bieten.

Der Strand ist in nur 2-3 Minuten zu Fuß erreichbar und bietet angenehme Liegen, die zu einem geringen Preis genutzt werden können. Das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis für Getränke und Snacks am Strand ist ebenfalls angemessen, allerdings gehört dieser Bereich nicht zum Hotel, da das Hotel keinen eigenen Strand hat.
Negative_Review:
Ein kleiner Minuspunkt ist der verhältnismäßig kleine Pool des Hotels. Es gibt nur wenige Stühle und diese sind schnell vergriffen, sodass man sehr früh am Pool sein muss, um einen Platz zu bekommen. Es gibt lediglich zwei Liegen außerhalb des Poolbereichs und diese sind ebenfalls schnell belegt. Insgesamt gibt es eher Sitzgelegenheiten als Liegen, was den Komfort etwas einschränken kann.

Trotz dieser kleineren Mängel bietet das Hotel insgesamt ein gutes Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis und ist eine empfehlenswerte Wahl für einen entspannten Urlaub.
Review_Title: Direkt am Strand, super Personal und Preis-Leistungsverhältnis

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe - Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: L’emplacement, un service de qualité, la nourriture, le spa et le personnel. Je tiens à remercier le personnel pour son professionnalisme et spécialement Éric qui travaille à la réception pour tous les renseignements qu’il m’a fourni sur la ville et les excursions. De l’enregistrement à mon départ, il a facilité chaque étape.
Negative_Review: N\A

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review: Единственное хорошее это вид из бассейна и расположение, на этом преимущества заканчиваются)
Negative_Review:
Для отеля такого уровня и с такой ценой отвратительный сервис. Холодильник в номере ужасно вонял, что невозможно было открыть его. 
Номер почти за 100$ с видом на соседнюю стену и отсутствием какой-либо звукоизоляции, всю ночь было слышно проезжающий мимо транспорт. 
Вишенкой на торте оказались душевые тапочки, забирать нельзя и вам их выдают после кого-то, для меня это был шок. 
Для меня цена в 100$ оказалась абсолютно неоправданной для такого сервиса. Отель совершенно не стоит своей репутации и потраченных денег. 
Были в отелях сети Raddison в России совершенно другой уровень. Полное разочарование.

Positive_Review: L'emplacement et quelques personnels à l'accueil
Negative_Review:
l'équipement à minima, aucune prise à coté d'un miroir pour le séchoir à cheveux, seules 2 petites poignées de portes de douche pourrait être utilisées pour le séchage de 2 serviettes alors que chambre familiale, quid des autres linges de toilette ? aucun étendoir pour le séchage des maillots & serviettes de plage !! grand balcon désespérément vide, ni chaise, ni transat, ni table, ni rien du tout !!! 
Cerise sur le gâteau, en plus du prix de la chambre familiale > 67 500 000 VND pour 8 nuits, non négligeable, pour un hôtel loin des 4 ou 5 étoiles annoncées, un déposit de 4 000 000VND, non prévu au contrat de réservation est à payer à l'arrivée, déposit que l'hotel s'arrange pour ne pas rembourser au check out, ne serait-ce que partiellement, en facturant des consommations mini bar injustifiées. Après 3 réclamations formelles aucun remboursement à ce jour !!!

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe - Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review:
Nous avons passé un séjour formidable dans cet hôtel très récent. Le rooftop, bien que de taille modeste, est parfait pour passé un moment agréable, avec sa piscine, son bar et sa salle de sport.
Le personnel est professionnel et attentionné.
Le petit-déjeuner est bien garni, les gateaux et pains frais faits sur place avec la présence discrète du chef dans la salle pour la bonne organisation.
Negative_Review: Continuez comme ça, ne changez rien!

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe
Positive_Review:
Wir mussten kurzfristig ein anderes Hotel in Da Nang buchen und haben uns für das Radisson Hotel direkt am Strand entscheiden. Bereits aus Europa ist man bei Radisson Hotels ein guter Service gewohnt aber der Service hier in Da Nang war der beste Service denn wir je erleben durften und übertraf den europäischen um weiten.
Das komplette Personal war sehr sehr zuvorkommend, hat immer wieder gefragt ob alles okay ist oder wir wünsche haben und könnte uns bei allen Fragen und Wünschen wunderbar weiterhelfen. Wir haben uns selten so gut aufgehoben gefühlt.

Das Frühstück bot eine sehr große Auswahl an lokalen und internationalen Speißen.

Extra hervorzuheben möchten wir den Super Spa Bereich und die mehr als erstklassige Spa Behandlung.

Auf jeden Fall werden wir bei unserem nächsten Besuch erneut im Radisson einchecken.

Positive_Review: 미케비치 바로 앞 위치 전망 좋앗고 객실 컨디션도 좋앗습니다. 루프탑 수영장 맘에 들었어요
Negative_Review: 루프탑 수영장이 오후 8시까지 입니다.오후 10시까지 운영시간이 조금 아쉬워요

RoomType: Phòng Premium - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Качественный ремонт.
Negative_Review: Мы снимали улучшенный с видом на океан номер за 150$ в сутки. В номере не работал кондиционер, не на обогрев не на охлаждение. Он про был отключен. Пульт от телевизора был сломан. В самом номере было очень холодно. Нам отказали в ужине в 6 часов вечера, хотя было написано, что за доплату он возможен. Нас сообщили что сегодня ужина не будет. В 22:00 отель вымирает, закрывается крыша, бар, бассейн, делайте что хотите, зато в 8 утра пришла уборщица и начала очень громкую уборку соседних номеров не дав нам спать. В коридоре на полу она бросила чистые полотенца, постельное белье. Несмотря на то что на улице 25 градусов, вода в бассейне очень холодная, отсутствует его подогрев, думаю его просто выключили.
Review_Title: Отель не соответствует 5 звездам. Персонал не обучен стандартам работы.

Phòng Grand 3 Người, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review: Đồ ăn sáng phong phú và tươi ngon, tôi thấy rất thích. Phòng sạch sẽ, view biển rất tuyệt, nếu có thời gian tôi sẽ ở lâu hơn. Các tiện ích cộng thêm như free trà chiều, tiễn sân bay đều rất hoàn hảo. Tôi hoàn toàn ưng với lựa chọn.
Negative_Review:
Vì ít thời gian, nên tôi chưa dùng hết được các tiện ích phòng gym, bể bơi, tôi sẽ quay lại Rosamia vào dịp đến Đà nẵng để được trải nghiệm các tiện ích tuyệt vời này.

Không có gì không thích tại Rosamia cả :)

RoomType: Phòng Premier Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review: Rất tuyệt vời

Vị trí đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện.
Được tặng thêm quà rất thích, set chào mừng, xe tiễn sân bay
Negative_Review:
Phòng bình thường, nội thất gỗ nên nhìn không hiện đại lắm.
Giá hơi cao so với chất lượng phòng

Positive_Review: Phòng sạch sẽ, chăn ga êm. Gia đình mình ngủ rất thoải mái. Đối diện là bờ biển nên cả nhà mình đã tăng kì nghỉ lên 5 ngày ở đây.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review: Dịch vụ cực kì tốt, đồ ăn buffet (miễn phí) buổi sáng ngon, đa dạng. Mình đặt phòng hơi muộn, được khách sạn nâng hạng phòng view bao trọn biển rất đẹp luôn. Phòng dọn dẹp hai lần một ngày sạch sẽ lắm, đồ trang trí nội thất sang xịn mịn. Highly recommend mọi người đến đây nhé!

Negative_Review: Chưa phục vụ bữa trưa tối và Sky bar chưa có tiết mục đặc sắc

Positive_Review: It was a short break. The staff were lovely and really helpful with all manner of things. Room was comfy enough and good size. The shuttle back to the airport was a pleasant surprise. Beach is across the road and there is a pool on 6th floor. Nice. Sky Bar looks nice, although we did not manage to grab a drink there. As for Da Nang if you are visiting for tourist reasons make sure you go Hoi An. The taxi ride from the airport was around 120,000 dong and took 20 minutes.
Negative_Review: Hotel at the moment caters for visitors from the region. This is reflected in the cuisine - especially breakfast. Curry and noodles may not be to everyone's taste early in the morning. The patisserie section could be much improved. But that is detail for the future perhaps. The hotel is surrounded by many other hotels... not sure what the difference may be - but Rosamia is really good - don't look further.

Negative_Review: During check-out, Jason, the front desk supervisor pointed finger on us, he not only behaved rudely but also his disrespectful gestures were unacceptable. Without any prior knowledge of what has been our check-out note he went on and on arguing for extra money. This unworthy guy is evidently incompetent & his behaviour is detrimental to any hotel operator for sure. No customer will accept it after paying for their stay. When we asked for the General Manager to come and meet us at front desk other staffs at reception desk managed the situation and things went all well as the supervisor finally disappeared from the front desk.

RoomType: Phòng Grand Giường Đôi, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review:
Great location opposite the beach. 
Great view from room
Staff were lovely and did everything they could to please. 
Comfortable room
Nice pool and sky bar although very quiet.
Negative_Review:
Breakfast - where do I start. 
I’ve never seen so much food but yet so little I wanted to eat. 
This however seems to be the case in a few hotels I’ve stayed in in Vietnam. 
Suggestions I would make is to offer bacon, beans, mushrooms and tomatoes to accompany the variety of eggs on offer. Not a fan of stir fries or soups for breakfast. 
Larger selection of fresh fruit and yogurts would be nice. 
Coffee - a must have for most of us in the morning. I was shocked to have to pay for a latte. 
I didn’t like the Vietnamese coffee on offer. 
Pillows - ones to soft the other is too thick which unfortunately I didn’t sleep well for the duration. I didn’t however actually ask for a different pillow, so they may have had alternatives. 

Lastly - training in cocktail making. for the high prices charged it was very disappointing to receive a thrown together cocktail. We tested a lot on the menu and most didn’t taste like they should. 

The above are suggestions only. I did enjoy my stay and the staff were lovely.

CustomerNational: Congo (Cộng hòa Dân chủ Công gô)

RoomType: Phòng Premier Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review:
Full disclosure: I had to checkout 2 nights early than my booking because my mother passed away, they gave me credit for that 2 nights so that i can use it next time i visit the hotel, and i thank hotel management for that, but this favor does not affect my review. 

The location is really good, closed to My Khe beach, An Thuong night market is around the corner, many restaurants are around, which help me to have good breakfasts during my stay. My room is ocean front which helps to view the ocean right in front of me, it would be better if there is balcony so i can fully smell the ocean. The room is big, which is suitable for me to work at the hotel sometimes, the light control is near my bed, which is very convenient. If you visit Danang for tourism only, you can skip what i don't like, if you visit Danang for work like me, you can read what i do not like about the hotel and the staff.
Negative_Review:
if you read the welcome book after you check-in, there is no mentioning about people who travels to Danang/this hotel to stay for work/business, this is origin of my complaints. 
Breakfast: most, perhaps all, hotels in Danang is offering buffer breakfast, as a result quality of breakfast is low, to my standard, however this is expected by me. What i do not like is this hotel does not offer a la carte breakfast, which saves my time and quality would be perhaps better. During my 14 nights stay, i skipped my breakfasts at this hotel, instead, i went to some restaurants around the corner for my breakfasts, which saved my time and quality is not the best, but acceptable to me. 
Staff: they do not distinguish which guest is for tourism only, which guest is for business, they assume all guests are for tourism, they can ask but they chose not to. They seemed surprised when i told them i stayed alone and they even asked why i stayed alone? If they asked, i would expect them to do everything they could to save my time during check-in and check-out but they didn't. Tourists might have plenty of time but i did and do not. This is problem of hotel management, who do not train their staff well.
Review_Title: Good for tourists but not good for business

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review: Very clean, nice pool, great views and location. Great afternoon tea and breakfast.
Negative_Review:
Booked a family room on booking .com 1 adult and 3 children age 12 months, 14 and 16. Arrived at the hotel and reception said the two children are adults and would cost more. So I asked to cancel my reservation as they were not complying with the booking .com reservation, however they said that I would be charged the full price, or I could pay the difference and they kept my passports until I paid the different. So I could not cancel which was very underhanded tactics of the hotel staff. 

The hotel lacked in facilities and did not cater for all. The smart TV did not have one single English channel and no Netflix. only YouTube and a Rosamia advert going round in a loop or Vietnamese channels. 

There are better facilities in 3 or 4* hotel.

RoomType: Phòng Grand 3 Người, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review: near to beach
Negative_Review:
Its for sure not a global standard hotel to me! You cant compare its services with Marriot or Hilton. I have been traveling last 30 yrs and have been to many many countries but have never experienced people stopping me taking one extra whole fruit or a cake to room from breakfast buffet. It happened here. I was stopped and told I am not allowed to bring food to room. I had my reasons, we have near 2 yrs and 8yrs old kids sleeping. Often they dont want to sleep longer or dont want have breakfast. So what I was trying to do was hand carrying one slice of bread and one small slice of cake! I was very shocked! Explained to them but they didn’t understand and insisted me not to. 
During breakfast the chef who was making egg omelette, used her finger (without gloves) to pick up something from the pan while frying the egg! I immediately told her, asked her to changed she didn’t even look at me! 
Next day same happed to my son when he was hand carrying couple of banana bread slices for his sister (my daugher) as she has never been to breakfast and wants to sleep through. He was stopped and told to leave those food! We were 4 of us and had booking with breakfast. 
Secondly I have never stayed in a world class hotel where there is a big cockroach 🪳 flying in the room. I had to kill it. Photo attached! 
I found too many people in the reception and are talking between each other on something else when I am asking something. Also I had difficulty in communicating, its not English I mean its the willingness of the hotel stuff to help me! 
Vietnamese people are very kind and very nice to us all through the trip however this hotel stay actually made our experience quite bitter. I am avoiding this hotel in future and wouldn’t recommend my friends as well.
Review_Title: ruined out Vietnam trip with bad experience

Positive_Review:
Очень понравилось расположение отеля прям напротив пляжа МиКхе, вкусные разнообразные завтраки. Отличный массаж со скидкой до 50% для гостей отеля. Семейный номер с двумя спальнями, 3 санузлами, залом отлично подходит для семей с детьми. Также рядом очень много кафе и ресторанов. 
У нас была годовщина свадьбы, отель прекрасно украсил номер и подарил очень вкусный торт. Также при бронировании нам предоставили бесплатный трансфер из аэропорта и обратно. Персонал очень вежливый и отзывчивый. Понравилось все!

RoomType: Phòng Premier Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review:
직원들 서비스가 매우 친절합니다
매일 룸 청소를 해줍니다
공항갈때 택시비 지원!!
조식은 종류도 많고 나름 괜찮음.
위치 바다 바로 앞임.
Negative_Review: 별로 없음.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review: Великолепный завтрак, лучший что я когда-либо видел. Ресторан на крыше с шикарным видом очень круто. До пляжа 20 метров, кстати Wi-Fi в отеле без пароля и ловит даже на пляже. Не большой уютный бассейн. Очень вежливый персонал, бесплатно организовали трансфер в аэропорт.
Negative_Review: нет такого

RoomType: Phòng Premier 3 Người Nhìn Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review:
해변이 호텔앞 길건너 바로 있어서 좋았습니다.
직원들이 너무 친절했고, 요청사항을 얘기하면 바로 대응을 해주었습니다.
뷔페는 매일 메뉴의 구성이 달라서 먹는 재미가 있었으며
맛도 아주 훌륭했습니다.
말하지 않아도 먼저와서 아기의자가 필요하냐고 물어보고는 가져다 주었고,
체크아웃하는 날 로비에 앉아 긴시간 기다릴때
목이 좀 말랐는데 물도 떠다 주고,
체크아웃을 한 이후에도 호텔에 키즈클럽에서 시간을 보낼수 있어서 좋았습니다.
부모님 두분, 친형가족, 저의 와이프와 두 아들까지 9명이서 방3개를 이용했고,
요청사항에 최대한 가깝게 해달라고하니 한층에 배정받아서 편하게 여행했어요.
다시 방문할 의향이 아주 많고, 그때는 와이프랑 둘이서 오고싶어요~!
Negative_Review:
4살, 2살 아들이라서 한국에서 아이들이 사용하는 목욕타월 두개 챙겨갔는데.
호텔 욕실에 타월이랑 착각을 한건지 방청소후에 타월 한개를 잃어버렸어요.
따로 호텔에 얘기를 하지는 않았지만 그게 조금 아쉽네요.

RoomType: Phòng Premier 3 Người Nhìn Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review: Прекрасный номер с чудесным видом на море! Всё работало, как часы. Безупречно! Персонал очень следит за сервисом. Если в номере 3 человека, то будет 3 полотенца, 3 халата и т.д. без напоминаний. Мы так расслабились, что проспали наш рейс)). Возникли проблемы с билетами, все на лобби помогали. И так в каждом возникающем вопросе.
Negative_Review: Спасибо всем за прекрасное время , проведенное в отеле!

RoomType: Phòng Grand Giường Đôi, Nhìn Một Phần Ra Biển Với Trà Chiều/Đợt Lưu Trú
Positive_Review: Emplacement, qualité du personnel, piscine.
Negative_Review: Rien à redire.

Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Nhân viên siêu nhiệt tình & thân thiện, cực kỳ chuyên nghiệp . Phòng sạch sẽ ! nhất định quay lại lần tới !

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Cơ sở vật chất, thiết kế chất lượng. Nhân viên chuyên nghiệp và thân thiện, đặc biệt là ở quán bar sân thượng và nhà hàng, cùng chất lượng đồ uống (cocktail), thức ăn ngon, giá hợp lý đối với khách sạn 5 sao. Vị trí tuy có hơi xa trung tâm, nhưng chỉ bước qua đường là tới biển, chung quanh có nhiều lựa chọn hàng quán từ sang trọng cho tới bình dân.
Negative_Review: Cần ra soát lại quy trình thủ tục nhận phòng phù hợp với một khách sạn ở đẳng cấp này. Mình có phản hồi với nhân viên lễ tân về trải nghiệm không thoải mái, và có câu trả lời thỏa đáng. Không phải lỗi của nhân viên mà là của quy trình.

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Phòng view biển rất đẹp. Nhân viên khách sạn và lễ tân nhiệt tình ạ.
Negative_Review: Nước uống ở spa khách sạn khó uống. Nhân viên spa chưa được nhiệt tình lắm. Kính ngoài ban công nên lau sạch một tý

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Vị trí đẹp, gần biển, gần trung tâm, phòng rất mới và rộng. Nhân viên nhiệt tình
Negative_Review: Đèn WC chỉ có 1 công tắc duy nhất cho 3 đèn, nửa đêm dậy đi WC phải bật tất cả đèn lên rất chói mắt. Bữa sáng chưa thực sự ngon

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Khách sạn sang trọng sạch sẽ, di chuyển thuận tiện

Positive_Review:
location is good, just walk across the road to the beach, walk to small supermarkets within 5 mins. I was told it is a relatively quieter side of the beach which I like. The room is nice with balcony and can hv a great view of the beach with no blockage. I read from other reviews that it may be noise during night time, the truth is sometimes there is music at the beach and it will only last till 10pm at night. The hotel has no control of it cos the music is from the resturant at the beach, yet the hotel keeps monitor the noise and report to police if it is over time. I stayed there for two nights and one night there is music, however, it stopped before 10pm. Meanwhile, if you close the balcony, there will hv no sound. 
Staffs at the hotel or at the resturant are supper nice and they are very curious of how is our stay, cos they want to improve their service, can feel every staffs give their heart for their hotel to serve us better. Definitely i will go back to the same hotel next time.
Negative_Review: not that i can think of, i enjoy every moment there.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
The room was absolutely beautiful, large and bright, very clean and lots of nice little details. Bathroom was great, separate toilet and shower which we liked. Powerful shower and nice products. Bed was comfy and clean soft sheets. 

The staff were amazingly attentive and always checking on us. Went the extra mile, gave us tips for local areas. One lady translated and arranged for a very precious item we left at a previous destination to be delivered by bus which we were so grateful for. 

The pool was also great, we swam on our own in the pool one evening and it was sheltered so you would be protected from the sun in the daytime. Food was fab for breakfast and we ate there in the evenings. 

If we are in the area again we will 100% come back. Thank you so much. Cam on Ban.

Positive_Review:
Breakfast was decent.
Room was fantastic and the view is just as reflected in the website; magical.
Service staff was very friendly and accommodating especially Hoang Thuy who was very patient, caring and meticulous. Her warm smile really made our stay here even more pleasant. Same goes to the lobby reception and breakfast reception and room service staff. Truly remarkable.

The Annona Spa at level 4 has a very very nice ambience and the service provided was really worth every cent. Friendly and dedicated staff especially Ms Nhi and Ms Thu.

Positive_Review: Even though we only stayed for one night we had an exceptional experience. The room was spacious and clean, breakfast was great, rooftop bar was spectacular and beautifully decorated. Location is perfect if you want to enjoy Hanoi’s Old Quarters. But most of all we appreciated how kind and attentive the staff was. They definitely went above and beyond to cater our needs, help with transportation and even book a last minute massage. Big thanks to My Lee who made us feel very welcome and well taken care of.

Positive_Review:
Extremely fancy hotel with an amazing view of the beach and Linh Ung in the distance. Recommend getting up early at least once to see the sunrise. Is located right at the beach, so you only need to cross the road to get there.

The facilities are great: decent gym equipped for all muscle groups, fancy pool and 2 saunas, and cool rooftop bar. Also offers extra services such as room meals and an on-site spa.
The staff was very friendly and helpful.

Positive_Review:
From the moment we arrived, the staff were fantastic. I’ve stayed in many hotels and this is some of the best service I’ve ever had. We arrived at 10am and had planned to leave our bags and head out but our room was ready for us which was a nice bonus.

The room was a decent size and was clean. The beds were comfortable and the air con worked well. The balcony was a good size and would have had a lovely view if it wasn’t so foggy. Having a separate door on the toilet was a nice touch.

The steam room, sauna and pool were nice but the pool was freezing. We still enjoyed our swim and cocktails by the pool!

Breakfast was good as were the cocktails at the rooftop bar.

There was a loud party across the street at night but the GRO spoke to each group individually at breakfast and apologised which was unnecessary but showed good care.

For the price, this hotel is definitely worth it!!
Negative_Review: The room didn’t feel small but because of the layout, there wasn’t really anywhere to lay the suitcase out except on the bed.
Review_Title: Great give star stay in Danang

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Stylish with great ocean views.
Good bar cocktails and food. Han Duc as a server and bartender was very friendly. Ask him to make you his signature cocktail.
Negative_Review: Pool is a little small. Outside parties on the beach very loud from 18:00-22:00

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and accommodating to our needs. We had a problem with the drainage in the shower and it was promptly fixed. We had to check out early due to an early flight and they gave us our breakfast in a bag to-go. Views were absolutely stunning.
Negative_Review: Nothing

Negative_Review: Breakfast time perhaps needs more staff to clear table, replenish food and manage the cooking section.
Review_Title: Convenient location to reach the beach which is at a quieter side

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Great breakfast with lots of choices, great staff, quick check in and check out, loved the rain shower and the very comfortable bed, good options on the TV, the location is amazing and the cake on the icing is definitely the balcony with the view (and sound!) of the sea.
Negative_Review: Blasting noise and flashing lights from the adjacent karaoke bar... the deafening noise levels were just beyond tolerable... it sounded as if they were singing in my own hotel room. I've lived in Vietnam for a while and I know karaoke is like a national sport - but the sound levels that I experienced during my stay, in particular one night, made me reconsider the amount of money I had spent on my room. Honestly, the sheer volume was disrespectful to the many guests of this beautiful hotel. Don't count on taking naps or going to bed early or enjoying the beautiful peace of the balcony during concert hours.
Review_Title: Very nice hotel, but plagued by disruptive karaoke noise.

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: what can I say, the hotel was stunning and far surpassed our expectations. we were doing a bit of traveling around the region and thought we would treat ourselves to a more luxurious stay at sel de mer. we opted for a bigger room and boy it delivered. stunning views from the 18th floor.
Negative_Review: found a few of the other guest on our floor flaunted the no smoking rule witch as a non smoker is a bit annoying but apart from that it was beautiful.

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Great location, large comfortable rooms. Great views.
Negative_Review:
There is a beach club across the street that plays full blast awful karaoke from. 17:30-22:00. So bad and loud you can’t sit on the balcony, even on the 25 the floor.
I’m no soprano, but this sounds like a lunatic asylum. Easy fix would be for the hotel to book the function suite for a few $$$ each weekend and then cut the sound off. Pool area also small for the hotel size.
Review_Title: Nice hotel and location, spoiled by street karaoke.

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển

Negative_Review: They make you feel like a criminal at checkout. As we were checking out, they asked us if we consumed anything out of the mini bar? I said no, they had to send someone up to the room to verify, and this took 45 minutes. As we were heading to the airport for a flight home, this was annoying. We would have left earlier. Just keep the card on file, and charge the room if I consumed anything. This was done at other Vietnam hotels, but not all.

Positive_Review: Our room was incredible!! Very large suite and balcony. The beds were like sleeping on a cloud! They were so comfortable as well as the sofa. The bath was pure luxury! I cannot fault the room! Perfection!
Negative_Review:
Everything was amazing but there were a few minor details that could be improved on.
Firstly some of the reception staff weren't very warm and welcoming if anything they came across stuck up and if they were looking down on us as if we didn't belong. I had paid for one of the best rooms so I don't expect to feel this way. But please note that was only a few of the staff members. The spa staff were very kind.
Secondly, this is very small but being a 5 star hotel it would be nice if they had a smart TV in the room with Netflix.
And lastly, this seems to be the same with most hotels, it would be nice if the breakfast could accommodate all dietary needs. I am vegan (not vegetarian) and I think I was only able to have fruit.

The highlight of our stay in Danang was Esco Bar, which is not too far from the hotel.

The hotel advised us to pay in VND because the exchange rate they use increases the $ value by a lot compared to what was given on Booking.com. We had to pay using a different card which was inconvenient. It would be preferable if prices were set in USD at the time of booking.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Everything. The staff are so accommodating you get made to feel like royalty nothing is too much for them. The rooms are so so clean the pool is incredible and the sauna and steam room too. The roof top bar is beautiful and had live music on one of the nights. Location is right next to the beach. They gave us a free room upgrade for the whole of our stay because there was a noise issue the first night which wasn't even their fault...it was from karaoke which is actually quite far away and a resident who can't be told to be quiet until 10pm. I am a very light and early sleeper so I struggled with this but in the new room it was peaceful and quiet. The staff immediately changed our rooms and upgraded us to a suite. The suite was exceptional. Huge and I highly recommend the upgrade if on the fence even though our first room was beautiful. The buffet breakfast is amazing too a great selection of healthy food that's cooked for you. I had a fresh omelette with salad and a yoghurt with fruit every day my partner went for traditional Vietnamese brekkie which he loved - they even have fresh sourdough and rye bread. I love this hotel it's been my favourite in Vietnam.
Negative_Review: I think the breakfasts could go on till later. I don't usually eat until 11am so perhaps until 12. Especially on the weekends.
Review_Title: Incredible staff and facilities BOOK HERE!

Many of the little things such as preparing us for checkout and ensuring that we were comfortable at all times made this hotel one of the best. The rooms are spacious, clean, well planned and have beautiful views. I do not hesitate in recommending this hotel.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: We loved everything about this hotel but the standout are the staff. They are amazingly friendly and helpful. Guest services advice saved us a lot of time and money by giving us great advice on day trips. A lovely waitress taught me some helpful vietnamese phrases to use on our trip. The doorman couldn't have been more helpful. Barman that recommend to try the spicy chicken wings...they were so yummy, you were totally right that we would love them!Service was flawless and very Japanese in style whist being warm and charming. The room itself was beautiful, large balcony overlooking the beach. The room was modern, clean a d just right for us. Beds were comfy. Breakfast was yummy with many choices both western and Asian. We would love to come back again and highly recommend this hotel. It has knocked our socks off to be our absolute favourite.

Positive_Review:
The service was impeccable from the time we arrived. We were greeted by An Khang who i believe is one of the GROs there. Check in was smooth, we were informed of the locations of the different amenities.

Our room had a leaking water pipe which i mentioned to An Khang the next morning when he asked us if the room was comfortable and if we have any issues. He immediately sent someone to fix it.

Every single staff was so courteous and professional. We had such a wonderful time there!

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
We stayed for 2 nights and it was so simply marvelous! 
It was mid-October and the weather was not that good rainy and cold, so we didn't want to move out of the hotel. And we had a great time! All the staff was so kind and detailed. Special thanks go to Mr. Tran Quoc Hoang (Food and Beverage Manager) - thanks for giving us your business card, otherwise I would never write your name correctly 😄. He was very kind, attentive, and positive. Such a shame we don't have all the names of the staff to thank them, but just know you are great! 

Spa, sauna, swimming pool - all was good and beautiful. The room was comfy and stylish. Thank you for the bathrobes and sleepers. The ocean view was stunning. 
We simply don't have any complaints, despite the fact one lady from reception kindly had asked us every morning “Is there anything you would like to complain about?” And the answer was all the same “Absolutely not! Sorry 😄” We had stayed at so many hotels, I wish many of them would had asked the same question and believe me we had something to say about 🙈. 

So, overall, guys, you all are great and we are greatfull for the stay! We wish you luck and nice guests. 
For sure if we are around, we are going to comeback to you place ❤️

Tanya and Alex ❤️

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
We had an incredible stay at Sel de Mer! I was previously staying at another property in Da Nang that did not meet our standards. We booked our room late at night to check in the following day. 
We left our previous property as soon as possible and checked in to Sel de Mer. The front desk staff let us check in our bags and go to the pool. We were able to get into our rooms early, and they left us a nice arrangement in our room for our honeymoon.
The AC was AWESOME. It worked exceptionally well, which is needed in Da Nang. The beds were so incredibly comfortable. The showers worked great, and the soaps smelled really good. We got a city view room, which was amazing to look out at everyday.
The breakfast buffet is excellent. There are great options, and it was very tidy, well-stocked, and organized. The pool and gym are gorgeous and overlook the water. The gym also had a great variety of equipment.
Negative_Review: I will say that the location is a bit far from some local bars and restaurants. But that makes the property feel a bit more quiet and private. Getting a Grab is easy, so this was no no problem for us.
Review_Title: Beautiful and comfortable rooms in Da Nang!

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: We stayed in the junior suite with ocean view. We asked for the highest possible room as it was our anniversary and they were able to (25th floor) 😊 Room was very spacious, modern, comfy, clean, great view and big TV. Bathroom very nice especially tub and great ventilation. Good walk-in wardrobe and plenty shelving next to desk to put all our clothes in. We were there for 7 nights so it made our stay more comfortable. Staff friendly and attentive especially the 2 guest relations officers. They would come to speak to us at breakfast every 1-2 days to check how our stay was and would attend to any issues/questions. Our shower drain was very slow to drain and they sent someone to fix it straight away. Room service, house keeping and reception is 24hrs. Free water bottles provided daily and more can be ordered as needed. Bartender named Chi (we think) at Speakeasy Bar on rooftop took great care in making our drinks perfect. Good gym, sauna, steam room and pool. Nice spa treatments. Breakfast buffet had good variety, nice fruit, juices, delicious pho/noodle soups, and great coffee. Room service food was good. We'd definitely stay here again.
Negative_Review: Nothing really, but just some suggestions for improvement. The pool area would have been better if there was a spa, if glass fence was kept clean to give a clear view of the beach and they played more chilled out music instead of pop/dance (btw I like pop/dance but it didn't feel right here). Windows in rooms could have been better sound proofed as we can hear all the street noise start from 5.30am or if there is a function across road in evening as they love the volume on the entertainment super loud lol (only happened 1 night luckily). TV would have been better if it allowed screen mirroring so I could watch my Netflix or YouTube off my phone ... or better still if it had Netflix and internet access. Breakfast was overall good, but some dishes could be better e.g. bacon, sausages, and have more hot vegetarian options.
Review_Title: Great place to stay. Highly recommended.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
This beachfront hotel is hosted in a modern tower. Everything from the design of the taxi apron, to the modern, roomy and quiet lobby, as well as common areas reflects a good care for details. 

Very polite and attentive staff, quick and reactive, yet kind and welcoming - a great example of Eastern hospitality.
We appreciated the welcome ice tea for all our party - much needed with 105°F outside!

We took a twin room with a sea view and a balcony - unobstructed view of the long beach of Da Nang, just super. The room was US-standard in size, rather big , with large bathroom, big TV screen, well designed and with a perfect and intuitive a/c control.

Breakfast is a highlight. Much choice of Vietnamese as well as western food, very good quality and presentation. Nice breakfast room, large and with no major odors. Apparently bottomless supply of food. Polite maitre constantly checking for quality and customer satisfaction.

The hotel is located to more quiet northern end of the strip, with a huge portion of the beach waiting for your early morning undisturbed bath :) Nice, quiet and reasonably big infinity pool, not on rooftop, in case you need some shadow. Large and nice gym nearby the pool. A taxi ride to/from the airport takes less than 15 minutes. Attractive Hoi An can be reached by taxi in less than 40 minutes.

Considering also the fare, I would say one of the best hotel stays I had over the last few years. We just felt welcome, relaxed, and stunned by the gorgeous view. Would totally recommend, and hope to be there again soon.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố

Negative_Review: Nothing

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
We liked everything: location, rooms, restaurants, pool, fitness etc. Hotel located just in few metres from one the the best beaches. There are many seafood restaurants and small markets nearby. 

The whole staff starting from managers to cleaners and waiters was very helpful. During check- in welcome drink and plate with fresh fruits were provided. Everyday room was cleaned, sometimes even twice a day:) Breakfast boxes were ready at early check-out even without our request. Breakfast selection and quality was very good. Restaurant food was also delicious and at affordable price.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
The hotel is right on the beach (across the road), rooms are modern and comfortable. One thing I would like to inform you, if you want to have some good food don't fall for the taxi drivers outside, just turn right on the road and walk down, you will come to a street full of restaurants on both sides of the road. All of these places have good food, just walk along and you can try over 100 places to eat there. I found this road to have lots of good places than the main road where most of these places are large establishments with sea food. There is a Beach Club just 1KM walk down also a good place for drinks and some full moon parties. 

The guest relationship manager was the best, she was always present while check-in, morning breakfast and even while we checked out, I give 100% to her she was a mini Wiki of knowledge, with a big smile. I think this is one of the few hotels who have got it right "customers come first". 

Next time I will definitely be staying here.
Negative_Review: Now, this is nothing to do with the hotel, but across the road there are two events places, where they do weddings, parties etc. and like anything in Vietnam they have to do karaoke that goes on till 10PM, so if you plan to sleep early good luck with that, lots of these guys think they can sing but believe me its a stretch.

The room is very spacious and the bed is really comfortable. They hotel had a crib for my baby which made everything better for everyone. Breakfast is 5 stars with excellent local cuisine as well (besides the normal stuff). I really enjoyed trying something new everyday. The rooftop restaurant is also amazing, really good food. The staff is really excellent, amazing people that care about you but Ms Thuong was the angel from the 2nd floor restaurant. She was not only an excellent waiter but she even offered to feed our one year old his meal so that my wife and I could enjoy our dinner. I have only amazing memories at this hotel… The gym, the pool, everything was fantastic. Thank you for such wonderful time.

Positive_Review: The room - very comfortable - love especially the jacuzzi and shower room, the service of the staff (super prompt, great service and very attentive), the snack bar at the top floor where we were able to enjoy the international fireworks while chomping down the best snacks. My family also like the buffet breakfast - the servers are very friendly and would engage us in conversation. The reception was great too! They are super attentive and would help us arrange for transport, or pay close attention to our needs ie if we needed extra towels / change of key cards etc. Enjoyed also the infinity pool and the sauna and steam bath. It is less than 3mins walking distance to the beach. All adds up - My whole family of 8 really enjoyed the stay.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The staff was very helpful and spoke excellent English. The breakfast buffet was excellent. It was easy to grab a ‚Grab‘ cab directly in front of the hotel but no in-App payment, just cash! We drove to charming Hoi An, 30-40 minutes away, every day. The hotel gym was good. The ocean views from rooms, rooftop bar, and pool area were stunning. The rooftop cocktail bar was wonderful- serving excellent cocktails, beautiful and delicious food. The cityscape at night made it worth the higher tab. There was no other restaurant or cafe nearby that we found at all appealing.
Negative_Review: To access the beach you had to cross the busy street without a traffic light. The stretch of beach in front of the hotel was very run down and did not permit swimming. The beach was dirty. The pool area and hotel room bath seemed a bit run down. The immediate neighborhood was very run-down residential, no restaurants or retail, lots of abandoned construction, torn up sidewalks, stray dogs. Sadly DaNang city seemed economically troubled and exuded zero charm.
Review_Title: Nice hotel if you need to travel to DaNang.

Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel with amazing facilities. We had an awesome beach view from our room, the room itself was spacious clean modern and comfortable. Positive_Review: Good facilities, the sauna (both hot and steam) work very well and are in the super clean bathrooms next to the swimming pool. The staff at the pool are lovely people and are eager to please the customers. The rooftop speak easy bar is extremely classy and has excellent views of the beach and the city.
Negative_Review: Very little to like about this hotel with excellent service standards. If you like a rooftop pool or a pool in the blissful sun then you won't enjoy the pool at this hotel on the 5th floor.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Truly stunning Hotel. Contemporary design, with attention to detail. Very good location, by the beach. The pool and other facilities were great. Very good breakfast too.

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: We uncarefully left one phone in the room when checkout but the staff found it and contacted us just in time before our leaving Da Nang, and kept the phone pretty well for us to pick. Really appreciate it!

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Location;
It's perfect. It takes a few minutes to go to the beautiful My Khe Beach. 

Services provided:
The breakfast buffet was outstanding. The room gorgeous, comfortable and it was cleaned daily. I had the massage in the hotel as well, It was great and relaxing!

Staff:
The friendly Staff would speak English and were willing to provide useful information and help.
Negative_Review: All the thing in the hotel was awesome! There was nothing I didn't not like.
Review_Title: Gorgeous room, comfortable and friendly staff

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Wonderful stay. Staff is extremely polite and always smiling. Special thanks to Mr Man (Relationship Officer) for his extremely polite and welcoming nature.
And Ms Hong Nhi on the breakfast floor is a very sweet and was very helpful especially to my wife finding all eggless food due to allergic to eggs.

Perfect location for hotel and breakfast buffet is fantastic.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Excellent customer service. Breakfast buffet was outstanding.
Negative_Review: The hotel was situated a bit further away from the main section of beach. When I booked, it said beach access but the beach opposite was not open for swimming and there were no Sun loungers. You also had to cross a busy road for access.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: A new hotel with fantastic facilities. Ocean view room which gave great views. Breakfast was very varied, and staff service was excellent throughout the hotel. Really great value for money

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Great hotel - we stayed in junior suite with sea view, it was just amazing! Balcony is huge and ocean view is breathtaking. Room itself is clean, stylish, tidy, spacious, with very comfortable bed. Breakfast is good enough, fresh and tasty food, although not too much of food varieties. At the same time hotel restaurant for lunch or dinner is super, highly recommended.

Hotel is located on the beachfront, but you will need to walk around 10-15 minutes to reach area with beachclubs and bars.
Negative_Review: During 5 nights stay we had 1 evening with very loud music from the restaurant opposite the hotel. However it fully stopped at 10pm, so noise did not influence on our sleep

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Good paean view. Friendly staffs and clean environment.
Negative_Review: Dining room of breakfast is way too small. There’s low frequency noise in the room which is came from air condition.
Review_Title: The beach is just within 100 meters distance from the hotel but you need to walk thru the street without traffic light.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
We recently stayed at Sel de Mer in Da Nang .

I would like to take this opportunity to express my gratitude. 

From the moment we arrived we experienced the most astounding sense of hospitality . Flights were arranged / day trips booked . Nothing was too much trouble . Breakfast excellent!

All the staff could not do enough to help . In particular Hoai Man . He is an asset to any business ! Wish I could steal him to work for me in South Africa . 

Sel de Mer we will be back ! 

Henelia and Louw Massyn 
South Africa

The beach in front of the hotel is the dirtiest section within the bay. The garbage there is the bycatch of the local fishermen, who leave it on the beach (and catch it again and again). The hotel and its neighbours Hilton, Sheraton and the like should definitely do something about it.

Also, as the hotel is in front of the beach, its staff regularly wipe the front lobby etc. In the morning, I slipped on the hard floor, just below the front steps. Luckily, I did not do much damage to myself or else I might have landed in a hospital with a broken bone or more.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Amazing hotel in a fantastic location - 2 minutes from stunning beach. The facilities are excellent, the staff and service are some of the best I have experienced and the ocean view from our room was incredible. The hotel breakfast is lovely and I was particularly impressed with the bar staff on the top floor. Couldn’t recommend a hotel more highly.
Review_Title: Beautiful hotel in great location with excellent staff and service.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
The room is in immaculate condition, very clean and spacious.
We book a room for 3 nights with balcony facing the sea and the view is just lovely. 
Adequate training equipment in the gym for proper workout. There is also an infinity pool to just soak-in and relax while enjoying the beautiful scenery. 
Their rooftop Speakeasy Bar & Tapas at 26th floor is a must try. Beside the 360degree view, the bar also serves good foods and drinks at reasonable price. We ordered their teriyaki chicken skewer, nem lui (pork skewer) and baked oyster with cheese….yummy!
Last but not least, all the staffs are very friendly, professionally trained and speak good English. Special mention to Mr Tan Bao at Anemoi restaurant. So nice of him to go all the way to request the same baked oyster with cheese that we ordered the night before at rooftop bar even though this is not on the lunch menu. Thanks to the cook too for making such special arrangement on our last day! 
We will definitely stay here again whenever we are back to Danang.
Review_Title: Immaculate and lovely seaview hotel room

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: nice and clean room with a great ocean view

Good service from all the staff that i have met 👍

Locationwise its not so bad since we had our own transportaion there are few seafood joins neary by within walking distance and the beach is just across the road . its quiet at night and soundproof of the room seems to be quite good comparing to most of the hotels in Vietnam so we were able to rest witthout being disturbing by next door guests .I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting danang

Breakfast was great though the selection wasn't very extensive. Room cleanliness was superb and amenities were great! The spa was superb too! 1 for 1 deal allowed me to enjoy massage every day! Try the Vietnamese bamboo massage! It lulled me to lalaland in no time!

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
great facilities and lovely hotel. The room is quite nice and spacious. they have a sauna and a steam room which is quite rare to find.

we had a spa which was amazing if you are looking for a spa!!! But if you are looking for a massage, this is not the right place as it is too light.

the restaurant is great and breakfast also !

The location is great allowing us to access the sea in 2 mins.
Negative_Review:
you shall probably check the blue panel in the swimming pool and have a proper fix rather that using strap … seems dangerous while at the same time we are not experts in this.

there was super loud music from the restaurant opposite to the hotel every day which you can hear in the room and even during spa … this was really terrible noise you guys shall buy this karaoke place to allow your customer to have proper sleep

we had to ask them to check the water evacuation in the shower as it was overflowing, they fixed it but would have appreciates a check before giving us the room …

RoomType: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review:

The prices of the rooms and of the restaurant are really reasonable, you get 5 star quality for 2-3 star prices. I would like to highlight one of the waiters, Bao, who taught us a lot about Vietnamese coffee culture. Finally a huge shoutout to the general manager who is personally helping with any issues and who has a great experience in the industry.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
We had a room on the 25th floor, ocean view.. Big room, and balcony.. Big shower. Rooftop bar right above us, but due to post covid, little amount if people..

And then breakfast...best ever. Name it, they had it. Continental, local, full english... Really exceptional.

The swimming pool, sauna, steamroom... Wellness, massage... All making it a great stay.

At 5am the local fishermen start working.. Enjoyed the activity..and later eat it at one of the restaurants.
Negative_Review:
The water in the swimming pool was rather cold. Sharing a steam room with my wife was not allowed.. Men and women are seperate.. Even in bikini. Boring, so we broke the rules. 
The music on the beach was rather loud.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển

Review_Title: nice and clean hotel , ocean view room are the best for relaxing

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Exceptionally friendly and professional service from front desk people. Spa facilities (sauna, steam room, and pool) were top notch and very clean. Bedroom with ocean view was beautiful and the bed was ultra comfortable. Staff at the rooftop restaurant / bar were delightful. Breakfast was quality.
Negative_Review: No complaints!
Review_Title: Wish I could have stayed longer. Will definitely return.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
The view of the ocean, the bed and pillow was nice. Overall room is very comfortable. 

The sauna was a plus.
Negative_Review:
Unfortunately need to go out and stand at the corner of the balcony to see the mountain view.

I stayed on level 19 and could hear neighboring businesses blasting music at night - so just be prepared for some noise nuisances which may be unavoidable at times.

We felt some aspects of the room could have been designed better, for example, the sliding door that opens to the balcony could be collapsed instead of stacked to one side. Stacking it effectively blocked 1/3 of the view. Also the shower does not have any place to put toiletries, we had to put the things on the floor.

Breakfast buffet egg station could do better. My sunny side up was soaked in oil, and the scrambled egg lacked the rich buttery flavor. Out of the eggs we tried, omelette was the best.

The hotel should place instructions on how to "on" the steam room. During my stay, if I needed to "on" it I had to ask a staff outside (so far is male) to enter the female toilet and help to "on" it. This left me feeling insecure during my use of the hot sauna that anytime a male could just walk in the female toilet to render assistance if needed.

CustomerNational: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

Positive_Review: Amazing property and amazing location. Right on the beach. The best part of the hotel is the staff right from the reception to the restaurant and the housekeeping, they all have gone and taken an extra step to make our trip wonderful. My wife was not well during the stay and the hotel staff was more than accommodating to provide us the things we requested. We even extended our trip by another day cutting short our stay in Ho Chi Minh as we loved the hotel and the place. Will definitely return here
