RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Opposite the beach and lovely views, sky bar was great atmosphere, the female managers were extremely helpful and friendly. The room was spacious and we really enjoyed relaxing here. Many staff become friends as we had 5 days here.
Negative_Review:
The pool was extremely cold even though it was 36 degrees. So unable to use it. The atmosphere for the pool was lacking. Great universal music was greatly needed. The selection of food for westerners was no good for breakfast , lunch or dinner. 
Just eggs, bacon, beens and pastry.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: It was ok nothing so special.
Negative_Review: Well the breakfast was good but there was raw chicken and there was this absurd policy that you could not take you're coffee with you to you're room.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The view was nice - that is when we could actually go out on the balcony and not have to deal with the noise. Room was well appointed and the bed was very comfortable.
Negative_Review:
Unfortunately the noise level was completely unacceptable. There is an open roof karaoke place right across the street with people screaming over loudspeaker for a few hours (until 10pm). There is no soundproofing in the room whatsoever and and even with the balcony doors fully closed, the noise is unbearable. We had to leave the room during that time. Complaints to the staff had no effect, no action was taken to make things right. We were on one of the higher floors, I imagine it could be even worse on the lower floors.

There were few other minor issues like leaking shower cabin or mediocre breakfast quality (especially the eggs!) but we would be fairly happy with the stay if it wasn't for the noise. Until this is fixed I'd definitely recommend staying somewhere else.
Review_Title: Absolutely unacceptable noise level - shame as it would be a decent stay otherwise.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The staff and especially Viet Tuan Anh Tran were very helpful throughout our stay! They arranged for us a driver to take us to all attractions that we wanted to visit in Da Nang, such as Marble Mountain, My Son Sanctuary, Coconut Village and Hoi An city! We couldn’t be more grateful for what they have done for us!
Negative_Review: The room that we had stay (Superior King Room with Ocean View) needs renovation! Also I would suggest that one used slippers are provided to guests, rather than old used plastic slippers. Also, I would suggest more options for breakfast.
Review_Title: Amazing Staff, but the hotel needs renovation

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Property was very clean and facilities very good. Bedroom was amazing with a great view out to the sea and the staff were very attentive.
Negative_Review:
The property was not well sound proofed at all to the point we could hear cars going by from the 14th floor. It was made worse by a karaoke bar situated at the bottom of the hotel which played exceptionally loud music till 10 in the evening.

It felt like the karaoke singer was in the room with us.

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Great location. Very friendly staff.
Negative_Review: Karaoke and weddings across the road create bad noise and lights until 10pm some nights. Great hotel. A shame about the sound proofing.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The room was clean and comfortable and the breakfast was really good. The gym was also good but the pool in permanent shade .
Negative_Review: Situated opposite a Karaoke bar, the noise at night was very loud (and very poor singing quality!), even with the doors closed. Although finishing relatively early, this spoiled the experience on the roof top bar and also on our balcony/room.
Review_Title: Pleasant enough, with very attentive staff and good good. but the location opposite a loud outdoor karaoke bar impacted

RoomType: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: Overall the staff at the hotel are very pleasant, especially those at the the restaurant on level 2. We had a few meals during our 4 night stay there, service was great and the waitresses were really attentive to our needs.
Negative_Review:
1. The noise. I asked to give us a quiet family room when we were checking in, as I haven’t had a good sleep for days in previous half of the trip in Hanoi. I was then told by the reception staff that they never had any complaint of noise from guests so I should not need to worry. It turned out that our beach view family room on level 8 was super noisy. The street traffic noise, the loud party music and karaoke for 2 consecutive nights from the restaurant or club across the street right in the beach, really negatively affected our entire experience. The balcony doors were not sound proof at all. When asking if possible to change to a quieter room, we were told the family room is only available up to Level 9 so changing room wouldn’t make any difference. I am not sure if that’s true, but we decided to stay put with this information from the reception staff. 
2. upon checking out, we were falsely blamed for breaking a glass in the room. Maybe just because we had 2 kids staying? I am 100% sure no glass was broken by us during our stay, it might be their cleaning staff who broke it during cleaning and blamed on us. Rushing to check out to catch our flight, my husband did not bother to argue and just paid for the mysteriously broken glass. However I am extremely disappointed by this.
Review_Title: Very mixed experienced. Hotel is new and clean, majority

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Just the pool and beachfront view
Negative_Review: The staff and their cooperation. Have never seen such unprofessional behaviour

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Roof Top Bar
Negative_Review:
Very crowded brrakfast area;
No any body lotion other than creme in bathroom

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The view was good and bed was comfy.
Negative_Review: So many large bus loads of (I won’t name the country) tourists. Extremely loud and no manners. There was no attempt to curtail them by the staff so they would invade every room. Also staff at spa were rude and unhelpful.
Review_Title: Need to make future potential guests aware that this is a hub for certain groups of tourists who are loud and annoying.

RoomType: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: Very clean and modern, the view is absolutely amazing!
Negative_Review: Would recommend only for business, customers very corporate and staff were accommodating but very formal.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: This is a beautiful hotel. Very comfortable and clean. The facilities were excellent and it is situated right across from a stunning beach. Breakfast was very good too.
Negative_Review: The restaurant was a little disappointing

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The view is very nice and the staffs are friendly.
Negative_Review: There was some I sure with the pump and no hot water for 2 days.
Review_Title: Room to improve the hotel facilities.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Place is well maintained and tidy￼. Bell man was really attentive.
Negative_Review: Reception staff are not accommodating with our request. We arrived early but was refused to check in early even though it was not peak booking period. Breakfast buffet was bland and lacks variety.
Review_Title: It was an adequate but unstimulating stay.

RoomType: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: Location
Negative_Review: It was very noisy. The doors and walls were not sound proof I believe. First night we were given 7th floor and we could clearly hear loud noise of vehicles. We later shifted to 9th floor which somewhat better.
Review_Title: Was reasonable value for money. However, certain things could be improved.

RoomType: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: The room with balcony on the sea
Negative_Review: This kind of hotel in Danang is always the same. Not really bad not really good and always too much expensive.

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
Staff is friendly & polite.
Room is clean & nice.
Negative_Review: The hotel is located in a remote area, which is surrounded by local residents and stores. People in the area are singing karaoke from afternoon, and the soundproof is really bad in the room.

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The food was amazing. The bar and pool was A1. The staff was very accommodating as well. I would stay there again.
Negative_Review: There was multiple wifi networks with similar names and they weren't secure networks so any one could connect and slow your connection or possibly hack you.
Review_Title: It was nice and I enjoyed it for the most part

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
1. The hotel is modern and has most of what you need if you just need a bed at night.
2. View of the ocean was very nice.
Negative_Review:
1. The swimming pool is small and very loud with all the traffic and construction work outside. Unusable.
2. Breakfast options compared to other hotels in Vietnam was disappointing, especially if you don't eat pork.
3. No sound proofing. We we're 23 floors up and it was very noisy. Can't imagine how bad it was lower down.
4. Hotel is missing so many of the nice touches some smaller hotels in vietnam do so well, like scooter rental etc.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The property is a cross the beach, so the view is magnificent.
Negative_Review: if there is a party near by and they’re singing - definitely you can hear their voice and it is very loud.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Location was quite ok.
Negative_Review: Cleanliness is very poor and hotel is totally different in reality then in photos.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: It is a very modern and clean hotel with very friendly staff and directly opposite the beach. The breakfast buffet has an extensive array of fresh and tasty options.
Negative_Review: The customer demographic is 99.9% Chinese and Korean toursits in this area and they can be very aggressive and dominating in common areas such as the breakfast buffet. There are a lot of restaurants in the this beach area which is very spread out but they are only seafood restaurants with a distinct lack of alternative options within walking distance.
Review_Title: Very nice modern hotel opposite the main beach

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: clean comfortable room with nice sea view
Negative_Review:
- location is far from center and the beach in front of the hotel is not the nicest part
- staff can be more courteous 
- breakfast a bit basic
Review_Title: comfortable room but far from center & not on the nicest part of the beach

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Big room and clean
Negative_Review:
We were treated differently to other guests just because we dressed up casual (came back from Bana Hills), we didn't get welcome drinks while all other guests had, we had to carry luggage to the room by ourselves. We booked suite and paid expensive room to experience the reception staff who lack of service mind and low hospitality, wasted it. We are from tourism industry and will share this to our business partners among AP to better stay with the brand hotels who have well trained staff. 

Ps. The property itself is ok, only reception staff are untrained.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: overal it was good
Negative_Review: need better choices for breakfast

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Hotel is nice boutique style, friendly staff nearby good seafood restaurant. By the beach
Negative_Review: When you pay a premium for a seafront js you expect tranquility & serenity yet the hotel is bombarded with wrong keys out of tunes karaoke sessions from 6pm - 10pm on weekends. Because there's a restaurant opposite the hotel and wedding receptions were on. Total wreckage for a good holiday!!!!!
Review_Title: Karaoke Nightmares by opposite restaurant, so loud that you can't rest.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The staff where extremely friendly & helpful. The rooms were large and modern and the bed was extremely comfortable.
Negative_Review: Unfortunately the hotel is right next door to an extremely loud karaoke bar. We stayed in the hotel for 2 nights and only on the last day did we not hear the awful karaoke. It was so disappointing because the hotel was so nice but the disturbance from the karaoke completely ruined our stay. We were on the 25th Floor and it was still loud enough as if we were actually in the bar itself. It was also playing during the day as we were trying to relax at the pool, to the point that we actually left the hotel pool to try and get away from the noise. I completely understand this is outside of the hotels control and the staff could not have been more apologetic and helpful for everything else.
Review_Title: Hotel & staff are brilliant, be warned of the extremely disruptive & loud Karaoke bar next door.

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: breakfast facility can be moor improved. couldnt see the sea as the glass was not cleaned

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Clean room and good size. Gym is well equipped. Staff was kind.
Negative_Review: The hotel is rated as a 5 star, however, it is definitely not at this level. Not worth the price. The price paid is due to the location, in the beach front. Breakfast was extremely poor if you were not Asian. located far away from city center, nothing near by, as supermarket, ATM etc.

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Staff friendly and helpful. Clearly well trained.
Negative_Review: Terrible coverd and tiny swimming pool and bar facility. Zero beach facility. If guests have to cross a busy road to access the sand then there should be something for them to enjoy there. Blaming it on the local council is not good enough. Room cleaning late - had to ask for it to be done. Pathethic in-room refreshments and toiletries. Two tiny chairs and a table on a large balcony. Should not have to ask for a lounger.
Review_Title: Way over priced. A city hotel with a view of the sea, NOT a resort -- which is how it is marketed.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Close to the ocean, big rooms and big balcony
Negative_Review: not cleaned room, mold in the shower, we used flip flop in shower because it was dirty and not sound proofed at all.
Review_Title: Big room but moldy and noisy

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: great amenities like the pool area, sauna and steam room.
Negative_Review: Room could have been cleaner. Need to mop the floors after each guest, wipe the balcony glass/ (childrens hand prints all over), shower grout looked mouldy, no top sheet on bed. The theme music is really really annoying after just a day.
Review_Title: Great room and view but a few kinks

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The balcony room view was great. The room is clean and the bed is comfortable
Negative_Review: There was an event during our stay there and it was very noisy the whole day with loud music from 12noon till 9pm and after that there was construction sound in the middle of the night. This had spoilt our stay there but the hotel staff did apologise to us and also took actions to call the police to stop those workers doing the work in the middle of the night

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: superb staff and hospitality
Negative_Review: location and facilities could be better.

RoomType: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: The property is clean and new. It is across the street from the beach.
Negative_Review: The hotel is across the street from a karaoke bar and very loud. It is also very far from restaurants and town.
Review_Title: The hotel was nice, but we had selected it because of the pool and room option for a family of four. The pool was closed

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The ensuite was nice and the complementary breakfast
Negative_Review: Noise every night. First night there was an event across the street and it was so loud until midnight. I didnt get any help from reception to ease my discomfort
Review_Title: Niceish, didn't feel like a 5 star hotel

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Breakfast was average, not a lot of choice. The location was a little far out, but did have nice restaurants in the near, but no 24 hour 7/11 shops.
Negative_Review: Staff were nice, but missed organization & this seemed to be a problem of the management or lack of it.
Review_Title: Ok/good, but could do a lot better

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
The hotel is located right next to the beach. On the higher floors you can see both directions along the beach and the fishing boats out to sea. The staff are really friendly and couldn’t have been more helpful. Made us feeling really welcome. Coconut coffee a must. 

As we exercised everyday helped with a late breakfast which was really appreciated. Gym, pool area and roof top bar has great views.
Negative_Review: Hotel in a busy area, on a busy road. Lots of beach activity including local celebrations which can be noisy. Pool decoration needs finishing albeit lovely location and lots of residents taking photos.
Review_Title: Great hotel, wonderful service, reasonably priced

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review:
very close to the beach. room was
clean and bed was comfortable
Negative_Review:
we paid extra for a sea view but our room overlooked a Karaoke bar with loud music every day from afternoon until 10pm. we couldn’t even hear the tv with the noise. 

the hotel also lacked any character and felt very cold and generic.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: The hotel alone is beautiful, the rooms are fabulous and spacious with amazing views!
Negative_Review: The reception staff are very unhelpful and quite rude. The door/bag helping staff, housekeeping and restaurant staff are so lovely! I was really disappointed with the reception staff they just aren’t willing to help out and don’t know what good customer service is - especially for this hotel you would expect reception staff to be polite and helpful!
Review_Title: Very beautiful hotel. Reception staff not helpful and quite frankly rude. There are a lot of screaming children too -

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Good location.
Negative_Review:
Staff were not very helpful when asked about currency exchange and transfers. 
Our room was right next (5 feet away) to the elevator, which resulted in so much noise and us been woke early every morning.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Nice, new, clean hotel. Beauifil view. Exceptional staff. Good food.
Negative_Review: Noise from KTV bar across the street was unbearable. Difficult to get elevator - no service elevator so the staff was running up and down in the guest elevators.Chaotic breakfast- letting people in where there are no free seats.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Location was in close proximity to the beach strip but still not close to the populated/patrolled sections of the beach. Breakfast was okay with all standard options. The tapas rooftop bar had very good food and drinks.
Negative_Review: Whilst being geographically close to the beach it isn’t patrolled or populated with vendors, everything is a 5-10minute taxi ride away which was inconvenient for people without a car. We were disappointed overall with the facilities of the hotel. It was often difficult to get a pool towel and the ‘bars’ at the pool and lobby were certainly staffed by inexperienced staff, where we were disappointed with the quality of food and drinks. This hotel was certainly the least favourite of ours whilst travelling in Vietnam.
Review_Title: Hotel with a lot of promise but you should give it a miss

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: beautiful hotel. very clean, comfortable, modern rooms. attentive staff
Negative_Review: review is low only because of the proximity to unbelievably loud karaoke bars and an event venue. there are no noise restrictions for these locations so you are forced to listen to extremely loud local Karaoke from 4PM through the night. noise is loud enough to be heard through noise cancelling headphones even though it is across the street.
Review_Title: would not stay again due to karaoke / event venue noise

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: being new
Negative_Review: toilet pipe jammed, water flowing slow. no place to put shower toiletries, have to leave on the floor. shower head also wrong, not facing down. bed is so so. ocean view is good but noisy with car honking and ppl shouting

RoomType: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển

Both the rooftop Tapas and main restaurant served delicious food with excellent customer service. The addition of underground parking was also very useful for when we hired a scooter for Hoi An.

completely.
Review_Title: Helpful and nice staffs, clean property and nice place near beach. Something has to be fixed but didn’t affect our comfo

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review:
새 호텔이라 깨끗하고 채광이 좋아서 보통 호텔에서 느끼는 침침함이 없어 좋았어요.
아주 친절한 직원들, 침대에 누워서 보이는 오션뷰는 환상적이었어요. 햇살의 뜨거움이 줄어드는 4시쯤 되어 호텔 바로 앞 비치에서 파도타기 즐기고 바로 호텔로 들어올수 있는점도 굿.
 바다를 내다보며 수영을 즐길수 있는 수영장도 너무 좋았어요

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: המלון מעולה. לחופשת ים וחוף המיקום פחות...אבל עם מונית אפשרי.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Die Ausstattung ist toll und die Zimmer bzw. das Hotel ist sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Die Mitarbeiter sind super freundlich. Der Ausblick auf das Meer wunderschön. Das Essen im Restaurant hat uns so gut gefallen, dass wir dort drei mal zu Abend gegessen haben.
Negative_Review: Man muss sagen, dass die Zimmer schon sehr hellhörig sind. Das hat uns jetzt persönlich nicht gestört, da wir sowieso immer mit Ohrstöpsel schlafen.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: ממש מרכזי ונעים
Negative_Review: היינו בקומה 18. ויש לחץ על המעליות. מחכים דיי הרבה זמן
Review_Title: אחלה מלון למעבר של לילה אחד.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
미케비치 바로 앞에 있어서 바닷가 접근이 쉬웠으며 걸어서 마트도 가까웠다.
숙소 내 청결상태가 좋았다. 오토바이를 대여를 원한다고 했더니 렌트업체에서 호텔까지 가져다줬으며 오토바이 주차장도 실내에 있어서 쾌적하게 이용하기 좋았다.
비오는 날엔 주차장에서 우산도 씌워주시고 모든 직원이 매우 친절했다. 2박을 했는데 조식이 매번 달라서 좋았다.
에어컨을 틀면 금방 시원해져서 오래 틀어둘 필요가 없었다.
Negative_Review: 수영장 물이 좀 차가웠다.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển

Negative_Review: La struttura era perfetta, l’unica cosa era la posizione. L’hotel si trova alla fine del lungomare, bisogna perciò camminare circa 15-20 minuti per arrivare alla spiaggia attrezzata o ai ristornati

Review_Title: Super Hôtel, j’ai le conseil à tout le monde de passage à Da nang 🔥

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển

Chambre très confortable, propre, excellente salle de bain.

Bon accueil (comme partout au Vietnam)
Nous avons passé un court mais excellent séjour dans cet établissement.
Nous le recommandons
Negative_Review:
Peu de chose si ce n'est qu'il s'agit d'un grand hôtel, mais avec les avantages.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: Lage direkt am Strand war schön, ist aber etwas ausserhalb des Zentrums. Sehr schöner grosser Pool!

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: Todella ystävällinen ja palveluhenkinen henkilökunta. Hieno ulko uima-allas alue kerrosten välissä katoksen alla, joten tästä pystyy myös sateella ja huonolla säällä nauttimaan. Lisäksi allas-alueen yhteydessä on ilmainen iso saunatila. Hyvä aamupala. Hyvän kokoinen kuntosali. Henkilökunta suositteli nähtävyys kierroksen tilaamista Dacotours nimiseltä yritykseltä, jonka järjestämä kierros Ba Na Hillsillä vastasi hyvin hotellin tasoa. Todella hieno huone hyvillä näkymillä rannalle. Hotelli sijaitsee rannan pohjoisemmassa osassa, joten alueella on hieman rauhallisempaa. Pari ruokakauppaa sijaitsee aivan hotellin vieressä.
Negative_Review: Kuntosalilla yksi laitteista oli rikki. Söin yhden kerran illallisen hotellin ravintolassa, mutta tämä oli hieman pettymys. Turistien suosima ravintola alue sijaitsee hieman kauempana (noin 3km etelään), joten täytyy usein mennä Grap kyydillä.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Hauさんの対応が素晴らしい

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Personalet var meget venlige, imødekommende og hjælpsomme og det føltes helt naturligt. De ville virkelig have at vi havde et godt ophold. Glimrende morgenmad, dejlig udsigt over havet og stranden.
Negative_Review: Lige på den anden side af hotellet er der en restaurant, der havde arrangementer hver aften. Det er jo fint nok, men de spillede meget høj musik, herunder karoke som nåede os på 17. sal. Lidt lavere volumen ville være godt, så ville bedømmelsen være 10 i stedet for 9.

Negative_Review: La suite qui donne sur la mer ainsi que sur la rue est assez bruyante (la baie vitrée est équipée d’un double vitrage très peu performant…. Problème d’insonorisation).

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Goede kamer, groot, schoon en faciliteiten zoals gym, sauna, zwembad. 
Kwaliteit van eten ontbijt/diner/skybar is goed. 
Personeel spreekt goed Engels. 

Grote groepen (Korean) zorgen dat ontbijt zaal snel/vol zit in de ochtend, maar doorloop is prima en worst snel aangevuld.

Wij zaten met een aanbieding in dit hotel en dat was prima. Als wij de "originele" prijs (zover die bestaat) hadden betaald (250 euro per nacht) was dat echt te veel geweest.
Negative_Review:
De skybar en restaurant hebben weinig sfeer. Vaak zaten d'r maar 2 mensen en is het wat eerder afstandelijk dan gezellig borrelen te noemen. 

We wisten dat het hotel wat meer uit het levendige deel lag, en met 10-15 min lopen ben je wel in de gezelligheid, maar de route is langs de boulevard die ook niet overal even leuk is.

Tegenover het hotel is een conventiecentrum waar ook bruiloften zijn etc. Op drie dagen was dit het geval (van 5 dagen van ons verblijf), de muziek stopt wel stipt om 22uur.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
ダナンの中心からは少し外れたところにある、比較的新しいホテルでした。
ビーチを見下ろす部屋はとても清潔できれい。
バルコニーも広くて快適に過ごすことができました。
タオル類も清潔で気持ちよく滞在できました。
Review_Title: ダナンに行くことがあったらもう一度宿泊したいホテルです。

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: 綺麗でスタッフの対応もとても良く快適に過ごすことが出来ました。朝食はam9:00くらいに行くとゆっくり快適に過ごせました。滞在中１日だけでしたが、夕方からpm10:00くらいまで、音が漏れてるのか外で歌ってるのか分かりませんが、カラオケが聞こえてきて面白かったです。びっくりするぐらい周辺の街中に響き渡っていたので…。それは少しうるさいかなと思いました。お祭りだったりいいんですが、あれはたぶん一般の方のカラオケです（笑）シティビューの部屋に滞在しましたが、夜景がとても綺麗でした。
Negative_Review: なし。

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển

Die Ausstattung des Hotels lässt eigentlich keine Wünsche offen (Dachterrasse mit Bar, Fitnesscenter, Pool, Restaurant ...)

Sehr schönes Hotel mit großen und komfortablen Zimmern.
Personal jederzeit freundlich und zuvorkommend. 
Lage direkt gegenüber vom Strand. Pool mit Aussicht auch super allerdings im Schatten was aber bei den Temperaturen für uns eher angenehm war.

Frühstücksbuffet sehr umfangreich und abwechslungsreich. Auch sehr viele asiatische Optionen.

Rooftopbar mit Live Musik am Freitag ist auch sehr zu empfehlen.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: 早餐豐富；對面就是沙灘，可以坐在陽台欣賞海景，面海的景致很不錯；附近有小超市，買東西方便
Negative_Review: 房間偏小；對面海灘旁有餐廳，靠近農曆新年，常有舉辦party，音響的聲音很大，會一直吵到10點才能結束
Review_Title: 距離市區有距離，出入必須叫計程車，但對面沙灘很不錯；飯店大廳偏小，提供的服務與活動也不多，與心中的五星級飯店有些落差；整體環境與服務良好，住起來算舒適

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: 今回は二人での旅行。泊まったのはジュニアスイート。部屋の広さは申し分無し。家具やベッドの配置に余裕があり、十分なスペースが確保出来ている。バスタブがあるのも嬉しい。朝食も毎日少しずつメニューが変わるので飽きがこない。何と言ってもホテルスタッフのホスピタリティが素晴らしい。ホテルはやっぱり「人」だと思わせてくれたホテルでした。補足として、個人的に重要なWi-Fi環境はとても良好。スピード速いです。シャワーの水圧強くなるし、お湯の熱さも申し分ないです。快適な時間を過ごせました。
Negative_Review: 部屋の窓が少し薄いのかな？波の音が少し大きく聞こえた。パートナーは波の音が聞こえるのはとても情緒があっていいと言っていたが、僕としては、もう少し音が小さくなってくれた方が嬉しい。良くなかった点を探すならば、これくらいだろうか。
Review_Title: 最高でした。またダナンに行った時は必ず泊まりたいです。

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Da Nang ist wahrscheinlich ist sehr unterschätzt, da sich die Stadt als moderne Metropole mit Flair und Stil entwickelt. Das Hotel ist sehr modern, professionelles Personal mit sehr guten Englischkenntnissen, der Pool ist regengeschützt mit einem wunderschönen Meeresblick und die unmittelbare Lage zum Strand ermöglicht erholsames Verweilen im Sand und Wasser mit lebhaftem Wellengang. Da Nang ist der ideale Ausgangspunkt und die Highlights Vietnams über Tagesausflüge kennenzulernen, wie Hoi An, Hue oder My Son.
Negative_Review: Nirgendwo wie in Da Nang sieht man die Überkapazitäten an Übernachtungsmöglichkeiten. Riesige Bettenburgen stehen leer und viele Bauprojekte sind im Rohbau hängengeblieben.
Review_Title: Da Nang ist mehr als eine Reise wert zu einem Hotel der absoluten Extraklasse

Negative_Review: For meget støj fra havet. Mere lydtætte døre til altanen vil løse problemet. Støj fra trafik, vind og havet går lige igennem.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: オーシャンビュー，シティビューの各部屋に泊まる機会があったが，どちらも眺望がとてもよく，日中，暑くて外出できない時間帯にホテル室内にいても，気持ちよく過ごせた。朝食もベトナム料理，洋食，韓国料理等，バラエティ豊かなメニューがそろっており，毎日，メニューが変わるので，連泊しても楽しめる。滞在中，エステの割引があったため，お得にホテルエステを楽しむことが出来た。また，友人の一人が滞在中，体調不良になってしまった時も，体温計の貸し出し（但し，解熱剤等の薬は置いていない）のみならず，その情報がスタッフ間で共有され，どの時間帯のスタッフからもケアして頂いたことに感謝している。
Negative_Review: プールサイドのチェアの数が少ないので，混んでいる場合は使えないこともある。本ホテルはミーケビーチよりもやや北に位置しているため，ミーケビーチ付近にたくさんある飲食店まではやや遠い（その代わり，静かな環境を楽しめる）。
Review_Title: ベトナム最高のビーチリゾート

清掃も丁寧で、非常に素晴らしい滞在でした。

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: De faciliteiten en het personeel
Negative_Review: Het tocht in de kamer bij de twee grote schuifpuien. Zeker met storm merkte wij dit.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
朝食は種類がたくさんあり、3連泊でも毎日楽しめました。
プールが綺麗でよかった！
Negative_Review:
立地が悪いです。海沿いのホテルの中でもかなり北にあるので、周りにレストランやコンビニがなくて不便でした。ホテルから出かける時は絶対タクシーを頼まなければいけない。
急遽部屋の掃除をお願いしたら、洗面とお風呂が水浸しになって転倒した。

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Établissement d'exception, la chambre (deluxe double bedroom ocean view) était magnifique, d'une propreté parfaite et offrant une vue magnifique sur l'océan 
Tous les employés sont aux petits soins, très attentifs et aidants 
Nous avons également profité du spa (formule massage) et passé un superbe moment de détente 
Nous y reviendrons, c'est certain !

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
ロケーション最高！何処に行くにも便利でした。
英語が得意でない私達にも親身になって、観光相談、タクシーの手配など丁寧に対応していただきました。
ダナンではバルコニーがあるお部屋がなかなかない中、こちらのホテルでは海を眺めながらバルコニーでまったりできる環境は最高でした。
口コミにカラオケの音がうるさい！とありましたが、23階だったからかもですが…全然気にならなかったです。
お部屋も、清掃も最高です✨

RoomType: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review:
ホテルスタッフが皆さんが一生懸命お客様のことを考え、対応してくれるところが素晴らしいと感じました。朝食をいただいている時、スタッフの方が話しかけてくださり、観光やマリンスポーツのことをアドバイスしてくださいました。また、バーナーヒルズに行く時もフロントスタッフはとても親切に教えてくれました。ホテルのチャーターバスやGrabを利用することについての細やかに説明してくれました。おかげで不安なくバーナーヒルズに行くこともできました。
お部屋はファミリールーム　オーシャンビューに４泊しました。お部屋からの眺めは最高ですので、オーシャンビューをお勧めします。お部屋の中央にセパレートできる扉があり、TV、トイレも２つあったのがとても便利でした。
朝食は毎日少しずつメニューが変わり、種類も多かったので飽きませんでした。ベトナム料理、洋食などいろいろでおいしくいただきました。
Negative_Review:
他の方の口コミにあるように、『近隣のカラオケの音がうるさい』ということは確かにありました。しかし、深夜まで続くわけではなかったので許容範囲かと思います。
プールはリゾートホテルの優雅な雰囲気はないのが残念でした。しかし、８月の暑い中でも屋根付きで日陰のプールですので、その点は良かったです。
客室のタオルが古く、柔らかくないのが残念でした。

Positive_Review: Das Hotel liegt direkt gegenüber dem Strand. Die Ausstattung ist perfekt und das Personal das freundlichste was ich je erlebt habe. Das Frühstück ist sehr gut und es ist für alle Gäste etwas dabei. Taxen stehen genügend vor der Tür und man kann die Ausflüge zur Lady Buddha und den Marmorbergen mit dem Taxi machen.

Positive_Review: Geschmackvoll eingerichtetes, top ausgestattetes Zimmer mit Meerblick, Sonnenaufgang und Meeresrauschen inklusive. Die Mitarbeiter waren alle sehr aufmerksam und hilfsbereit. Die im angeschlossene Spa gebuchte Anwendung war ganz wunderbar, absolute Empfehlung!

Positive_Review: 部屋のサイズや眺めがとにかく良かった！ホテルの近くに食事や水を買うところもあり、海も目の前。市場や空港へもGrabを使えば全く問題もなく、便利だった。朝食も卵料理やフォーをその場で作ってくれたり、食事のバリエーションも毎日変わるので飽きることなく楽しめた！とにかく大満足！

Positive_Review: 직원들도 친절하고 시설도 수영장이랑 헬스장 등 깨끗하게 잘 갖춰져있어요. 객실도 패밀리룸 예약했는데 친구들이랑 3명이서 편하게 썼습니다. 조식도 베트남식이랑 서양식 같이 섞어서나와서 먹을것도 충분합니다. 직원들이 고객의 이력을 외우고 그에 맞는 서비스를 제공해주는 마인드가 감동스러운 곳입니다. 위치도 근처에 마트있어서 맥주사러 나가기도 편하고 그랩을 부르면 어디든 10분 안에 가는 좋은 위치입니다.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Schönes Zimmer mit tollem Meerblick, gemütliches Bett, leckeres Frühstück und Strandlage. Massage im Spa gut, aufmerksames Personal. Alles top!

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Wunderbares Hotel !
Die Lage: Front Row am Strand, aber am oberen Ende der strahlenden Bucht von Danang. Bis hierher kommt die Party nicht - das bedeutet: keine Lärmbelästigung durch Beachbars und Beachclubs direkt vorm Haus. 
Die Zimmer sind ausgesprochen groß und geräumig. Die Ausstattung ist sehr gut und in tadellosem Zustand. Augenzwinkernd haben wir zur Kenntnis genommen, dass das Bad komplett mit deutschen Armaturen ausgestattet ist ;)
Smart TV - Amazon Prime fähig
Das Personal ist wirklich sehr lieb und zuvorkommend.
Der Strand vorm Hotel ist ohne Bars, daher auch ohne Liegen - es werden jedoch große Strandtücher ausgegeben, für diejenigen, die ein Runde Schwimmen gehen wollen. Wer eine Liege mieten will bewegt sich ein Stück Richtung My Khe Beach - kein Problem
Negative_Review: Zu wenig Liegemöglichkeiten am Pool. Die wenigen Plätze die es gibt sind ab morgens fest in koreanischer Hand - wir haben den Pool daher einfach nicht genutzt, wozu auch, wenn das südchinesische Meer direkt vor der Tür liegt

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
位置很棒，雖然無法直接過街即是海灘，但也多花不了幾分鐘。
擁有極佳海景，很棒的早餐與令人滿意的親切服務。
房間明亮乾淨舒適又漂亮，很適合一段愜意的假期。

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
位於美溪沙灘旁邊，從房間望出的風景十分漂亮。
房間整潔與舒適，還有附上迎賓茶水與水果，備品的品質也都相當好。
服務人員非常專業與親切，泳池與健身房設施齊全，整體感受度非常良好。
早餐豐富且美味，下次來峴港絕對會再入住!

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review:
バルコニーから見える景色は最高。ぜひ海側を。
スタッフがは若いがよく気がつき、いつも😀。
プールそばに、サウナがある。施設が新しく清潔。
バスジェルやシャンプーがいい匂い。コンディショナーもある。
Negative_Review:
周りに海産レストラン以外はほとんど店がない。Cafeもない。すぐ前のビーチはパラソルやチェアはない。
シャワーしかない。サウナのスイッチが入っていなかったので、温かくなるのに時間がかかった。朝食はあまりおいしくない。
Review_Title: バルコニーからの海の景色は最高。

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Wir waren fünf Tage im Hotel. Die Zimmer waren super komfortabel, Bett sehr bequem und die Dusche super geräumig. Es war immer sauber, Zimmerservice somit auch klasse. Das Frühstück war nicht unbedingt ein Highlight, aber solide. Man hat eine gewisse Auswahl - wir konnten uns damit arrangieren. WLAN hat immer und im gesamten Gebäude super funktioniert. Der Fitnessraum ist ausreichend ausgestattet, so dass man die meisten Basic Übungen und Workouts durchführen kann. Zum Schluss das Beste am Hotel: die Mitarbeiter. Super freundlich, immer hilfsbereit und respektvoll.
Negative_Review: Der Pool war eine der größten Enttäuschungen. Dort kann man nicht wirklich entspannen. Zum einen zu wenig liegen und zum anderen eigentlich keine Sonne, da überdacht. Ebenfalls etwas nervig waren die Aufzüge. Manchmal ist man fünf Min oder länger unterwegs 😒

Positive_Review:
Hötel, chambre et salle de bain très propres.
Le directeur est très aimable : en l'absence de business center (en dépit de la mention indiqué dans l'ascenseur...), il a mis à disposition une salle de réunion.
Negative_Review:
Pas de porte-bagages dans la chambre... Pas pratique pour poser sa valise (et encore moins si on est deux dans la chambre) ! Du coup on a dû utiliser la table du balcon en guise de porte-bagages !
La douche ne comporte aucune étagère, donc impossible d'y poser quel que produit que ce soit (gel douche, shampooing etc.). D'ailleurs il manque des produits de douche... dans la douche ! La logique voudrait dans ce cas que soient vissé dans le mur un distributeur de produits de base (gel douche, shampooing...).

Positive_Review: スタッフが丁寧で感じ良かったです。オーシャンビューのバルコニー付き部屋の景色が良く、選んで正解でした。シャワーとバスタブが分かれているのも良い。朝食ビュッフェも美味しかったです。コスパ良いと思います。

Positive_Review:
가격대비 편안하게 지낼수 있는 호텔입니다.
직원들은 친절하며 서비스 정신이 투철합니다.
조식 메뉴는 깔끔하게 잘 나오며 맛 또한 나쁘지 않습니다
호텔 내 마사지는 아주 만족스럽습니다.
Negative_Review:
승강기가 조금 느리 숙박객이 몰리는 시간대에는 이용함에 불편함이 있습니다.
호텔 맞은편에 있는 식당이 조금 시끄러우며 방음에 약간 취약합니다.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: フロントの方をはじめ、みんなとてもテキパキと働いていて、いろいろ質問をしてもしっかり答えてくれて気持ち良かった。朝食バイキングも、毎日少しずつ変化をつけたメニューで飽きることなく、味も良かった。今回宿泊階では最上階にある海側の部屋に宿泊して、部屋もきれいだし、アメニティーもしっかり揃っていて、シャワーの水圧も申し分無かった。通りを挟んで目の前にビーチがあり、部屋にあるビーチサンダルと、フロントでタオルも借りられた。5階のプールでは、子供用に浮き輪の貸し出しもあって、小さいけれどキッズコーナーもあり、ファミリーフレンドリーなホテルだと感じた。夜ホイアンに行きたかった時、往復で借りられるタクシーを手配してくれて、非常に助かった。
Negative_Review: 通りを挟んで目の前にバーがあり、夜10時まで25階にいても目の前かのような非常に大きい音で音楽が鳴り響いていたので、小さい子供がいて早く寝たい場合は、海側の部屋ではない方がいいと思う。私たちは金曜と土曜の夜の宿泊だったので、他の日も同じなのかはわからない。部屋に備え付けのシャンプー類は、エコフレンドリーなのかと思うが髪が少しパサパサになったのが残念だった。
Review_Title: 全体的には非常に満足のいく滞在となり、おすすめできるホテルである。

조식도 최고는 아니지만 괜찮았습니다.
향후 재방문 의사 있습니다.
Negative_Review: 객실의 유일한 단점이, 화장실의 바닥 물이 잘 빠지지 않았습니다. 또한 루프탑 바에서는 직원들이 과하게 친절하여 강매당하는 느낌을 받았습니다.

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
조식, 수영장, 오션뷰, 직원분들의 태도 등 매우 좋았습니다.
지인및 가족 들에게도 추천해주고싶네요 
청결함 같은 기본적인것은 당연하구요
Negative_Review:
아쉬운점은 숙소 외적인부분밖에없어서 딱히 없네요
숙소근처 디너쇼가든에서 조금 늦은시간까지 시끄러운정도? ㅋㅋㅋ 한 11시까지만 참으시면되요

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review:
Likte hotellet- og personalet utrolig godt, veldig god frokost, veldig fint hotell, veldig god service, veldig flinke vaske damer, vi ble godt tatt imot.
Sønnen vår på 1år ble godt tatt vare på av personalet. Hotellet var kjempe fint, utsikten var fin og stranda var rett utenfor, men vi måtte gå et stykke for å få tak i solsenger

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Schöne Lage, Strand direkt über die Straße, Personal sehr freundlich, toller Ausblick, Frühstück war in Ordnung
Negative_Review: sehr laut, da im Restaurant gegenüber den ganzen Abend mit Mikrofon gesprochen oder gesungen wird. Schimmel in der Dusche. Auf den Gängen und im Lift war es extrem heiß. Für den Preis hätten wir uns mehr erwartet.
Review_Title: Nettes Hotel, allerdings für uns nicht den hohen Preis wert.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: スタッフが何時もニコニコしていて、親切に声を掛けてくれる。
Negative_Review:
部屋の清掃になかなか来てくれない。
バスタブの清掃がイマイチ。
前にある施設での大音響でのカラオケ？が夜遅くまでかなりうるさい、ホテルから音を小さく要望できないものか？
Review_Title: スタッフの対応がとても良い。近所に食堂、レストランが増えてくれば尚便利。

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Le restaurant car les plats à la carte étaient très bon , bien servis
Negative_Review:
L'accueil du client inexistant , on est juste bon à payer 
Le ménage n'était fait que le soir vers 18h00 et rapidement.
La plage MY KHE BEACH n'est pas faite pour se baigner

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review:
建物が新しくて
設備が整っていること
Negative_Review:
夜10時頃まで毎晩カラオケが聞こえてくる。
窓ガラスが薄くて防音がないに等しい
Review_Title: 景色は最高、カラオケ最悪

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Unser Hotelzimmer, im höchsten Stock, war wunderschön, wirklich tolle Aussicht auf das Meer, sehr gross geschnitten, bequemes Bett sowie sehr sauber. Leider hat uns jedoch das Hotel trotz des schönen Zimmers nicht überzeugen können.
Negative_Review: Das Hotel liegt direkt am Strand, nur eine Hauptstrasse ist zu überqueren. Leider ist dieser Strandabschnitt nicht sauber, hat keine Liegen oder Sonnenschirme. Wir sind der Meinung, dass auch das Hotel etwas zur Sauberkeit betragen sollte, schliesslich wird auch dafür geworben. Die Mitarbeiter sind nur teilweise freundlich und man wird kaum wahrgenommen. Die Vietnamesische Gastfreundschaft war leider nicht spürbar... Der Frühstücksraum ist sehr voll und dementsprechend laut. Die Speisen und Getränke sind ok aber nichts besonderes... Wir haben meistens ausserhalb gegessen. Dort war es nicht nur günstiger sondern auch deutlich besser. Besonders enttäuschend war der Poolbereich. Der Poolbereich liegt komplett im Schatten, daher ist das Wasser wirklich eisig kalt und das trotz den heissen Temperaturen. Ebenso sind nur sehr wenige Liegen, welche ebenfalls im Schatten sind, verfügbar, sowie liegt der Poolbereich im zweiten Stock... Wie am Anfang erwähnt direkt an einer sehr gut befahrenen Hauptstrasse. Auch wenn man somit nur am Pool liegen will, wird man ständig von hupenden Autos gestört... So haben wir unsere Ferien leider nicht vorgestellt. Im Grossen und Ganzen war es ok, wir würden jedoch nicht wiederkommen bzw. das Hotel weiterempfehlen, da gibt es deutlich bessere für den ähnlichen Preis.
Review_Title: Aufenthalt war ganz ok, aber nichts besonderes

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Les habitacions i el personal molt amable.
Negative_Review: No tenen mapes de la ciutat, no tenen bicicletes de lloguer. L'aigua de la piscina està molt freda, només per valents. La terrassa del restaurant pis 27 es d'un hotel de 3 estrelles, desangelada, mobiliari trist i de poca qualitat, ho tenen deixat i poc aprofitat. Carta de tapes curta i molt justa per lo bé que es menja a Vietnam. Qualitat/ preu 4 ( per les habitacions, que es lo millor!!) estrelles no 5.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review:
Personalet i restauranten var fantastisk
Udsigten til havet
Negative_Review:
Vi kom til at tabe en kop på værelset og den blev vi afkrævet betaling for ved afrejse. Det er ikke værdigt for et femstjernet hotel og gør at vi ikke vil komme tilbage.
Byggerod på begge sider af hotellet
Der var næsten en kilometer til den del af stranden, hvor der var stole og udskænkning
Review_Title: Afkrævning af betaling for en itugået kop ved afrejse overskyggede fuldstændig det positive ved opholdet

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Negative_Review:
Attention au bruit, très mauvais emplacement, même au 24 ieme étage on attend la musique ( du début de l’après midi jusqu’à 22 h ) donc impossible de se reposer. On entend la musique du couloir. Tres mauvaise insonorisation. Le petit déjeuner était sans goût, les fruits pas mûrs (obligé de s’acheter des bananes et des mangues) Dommage que la piscine ne soit pas chauffée impossible de l’utiliser trop froide (fin janvier) 
L’emplacement est loin du centre animé. 
Pour la grandeur de la chambre je n’en parle pas puisque tous les hôtels sont identiques

RoomType: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Excellent emplacement sur le front de mer avec tous les commodités nécessaires d'un hotel.
Negative_Review:
Petit déjener peu varié.
Peut mieux faire surtout qu'il y ait beaucoup de grands autres hotels non loin et de bonne facture.
Review_Title: Bien mais nous avons changé d'hotel pour le Four Points by Sheraton Danang à 2 pas

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: Ładny wystrój, piękny widok z okna, bardzo dobra obsługa
Negative_Review: Pokój był bardzo bardzo głośny, pod spodem jest bar karaoke, impreza trwała do 22 ale wygłuszenie pokoju jest żadne. Za tą cenę oczekuje się lepszego wygłuszenia

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: 沒有
Negative_Review: 清潔不ok

RoomType: Phòng Gia Đình Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: 位置方便
Negative_Review: 清潔完全不行一掀開棉被床單全部都是髒的大家都嚇到，還有要結帳的時候居然說我們用了迷你爸的小熊軟糖但我們並没有，後來查明後確定才沒有收錢，所以放錢要退房的時候記得把預收信用卡單收回，
Review_Title: 這樣的價格在越南有更多更好的選擇，這四因為想四個人住在一起可以方便晚上聊天，所以選擇這個飯店有家庭房，有些失望

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Gemütliche moderne Zimmerausstattung
Negative_Review:
Aufgrund der Baustellen um das Hotel herum und die Hauptverkehrsstraße direkt vor dem Hotel ist es nicht möglich die Aussicht vom Balkon oder den Pool ohne Lärm und Gestank zu genießen, daher ist das Preis- Leistungsniveau auch nicht so gut.

Zudem sind die Zimmer zum Flur sehr hellhörig, sodass man morgens das Personal vom Housekeeping laut per Funk sprechen hört. In den Zimmerecken lag einiges an Dreck.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: Чистый отель с хорошим персоналом
Negative_Review:
Через дорогу находится караоке-кафе которое очень сильно шумит до 22:00. Мы жили на 17 этаже, и нам было слышно как будто поют в соседней комнате.
В отеле есть три лифта, но их порой не хватает для обслуживания всех жильцов, особенно это чувствуется во время завтрака.
Для отдыха на пляже отель ничего не предоставляет (зонт, лежаки и т.д) кроме полотенец.
Готовят в отеле не плохо, но нет разнообразия блюд. Особенно для тех, кто не ест свинину.
Этот отель не рекомендую для отдыхающих с детьми.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: 깨끗했습니다
Negative_Review: 조식이 정말 별로입니다

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: La chambre est propre avec une belle vue sur la plage comme indiqué sur la réservation . Le petit déjeuner est bien mais sans plus. Très mauvaise insonorisation ,on entend tout de l’extérieur à se demander si la fenêtre fermait bien?? Hôtel bien mais qui n’a rien de singulier .
Negative_Review: Rien de spécial mais DaNang ne vaut pas la peine de s’y arrêter sauf pour faire la fete(peut être??). Préférez Hoi An….
Review_Title: Hôtel sympa mais rien de singulier

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: персонал прекрасен , любой вопрос был решен быстро и оперативно ! вкусные завтраки , отличный ресторан на крыше , лично мне понравился бассейн . думаю, но не знаю , что это один из лучших отелей в Дананге . красивый берег
Negative_Review: указано 5 звезд , первая линия ! но на самом деле , это отель у моря и у дороги , лежаков нет совсем- даже частных ! Идешь на пляж, бросаешь вещи и идешь плавать (пройти надо далеко , море мелкое ) ! точно не стоит этих денег ! рядом кафе очень дорогое и грязное , магазинов нет . в номере отсутствует шкаф (скорее полки для пары трусов, если вы в командировке ) - если с чемоданом , вещи на полу или в том же чемодане ! не смотря что курорт морской , нет никакой сушилки - поэтому все сушат вещи на балконе (так себе вид ) . рядом нет ничего , пустой пляж , если вам нужны красивые виды - вам не сюда , тусовки тоже нет

RoomType: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: 早餐不錯選項豐富，離沙灘近
Negative_Review: 連住兩晚問題不少1.淋浴水壓不穩，水溫忽冷忽熱，第一個洗澡的人不知道，因此被燙傷，還好不嚴重。2.浴室排水不良，差點水淹到浴室外面。3.隔音很差，海邊餐廳唱卡啦ok,房間門窗關閉後還是很大聲，這些都是飯店硬體設施沒到位，短時間無法改善。

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: ausblick zimmer, Personal zuvorkommend
Negative_Review: etwas abgelegen, nächste Strandliegen: 15 min zu Fuss

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Negative_Review: 空調が悪くて、途中で違うホテルに変更しました！

RoomType: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: ロケーション
Negative_Review: リビングエリアが無かった

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 giường đơn nhìn ra cảnh thành phố
Positive_Review: Staff cortese e abbastanza disponibile. Pulizia molto buona. Spa ben fornita e massaggi eccellenti. Anche con un ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo.
Negative_Review: Colazione varia, ma già da prima delle ore 9 inizia ad essere sfornita, se chiedi alcune cose vengono rifornite. Un giorno su tre si sono dimenticati di pulire la stanza, abbiamo chiesto in reception di poter avere almeno degli asciugamani. Una delle tre mattine alle 6,40 hanno iniziato fuori dall'hotel a cantare al karaoke, e le stanze sono insonorizzate malissimo, quindi era come averlo in stanza. Anche i rumori delle altre stanze accanto e della strada si sentono a volume alto. Riuscire a prendere l'ascensore era una missione impossibile...

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
スタッフの人はみんな優しかった。
朝ごはんのパンが美味しかった。
施設も全体的に綺麗だった。
Negative_Review:
ベビーベットのマットレスが薄すぎて子供が寝にくそうだった。ベビーベットのシーツも毎日交換してほしい。(ぐちゃぐちゃでもそのままだった）

清掃後、新しいバスローブが置いてなくて困った。
使った後のコップがちゃんと交換されていなかったりした。

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Inordnung
Negative_Review: Inordnung

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
スタッフ全員がいい笑顔して優しく接してくれたこと。
朝食がかなり充実してコーヒーまで淹れてもらえましたこと。
Negative_Review:
プールの水が冷たかったこと。
コーヒーは丁寧に入れてもらえたが正直にいうとあまり美味しくなかった(コーヒー豆の問題だと思います。ローストが少しダークすぎたかもしれません)
夜向かい側のイベント場かなんかの騒音がものすごくひどくて(ホテルはなにも悪くなかったし仕方がないことなのかもしれません)あまり眠れなかったこと。
Review_Title: 騒音の問題が解決できればリピしたいと思います。

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
館内はきれいで部屋も広く、すっきりしたインテリアと、設備が整っていて快適です。
シービューの部屋から見える海もきれいです。
スタッフの方が部屋の案内に入室される際に、靴を脱いでいたのを見て丁寧さに驚きました。
Negative_Review:
ホテルの前でパーティをしている時は、かなり大きな歌声や音楽が聴こえてくつろぐのが難しいです。22時頃には終わるので大人が眠るのには支障はないですが、とにかくすごい音量でした。
(ホテルのせいでは全くないのですが)

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Wunderschönes Zimmer mit tollem Ausblick, traumhaftes Schwimmbecken und Hotelausstattung
Negative_Review: Leider waren beim Frühstück zu viele Leute und zu wenig Platz, die Rezeption war auch etwas überfordert
Review_Title: Es war ein toller Aufenthalt, auch wenn ich mir von einem 5 Stern Hotel noch mehr erwartet hätte.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review:
조식 메뉴가 다양하고 맛있어요! 바리스타가 따로 있어서 질 좋고 맛있는 커피를 마실 수 있었고
직원들이 너무 친절하고 따뜻하게 맞이 해주어서 좋았어요 다시 방문 하고 싶은 숙소 였습니다.
Negative_Review:
미케해변 바로 앞이라 해변을 왔다갔다 하긴 좋았지만 행사 기간과 맞물리면 너무 시끄러워요ㅠ
특히 베트남 교통상황 특성상 크락션을 너무 많이 울리는데 도로 바로 앞이라 아침저녁 할것 없이 빵빵대서 
조금 불편했습니다.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Sauberkeit 
ruhige Lage
Negative_Review:
kein Liege und Dusche am Strand 
jeden Tag das gleiche Frühstücksortiment .
laundry - Beutel wird sogar berechnet.
Review_Title: wenn jemand Strand Urlaub machen möchte, ist das nicht das richtige Hotel.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Meerblick in der 22. Etage. Das war schon super. 
Es liegt am Ende vom Strand. leider hat das Hotel am Strand keine Liegen. zumindest eine Dusche wäre nett gewesen. Wer also Strandurlaub geniessen möchte kann ich dieses Hotel an dieser Stelle nicht empfehlen. 
Hinzu war das Frühstück nicht 5 Sterne würdig. Jeden 2. Tag das gleiche Essen. Echt enttäuschend. 
das schlimmste ist, dass man uns für den Altkleider Sack berechnet. Kostet zwar nur 25K dong. Aber selbst die 3 Sternen Hotels stellen das nicht Rechnung. für mich ein Unding und sollte geändert werden. 
Personal war aber perfekt.
Negative_Review: Frühstück war jeden 2. Tag gleich

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
Positive_Review: le petit déjeuner
Negative_Review: le bruit extérieur mauvaise insonorisation

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Positive_Review: 5성급으로 가성비 숙소였습니다. 어쩌다보니 불꽃축제 기간에 시티뷰로 이용하게 됐는데 숙소 베란다 혹시 26층 루프탑에서 관람가능합니다.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: 餐飲、設施、服務、員工態度
Negative_Review: 無
Review_Title: 訂了海景房，風景非常好，泳池健身房spa設施齊全，人員都很友善而且很有耐心。附的早餐非常非常好吃😋。客房打掃服務很乾淨也令人安心

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Biển Có 2 Giường Đơn Và Ban Công
Positive_Review: Phòng tương đối rộng và view biển tuyệt vời. Bữa sáng rất phong phú và đồ ăn ngon. Nhà mình có em bé gần 5 tháng tuổi yêu cầu thêm nôi và chậu tắm được các chị nhân viên đáp ứng rất nhanh.
Negative_Review: Tủ lạnh của khách sạn không có ngăn đá nên hơi bất tiện đối với mình, do mình cần trữ đá khô.
HotelName: voco Ma Belle Danang, an IHG Hotel

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công

Negative_Review: Cách nhập mật khẩu wifi hơi khó hiểu với đoàn đi k phải gia đình
HotelName: voco Ma Belle Danang, an IHG Hotel

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Đồ ăn ngon, khách sạn mới và đẹp
Negative_Review: Dịch vụ còn hời hợt, phòng ốc k được dọn hàng ngày.
Review_Title: Chưa xứng đáng với giá tiền chi trả
HotelName: voco Ma Belle Danang, an IHG Hotel

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Negative_Review:
Tôi đã ở rất nhiều khách sạn nhưng cảm nhận của tôi quá thất vọng về kỳ nghỉ ngắn vừa rồi tại đây. Cái tệ nhất là thái độ của nhân viên khu vực lễ tân. Tôi đặt qua Booking và có đề nghị nhận phòng lúc 12.00. Khi tôi đến là 13.30 ngày 4/4/2024. Ks bố trí phòng nghỉ ở tầng 23. Vì gia đình tôi không thích hợp với phòng ở tầng cao nên tôi có đề nghị được ở phòng tầng 6-10. Nhân viên yêu cầu tôi chờ đến 15.00 theo quy định vì yêu cầu của tôi chưa được đáp ứng ngay. Tôi biết tại thời điểm này ks khách cũng ít nên đề nghị cho tôi nhận một phòng 2 giường, các yêu cầu khác của tôi sắp xếp sau vì chiều đó tôi ra khỏi ks sớm. Không những không được đáp ứng mà thái độ của nhân viên lễ tân thiếu chuyên nghiệp, cứng nhắc và coi thường khách.
Tôi sẽ không bao giờ đến ở ks này, và tôi biết trước tôi đã có rất nhiều người góp ý nhưng ks không tiếp thu và thay đổi. Thiết nghỉ, kinh doanh du lịch mà như mấy c lễ tân hôm ấy thì ks đi đến đâu? Thái độ quá kém so với tất cả các ks mà tôi đã đến ở.
Review_Title: Một khách sạn mà nhân viên lễ tân có thái độ quá kém.
HotelName: voco Ma Belle Danang, an IHG Hotel

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Positive_Review:
Good location with amazing view
Breakfast is also great!
Room is clean and modern. Definitely upgrade for sea view if u have a bit extra money;)
Negative_Review: The drain in the shower room needs regular deep clean
HotelName: voco Ma Belle Danang, an IHG Hotel

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Positive_Review:
We spent five nights at this beautiful hotel and couldnt be happier!

+ Fantastic location right by the beach, sunbeds (not owned by the hotel) are available for only 40.000 VND/day
+ The staff was incredibly friendly, especially the assistant to the general manager went out of her way to accomodate us
+ Rooms were super cosy and spacious
+ Breakfast was excellent and offered a lot of variety
+ The rooftop pool was beautiful
+ lunch and dinner at Ciela rooftop bar was fabulous as well
+ beautiful & well equipped gym
+ numerous nice restaurants in the area
+ very affordable laundry service right around the corner of the hotel
Negative_Review: Cant think of anything
HotelName: voco Ma Belle Danang, an IHG Hotel

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
Positive_Review: Loved the kids room, the hotel room, the food, the view and just about everything.
HotelName: voco Ma Belle Danang, an IHG Hotel

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn

Negative_Review: nothing

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
We had the pleasure of staying at the Voco ma belle hotel. The hotel's facilities are simply top-notch. The pool and the view of the beach are truly incredible.
We had the pleasure of chatting with the hotel's staff - a great team! 
Linh was able to answer all our transport queries in excellent French.
We also met Henry, who made us feel so welcome. Henry is a very kind person, and gave us all the advice we needed to make our stay in Da Nang as pleasant as possible. 
He even took the time to recommend some really nice places for our next destinations.
We were able to communicate with Henry in Vietnamese, English and French! So don't worry, if you need anything Henry will be there for you!
Negative_Review: Nothing !

RoomType: Phòng Gia Đình Nhìn Ra Thành Phố - Phù Hợp Cho Khách Khuyết Tật
Positive_Review: Best thing about my stay at voco Ma Belle was the staff. They were professional, friendly and extremely helpful about everything. Definitely exemplified IHG service standards (and it's always a good sign when you see management staff walking around checking on things and greeting guests). They made our stay so enjoyable that we missed voco Ma Belle when we moved to other resorts. Location of the hotel was very good. Easy access to everything. Also loved the rooftop infinity pool. The breakfast buffet had a good selection of food, although seem to cater towards Korean tourists (understandable but would have preferred more Vietnamese food options). Overall an excellent hotel. We would definitely stay here again if we go back to Da Nang.

Positive_Review: Hotel is beach front with restaurants and convenient store nearby. It’s a family friendly and we had the room with bunk beds for the kids. Room and bathroom are spacious and mattresses and blankets are super comfortable. Infinity pool on rooftop is a bonus. Breakfast is great and staffs were super friendly. Love the Vietnamese coffee they serve at breakfast.
Negative_Review:
It didn’t bother me but just to note that there is a beach club across from the hotel. Music can be heard a little bit with the windows closed. But then again, on the positive side, it adds to the vibe of the city. 

Also, they could be a little bit more organized. We were a family of 4 (obviously with bunk beds) but everyday after room make up, we only got 2 towels and 2 water bottles, so we had to call housekeeping everyday to bring more, which they did instantly.

La posizione è adatta per chi vuole soggiornare vicino al mare. Il centro della città è comunque facilmente raggiungibile in 10 minuti di taxi.

RoomType: Suite Grand
Positive_Review:
- Incredible view of the ocean and the city from the Grand Suite.
- Beautiful suite and bathroom.
- The staff was friendly. Especially the manager. She asked us for our honest opinion and provided us with tea while we were waiting in the lobby. She was awesome and probably the most 5* experience about the hotel.
- Cocktails from the bar are delicious.
- Location of the hotel is great.
Negative_Review:
- Room service says it's 24h but it takes them forever to respond in the middle of the night (2AM+).
- Bed is not 5* comfortable.
- Rooftop bar needs renovations and was underwhelming in comparison to other sky bars in Da Nang.
- Overpriced for what it is.

Would come back if either the hotel invests in some renovations and upgrades or if the price was lower for the as-is state.
Review_Title: Good stay but more of a 4* than a true 5* experience
HotelName: Muong Thanh Luxury Da Nang Hotel

Positive_Review: The rooftop is really amazing at night. Staff’s attitude is also a plus with energy and fast from Front office, housekeeping as well as maintenance.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
- Rooftop bar in the 40th floor: is a must try, even if you don’t stay in the hotel. The view there is sooooo stunning, either in a moonlight light or a sunny day.
- Excellent service: we got a free upgrade thanks to booking.com promotion from a no view, no window room to a twin room with partial seats view so I was happy enough but Định the bellman made us even more happy as he walk our luggage to the room and realised we are travelling as a couple so he ask if we want to request a room change to double room and then the hotel is very nice to change it for free. Such a very thoughtful gesture. Định really went extra miles for customer’s satisfaction. He helped us a lot with hotel information and taxi, too. Other staffs are also very welcoming. They really exceeded my expectations which premade from reading other reviews. Oh, and we got welcome drinks and food too :)
- Location: very near the beach and An Thuong areas where lots of shops and services are available. Our room is on the back corner of the hotel, floor 21 so we got a very beautiful view of the beach and the city while stayed away from the noise in the beach in the evening.
Negative_Review:
- The building and room was built a long time ago I guess so furniture and carpets look a bit old and worn out here and there, although still very clean. 
- The breakfast is not specially tasty but it’s common in other Muong Thanh hotels too
HotelName: Muong Thanh Luxury Da Nang Hotel

Positive_Review: Close everything
Negative_Review: The bed too hard

Draußen vor dem eingang sprechen uns die taxi fahrer jedesmal an ob wir zu Prostituierten möchten. Wir sind teilweise weg gerannt weil die uns so gernervt haben. Positive_Review: các tiện ích như khu spa, hồ bơi hiện không hoạt động ( khu bar tầng 28 có view khá đẹp nhưng hôi và rất ít lựa chọn; có thể mùi hôi từ hệ thống kỹ thuật thoát khí chưa tốt
Negative_Review: cần xem lại hệ thống kỹ thuật khu vực bar tại lầu 28, mùi khá nặng, có thể mùi hôi từ hệ thống kỹ thuật, thoát hơi

RoomType: Suite 1 Phòng ngủ có Giường cỡ King Nhìn ra Thành phố

Negative_Review: Vòi xịt nước rất yếu

RoomType: Phòng Ở Tầng Cao Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: vị trí trung tâm thành phố, phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện.
Negative_Review: nhân viên bảo là phải lưu lại số thẻ tín dụng của mình lên hệ thống. trc đây mình đi rất nhiều hotels và resort rồi mà đây là lần đầu tiên phải đưa thẻ tín dụng ra cho nhân viên nhập full thông tin vào hệ thống. Thông tin này rất nhạy cảm và ảnh hưởng trực tiếp đến tài sản của khách hàng. Hilton không nên thu thập thông tin này!

Positive_Review:
Always great at the Hilton

Staff super friendly

Positive_Review: Perfect!

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: Beautiful view of the river, comfortable bed and lovely bath.

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: The hotel was very nice. Everyone that we encountered was accommodating and helpful. We arrived early and wanted an early check in. The front desk accommodated us without charge but wanted us to write a review first before even experiencing the hotel. The room did have some issues that were resolved quickly but they were issues. For example the shower knob was broken and we couldn’t turn off the rainfall shower. The was room was very hot all the time and we finally asked on the last night for them to check it. They made some adjustment and it cooled off. Also our tv stopped working , again they replaced it right away. Other than that it was fine. The breakfast buffet is amazing and had many selections.! The location of the hotel is perfect and we had a great view of the Han River and it’s about 1 mile from the dragon bridge. The Han’s market is maybe a 7 minute walk and there is a Starbucks right next door. Overall I would probably stay there again but I really didn’t like how they asked me to write a review BEFORE actually experiencing or seeing the room. Oh and if you’re looking for good Vietnamese food I highly recommend An Thôi which is on the same street about 10 minutes down on the right. The food is delicious!
Negative_Review: They asked me to write a review BEFORE I even got to the room in exchange for early check in

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: The hotel overall was great, just as I expected of a Hilton. My room was large and very comfortable. The breakfast was excellent with a wide choice of foods. The staff were very nice and tried very hard to make my stay enjoyable. The pool was small, but still comfortable to relax by.
Negative_Review: The staff could have been better in a couple of things. My check-in experience was confusing and took too long. Staff during breakfast were efficient, but it took too long to get a 2nd coffee while eating. Overall, these were very minor things.
Review_Title: Da Nang Hilton delivers a great experience as expected

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: Room was clean and stylish, nice view to the river

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: Location is nice

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: Great view

RoomType: Phòng Premier có Giường cỡ King
Positive_Review: Location was very good.Breakfast was also good
Negative_Review: They could have added at least one Indian item in breakfast.Apart from others,we were a group of 19 Indians.

RoomType: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review:
We were 3 familes booked 3 rooms.
Beds were comfortable, nice location, breakfast buffet was good. Staff were attentive.
Negative_Review:
Spacewise, the reception area and buffet dining area was too small and crowded.
Hilton hotel is 5star hotel, but it didn't feel so. 
We have chosen Hilton because of the fame even though the price is nearly double compared to other 4-5star hotels available around that area. Photos shown Booking.com look a lot more spacious. Disappoining with our choice.
No plan to come back to Hilton Da Nang next time. Better try cheaper options with better value money.
Review_Title: Not worth of money, too expensive compare to other similar level of hotels available.

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: Lovely spacious rooms. Location ok. Some restaurants close by, plenty of cafes for coffee. Staff very helpful and pleasant in a bid to make your stay perfect.

CustomerNational: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)
RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Very luxurious and a true 5 star hotel, except for few gripes, compared to our other experience in Ho Chi Minh city. Very spacious and well appointed room and hotel looks very new. The location, while little bit away from city center, still has many restaurants and it is on the river by front along with many other 5 star properties. 
The breakfast spread was really good with a dedicated vegetarian section. 
The bed was very comfortable, with good balance of softness to not to affect people with back pain problems.
Negative_Review:

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: We stayed at the Hilton Danang over the course of 2 nights which covered our wedding anniversary and then new years eve itself. The hotel is nice and modern and definitely feels luxurious. The check in process is painless, and it's a really nice touch how they get you to sit in the lobby lounges during the process so that you don't have to be on your feet the entire time, which was especially nice after coming straight off a flight. The hotel is conveniently located by the Dragon bridge, but Danang itself is a town with many areas/ districts, so if you prefer being closer to the 'eat streets' or the beach, this may not be the best choice for you.
Negative_Review: Everything was great. We had the buffet dinner on new years eve which was amazing, and they even provided live entertainment through a magician. The only minor gripe we had was the countdown party on the rooftop, which was a little lacklustre, but can't really fault the hotel for that.

RoomType: Suite 1 Phòng ngủ có Giường cỡ King Nhìn ra Thành phố
Positive_Review: Nothing
Negative_Review: Let me start by saying, the practices at this hotel is extremely unethical. They took a deposit that was way larger than the amount that we were supposed to be charged the day we arrived, okay no worries.. I can appreciate this. On the day we checked out, I was advised they would deduct our stay amount from the deposit.. this was not done. They asked for my card, I asked why? You have my deposit? He said in order to release the remainder of the deposit to you. I asked very clearly, so you’re not going to be charging me? They said to me, no definitely not. I get to the car, and sure enough.. they charged me $1000AUD. I was told I would receive my funds back in 1 month because it’s an Australian bank, after multiple complaints, they agreed to contact their back to release our deposit back to us in full within a few days (which I still haven’t received back). Not to mention I paid $60AUD for a broken iron that was not damaged by us because I couldn’t be bothered arguing with the staff any longer. Absolutely horrendous, I then received an apology letter for the error on Hilton’s part. You’d think, being such a large company with a big name, these sorts of practices would not occur. They would have not corrected their error, if I had not checked my bank transactions. Absolutely dodgey, would not approach with a 10 foot pole.

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: Choices ok, taste average.
Negative_Review: One of the room phone was not working. A portion of the PU on the bed headboard was peeled off. Quite unsightly. Not the standard I expected from Hilton.

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: The manager rectified a severe error that the receptionist made, however I did not appreciate the rude condescending stares we received, so it’s safe to say that the customer service from some were sub par.
Negative_Review: There was no accomodating early check in service, the room and hallway were HOT! Please note, the temperature gauge doesn’t go below “18” - with a temperature gun it was sitting at 23 but felt like 26! The trouble checking in was a mood killer as we didn’t feel comfortable staying there after having to address an issue that any millionaire or every day worker would. All in all, we expected so much better from the Hilton!
Review_Title: Save your time, money and headache!

RoomType: Suite 1 Phòng ngủ có Giường cỡ King Nhìn ra Thành phố
Positive_Review: Location with perfect views of Han River
Negative_Review: We've spent 4 nights in 2 suite rooms with direct views of Han River. We paid the premium, and expected the best of comforts being in the suites. However, our rooms' tempatures consistently at above 26 degrees celsius or 78+ farenheit nights and days with full blast of air conditioning. It was unacceptable to bare and we had to switch floors in between. Hotel Management was very apologetics and acknowleged of air conditioning defects in all 28 suite rooms. They offered room discounts but nothing near the premiums we had paid for. As 5 five star hotel, should have been more honest of their constructiin faults and not marketing it to the public when problems are not solved. It does offer the best views, room size, and service. You should quality check these problems before engage in booking any suite facing the river.

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: Breakfast was very nice lots of options - we booked a river view room and it was massive so much room! We had a lovely cake for our anniversary and the location was central - they even organized a scooter for us for 3 days.
Negative_Review: There was a blood stain on my sheets and I called and complained immediately and the changed it - Didn't expect this from the Hilton! The pool was very small. I booked a River view and I could only see a fraction of the river the rest were buildings!

Positive_Review:
The locations is prime. 
Some staffs were very helpful and friendly.
Negative_Review:
Generally, the whole experience is average, it is a bit costly for the room and facilities. 
The sink in the toilet was dirty when I checked in and seemed impossible to remove dirt made it look very unpleasant for a 5 star hotel and a brand like Hilton. 
The staffs were not concentrated: 1: the room service did not change the supplies for the bath room even though I specifically told them to change when they cleaned the room, but they still forgot; 2: the receptionist forgot (or did not look) that I did request for the late check-out. 
It was quite frustrated even though I stayed only 2 nights. 
This is hospitality and the service makes the whole staying experience, hence, I hope the hotel increases its services so the guests would not need to request for specific details. 
Plus, the sound-proof are literally bad for a hotel 4 years-old. 
The foods and beverage service is quite complicated which required to book in advance.

朝食もベトナムのフォーや種類豊富なパンやデニッシュ、おかずもベトナム料理や洋中と種類が多くて、どれを食べるかかなり迷いました。

立地もハン市場が近く、橋を渡って対岸に行けばショッピングセンターのヴィンコムプラザがあり、ホテル出てすぐの所にスタバもあるのでとても便利でした。

다낭에 신축이많아져서 구석구석 깨끗하진못하고
커넥팅룸이라 옆에호실 소음 약하고
수영장 작고~작아도 5살아이놀기엔 적당한데 물은차서
엄마는 구경만했네요

RoomType: Phòng Ở Tầng Cao Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: 직원들이 모두 친절하고 숙소가 너무 이뻤습니다! 가족여행이라 숙소 고민을 많이 하고 예약했는데 다들 너무 좋아했어요😆 다음번에도 또 오고싶습니다!!!

RoomType: Phòng Executive 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: 위치랑 직원들 친절도는 너무 좋았어요
Negative_Review: 투숙일정 중에 공사가 있어서 수영장을 이용 못한다는 걸 체크인 당일에 알게 되었어요. 별다른 공지가 없던 상태였어서 좀 아쉬웠습니다.

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: 아침식사가 기대이상이라 매우 만족했습니다. 이용시간(06:30~10:30)도 넉넉해서 편리하게 사용했고, 특히 베이커리 종류도 많고, 맛도 좋아 매우만족합니다. 커피등도 좋류가 많았으며, 직원들의 서비스도 좋아서 대만족합니다. 다음에 꼭 다시 이용할거 같아요. 그리고 피트니스실도 너무 잘 관리되고있어 애용했습니다.
Negative_Review: 생각보다 규모가 크지않아 실망은 약간했지만 나름 관리를 잘하고 있어 큰 불만사항은 없습니다. 28층에 위치한 레스토랑도 방문했는데 Dinner메뉴선택의 폭도 좁았지만 무엇보다 음식의 맛에 큰 실망을 했어요. 디너패키지는 절대 선택하지 않을거 같아요. 메뉴 및 음식의 질 향상에 노력을 기울일 필요가 있을거 같아요.

RoomType: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: 빵맛집
Negative_Review: 방음

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
시설도 깔끔하고 룸 컨디션도 매우 좋았습니다
가격고 매우 합리적이였습니다
Negative_Review: 조식 메뉴가 조금 더 다양했으면 좋겠습니다

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review:
역시 힐튼답게 모든 시설들이 다 좋았어요
수영장이 조금 작나? 싶었는데 아침에 수영하면 주변 건물이 해를 막아줘서 해 안받고 할 수 있어 좋았구요~
서비스는 너무 좋았고, 리셉션분들도 다 너무 친절하시고 가족여행이었는데 가족 전체가 다 만족했습니다
체크아웃 후 비행 시간 전까지 짐도 맡아주십니다

RoomType: Phòng Premier có Giường cỡ King
Positive_Review: Le personnel est au petit soin, attentif et très professionnel , disponible pour les informations et les bons plan. Hotel très bien situé, taxis et commerces à proximité
Negative_Review: Pour moi tout était parfait

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: スタッフが親切だった
Negative_Review: ツアーデスクやショップがなかった

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review:
部屋がきれい
朝食が美味しかった。
スタッフが親切
Negative_Review: なし

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: Le personnel était incroyable ( notamment le Chef exécutive Lan Nguyen , le serveur Chim Anh , et Tu du fitness center ). Petit déjeuner incroyable également ( choix/qualité/service)
Negative_Review: un petit peu excentré et encore ..

RoomType: Phòng 2 giường đơn nhìn ra đại dương
Positive_Review: ジムが綺麗で清潔、バランスボールまで磨かれていた
Negative_Review: 素晴らしく英語のできるスタッフがいなかった

RoomType: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: 조식도 룸도 다 맘에 들었어요.
Negative_Review: 없습니다.

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: 위치짱좋음. 호로콴바로옆이고. 그앞에 당근레스토랑도 7시에 아침먹었는데 존맛탱. 냉장고와 전자렌지는 공용이지만. 수영장도이용할수있고. 방도넓고. 에어컨시원. 깨끗.어메니티 칫솔치약다있음. 뜨거운물잘나오고. 수건다있고. 가성비 갓성비 짱짱맨.
Negative_Review: 화장실에 불이 왜..안켜지나?ㅋ 상관은없었음.

RoomType: Phòng Ở Tầng Cao Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: 한시장과 가까워 쇼핑하기 좋았고 룸 컨디션도 좋았어요! 후기가 별로인 것들이 있어서 조금 걱정했는데 저는 넘 만족했네요 ㅎㅎ
Negative_Review: 딱히 아쉬웠던 점은 없었어요. :)

RoomType: Suite 1 Phòng ngủ có Giường cỡ King Nhìn ra Thành phố
Positive_Review: 全体的に清潔
Negative_Review:
ウェルカムドリンクがある人と、ない人がいる
私はなかった

RoomType: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: 쌀국수 맛집이라는 후기를 많이 보긴 했는데 실제로 맛있게 먹었습니다. 조식은 전반적으로 맛있엇고 빵 종류가 많았습니다. 직원들은 친절했고 룸 컨디션도 매우 좋아서 다음에 다시 다낭에 방문해도 예약할 생각입니다. 바로 옆에 스타벅스가 자리하고 있고 호텔 바로 앞에 한강이 있어서 도보로 한시장까지 갈수 있는점도 좋았습니다.
Negative_Review: 강변 산책로가 잘 조성되어 있어서 자전거를 타면 좋겠다 싶어 호텔에 문의를 드렸는데 답변이 빠르게 오지 않앗습니다. 한시장까지 도보로 이동은 가능하나 호텔 주변에 편의점 같은 상점이 부족해서 늦은 저녁에 간단한 간식을 살 수 있는 곳이 없어서 아쉬웠습니다.

RoomType: Phòng Executive Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: อาหารเช้ายกให้เบเกอรี่อร่อยมาก และน้ำผลไม้คั่นสดดีมากๆ

RoomType: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: 위치가 정말 좋습니다. 한시장 도보이동이 가능하고 한강을 내다볼 수 있는 전망이 좋았습니다. 조식도 먹을만했고, 객실은 연식이 좀 느껴지기는 했지만 고급스럽고 편안했습니다.
Negative_Review: 다른 직원들은 매우 친절했습니다. 다만 벨보이가 객실에 가방을 가져다주면서, 자기 친구 드라이버를 소개해준다며 너무 끈질기게 호객행위를 해서 불편했네요. 직원 교육이 필요할것같습니다.

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: 객실이 깨끗하고 직원들 응대가 친절했어요.

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: 다좋은 모든것이 좋음 걍
Negative_Review: 없음

RoomType: Phòng 2 giường đơn nhìn ra đại dương
