위치 좋고 산+강+바다가 모두 보이는 뷰가 최고였습니다
해수관음상(린응사)도 보여서 방에만 있어도 너무 좋아요

RoomType: Phòng 2 giường đơn nhìn ra đại dương
Positive_Review:
清潔で、気持ちよく過ごすことが出来ました。
朝食のバリエーションが多く、翌日空港から帰路に着きましたが空港にも近く大変便利な場所にありました。
Negative_Review: ありません

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
주요 장소들과 가까워 이동하기 좋음
조식 맛있고
직원들 아주 친절함
불편한 점 바로 해결해주기 위해 노력함
Negative_Review:
13층 객실에서 지상 클럽 노래소리 들림
8:30pm 에 영업 종료된 후 조용해짐

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
깨끗하고 
시설이 편리했습니다
Negative_Review:
특별히 아쉬운 점은 없습니다
베트남에 너무 친절하고 좋은 분들을 만나보다 보니
상대적으로
나쁘지 않게 친절한 것 같습니다

RoomType: Phòng 2 giường đơn nhìn ra đại dương
Positive_Review: 한시장 근처와 가까워 시원할땐 도보로 산책가기 좋아요.
Negative_Review:
새벽시간이라 그런지 짐을 방으로 가져다 주지않고
웰컴드링크도 없었어요.
엘리베이터 앞에 엄지만한 바퀴가 죽어있는걸 첫날 봤는데 퇴실하는 날까지 그자리에 있었어요.
옆건물에 전망이 일부가려 전망이 별로에요.

RoomType: Phòng Executive 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Đại dương
Positive_Review: 無し。
Negative_Review: エクゼクティブラウンジの料理が今まで宿泊したクラブアクセスできるホテルの中で最低だった。

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Negative_Review: 服務人員口氣態度不佳

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
물은 아주 깨끗.
침구 편안하고 좋음.
방 청결함.
Negative_Review:
수영장 아주 좁음. (시설도 별로)
조식메뉴는 5박동안 안바뀜. 먹거리도 그닥..
석식패키지로 신청 했다 5박중 4박은 안먹음(아주 맛이없음.)
로비 좁음.

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review:
1) 시내에 근접해 있기 때문에, 이런저런 명소를 쉽게 갈 수 있어서 좋았습니다 !!
2) 스타벅스를 개인적으로 좋아해서, 자주 방문할 수 있어서 좋았습니다 !!
3) 식당 스태프들이 항상 음식 컨디션이나 서비스 상태 필요한 걸 챙겨주셔서 너무 좋았습니다 !
4) 한강 뷰가 너무 좋았습니다.
Negative_Review:
1) 키즈클럽과 스파 시설이 없어서, 매우 아쉬웠습니다. 키즈클럽 자체는 아예 없었고, 4층 피트니스 클럽 주변에 테이블 하나만 덩그러니 있었던게 좀 아쉬웠습니다. 또한 보통 5성급 클래스 호텔의 스파는 찾아 볼수가 없었습니다. 이 점이 너무 아쉬웠습니다.

2) 생각보다 가족 친화적이진 않은곳이라, 가족 방문객에겐 좋지 않은 호텔이었던거 같습니다. 

3) 전혀 고려하고 간 것은 아니었지만, 2023 다낭 국제 불꽃놀이 대회가 개최되어 볼 기회가 있었으나 스타벅스가 있던 건물로 인해 뷰가 제한적이었고, 개최지와 가깝지만 모든뷰가 가려서 전혀 불꽃놀이를 볼수 없었습니다. 단, 유료로 라운지 서비스를 이용해야지만 볼 수 있었던 단점이 있었네요 !
Review_Title: 며칠동안 힐튼과 노보텔중에 선택한 힐튼이지만 결국 후회였네요, 절대로 가족 친화적인 숙소는 아니라 생각합니다

RoomType: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: 위치. 편안한 침대.
Negative_Review: 프론트직원이 그닥 친절하지않았고 뷰가 좋은 방을 달라고 미리 메세지도 보냈었는데 한국인이라서 그런지 처음에 냄새나고 층이 낮은방을 주었다. 담배냄새와 퀴퀴한 냄새가 심해 방을 바꿔달라고 하니 그제서야 층이 높고 뷰도좋으며 청결한 방을 주었다. 엘리베이터 타고 내릴때보니 한국관광객은 낮은층에서 주로 타고내리는 것을 보았다. 방도 크기도 작고 가성비가 별로였다. 조식도 그럭저럭 먹을만 했으나 호텔 명성에 비해는 퀄리티가 떨어졌다. 다음에 간다면 다른 호텔을 방문할것이다.

RoomType: Phòng Executive Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: スタッフの対応がとても良かった。
Negative_Review: ホテルにレストランとコンビニのような店が、ない。両隣が公的な大きな施設で、飲み物など欲しい時は、そのつもりで出かける必要がある、

RoomType: Phòng có Giường King - Thích hợp cho Khách suy giảm khả năng vận động
Positive_Review: Zimmer

RoomType: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: ベッド、浴室、清潔さ、フレンドリーなスタッフ
Negative_Review: 部屋のティッシュの補充がなされない、バスに置いたバスローブの交換がなされず再度フックにかけられていた、浴室のアメニティーに不足があった、朝食の際も持ち場を離れて他のスタッフとダベってるスタッフがいた、全般にスタッフの教育が不十分な感じがした、コロナで教育係がいなくなって現地スタッフに任せきりだった？
Review_Title: ヒルトンの標準には届いていない？

RoomType: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Sông
Positive_Review: 다낭 시내에 있고 한리버조망이 좋아요
Negative_Review: 침대쪽 바닥에 먼지덩어리들이 에어컨바람에 날라다니는 것을 보고 실망했어요. 화장실 샤워실은 배수구가 막혀서 물이 안내려갔어요. 옆방이 너무 시끄러워서 방을 바꿔달라고 요청했는데 30분이 넘게 걸렸어요. 게다가 조망도 없는 더 작은 방으로 바꿔주어서 기분이 많이 상했습니다.

Review_Title: Về cơ bản là hài lòng

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Có quá nhiều thứ đáng yêu tại khách sạn Nalod này giúp cho nhà mình có kỳ nghỉ đáng nhớ.
1. Khách sạn nằm ở vị thế trung tâm, đối diện bãi tắm 1,2,3. Phòng view biển chính diện tạo cảm giác vô cùng thư thái. Ngay đằng sau khách sạn là cả 1 con đường dài với rất nhiều các địa điểm ăn uống có tiếng mà không phải di chuyển quá xa. Nhà mình ăn tại nhà hàng Hương Đồng mấy bữa luôn, đồ ăn ở đó rất ngon nha.
2. Nhân viên lễ tân luôn niềm nở, nhiệt tình, lịch sự, tư vấn vô cùng có tâm, tỉ mỉ chi tiết mỗi khi gia đình mình cần bất cứ thông tin gì. Đặc biệt ấn tượng với 2 bạn lễ tân là Trâng và Nhi là 2 cô gái tử tế, thân thiện khiến mình có thiện cảm nhất. Bạn Trâng hướng dẫn mình rất cẩn thận khi được hỏi về các địa điểm ăn uống trong thành phố, các dịch vụ khác. Nhi rất dễ gần và tốt tính. Nhà mình đi chơi khi trời trở mây tối trời, bạn chủ động hỏi mình có mang theo ô không, khi được biết mình ngại mang chiếc ô dài có sẵn trong phòng, bạn ấy đã không ngần ngại cho nhà mình mượn ngay chiếc ô gập cá nhân của bạn ấy. Các bạn nam lễ tân cũng rất nhiệt tình, các bạn dọn phòng cũng rất sạch sẽ và tôn trọng không gian riêng của gia đình. 
3. Đồ ăn sáng tại khách sạn cũng thật tuyệt vời. Đa dạng món ăn và đổi thực đơn hàng ngày. Mình rất thích các món mỳ Quảng, hủ tiếu tại khách sạn. Thơm ngon, đậm đà bản sắc của miền Trung
4. Bất ngờ hơn nữa là nhà mình đi chơi về nhận được bánh sinh nhật chúc mừng chồng mình và bánh chia tay khi sắp hết kỳ nghỉ được để sẵn trong phòng với nét chữ viết vô cùng cẩn thận, lời chúc rất đáng yêu
....
Mỗi thứ một chút một thôi nhưng làm nên 1 Đà Nẵng thật xinh đẹp, tình cảm trong gia đình mình. Cảm ơn các bạn nhân viên khách sạn, cảm ơn cả những con người Đà Nẵng từ các bạn lái taxi, những người bán hàng. Rất ưng phong cách làm du lịch tại đây.
Negative_Review: Bể bơi chưa được chăm sóc tốt. Khách sạn lưu ý thêm mục này.

Negative_Review: Tủ lạnh hoạt động kém, gần như hỏng chức năng làm lạnh, khăn lau nhìn cũ kỹ, hẹ thống nước yếu, các thiết bị vệ sinh đã cũ và hỏng. Ăn sáng nghèo nàn về thực đơn và hạn chế về số lượng trong khi khách đông. Khu vực check out lộn xộn và nhân viên làm việc lúng túng, xử lý thiếu chuyên nghiệp.
Review_Title: Khách sạn đã có dấu hiệu xuống cấp về chất lượng dịch vụ so với làn viếng thăm cách đây 2 năm.

Negative_Review: Toilet cũ và xả nước không được sạch

Positive_Review: Vị trí sát biển, trung tâm tiện lợi.
Negative_Review: Tiếp tân, phòng ăn phong cách chưa chuyên nghiệp đạt 5 sao.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Vị trí cực đẹp, được upgrade lên phòng view đẹp ngắm biển vào sáng sớm. Nhân viên nhà hàng nhanh nhẹn. Bạn lễ tân tên Phúc biết cách xử lý tình huống cho sự không thống nhất của hotel và khách.
Negative_Review:
Hồ bơi đóng cửa nhưng mình không được thông báo trước. Do dịch bệnh nên cũng có thể hiểu được nhưng vì là chuyến đi trong ngày dịch nên mình cần hotel có hồ bơi để hạn chế ra ngoài.
 Dù sao, cách xử trí và sự nhẹ nhàng của bạn Phúc cũng làm bọn mình thấy thoải mái và chấp nhận sự thiếu xót này. Khách sạn nên giữ những nhân viên hiếu khách như Phúc. Bạn lễ tân nam nói chuyện kém!
Review_Title: Bạn nữ lễ tân tên Phúc rất giỏi

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Room is big enough for family of 4. Has ocean view. Comfy bed
Negative_Review: The pool needs repair. Tiles are falling off. The water seems a bit off as it doesn’t have the usual chlorine smell but rather slimy on the hair.
Review_Title: Superf services from staff, specially Phuc the front office supervisor who accommodated all our requests.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Stayed for two weeks in Feb. gorgeous view, spacious room, kettle. comfortable bed, firm with pillow top. Extra pillows available on request. Daily cleaning was nice. Shower had nice glass door, no leaks (not common in SEAsia!) Staff very friendly and helpful. Breakfast buffet was extensive and had lots of options - western and Asian.
Negative_Review: Location is outside main area of town - 10-15 walk to main restaurant/bars. Beach was cordoned off due to jelly fish season. Also water had bacteria as we got rash from going in sea. Pool was COLD - its on shady side of building. Also steps have a 2.5 foot drop from deck to first step - not helpful for mobility issues. Music on pool deck too LOUD. Smoking allowed on pool deck.
Review_Title: Pleasant stay in nice hotel, friendly staff

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed and nice clean room. Breakfast buffet had lots of options.
Negative_Review: Walls were very thin and other guest next door were extremely noisy from early hours in the morning. To the point we had to ask them to be quiet after being woken up at 6am, they then continued to be noisy regardless which made for an unpleasant experience.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Location was great. Hotel was very clean. Staff was friendly and very helpful. Pool area was very nice. Good views. Breakfast was amazing.
Negative_Review: Next door rooms / neighbors were noisy. No much noise proofing. Couple next were Indian and yelled at each others a lot , others side was a Chinese couple and they moved furniture and coughed all the time. The Wi Fi also was unsafe. I joined the WiFi network and was watching a U Tube video 3 minutes later I got alerted I had been hacked. And change all my passwords.
Review_Title: Nice property I would stay here again

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The view
Negative_Review: The fittings and fixtures lacked design details and we're just dropped in.. specifically the bath with no copings or silicon and the access door to the buildings service riser inside the shower was very unusual and poorly finished.
Review_Title: Reaching for higher stars but falling short.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: It was very nice to gat a room that matched what was advertised. The reservation included a buffet breakfast with a large selection of food and drinks.
Negative_Review: I don’t have any items that I didn’t like.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: The location is great and the room is new and clean
Negative_Review: The payment machine broke and it charged me three times on my Visa card then I still had to pay in cash in the end. And now it takes 5 days to wait for the money (3 times my room fees) and during Tet holiday in Vietnam, I don’t expect to get my money back on time.
Review_Title: A good place to stay but I recommend to pay in cash

Negative_Review: There were some issues with the facilities in the room. For example, the lamp next to my bed was damaged and when I arrived there was some garbage left behind in the washroom. Just a few small things, and they didn't affect the overall stay by that much.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Really comfy bed, beautiful food for breakfast. Over the road from the beach. The staff really friendly. Even a cute cake from staff on last night to say thank you for staying. We used the pool, that was lovely. Even used the gym. Very limited equipment so it's good to have good gym knowledge before you go to make good use. Highly recommend.
Negative_Review: Couldn't access all channels on TV. That's it! No complaints at all.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 giường đơn nhìn ra cảnh thành phố
Positive_Review: The Nalod has all amazing staff . Thao was was making sure my stay was pleasant and I was taken care of by reminding about my ride to the airport as well as places to go . My daughter turned 13th our second day there and we received pleasant smile and cake from Thao and online manager surprised is with a cake . The Nalod had also provided excellent breakfast for my children and I , also cleaning service was always good , our room has a giant bed which all four of us fits and my room was always put together and clean eventhough we go to the beach everyday and kids had brought sands to the room. I would stay there agian since it's just across the beach as well.
Negative_Review: The pool was nice and big but it needs work since there were tiles coming off on some areas not alot. Also the gym need A/C and newer equipments.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Only the Massage
Negative_Review:
Where do I start? Why this hotel is even 5 stars on booking.com? 
The Nalod Da Nang hotel is the worst hotel we’ve ever been to.

We booked this hotel from Jan 23-29 and we decided to check out after 3 days because we had a horrible experienced.
One day before we traveled, we contacted the hotel for airport pickup, but unfortunately, the hotel never responded. It was raining when we arrived, we were very mad because if they communicate with us, it’s much easier to travel going to the hotel and it's Luna’s New year so there are not so many taxis (not even a grab). After check-in, we went to our room and found 1 Pantyliner on the floor, disgusting! They don’t even check the room though they had so much time because we arrived around the evening. 
On the next day, we ordered room service and unfortunately, the STAFF doesN'T UNDERSTAND ENGLISH! IS THIS A 5-star? 3x that’s happened. I said I don’t want fries, they bring me a wrong order full of fries or even wrong order even though their Menu is English. The next day I ordered a pot of fish and I was so excited UNFORTUNATELY the pot have PORK BELLY! what recipe is that??? And not on the Menu that a Pot of steamed fish is with a pork belly. Lastly, I went to the breakfast and ordered a cappuccino, later I need to pay after My breakfast, WHERE IS THE FREE BREAKFAST THAT INCLUDED IN MY ROOM? Plus the Save box can carry by a person, not even attached to the wall (check the photos)
The only good thing I’ve experienced here is their massage atleast I had 1 hour to relax after all the terrible experiences. English is a very important communication which the hotel must give attention to. We can't handle what the hotel stress gave so we check out early. I WILL NEVER COME BACK TO THIS HOTEL! NOT EVEN RECOMMENDED TO MY FAMILY AND FRIENDS! 

Ps. I hope booking.com check the hotel before they became 5 Star.
Review_Title: DISGUSTING! I WILL NEVER COME BACK!! DO NOT BOOK HERE!

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đơn
Positive_Review: Die Zimmer sind gut ausgestattet und komfortabel, die Lage am Strand ist top! Das Personal ist sehr zuvorkommend und ständig darum bemüht, dass man sich als Gast wohlfühlt. Ein kleines Problem mit einem leichten Wassereinbruch während des Taifuns wurde von Herrn Sang so schnell gelöst, dass ich 15 Minuten nach meiner Meldung an die Rezeption bereits in ein anderes (besseres) Zimmer umgezogen war! Das Frühstücksbuffet ist sehr reichhaltig und abwechslungsreich, ich kann das Hotel unbedingt weiterempfehlen.

Negative_Review: お部屋の水まわりがもう少し改善されるといいと思いました。トイレの水が流れっぱなしだったり、洗面の水が流れなくなったりしました。水圧ももう少し強ければ…。
Review_Title: 必要最低限での満足度はありました。また利用すると思います。

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: La gentillesse du personnel.
Negative_Review:
Nous y sommes allés en 2018 et avons bien apprécié cet hôtel. C’est pour cette raison que nous y sommes retournés.
Nous pouvons comprendre qu’en l’absence de touristes internationaux dû au Covid, les prestations ne soient pas les mêmes. Cependant, le ménage est partiellement fait et un soir, nous avons fait appel au room service, le plateau est resté toute la nuit et une bonne partie de la journée dans le couloir, il n’a été enlevé qu’en fin d’après-midi.
Quant au petit déjeuner, la qualité laisse vraiment à désirer. Le buffet a diminué de 2 tiers mais en ces temps de pandémie et l’impact que cela a sur le tourisme, cela peut se comprendre. Par contre, ce qui n’est pas acceptable, c’est qu’il n’y avait même pas un jus de fruit et seulement 1 ou 2 fruits frais. En 7 jours, c’était quasiment les mêmes plats tous les jours... De plus, la qualité des aliments n’était pas top !! 
Bref, nous avons été très déçus.

Positive_Review:
Kamers zijn netjes , personeel zijn erg lief en behulpzaam. We waren met ons gezin van 4 en hadden een kamer ( uitzicht op de zee) echt zo prachtig! De kamers worden elke dag netjes schoongemaakt. Mijn zoontje is op 4 mei jarig.
We hebben enkele uren voordat hij jarig is nog alles kunnen regelen bij de receptie! Super snel geregeld en hebben zijn kamer super leuk versierd! Echt een compliment en ook voor diegene die dit heeft geregeld “ Thao” super blij! Ik raad het iedereen aan als je naar da Nang gaat! Wij zaten 18 hoog:) ontbijt was lekker en uitzicht op de zee.

Review_Title: Il ne vaut pas un 5* comparativement aux autres de la même catégorie de prix au VN. Je n’y retournerai pas.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đơn
Positive_Review: Aussicht auf den und Nähe zum Strand. Aufmachung des Swimming-Pools in der 4. Etage. Grundsätzliche Hilfsbereitschaft des Personals. Aufmerksamkeit (Kuchen) zum letzten Tag.
Negative_Review:
Das Hotel scheint schon ziemlich alt zu sein, was der Ausstattung anzusehen ist. Dies zeigt sich auch im Fitnessstudio, das sehr sporadisch eingerichtet ist und allein vom Zustand der Geräte ein fortgeschrittenes Alter aufweist.

Die Qualität und der Service beim Frühstück (kostenlos inkl.) lassen zu Wünschen übrig. Nach dem zweiten Frühstück entschied ich mich lieber etwas anderes außerhalb des Hotels zu suchen. Das Frühstück wurde nur bis 9:30 Uhr angeboten, wobei ich beim ersten Frühstück bereits gegen 9:15 Uhr bestimmt darauf hingewiesen wurde, dass man gleich schließe. Meine Bestellungen wurden vergessen und trotz Nachfrage nicht nach einer zügigen Lösung gesucht. Das Essen schmeckte mir nicht (alles neutral oder abgestanden), obwohl es sehr auf vietnamesische Kunden ausgerichtet ist, was eigentlich eine bessere Qualität vermuten lässt.

Das Wifi könnte besser funktionieren. Mein erstes Zimmer ließ mir am zweiten Tag kein einloggen mehr zu, weshalb ich sogar ein kostenfreies Upgrade in ein Zimmer mit Seeblick erhielt (vielen Dank dafür!). Der Wechsel musste (?) aber in wenigen Minuten stattfinden, so Stand der Rezeptionist in meiner Tür und wartete auch dort bei offener Tür, selbst nachdem ich um ein paar Minuten Zeit bat. Das Wifi im neuen Zimmer funktionierte grundsätzlich, war aber langsam und auch nicht immer zuverlässig (kurzzeitig kein Internet oder keine Reaktion).

Leider war mein erstes Zimmer nicht ausreichend sauber. So fanden sich viele lange schwarze Haare in meiner Dusche, die definitiv nicht von mir stammen konnten. Grundsätzlich war daran anschließend alles sauber.

Alles in allem dominierte bei mir der Eindruck, dass trotz der zahlreichen Mitarbeiter des Hotels der Service qualitativ merklich ausbaufähig ist (es handelt sich um ein 5-Sterne-Hotel). Auch sollten die angebotenen Speisen, ob kostenfrei oder kostenpflichtig, eine hohe Qualität aufweisen, was sie aus meiner Sicht nicht taten.

Positive_Review: The location was good, right across the street from the beach. Breakfast was tasty and lots of variety. The swimming pool is big and refreshing after a hot day. Sea view was nice
Negative_Review: Staff were lacklustre - no one helped with our bags on check-in, and the process to check in was slow. No tours are available, only cars to take you to locations yet the TV advertises tours. Windows are super thin, so if you're a light sleeper, you'll be awoken by noise outside, and curtains are thin, so lots of light comes in early in the morning
Review_Title: Decent location, sea view, but hotel needs improvement

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
This is my FAVOURITE hotel, and I will stay here next time im in Da Nang as well. When we first came me and my boyfriend had a beautiful room with seaview, then we was supposed to move room to a room with city view. But instead we got a call the morning with the news that we was upgraded to a bigger room with seaview. And this room is the most beautiful room I`ve ever stayed at! 
The room service was so good. They cleaned our room every morning, we got water two times a day and they fixed our room ready for night in the afternoon. 
The breakfast was good, with the cutest waiters. 
The gym was nice and new, and had all the equipments I needed for a full body workout. 
When we checked out the receptionist came after us with a present- it was a nice wooden model of the hotel. This was the perfect souvenir for us. 
I also loved the location- the beach was just over the road and there was many nice cafees and restaurants in short walking distance. The guards in the car park was always so nice when we came with our scooter. 
Highly recomment the hotel!
Negative_Review:
More aircondition in the hallways and in the elevator would be nice. But there was nothing I really didnt like. 
My only comment to the gym is that I would love to have a squat rach with different plates. Then the gym would be a 10/10.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
Great hotel on the beach road at the start of the town center. Check in easy and quick . we had a town view room which was fine, large and spacious with a nice sitting area. The room was clean and service daily always had water provided.
Restaurant for breakfast was very good with western and Vietnamese options available. Evening quieter but the food choice again is good and very reasonable.
The beach opposite the hotel is clean and with plenty of space.
For us the big benefit was the hotel pool private and plenty of place to sit.
We used the hotel transfer to Danang airport ,very convenient and dropped us off at the domestic terminal for our flight to Hanoi.
Staff were very helpful and a credit to the hotel.
I would stay again on a repeat trip.
Negative_Review: Disappointed that the Sky lounge bar on the top floor was closed at the time of my visit . This maybe due to just reopening after covid.
Review_Title: Great place to stay opposite the beach.

RoomType: Suite Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: we loved everything about the property, and the staff was amazing from start to finish

Positive_Review: it’s as nice as they come… did not over advertise. You get what you see. I love the sea view and the pool area. Water was too cold to swim but that’s not the hotel’s fault. I slept like a baby in those sheets and pillows.

There were enough vegan options; just not what these tourists were looking for. They demand poori and other spicy vegan options like they would get back home. Poor manager actually went out of his way to try to accommodate these unreasonable guests. That was the moment ruined by these privileged self-entitled tourists.

The room was very clean and spacious, shower and bath were what you would hope for.
The staff were very pleasant and helpful, even helping me sort out domestic flights. Breakfast was more than sufficient ( except they had no baked beans on some days )

No 24hr room service.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: 가성비가 좋습니다. 직원들 매우 친절하구요. 미케비치 주변에 어지간한 음식점이나 상점들이 다 근처에있어서 걸어다닐만 했습니다. 수영장은 바닥에 모래가 좀 있지만 물은 깨끗한 편이였구 룸 샤워실도 뜨거운물 잘 나옵니다. 저는 해변뷰가 아닌 도심뷰 룸이였지만 밤에는 나름 운치있었습니다.
Negative_Review: 방음이 좀 안되요. 옆방 건너방 소리 간간히 들립니다. 시끄럽게 떠드는 손님이 옆방에 오면 난감할 듯 합니다

RoomType: Phòng Premier Deluxe
Negative_Review: Zu viele Gruppen aus China. Frühstücken in Ruhe, war unmöglich. Gäste ohne Respeckt und Anstand.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Вид из окна шикарный. Довольно удобное расположение, если вы любите погулять.
Negative_Review:
Если вы бывали в международных пятизвездочных отелях, то поймете, что это уверенные три звезды. Если б так и позиционировали они себя, я была бы довольна. Но это никак не 5 звезд.
Номера большие, но какие-то пустые и бестолковые, обшарпанные местами. Но это ладно, мы не сидеть в номере приехали. А вот спать как раз сложно. Да, вид из окон шикарный, очень красиво! Но очень шумно. Слышна дорога и постоянно сигналившие водители. Всю ночь играла музыка. Я просыпалась постоянно и даже в 5:30 утра музыка играла. А дальше по коридорам начали ходить туристы. Что оказалось еще более шумно. В общем, не выспались.
Прям рядом с отелем нет кафе, нужно прогуляться. Но я ставлю 5 за местоположение, тк мы любим гулять. До драконьего моста пешком 25 минут.
Завтрак, на мой взгляд, более азиатского состава. Я не против, но мне было не очень вкусно. Даже круассаны больше похожи на хлеб, чем на воздушную хрустящую выпечку.
Я не из тех людей, кто придирается ко всему, наоборот. Но, ребята, если вы называете себя пятизвездочным отелем, то нужно соответствовать. Посетите международные сетевые отели и сравните. Желаю успехов и процветания!
Review_Title: Виды из окна отличные, но выспаться не удалось.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: das delux doppelzimmer war sehr geräumig
Negative_Review:
die glastür der duschkabine war undicht. Nach dem duschen lief das wasser überall auf dem ganzen boden. Die bedienung des wasserhahn im bad war eine kleine katastrophe. Ich wußte nicht wie mann nach dem anlauf das wasser abstellte. Das rezeption schickte auf meinen anruf einen fachmann, der allerdings selbst überfordert waurde. Kurz nachdem er eine verstärkung gerufen hatte, konnte er das fliessende wasser stopen. 
Zum strand mußte man über die belebte strasse überqueren.
Review_Title: schönes deluxzimmer mit probleme im bad.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển

Positive_Review: Nagyon kedves, segítőkész személyzet fogadott bennünket. A szobáinkat előkészítették és gyorsan megkaptuk. A szobák kényelmesek. A szálloda elött található a tengerpart, ami jó időben fürödhető. Taxival 3 perc alatt a Dragon hídnál lehetünk. Sok étterem található a szálloda környékén. Szívesen választom a következő alkalommal is ezt a szállodát.

man muss jeden Tag von Neuem alles beobachten u checken ..

lo staff cortese, sempre pronto a soddisfare tutte le richieste dei clienti.
la piscina pulita, spaziosa

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
- L'emplacement idéal, accès facile à la plage, restaurants et supermarchés à proximité
- Petit déjeuner avec beaucoup de choix
- Chambres spacieuses et bien équipées
- Nous avons bénéficié d'un upgrade pour une chambre avec vue mer, c'est vraiment appréciable
Negative_Review: - Salle de gym anecdotique, juste quelques machines et très peu de poids, qui s'arrêtent d'ailleurs à 14 kg. Inutilissble pour quelqu'un qui souhaite maintenir un entraînement sérieux.
Review_Title: Excellent emplacement. Chambre avec vue mer recommandée.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Lo único reseñable en positivo es que la localización está bien, delante del mar y de la zona de restaurantes. Por lo demás un desastre total, no lo recomendaría a nadie.
Negative_Review: En una ciudad como Da nang con 40 grados y humedad del 100% no hay aire acondicionado en los pasillos, ni recepción ni en la sala del desayuno, antes de llegar al ascensor ya estas sudando. Muy muy decepcionante, ni de lejos un hotel de 5 estrellas, sería de una estrella en España. La habitación muy desactualizada. La moqueta del pasillo llena de manchas. Desastre total. Las fotos de la web son literalmente engañosas. El desayuno es totalmente asiatico, ni un croissant siquiera.
Review_Title: No es un hotel de 5 estrellas, si acaso de 1 estrella. No recomendable a nadie.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Расположение, красивое здание.
Negative_Review: При заезде попросили доплатить за завтрак на второго ребенка, но после возражения передумали. Номер большой, но кровать маленькая. Завтрак не очень разнообразный. Нет своих лежаков на пляже. Ожидал большего, т.к. за меньшие деньги в других отелях было лучше.

RoomType: Suite Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Отель находится прямо у береговой линии, что очень клево. 
Рядом множество ресторанов с морепродуктами, шикарная набережная, для любителей бега.
Negative_Review:
Персонал какой-то сонный :) 
На ресепшен ходят друг за другом и что-то делают, но про это долго приходится ждать всего. 

Заселиться поручилось только, ровно в 14:00. Да это по правилам отеля, но… ждали почти 3 часа, за это время только соком угостили.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
Bedden waren goed. Kamer is groot. 
Alles was wel netjes en schoon.
Negative_Review:
Had meer verwacht qua ontbijt en qua service en personeel van een 5* hotel.
Nadat één persoon gedoucht heeft, is er koud water. 
Er werd bij het ontbijt geen koffie/thee gebracht, terwijl dit wel de bedoeling is. 
Geen bedden bij het strand, terwijl het hotel zich beschrijft als aan het strand. 
Het zwembad ligt veelal in de schaduw door de hoge gebouwen er omheen. Voornamelijk ''s morgens zon bij het zwembad.
Review_Title: Niet wat we er van verwacht hadden en zeker geen 5*

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 giường đơn nhìn ra cảnh thành phố
Positive_Review: L'hotel non è all altezza di un 5 stelle, sicuramente ottima posizione di fronte alla spiaggia immensa, a pochi km dal Dragon bridge e dall'aeroporto unico motivo per il quale abbiamo alloggiato qui al rientro da Hue. Colazione abbondante, varia soprattutto sul salato.
Negative_Review:
La stanza era deludente rispetto alle foto, avevamo richiesto letto matrimoniale invece abbiamo trovato letto separati, nei corridoi non c'era un buon odore, nell'ascensore c'era un caldo insopportabile, e considerando che eravamo al 19 piano non potevamo non prenderlo, la tenda della doccia era sporca, così come il cestino del bagno, non particolare attenzione alla pulizia nel dettaglio. L'hotel ad un certo punto ombreggiava la spiaggia quindi per chi ama prendersi il sole non è consigliati lo stabilimento proprio di fronte ma magari meglio spostarsi in quelli più laterali, anche se abbiamo constatato che alla gente del posto piace stare proprio lì all'ombra quindi il problema era solo nostro. 
Avevamo chiesto di poter chiamare il taxi la mattina presto perché dovevamo andare all'aeroporto, ma non è stato fatto, però niente di grave le sviste possono capitare. Hanno recuperato in quanto i taxi arrivano davvero in brevissimo tempo.
L'ingresso non mi è piaciuto, mi è sembrato molto caotico.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 giường đơn nhìn ra cảnh thành phố
Negative_Review: シャワーの水がカーテンをしていても浴槽の外に出て、大変でした。

Positive_Review: Khách sạn quá ổn so với giá tiền. Phòng căn hộ 4 người đầy đủ tiện nghi, sang trọng, rộng rãi thoải mái và sạch sẽ bóng loáng nhìn rất thích. Giường siêu lớn và êm, view phòng tắm nhìn ra thành phố cực chill luôn. Vị trí ngay trung tâm đi đâu cũng tiện. Tivi có netflix.

HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Harmony Có 2 Phòng Ngủ và Ban Công
Positive_Review: Altara Suites Da Nang is kind of an apartment hotel type arrangement. What we liked about the hotel is that the rooms are pretty generous and large. We booked 2 rooms for a family of 5 adults, and the room for 3 had 2 separate bedrooms, which is really nice. The whole place is spacious as it resembles more like an apartment than a typical hotel where everything is crammed together.
Negative_Review: The service was just OK and typical of larger hotels. The problem for us is that we have been spoilt by the quaint, smaller and more boutique hotels in places like Hanoi and Hoi An, where their service is impeccable and staff were eager to serve and pamper guests really well. It's not that Altara Suites' service is bad, but just in comparison, the care isn't as felt as the other hotels. Also, we were quite hard pressed to find good places to eat nearer the hotel, so we felt kind of "stuck". Da Nang itself was quite boring - or at least the area the hotel is in - there's nothing to do.
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Serenity 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
Comfortable, spacious, clean, close to the centre, opposite the beach, fabulous breakfast, washing machine and a dryer were very handy. 
The kitchen is not well equipped but it was not an issue as we did not cook even once. 
We loved the city views at night and enjoyed the pool on the roof.
Negative_Review:
How the kitchen was equipped. It would be nice to get some tea and coffee and few more cups and glasses. 
We had to cross the road to go to the beach which was a frightening experience as the cars and bikes do not stop at the crossing. Having traffic lights or a lollipop man helping you to cross the road at the front of the hotel would be the great addition.
Review_Title: We had the best time, enjoyed the apartment, the pool and are very pleased that we were not hit by any drivers when goin
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Serenity 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Good location across from beach, 2 bed rooms spacious, comfortable and clean. Strong WiFi. Walking distance (10-15 mins walk) to an array of restaurants and convenience stores very close by. Warm showers with strong water pressure. Taxis outside for convenience. Pool on rooftop fine. Washing machine and dryer, larger fridge than normal a bonus
Negative_Review:
Breakfast - eggs cooked fresh but forget the rest, sub standard buffet, however enough to eat. 

Not a criticism of the hotel directly but arranged a trip to Ba Na Hills through reception (private car and driver return to Ba Na Hills cost 1,000,000 Dong) and was advised to buy the buffet lunch at Ba Na Hills - avoid the buffet lunch!! The hotel breakfast which I just mentioned was Michelin star quality compared to this stuff. Literally inedible. Would not allow my dogs to eat it. Grotesque. Stale, dried out, tasteless - and that's being generous. Lot's of other food options at BaNa Hills, so my best advice is to just buy your entry ticket (900,000) and have some cash for lunch elsewhere.
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Serenity 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: The view from the pool area.
Negative_Review:
It was absolutely filthy! All of the reviews mentioning how dirty it is, were true, sadly. 

From the grease marks in the kitchen, over the clapboards, on the fridge, to the dirty floors, hair in the shower drains, really unclean lounge, dirty dining chairs and gross bed heads to smelly pillows…the list goes on and on…I cleaned my room for over an hour and the little towels were black afterwards. The second dirtiest hotel I have ever stayed in over 25 years of travelling the world. 

The lifts were absolutely filthy - finger marks everywhere, greasy and SO SLOW. There were 3 lifts in total, but it seemed only one worked, and people lined up for ages for the dirty lifts.

The reception area was dirty, smelly and just so unwelcoming and drab. 

The whole experience made you feel like you needed to shower constantly and wash your hands every minute.
Review_Title: Don’t stay here…find somewhere else in Danang!
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Harmony Có 2 Phòng Ngủ và Ban Công
Positive_Review: The space in the 2 bed apartment is good for 4 people.
Negative_Review:
The photos are very misleading. The property needs a good uplift and paint at the very least.

The gym has dated equipment, there are only 3 lifts to service 33 floors, no goods lift either so you spend most of your time waiting for a lift to either leave the hotel, go to your room, pool or restaurant and the lift lobby except the ground floor has no a/c - very unpleasant and frustrating.

The staff in the pool area speak very little English. Our orders were wrong and again very frustrating, especially as they insisted we pay for their mistakes.

I knew it was going to be an interesting stay when we were checked in by 5 staff, some of them training but all very confusing!
Review_Title: This is by no means a 5 star property I have no idea who or why it has been awarded this way.

Positive_Review: Where do I start? The property was very clean (my only complaint was the smell in the hallway - musty or mouldy) but that is my only complaint of our whole 7 night stay. The breakfast was amazing - so many choices including a separate vegan menu we could order from every day! A special mention to Linh unpstairs who was the most friendly and welcoming staff member! They even brought us soy milk every morning and remembered our eating preferences! The room was spacious, quiet, clean and had everything we needed - the washing machine and dryer were so so handy!!. We didn’t eat in the room so only used the kettle and 2 cups for tea. The bed was the most comfortable king sized bed and we slept so well! The pool and gym were amazing and we really enjoying using those facilities (the views were incredible up there). We would 100% recommend altara suites and will definately stay again!

Positive_Review: The apartment came with a washing machine and dryer, which was very handy. The staff here was absolutely lovely and helpful. Negative_Review: There was mold on the air con vents. There were some suspicious discolourations on the ceiling as well from likely water damage. The reception area and lifts smelled like sewerage (the daily cleaning staff was really good and thorough from what we see, so it perplexed me where the stench came from, but it was very heavy and deep). They tried to use bleach to cover the smell, but it's still there. It most definitely was not a 5 star hotel standard. Upper management didn't maintain the hotel at all, despite the regular staff trying their best to upkeep the hotel. I would not feel annoyed if the number of stars actually reflect the condition of the hotel (3 stars would be more fair here).

Positive_Review: It was a nice spacious apartment with comfy beds and nice view of the beach as we were on the 28th floor. The location is withing walking distance to many spas and restaurants and minutes away from the beach, but if you are looking for beach chairs you will have to go much further down!
Negative_Review: The apartment it-self had a very stale and damp smell and the kitchen utensils and facilities were very used and had dirty stain marks on them and ther were ugly brown dirt marks on most of the curtain nets which were not displeasing! We had a problem with the shower as there is no hot water, but lucky enough there were two showers room available. I tried the breakfast on the first day and never went back, the choice was very limited! It was very crowded and beacuse the food was located one side, there was a big queue and the staff did not clean or filled up the food frequently compared to the amount of guest that was there. There was a main problem with this building is the lift, there was 3 lifts available but always seem like only one worked, I have waited nearly 3-5 mins from ground floor to reach 28th floor but at times it makes so many stops on the way which is quite frastrating every time you need to go out.

HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Serenity 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Near the beach and has two bedroom suite with dining table, ref, microwave and basic essential stuff
Negative_Review: It was not mentioned that there is currently a construction in front of the hotel. We thought we would be having city view with some beach views but because of the construction, we couldnt see any view. Also at first, aircon was not working but it was fixed so it’s ok.
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Harmony Có 2 Phòng Ngủ và Ban Công
Positive_Review:
We stayed in the Harmony 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom suite. The photos from Booking.com are accurate. In person, I would argue its even better. The view was BREATHTAKING. We were in suite 2706 which also has a bathtub.

Everything was so clean and the staff were very welcoming and helpful. You are provided with a washer and dryer and a small amount of laundry powder. We received four complimentary bottles of water each day which was much needed.

Loved the rain shower head and the air conditioning worked well. Beds were very comfortable and there were three tvs (one in each bedroom and one in the living room) which could be used with Netflix, Prime, YouTube, etc

Breakfast was really enjoyable. Buffet style but also had an egg station with delicious omelettes. There was also a rotating menu of Vietnamese local noodles. If you get a chance, the local My Quang chicken noodle soup is delicious. Breakfast runs from 6:30 to 10:30 and you won't go hungry. Tons of variety and fresh juices (passionfruit, mango, watermelon, etc.) along with Vietnamese coffee, normal coffee, tea.. whatever you need.

The gym was basic but very clean and well maintained. The view from the gym was even better than the hotel room. First day the AC was off inside but after pointing this out, they promptly addressed it.

The swimming pool was a tad busy but very comfortable and had great service. The pool towels smelled extremely fresh which was nice.

Location is decent. Directly across from the beach. Lots of seafood restaurants down the street. Also a convenience store about 200m away walking distance.

That said, the prices are inflated - if you use Grab, take a 5 min ride down the road to Vincom Plaza (big mall) and go to the grocery store called Winmart where you will find much cheaper goods. Likely useful for longer stays or those who want to cook.
Negative_Review:
As others have mentioned, the elevators could be a bit frustrating and slow depending on the time of day. Only felt the AC on in them once for the three nights we stayed. I think part of the issue is the size of the property but also the fact that there are no separate service elevators. We rode with staff multiple times. Must be extremely frustrating for them and likely leads to problems with efficiency. 

However, this was a very minor inconvenience. The elevators were always clean and we're equipped with air freshener units. If you are staying on the 27th floor or higher, would recommend using the stairs to access the gym facilities and breakfast in the morning (if you are physically able).

The only other suggestion would be to bring an extension cord or a multi plug extender as there was only one outlet on each side of the bed in the bedroom. 

Finally, the bath towels did smell a bit musty but in my experience that is hard to avoid in seaside accommodations. If I am mistaken and there is a way to mitigate this, this would be my primary suggestion for Altara on easily achievable improvements.
Review_Title: Outstanding Service and Well Maintained Property
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Harmony Có 2 Phòng Ngủ và Ban Công
Positive_Review: Das Appartement war für unsere 4-köpfige Familie mehr als groß genug. Es war bis auf ein paar Kleinigkeiten alles vorhanden, was wir benötigt haben. Wir konnten in dem Appartement selbst kochen, da unsere Kindern mit dem vietnamesischen Essen nicht so gut zurecht kamen. Auch eine Waschmaschine und ein Wäschetrockner waren enthalten. Einen kleinen Balkon vor dem hinteren Schlafzimmer gab es auch, allerdings wurde mehr als die Hälfte der Fläche davon vom Außengerät der Klimaanlage in Anspruch genommen. Der Zimmerservice reinigte das Appartement inklusive der Küche jeden Tag. Unsere Kinder haben den kleinen Pool auf der Dachterrasse mit einer wunderschönen Aussicht geliebt. Das Personal war meist freundlich und hilfsbereit. Hervorzuheben sind die Mitarbeiter/innen im Hotelrestaurant, die sehr aufmerksam waren (Duyen, Hung etc). Insgesamt waren wir 8 Tage in dem Appartement.
Negative_Review: Da der Rezeptionsbereich ziemlich klein war, war es nicht so angenehm, sich dort länger aufzuhalten. Auch die Toilette neben der Rezeption könnte sauberer sein, um den Anspruch eines gehobenen Aparthotels gerecht zu werden. Die Besetzung an der Rezeption war nicht optimal, mal standen dort 4-5 Mitarbeiter/innen herum, die wenig zu tun hatten und mal war es nur von einer Person besetzt, als auf ein Mal viele Gäste ankamen. Oft haben wir zu lange auf den Fahrstuhl warten müssen, da es nur 3 Fahrstühle im ganzen Building mit 39 (?) Stockwerken gibt. Der Buffetaufbau im Restaurants kann definitiv besser organisiert werden. Ständiges Drängeln am Buffet war absolut unnötig, auch weil manche Gäste nicht wussten, wo das Ende einer Warteschlange war. Das Frühstücksangebot für Kinder war leider sehr dürftig. Unsere Kinder im Alter von 6 und 12 J. kamen sich im Frühstücksrestaurant verloren vor, weil die Speisen fast nur für Erwachsene ausgerichtet waren. Vielleicht würde die Einrichtung eines "Kid corner" im Frühstücksrestaurant den Service aufwerten. Die Ausstattung der Küchenutensilien kann auch verbessert werden. Was uns auffiel, war, dass wir nirgendswo in den insgesamt 5 Appartements, in den wir auf unserer Vietnam-Reise aufgehalten haben, ein Schneidebrett gefunden haben. Trotz allem würde wir gerne dieses Aparthotel wieder buchen, falls wir wieder nach Da Nang kommen.
Review_Title: Erholsame Tage in einem strandnahen, guten Aparthotel
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Serenity 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: Просторные номера, самое то для большой семьи, уборка каждый день была, большой бассейн, днём был пустой, что нас очень радовало)

Маленький холл, ну точно на 5 звёзд не тянет. Слабые завтраки, хотелось побольше европейской еды.ресторан на обед и ужин не работал, приходилось ходить в соседний отель.

Positive_Review: 인테리어가 예뻤고 뷰가 좋았습니다. 미케비치가 가까워서 좋았어요.

RoomType: Suite Bliss 1 Phòng Ngủ Có Ban Công
Negative_Review: 7명을 위해 방을 3개 예약했다가 코로나로 한 팀이 못 가게 되어서 방 하나를 취소 요청했더니 안된다는 답변 뿐이었습니다. 그래서 5명이 방 세계를(방 두 개는 둘 다 투룸이고 6 명이 묵을 수 있는 방) 사용했습니다. 적어도 형편이 이러면 방을 다운그레이드 해주든지 아니면 방 하나를 환불 해주는게 정상 아닌가요? 단순 변심도 아니고 코로나로 어쩔 수 없이 여행을 못 가게 된건데 사전에 환불을 위해 한국에서 전화했더니 프론트 직원이 자기 할 말만 하고 굉장히 불친절하게 전화를 끊어버렸습니다. 꼭 환불을 못 받아서 기분이 나쁜게 아니라 이 과정이 너무 불친절하고 기분 나빴습니다. 방 청소도 문제입니다. 내가 혼자 투룸 방을 사용했는데 꼭 비치해야 되는 물건들(면도기 커피등)도 제대로 비치도 안되고 아무튼 이 숙소 문제 때문에 여행 내내 기분이 나빴습니다.
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Peace 1 Phòng Ngủ Có Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Thành Phố

RoomType: Suite Harmony Có 2 Phòng Ngủ và Ban Công
Positive_Review: 쓰리룸이고 취사나 빨래가 가능한 콘도 같은 호텔이였고 룸서비스 저렴하고 인피니티 풀이 옥상에 있어요
Negative_Review: 음식은 그제 그렇네요
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Serenity 2 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review:
아파트먼트 호텔입니다 식기도구 세탁기 건조기 전자레인지 인덕션 싱크대 그릇 식탁 의자 등등 서울아파트 가정집을 통째로 가져다놓은것같아서 편했습니다 룸서비스도 되고 조식도 종류가 많아요 수영장은 많이 크지않지만 적당한크기 칵테일 커피 등 옥상수영장 바에서 판매하고있습니다 욕조가 커서 좋고 물 수압이 좋습니다 뜨거운물 콸콸 나와요 호텔안에있으면 한국 친구집온거같아요 에어컨 거실 방2 다 나눠서 온도 조절할수있어요 조절기3개있습니다
뷰는 바다 측면이지만 밖에 볼일없고 암막커텐 치니까 잠잘오고 좋습니다 여기호텔 재방문의사있습니다
한건물이 니은 짜로 엄청크게 있는데 우측 포포인츠쉐라톤호텔 가운데 알타라스위트호텔 좌측 카지노 이렇게 한건물이지만 벽이있습니다 가보시면알아요 그렇기때문에 손님이 많으니 근처에 그랩택시가 엄청많아서 내려가서 그랩 부르면 1분만에옵니다 마지막으로 침대 진짜 너무 좋아요 침대랑 침구 누우면 바로 잠이옵니다 즐거운여행되세요~
Negative_Review: 아파트먼트 호텔 이기때문에 객실고객 외 일반 개인 아파트 살고있는사람도 많아서 엘레베이터 한번타면 층마다 서요 한번에 내려간적이 없습니다 엘레베이터 기다리면 한5분은 기다려야 옵니다 엘레베이터 3대 뿐인데 1대가 올라가는걸로 움직이면 올라가는애가 다태우고 1대는 쉬고 1대는 내려가는걸로 움직이면 내려가는애가 다태우고 무슨말인지 알아요? 전기 아끼는건 좋지만 엘레베이터 너무 불편했어요 또 객실 처음에 퀘퀘합니다 에어컨틀고 세탁기 세탁했더니 세탁 냄새로 가득차면서 괜찮아졌어요~
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Zen Có 2 Phòng Ngủ và Ban Công

Negative_Review: 코로나때문에 시설투자를 못한 것까진 이해를 하지만 너무 낡은 제품과 시설을 계속서용하는것

특히 세탁기와 건조기가 있어서 여행하는 동안 옷 걱정없이 정말 편하게 다녔다.

RoomType: Suite Harmony Có 2 Phòng Ngủ và Ban Công
Positive_Review: Просторный номер,вкусный завтрак и хороший бассейн.
Negative_Review:
Бронировали номер за 3-4 недели до заезда,но номер был не подготовлен в плане чистоты.полы были пыльными,поверхности и шкафы грязными и заляпанными. На 5ти звездочный отель не тянет. Полотенце были старыми,с дырками и один раз принесли полотенце с плохо застиранной кровью. Когда мы им его показали,сказали: Ничего страшного,мы вам его поменяем. Был ещё не очень приятный момент. Испачкали полотенце краской для волос,дочь помыла голову и вытерла полотенцем,осталась краска. Полотенце даже не попробовав постирать выставили счёт как за новое,а оно было очень старое.от старости уже нитки торчали. Я предложила им постирать его сама,и если не отстирается то я заплачу за него. Постирала его в стиральной машинке и он все отстиралось без проблем. 
В целом все было нормально,не считая этих моментов.
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Zen Có 2 Phòng Ngủ và Ban Công
Positive_Review:
1. 프론트 직원들이 다 친절하고 좋았습니다
2. 수영장도 깨끗하고 이용하기 좋았어요.
(다만 저녁 5시정도부터는 아이들 수영수업을 진행이 있음)
3. 냉장고. 세탁기 다 잘 됨
4. 위치가 아주 좋음 
5. 조식 메뉴가 조금씩 바뀌어서 아주 좋음 
6. 물이 깨끗함-!!!!!!!! 필터가 하얀상태로 그대로 집에 가져갔음
Negative_Review:
1. 에어컨이 빵빵하긴 하나 실외기 돌아가는 소리가 점점 탱크가 됨
2. 공사장 뷰가 걸림 
3. 이용하는데 딱히 단점이 없다는게 아주 좋음
HotelName: Altara Suites Da Nang by AHG

RoomType: Suite Serenity 2 Phòng Ngủ (Giường Cỡ King và 2 Giường Đơn)

고층은 좋으나 31층은 꼭 피하시길..

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Everything was Perfect ! 👌👌

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Zwembad op het dak
Negative_Review: De communicatie met de eigenaar van het appartement. Het was ons tot 5 minuten voor aankomst niet bekend dat we een privé appartement hadden gehuurd. Daarna bleek dat we niet de handdoeken van het hotel mochten gebruiken, ons moesten registreren voor het zwembad. En dat we fietsen huurden van het hotel en moesten betalen aan het hotel.......
Review_Title: Mooi appartement in een mooi hotel

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Tout juste extraordinaire
Review_Title: Nous avons passé un très bon séjour, Nhan la propriétaire des lieux est vraiment gentille

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review: Все было классно. Чисто и уютно. Все в мраморе и золоте. Бассейн на крыше очень красивый. За такую цену очень классно, но отель не в центре и не около пляжа.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển

Negative_Review: 周りに店があまりない

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Biển
Positive_Review:
Tres bonne emplacement.
Une tres belle decoration.
Le gros plus : la piscine en rooftop au 29ieme étages où on peut admirer le couché du soleil et la ville de jour et de nuit.
Il y a aussi un restaurant / bar au rooftop qui est pas cher avec toujours cette très belle vue.

Très très bon rapport qualité prix !

Merci à Madame Nhan pour son accueil et sa disponibilité par WhatsApp pour tout renseignement.

Positive_Review: It's a nice hotel in a good location. There's also a really great cafe called indigo that's 2-3 minutes walk away from the hotel.
Negative_Review: Novotel is a "tourist" hotel, meaning those huge tourist groups you see in tour buses stay here. It makes breakfast a chaotic experience, because there's just SO many people. It's not such a big deal, but sometimes, you just want the peace and quiet hahahaha! I also don't really like how their tour offers are not so comprehensive. It's not bad, but I can't help and compare it to the previous hotel we stayed at in Hanoi. Here, they only offer car services without city/tour guides. That's fine, but sometimes, it's just more convenient if you have a guide as part of the car package.

Positive_Review: Breakfast was buffet and always well presented with local choices as well as most international standards. View over the river was nice.
Negative_Review: Getting to the dining area was not easy. Either go to the ground floor and then up another elevator to the dining area on level 4. Or take the evelvator to level 5 and walk down a spiral staircase to level 4. This staircase is a major hazard for visually impaired (like me with monocular vision) because of its material construction and lack of edge markings. However, this is a minor complaint and one that is not relevant to normal sited persons and a common problem if you visit Vietnam. Not a complaint. Just a fact.

RoomType: Suite Ở Góc Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Sông Hàn - Quyền Sử Dụng Executive Lounge
Positive_Review: To me Danang has Two Main Areas. The beachfront and The River View. Novotel Location is ideal For the Danang River view experience. The customer Service by all the Staff was Exceptional. The Room was Spacious and the Balcony offered a view of the city the river and the ocean. A true panoramic View We enjoyed during our Stay. The bed was Very comfortable and clean. The bathroom was very clean and Spacious. The breakfast buffet was very good. Large selection for all tastes. The gym was very good. The Pool was large clean and beautiful with a great view. During our Stay we went to Ba Na Hills. If one of your main Activities in Da nang is to go to Ba Na hills than i highly recommend you Stay at novotel as they are able to offer purchase your tickets for the Sun world Park and also offer special Deals that you cannot get anywhere else. my Booking included the lounge access and Giang from the executive lounge Staff went above and beyond my expectations when it came to our complete experience at Novotel. Giang helped book our entire day At Sunworld and made sure that we were able to enjoy the perfect Trip to Sunworld.
Review_Title: Comfortable and Relaxing. Perfect for Families , couples and Business Trips as well.

RoomType: Suite Ở Góc Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Sông Hàn - Quyền Sử Dụng Executive Lounge
Positive_Review: We had booked a corner suite which was really spacious and comfortable. We were looking forward to staying in that room, but the noise from a discotheque next door was so deafening (bass) that we had to move room. The staff was very helpful and understanding and I kind of felt sorry for them. Breakfast on the club floor was very pleasant, nice staff there, too. The hotel also helped us to organize a trip to Hoi An. It is really a nice hotel and a great location along the river, if it wasn't for the discotheque.
Negative_Review: The noise of the discotheque next door is beyond any acceptable level. The bass noise is deafening and it is really impossible to sleep. We had moved from the corner suite to a much smaller room on the other side, but the noise was only slightly less. Apparently, the manager had contacted the police one evening - they came by and found the noise level acceptable.... I cannot understand how the city allows a business in the central hotel district to be so noisy without anybody stopping it. I think Novotel will need to have a serious word with the city counsel about this or they will lose customers.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Ở Góc Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: The view from our room
Negative_Review: The staff were really helpful and we had the most phenomenal views from the corner suite. We booked this hotel as a one off for my birthday and the room and facilities did not disappoint. The swimming pool and view is beautiful and they have a restaurant on the same floor. For lunch we had some great food and the price is as expected a little more than you would normally pay in Vietnam. For our evening meal the menu was the same however they do advertise a sea food BBQ and Al a carte Menu but this was not given to us as an option and the bottle of wine we chose was not available. We were the only ones who dined during this time and the restaurant was completely empty. There is a lift to the sky bar from the hotel, this is not the same company as the hotel, but they do promote it, so we chose to have a drink there for the experience. The cocktails were triple the price (350,000 dong +) and they were handing out wet towels as you sat there and then charged you for them on the bill. This ruined our hotel experience. Overall it was a nice and different experience but I think I will stick to the cheaper hotels in future.

Positive_Review: Firstly they the photos in booking.com were misleading but the reception manager made amendments and gave me a more appropriate room. Thank you.
Negative_Review: The worst is the room service. Oh come on 5 star hotel takes 45 mins to bring 2 glasses of red wine... that is totally unacceptable. My advise... improve your room service delivery timing.. simply disappointing. And they lie alot. After 20 mins i called they said the order should reach me in 5 mins. Then after 30 mins they said on the way. After 45 mins they said 2 mins... that's really but service. Novatel being 5 star means your service quality as to be top notch. But this really disappointing. Might as well just go out and buy not do room service.

Ending up we did not have any breakfast during our 3 days stay with the hotel because we are so exhausted with all activities during the day to get up in time in the morning for breakfast!
Review_Title: Could be better if they have smarter management.

Negative_Review: Ich hatte den Abholung vom Flughafen gebucht. Eine sehr adrette Person junger Mann in einer Hoteluniform hat einem empfangen. Beim verlassen des Flughafens meinte er wir könnten bei der Bank des Hotels noch zum besten Tarif Geldwechseln. Da wir so oder so wechseln mussten, machten wir dies. Als wir auf einem Ausflug, nochmal was wechseln musste, kam die Überraschung 20 Prozent mehr, als der vom Hotel empfohlenen Bank. Aufgrund dieses Vorfalls hätte ich eigentlich 1 Stern geben müssen.

RoomType: Căn Hộ 2 Phòng Ngủ Có Bếp Và Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: мы отдыхали на ТЕТ в Дананге ! отдых был замечательным начиная с отеля ! NOVOTEL как всегда на высоте ! Мы прилетели вечером , нам в подарок дали ваучеры на бесплатные коктейли в Skybare, было очень приятно и неожиданно, снимали апартаменты с двумя спальными ! шикарный номер с потрясающим видом с балкона ! Красивая река с мостом дракона и поворотным мостом ( об этом мы узнали только благодаря этому виду с балкона, когда сидели вечером на балконе и наслаждались красотой Данага! У нас был 7 этаж. После этого на одну ночь мы уезжали в Банахилз, а потом опять вернулись в Novotel. Вещи мы оставили в камере хранения отеля . Мы попросили по возможности дать нам этаж повыше , уж больно хотелось наблюдать за красотой с верхнего этажа , обслуживающий персонал отеля был очень дружелюбным , особенно на рецепшен, молодой человек пообещал нам дать номер повыше . Конда мы вернулись , был тот же нам знакомый , приветливый парень ! Он сказал я дам вам самый шикарный номер нашего отеля , пентхаус на 31 этаже !!! Так начался Новый год по лунному календарю ! это был первый его день ! Такой подарок мы не ожидали ! Он сделал апгрейд нашего номера на бомбический номер , который занимал половину 31 этажа !! Просто нет слов ! Номер потрясающий , шикарный , незабываемый, думаю так живут только короли !!! Круглая ванная с видом на реку , всю красоту Дананга можно наблюдать релаксируя в ванной с пеной и бокалом вина после активного дня. Я обязательно еще раз вернусь в этот город , в ваш отель ! это любовь !
Negative_Review: таких вещей нет !

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Ở Góc Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Sông Hàn
Positive_Review:
한시장, 콩카페, 스타벅스 등 주요 장소와 접근성이 매우 좋아요. 그리고 코너룸에서 내려다 보는 한강의 야경은 완벽합니다.
스카이36 루프탑 클럽도 매우 신나고 좋습니다. 스카이36은 밤 9시 이후에 본격적으로 분위기가 고조됩니다 ^^ 조식은 진짜 꼭 드셔야합니다. 조식은 호텔의 정점을 찍어줍니다.
일반룸보다는 코너에 큰 유리창이 있는 코너룸이 이 호텔의 매력을 가장 잘 느낄수 있는 객실인거 같아요! 객실에 두고나온 분실물도 찾아주시고 너무 감사했어요.
Negative_Review: 없어요 없는게 하나는 꼽자면 주변에 마트가 없다는 것? 그러니 필요한 것은 추가요청하시거나 마트에서 미리 준비하세요.

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review:
호텔 위치며 객실이며 다좋아요
조식 또한 맛있었습니다.
Negative_Review:
코너스위트룸인가 예약했엇는데
에어컨이 안되어서 룸서비스 불러서 해결해달라했으나
해결못하여 다른방으로 바꿔줬습니다.
방은 나쁘지않았으나 코너스위트룸이 아닌 다른방을 줘서 아쉬웠네요

RoomType: Căn Hộ 2 Phòng Ngủ Có Bếp Và Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review:
2배드룸 아파트에 묶었는데 진짜 넓고 좋았어요. 전망도 너무 좋구요.
세탁기가 있어서 수영하고 수영복 세탁하기 좋았어요. 식기도구도 있어서 과일 잘라 먹기도 수월했구요.
걸어서 한시장까지 10분이면 걸어가니 아주 좋았어요. 뭐 그랩을 타도 1500원 정도 밖에 안나오구요.
직원분들 친절하시고 호텔에 대한 자부심이 있는 것 같아요. 인사해주시고 친절하게 응대해주세요.
Negative_Review:
식기도구는 있는데, 세제랑 수세미가 없어서 설거지를 할 수 없었어요.
비치해주시면 좋을 것 같아요.

또한 시내에 위치하고 있어 접근성이 좋았습니다
Negative_Review: 없습니다

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Ở Góc Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: 수영장도 좋고 일단 위치 최고! 밤산책하기 너무 좋았고 직원들 전부 엄청친절했음! 뷰 너어어어어무좋음
Negative_Review: 27층 2면 오션뷰였는데 잠들기전까지 라운지바 음악아주약하게 들림

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: 뷰 최고 주말 저녁 9시 용다리 불쇼를 숙소에서 누워서 봄. 수영장 작지만 충분함
Negative_Review: 스카이바 노래가 좀 촌스러워짐

RoomType: Căn Hộ Studio Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: Tout était parfait, le personnel d’une gentillesse incroyable, un merci tout particulier à Thang!

RoomType: Căn Hộ 2 Phòng Ngủ Có Bếp Và Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: 가성비는 짱입니다. 인근 맛집도 많아 위치도 좋으나 호이안가거나 해안 여행하실려면 불편합니다

RoomType: Căn Hộ Studio Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: チェックアウト当日夜便でしたが、プールやジムを夜まで使わせてくれてすごく親切だった
Negative_Review: 洗濯機有りの部屋だったが、洗剤が無かった

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: 場所は飲食店も近くて全く問題ない。
Negative_Review:
プールの水が濁っていたり、スタッフおらず、チェアを自分で用意しないといけなかったり、、
客が少ないから仕方ないが。
Review_Title: 4つ星以上5つ星未満という感じ

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Ở Góc Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: 窓からの景色。コロナ禍で朝食は固定されたメニューが多い中、ブッフェは有り難かった。
Negative_Review: 防音が今ひとつ

RoomType: Căn hộ 1 Phòng ngủ có Nhà bếp
Positive_Review:
아침식사 부페는 훌류했으며, 매우 다양한 음식이 있었습니다. 
또한, 전체적인 시설이 좋았습니다.
Negative_Review: 관광객이 많아서 체크인 등이 원활하지 않았습니다.

RoomType: Suite Ở Góc Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Sông Hàn - Quyền Sử Dụng Executive Lounge
Positive_Review:
별로 예요
코너스위트룸 2박인데
친절하지도 않고
이불도 덜 보송하지도 않고
특히 서비스 정신이 없는듯
Negative_Review:
엘레베이터 탔을때 가방 잔뜩 싫고 호텔 직원이 타서는 우리보고 문 열어 달라하고
우리는 낑겨서 겨우 우리방으로 들어감

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: El desayuno
Negative_Review: La habitación es pequeña y básica y huele muy fuerte a un ambientador de limón que le ponen

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường đơn có Ban công và Tầm nhìn
Positive_Review: 早餐ok

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Negative_Review: 카운터에 어린 여직원이 고객을 응대하는 태도가 몹시 불친절했고 짜증섞인 말투가 불쾌했다.

RoomType: Căn Hộ 2 Phòng Ngủ Có Bếp Và Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: 아침식사가 좋았습니다.
Negative_Review: 가족 여행인데 하나는 아파트먼트, 하나는 호텔로 떨어져 있어서 불편했습니다. 3베드룸 아파트먼트로 대체가 되었다면 더 좋았을거 같습니다.

RoomType: Suite Ở Góc Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Sông Hàn - Quyền Sử Dụng Executive Lounge
Positive_Review: 코너 스위트룸 뷰가 정말 좋았음
Negative_Review:
수영장이 성인 기준으로도 깊은 편이며, 수영장 야간 조명이 적음
객실 내에 전원 코드가 너무 적음
객실 전등이 비교적 어두움,
조식에 쌀국수가 없는 날이 있고, 그릇을 잘 안치워줌

RoomType: Căn Hộ 1 Phòng Ngủ Có Bếp Và Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: 시내와가깝고 좋았어요
Negative_Review: 수영장물이 더럽다.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường đơn có Ban công và Tầm nhìn
Positive_Review: 조식과 공항이 가깝다는 점이 좋아씀
Negative_Review: 프론트 직원들 서비스응대는 불친절하여 다소 아쉬움
Review_Title: 가성비와 공항과 가까운 곳을 찾는다면 가셔라

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường đơn có Ban công và Tầm nhìn
Positive_Review: 친절한 서비스

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường đơn có Ban công và Tầm nhìn
Positive_Review: 컨시어져에 잉하시는 분들의 대우가 너무 감사했습니다.^^ 한강뷰가 보이는 룸이 너무 좋았어요~~ 프론트와 커시어져 직원덕분에 기분이 좋았어요~
Negative_Review: 4층 직원들은 정말 사람을 치고다니고....아침 조식시간에 치고다니면 어쩌려는건가요??? 그리고 뭔가 굉장히 종류가많은듯하나 별로...

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 Giường đơn có Ban công và Tầm nhìn
Positive_Review: 조식이나 친절함 청결도 모두 좋았어요
Negative_Review: 위치가 조금 애매합니다.

RoomType: Căn Hộ Studio Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Negative_Review: חדרי סטודיו מיושנים ולא מאובזרים

RoomType: Căn Hộ 2 Phòng Ngủ Có Bếp Và Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: 시내 가까워서 교통이 편합니다
Negative_Review:
북향은 9pm부터 12pm까지
어디선가 노래소음이 잠을 방해할 정도 크게 들리네요

아파트먼트 투숙했는데
4층 식당으로 엘리베이터가 바로 가지 않아 이동이 불편합니다

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Negative_Review: Das Zimmer war eher klein, wurde aber durch den Balkon mit Liegestühlen wieder aufgewertet.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: 식사가 다양하고 맛있었음
Negative_Review:
태풍 지난후에도 수영장을 열지 않았고
태풍 때문에 당연하다는 태도는 호텔비에 수영장 사용료도
포함된 것을 감안하면 적절한 태도는 아니라 생각됨

RoomType: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: 조식과 수영장이 좋아요
Negative_Review: 물이 하루에 두병만 무료입니다

RoomType: Phòng Executive Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn - Quyền Sử Dụng Executive Lounge
Positive_Review: 객실 깨끗하고피트니스센터에 운동기구가 많아서 좋고 용다리가 잘 보여 도시 야경 보기 좋습니다
Negative_Review:
1. 직원 및 시스템
우선 객실 배정을 잘못했습니다. 발코니 있는 킹사이즈베드 룸 대신 트윈을 주고 바꿔달라 하느라 한시간 날렸네요.
뭐든 물어보거나 룸서비스 요청하면 웨이팅 시간이 너무 길어요

2. 이그제큐티브 실망스러웠습니다
이그제큐티브 옵션을 선택한만큼 라운지 이용에 기대가 많았는데 코로나 이후 중단하고 레노베이션 준비중이라는 말을 미리 호텔 측에서 알려주지 않았습니다. 

더 어이 없는건,가니까 조식도, 에프터눈티, 이브닝 칵테일 모두 그냥 일반 객실 손님들과 같이 4층에서 먹었네요. 추가지불이 그렇게 적은 것도 아닌데 누릴 수 있는건 너무 없고, 그에 대한 보상 따로 없습니다. 

서비스는 또 어떻게 불친절하고 음식 서빙도 느렸는지, 절대 이그제큐티브 비추입니다! 가성비최악. (직원들 자체가 이그제큐티브 룸의 개념을 모르는듯. 교육 제대로 시켜야할듯) 

객실 청결도랑 도심위치인것 빼면 굳이 여기 묵어야하네요. 스카이36 재밌다고 해서 접근성 좋으려고 여기했는데 클럽은 정말 재미없습니다. 굳이 여기 묵지 마시고 더 가성비 좋은 호텔 가시길
Review_Title: 5성급 호텔이라기엔 너무 실망스러운 서비스 (이그제큐티브 라운지 운영 안합니다)

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Positive_Review: 아침 식사는 가격대비 우수 했습니다.
Negative_Review: 전반적으로 만족합니다.

RoomType: Căn Hộ 2 Phòng Ngủ Có Bếp Và Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: ロケーションが良い。市内観光には大変便利だとおもいます。
Negative_Review: サービスアパートメント兼の為、共有部分が殺風景でホテルらしくなかった。

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Ở Góc Có Giường Cỡ King Kèm Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: 직원들도 너무 친절하고 시설도 좋았어요!

RoomType: Căn Hộ 2 Phòng Ngủ Có Bếp Và Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: Vietimme perheen kanssa hotellissa kaksi yötä ja ei olisi voitu valita paremmin. Saavuimme hotelliin myöhään illalla ja melkein kaikki ravintolat olivat jo kiinni tai menossa kiinni. Hotelli järjesti yhden ravintolan odottamaan meitä ja pitämään ravintolaa auki ja ruoka oli kerrassaan loistavaa. Aamiainen oli mahtava ja vielä rauhallinen hotellin koosta riippumatta. Hotellissa henkilökunta sai meidät tuntemaan itsemme hyvin tervetulleiksi ja meidät otettiin joka kohtaamisessa lämmöllä vastaan. Kiitos koko henkilökunnalle ja erityisesti vastaanoton Selinalle!

RoomType: Căn Hộ 2 Phòng Ngủ Có Bếp Và Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Sông Hàn
Positive_Review: ファミリーにぴつたりでコスパ良し
Negative_Review: 洗濯機の使い方がわからなかった

DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review:
Thực sự mình rất ít khi review. Nhưng Saha Casa là nơi rất đáng lựa chọn để nghỉ ngơi. Không thể không viết đôi lời bày tỏ sự hài lòng, thích thú và cảm kích
1. Khách sạn có thiết kế kiến trúc rất đẹp, hay ho. Yên tĩnh và nhiều cây xanh.
2. Phòng ốc rất sạch sẽ.
3. Đặc biệt mỗi phòng đều được setup 2 ly rượu thảo mộc trong phòng
4. Các bạn nhân viên rất dễ thương và cực nhiệt tình.
5. Bữa sáng khá đặc biệt và thú vị. Tôi được trải nghiệm thực phẩm buổi sáng ở đây rất khác so với những nơi tôi từng ăn và nó rất phù hợp với chủ đề "Căn nhà sức khoẻ"
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review: Cảnh quan tại khách sạn này đẹp mắt và tạo cảm giác yên bình. Tôi thích ngồi dạo quanh khu vườn và uống trà thảo mộc thư giãn sau một ngày dài. Ngoài ra, nhân viên tại Saha Casa rất chuyên nghiệp và chu đáo, các bạn đã đón tiếp chúng tôi rất nhiệt tình. Và phòng chúng tôi ở đầy đủ tiện nghi, sạch sẽ và thoải mái.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Negative_Review: Tôi đề nghị trả 50% giá phòng để ở đến 18h vì tôi có chuyến bay trễ lúc 21h. Tuy nhiên khách sạn không có chính sách này nên tôi đã out sớm hơn. Điều này gây bất tiện ảnh hưởng đến trải nghiệm và tôi sẽ không quay lại.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: GRAND SUITE GARDEN BALCONY BATHTUB
Positive_Review: Phòng và kiến trúc đẹp
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review:
Breakfast variety was awesome and tasty. Love their herbal tea. Artsy design, very beautiful and full of nature. Bicycles provided though we didn't use. 
Special shout out to Thien Nanh and Vanh for great service throughout our stay! Also the lady at the front desk who helped find a clinic when I was sick.
Herbal wine was provided in the room which is rather unique
Negative_Review:

The hotel was close to the beach, and it was very convenient to walk there. 

Our late arrival due to a delayed flight was handled with exceptional care, and the hotel proactively arranged airport pick-up services, exceeding our expectations.

Positive_Review: Fabulous accomodation. Friendly staff, large spacious rooms, the hotel’s architecture is beautiful and very close to the beach. The rooftop pool is fabulous however it wasn’t very refreshing when we were there.

Negative_Review: Nil

Maybe a selection of breads too. However, you could choose your main breakfast each day and it was always freshly cooked.
Review_Title: Amazing value, really large room and very friendly staff.

RoomType: PREMIER GARDEN BALCONY
Positive_Review: "I stayed here for five days and truly felt at home. The service was amazing, and they made me feel so welcome. The hotel is conveniently located near many nice and fancy restaurants, as well as street food options. It's less than a 10-minute walk to the beach. The hotel's architecture is also very beautiful."
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel was my favourite stay in Vietnam. The staff is so lovely and helpful, the breakfast is very good and the location is fantastic. It’s a new hotel so the rooms and the facilities are immaculate. It’s a little green oasis in a beautiful city 😊
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: SUITE GARDEN BALCONY BATHTUB
Positive_Review:
The place is very new, in a quiet street which we liked
A bit of an enclave away from the high rises 
A few good restaurants nearby
Staff tried their very best to look after us but there was a lot of confusion due to a lack of English understood
Negative_Review:
The TV was a pain as all instructions are in Vietnamese
Staff helped me connect to Netflix and YouTube so we survived on that
The breakfast was unusual but included
You order the day before
I’d suggest the local dishes 
Decent coffee machine helped when driven properly
Breakfast is served in the back of the lobby which was a little steamy at times
Pool water was cloudy and inviting
Review_Title: Lovely suite, great aircon, I’m sure with time this will be a special place to stay once they get more organised and exp
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: GRAND SUITE GARDEN BALCONY BATHTUB
Positive_Review:
This may be the prettiest hotel I've ever stayed at; every single corner of our room looks amazing, we even took notes and inspiration for an upcoming house renovation lol.

The staff were all very friendly and helpful; their english is not the best but if you speak slowly they can hold a conversation. I love that you can borrow the umbrellas and bicycles for free, perfect to cycle down to the beach which is just down the road. The staff will also happily give you food recommendations and point out which spots are touristy and which are the local ones.

This may be unconventional, but my favourite thing about Saha Casa is actually the breakfast! You won't get a continental-style breakfast buffet (though I think they have sausages and eggs as one of the breakfast options) but a slim selection of porridge / chicken soup / noodles made with ginseng (a type of herb). I grew up in an oriental household and this reminded me of the time my grandmother stayed with us and made us breakfasts everyday. Extremely wholesome and nourishing! They would also happily bring your breakfast to your room for you if you request.

PS: Do yourself a favour and check out The Whale, which is a small cocktail bar just next door. I had one of the BEST cocktails I've ever had in my life there. Literally just next door, so you can let yourself get a little tipsy ;)
Negative_Review:
(This is NOT a reflection of shortcomings of the hotel, but merely some notes to the management for improvement)
- I wish there was a full length mirror in the room.
- We could have used some cutleries too.
- The blinds in the bathroom don't 'stick' closely to the glass window, meaning that people outside can look inside towards the shower and the tub, especially if the lights are on at night... It's such a shame because the bath was beautiful; we ended up buying some tape to tape it down temporarily. I recommend getting the windows treated with privacy tint.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE SAND BEACH
Positive_Review: The hotel is so clean and new. The rooms are spacious and beautiful throughout. We had an amazing stay and the staff made it even better. Everyone is so lovely and kind - helped us with everything.
Negative_Review: There are so many nice breakfast coffee shop places nearby that we didn't try the breakfast. So can't comment on it but looked alright.
Review_Title: Amazing stay at this new hotel near My Khe beach
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE SAND BEACH
Positive_Review: the hotel is extremely BEAUTIFUL, and located very near the beach. the rooms are spacious and comfortable and the pool is also built well, since it is of even depth throughout and so, safe for kids. the breakfast is pre-order so you get to choose what to get and all the options are very health-themed and portions are filling.
Negative_Review: the hotel is very short-staffed and there were only two people rushing to cater to everyone. the breakfast options were limited to 3 and the common options like omelettes, toast, fruit were missing. the bidets in the toilets were not usable.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: PREMIER GARDEN BALCONY

breakfast is simple, but there are so many nice restaurants around the neighborhood within walking distance.

beach is just 10 mins walk away, and it's a very beautiful beach with happy people.

i must express my big thanks to Thian, the front desk supervisor, she was kind and very helpful, makes my stay easy and comfortable, a memorable stay.

I also really like the herbal tea that they serve at the hotel. Loved my stay at Saha Casa and would definitely recommend it to all my friends planning to visit Da Nang.

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE

L'espace commun de l'hôtel est soigneusement décoré d'arbres verts et de bois, et le personnel est sympathique et enthousiaste. Je reviendrai à Saha Casa si j'ai l'opportunité de venir au Vietnam.

Positive_Review: サハ カーサの部屋を予約したとき、私はここの建築とプールに感銘を受けました。ここで最も印象に残ったのは、このホテルの座席エリアと廊下が非常に奇妙な曲線を描いていることです。上品な空間で、特別なゲストとして歓迎されているような気分になりました。また、この場所のスタッフとアメニティが非常に充実していることは賞賛に値します。さらに特別なことは、Saha Casa でとても特別な朝食体験をしたことです。すべての料理が健康に関連しています。この場所が本当に好きです。

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review: 호텔은 매우 아름답습니다. 영화 해리포터에 나오는 호그와트 학교를 닮았습니다. 직원은 친절하고 문제 제기에 대한 응대가 좋았습니다.
Negative_Review: 조식은 호불호가 있을것으로 예상.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE SAND BEACH
Positive_Review:
die Lage ist super. Mir gefällt das Hotel total, es ist einfach so schön.
Von außen sieht das Hotel wie ein Haus im Wald aus, aber wenn man drin ist, hat man ein Gefühl wie als ob man im Tal lebt. So so schön!

Das Personal ist außerordentlich freundlich und hilfsbereit.
Negative_Review:
Ein Minuspunkt: man muss die Speise für Frühstück vorbestellen. Ansonsten, bekommt man leider nur eine traditionelle Speise ( My Quang). Die Kommunikation war nicht klar, dass man für Frühstück vorstellen muss.
Das sollte geändert werden.

( Feedback von Thi Hien Vu - die im Zimmer 302 war ☺️)
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review:
Moderne Zimmer, gute Armaturen.
Schönes Design des Hotels.
Negative_Review:
Man konnte den ganzen Tag Karaoke hören im Zimmer. Ab morgens um 06:00 musik.
Es gibt keine Vegetarische frühstücksoption und weder Früchte noch andere Süssspeisen (ausser marmelade)
Wir hatten Kommunikationsschwierigkeiten, da ein Teil des Personals so gut wie kein englisch sprach.
Von unserem Zimmer aus hatten wir nur Aussicht auf das Nebengebäude.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: PREMIER GARDEN BALCONY
Positive_Review: 整個飯店設計的非常有美感，在房間待著十分舒適，早餐是套餐式，雞湯跟粥都有加入他們主打的藥材特色，十分推薦。
Review_Title: 這是間剛開幕的飯店，我在搜尋時就被它得照片吸引，獨特的造型，滿滿的植栽。位子雖稍微遠離市區，但是5-10分鐘都可以走到不錯的餐廳。早餐是我很喜歡的地方，雞湯跟粥很有特色。
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review: Very Good!
Review_Title: 직원들은 매우 귀엽고 열정적이며 재미 있습니다. 멋지고 바람이 잘 통하는 객실, 새롭고 현대적인 장비, 해변과 가깝습니다. 실내 조명은 매우 아름답고, 램프 위치와 조명 밝기도 매
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review: 여기서 가장 칭찬할만한 점은 내부와 외부가 매우 아름답고 아름답고 영원히 사진을 찍을 수 있으며 여전히 사진을 찍을 장소가 부족하지 않다는 것입니다. 호텔은 매우 통풍이 잘되고 고급스럽고 편안합니다. 특히 침대는 깨끗하고 편안합니다. 이 가격은 저에게 꽤 괜찮고, 직원들은 열정적이며, 경험할만한 가치가 있습니다.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review: L'arôme des herbes de la zone de culture est agréable, une boisson de bienvenue soignée et originale. L'hôtel est en plein centre-ville et à proximité des lieux de divertissement. Le personnel de Saha Casa nous a servi avec beaucoup d'attention et de politesse.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review: Einzigartige Architektur, die Wahl eines Zimmers mit Balkon, um die Sonne einzufangen, ist am besten, der Swimmingpool ist nachts mit bunten Fliesen ausgekleidet und sorgt für wunderschöne Fotos. Darüber hinaus ist das Frühstück hier auf die Gesundheitsfürsorge ausgerichtet und unterscheidet sich daher stark von dem Frühstück, das ich in anderen Hotels gegessen habe. Für mich ist alles bei Saha Casa großartig.
Negative_Review: Nope
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review: 방은 아름답고, 나와 내 연인은 멋진 발코니, 깨끗한 청소 서비스, 다양한 편의 시설을 갖춘 방을 선택했습니다. 호텔은 해변으로 가는 길에 바로 위치하고 있습니다. 오늘 아침 우리는 해변을 따라 일출을 감상할 기회를 가졌습니다. 저는 Saha Casa 호텔을 정말 좋아합니다. 다른 호텔에 비해 서비스가 특별합니다. 우리는 다시 여기로 돌아올 것입니다.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review: 녹지 공간, 아름답게 디자인된 객실, 깨끗한 화장실, 24/24 온수, 넓은 욕실, 매우 쾌적한 샤워수. 세심한 서비스 직원. 아침 식사는 제가 먹어본 다른 호텔보다 매우 맛있고 독특합니다. 해변과 가까운 위치에 있어 산책과 수영을 즐기기에 편리합니다. 실내 수영장은 깨끗하고 편안합니다.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review: De locatie van het hotel ligt midden in het stadscentrum en vlak bij de zee, waardoor het voor mijn gezin gemakkelijk is om zich te verplaatsen en beroemde plaatsen te bezoeken. Vooral het personeel hier is erg enthousiast in het begeleiden van mij bij het boeken van een auto. Wat ik hier het leukste vind is de unieke ervaring vergeleken met andere hotels, met name het welkomstwater en 2 glazen wijn op de kamer en allemaal gemaakt van kruiden die heel goed zijn voor de gezondheid. Het is vergelijkbaar met de naam Saha Casa.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: DELUXE OCEAN BLUE
Positive_Review: 호텔은 오픈한 지 얼마 되지 않아 매우 아름답고 현대적이며 발코니, 테이블과 의자, 많은 나무가 있습니다. 호텔은 매우 좋은 장비에 투자했고, 객실이 깨끗하고, 디자인이 매우 아름답습니다. 친구들과 저는 3일 연속 머물렀는데, 아무런 비판도 없었습니다.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang

RoomType: SUITE GARDEN BALCONY BATHTUB
Positive_Review: 방이 우드톤이라 좋음, 수압 좋음
Negative_Review:
수영장 물 너무 더러움. 뿌옇고 벌레도 떠다님. 
주간에 계속 공사 소리 들려서 쉬지를 못함.
그렇다고 공사한다는 공지도 없었음.
물이 너무 비쌈. 6-7병 마신거 같은데 30만동 가까이 나오는게 말이 되나ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ 
밤 11시 좀 넘으면 로비 사람도 없고, 호텔 불 다 꺼져서 일정하고 좀 늦게 복귀하면 개무서움.. 그랩 택시기사도 호텔 불 다 꺼져서 매번 지나침. 호텔이 불 꺼지는게 말이 안됨. 한국 모텔도 켜 놓는데ㅋㅋㅋ 새벽에 들어온 것도 아니고;; 
조식도 뷔페식 조식을 선호하는 편이라 음식 하나 딱 나오는게… 호텔이라고 하기엔 매우 부족함. 맛도 별로임. 4박 5일동안 하루 먹어보고 걍 안 먹음.(4일동안의 다른 호텔에서는 다 먹었는데 오죽했으면 안 먹었겠냐)
직원들 영어도 못해서 의사소통 거의 불가능. 조식 주는 직원한테 숟가락이랑 포크 하나 달라고 말했는데 못 알아들음.
딱히 사진 스팟도 없음.(주변 다 공사하고 있고, 건물은 골목길에 한국 모텔보다 작은 사이즈임)
참고로 55제곱미터 예약했는데 실평수는 그 정도 절대 안되는듯 생각보다 작음.

결론: 수영장 물 더러워서 20분 정도 잡고 사진만 찍는 느낌으로 있다가 수압 좋은 물로 씻고 나가세요. 물은 밖에서 사서 마시고 조식 맛 없으니까 군대 왔다고 생각하고 드세요. 일찍 나가서 일찍 들어오세요(밤에 들어오면 ㄹㅇ 개무섭고 하루는 깜깜한 구석에서 직원이 갑자기 튀어나와서 호러 체험까지 했네요)
우드톤 숙소랑 수압은 좋았어요. 그게 전부임.
HotelName: Saha Casa Boutique Hotel Da Nang
