RoomType: Phòng Grand Nhìn Ra Biển Có Giường Cỡ Queen Và Bồn Tắm - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
Room size was comfortable for two people even stay for several days. Big windows, panorama ocean view, east-facing, watch the sun rise at room, very nice. 

Room was new, neat and tidy. Sufficient lighting in room during night time. LED TV was good size among other hotels. I love their tile floors, no carpet at all.

All staff were in good manners, including the bell boys, front desk, house-keepers, restaurants staffs etc.

The Vietnam coffee provided in the buffet breakfast was nice, don’t miss it. Tried their free tea buffet once and it’s nice too. Tried their body massage, professional. 

The pool was not big but the view was very good. 

A convenient store located 5 mins walk at the RHS of the hotel. The beautiful beach just crosses the road.
Negative_Review:
Working desk was too small, as the room has lot of space left. 

The fridge was a joke. After we told the house-keeping that our fridge was not cool enough, they sent a technical man very quickly for investigation. The technical man used a thermometer to test the temperature of the fridge. Then told us the temperature was normal, no problem. We said no, our beverage and fruits put inside were totally not cold enough. He said because it was not a “fridge”, it’s a “cooler”. He just tested it’s temperature was between 10-15C, so it’s in normal operation. As he was in good manner; we didn’t want to blame him. Just could not imagine the days we stayed there was around 33-34C in the day time, but the hotel is not providing a fridge but just a “cooler”.
Review_Title: Good ocean view, new and tidy room

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
Great interior Design, great facilities, staff was very friendly. Checking in earlier or even checking out later (with a little extra fee if you stay after 12:30) is possible if the capacity allows it. Which was great as our flight out of town was due in the evening. 
The beach is just across the street. The views from the hotel pool towards the sea are stunning. They have a nice gym room in the top floor with nice views towards the ocean and peninsula. 
The breakfast is amongst the most diverse I have come across in Vietnam. 
Definitely recommend staying here!

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
The Hotel was nicely located next to the beach with excellent views overlooking the whole of the Danang beach. The hotel gave me a free upgrade and the room view was amazing! The hotel staff were all so friendly and helpful. A special thankyou to Hanh and Ngoc who worked in the Spa who were especially helpful. I also had a massage at the spa, thank you Ms Yee who did a great Job. The staff at the restraunt were always happy to help and were very welcoming at all times. The room was very clean and fresh and the furnishings were to a very high standard. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and always looked forward coming back to the hotel to relax! 
I would highly recommend this Hotel! I would definitely be going back again!

Positive_Review:
The hotel's location was truly fantastic, situated right on the beach and offering easy access to the sparkling waters and golden sands. I was blown away by the stunning ocean view that greeted me as I stepped into my room. Seeing the sunrise each morning was magical.
The service at this hotel was exceptional, with the staff going above and beyond to ensure that my every need was met. From the friendly check-in process to the attentive housekeeping staff, everyone I encountered was dedicated to providing the highest level of service.
The rooms themselves were well appointed and comfortable. The bed was incredibly plush and luxurious, providing the perfect night's sleep after a long active day. The view from my room was truly breathtaking, with sweeping vistas of the ocean that were simply unforgettable.
I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone. With its fantastic location, excellent service, well appointed rooms, and stunning views, it truly is a gem in Danang.
Review_Title: Sunrise at the beach was magical.

Positive_Review:
beachfront. impressive as soon as we arrive staff came to assist with luggage from the bus . welcome drink and wet washcloth to refresh. 

rooms are very clean and spacious we stayed at a junior suite ocean view. can hear the waves if windows are open and so relaxing to watch the waves 

bathroom is very clean and toilet has bidet and rain shower and has everything you need

dining room has ocean view and city view good variety of Asian and continental food, Vietnamese coffee . really worth it for the price we paid.
 infinity pool was nice overlooking the ocean. it was windy at the time we were about to swim so just took picture
sky bar was awesome
location was near alot of seafood restaurant very affordable prices and very clean. the hotel has a restaurant right next to it. very convenient
shopping at Hahn market was only about 2 miles away. (taxi at $3-4)
staff was awesome . very attentive to our needs. very honest and hardworking people.

we will definitely recommend this place to friends and families and we would like to come back with our family.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: This is a newly opened hotel and overall was really good. All the staff were friendly and helpful, the rooftop pool and bar are excellent and the gym is decent. My wife said the spa was good and I can confirm it was great value. The location is excellent - right on the beach and is a 5 minute grab from the centre of town.
Negative_Review:
I'd say there are a few minor teething problems but nothing major:

1) Every single door to every room seemed to have a problem closing, which meant alarms were going off on floors constantly. It wasn't too loud so not that disturbing but still annoying
2) Very limited selection of tea & coffee in the room. When asked for simple black/breakfast tea, I was told 3 times that it would come in "5 minutes" and then nothing... they were serving it at breakfast so I'm not entirely sure what the problem was
3) Breakfast was good (eggs made to order, fruit, tea/coffee) but could be that little bit better. Bread and pastry choice was poor, bacon and sausages weren't great

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: 員工服務殷勤，對於一般的查詢，安排車輛去其他地方，都能幫忙。房間乾淨整齊，住得舒適。早餐的餐廳在最高層，景觀開闊，可一邊享受美食，一邊欣賞風景，食物種類也足夠多。

RoomType: Phòng Grand Nhìn Ra Biển Có Giường Cỡ Queen Và Bồn Tắm - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
Tivemos uma exelente estadia no Península Danang. O hotel era impecável, desde ao staff que era extremamente agradável e eficiente até as amenidades do hotel que eram excelentes. A piscina de borda infinita é um passeio em sí só, ficamos o dia do aniversário do meu marido apenas na piscina e na praia (na frente) e foi super agradável. Tem roupão e chinelos disponíveis sempre. Além disso, o café da manhã é excelente, um buffet super completo, tendo tanto opções ocidentais quanto locais vietnamitas (tinha uma estação de Pho, além de diversas outras comidas) e o serviço da equipe do salão durante o café também é extremamente eficiente - sempre perguntando se desejamos algo mais ou retirando pratos sujos a cada 2 minutos. 

Um ponto super legal desse hotel é o Aftenoon Tea que eles oferecem diariamente. Tem várias comidinhas deliciosas, doces e até pizza. E além disso, na nossa reserva tínhamos também direito a 30 minutos de sauna todo dia, o que foi super legal.

Além disso, eles prestam muita atenção aos detalhes: um carinho do staff no dia do aniversário do meu marido. Eu havia avisado na reserva que estávamos comemorando aniversário e quando chegamos no quarto, à noite, eles tinham deixado um bolinho com macarons e um cartão de parabéns muito fofo escrito pela Ms. Hanh Nguyen, a diretora de sales and marketing. ❤️

Voltarei com certeza ao Península Danang.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
Breathtaking Coastal View: The scenic coastal view from the room is truly magnificent, providing a serene and visually appealing experience.

Competent Housekeeping Service: The overall housekeeping service is praiseworthy, contributing to a welcoming and comfortable ambiance throughout the stay.
Negative_Review:
Communication Gap: There was a communication lapse between the daytime and evening staff. Despite confirming our check-in details in the midday, the information wasn't accurately conveyed to the evening shift, resulting in an oversight.

Key Card Configuration Issue: Due to the aforementioned communication problem, the key cards for all three rooms were not properly configured. This led to an inconvenience of having to make an additional trip downstairs upon reaching our floor.
Review_Title: 雖然飯店地理位置絕佳，房間擁有令人驚艷的海岸美景，整體整理服務也令人滿意，然而，溝通不足導致入住過程中出現了一些小困擾，希望未來能提升協調性。

En especial agradecer la maravillosa atención de Ann nuestra guest manager. Muchas gracias por todo!!

RoomType: Phòng Executive 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
宿泊前のレビューに、ペニンシュラとは関係ない旨、記載されていたため、不安に感じることがありましたが、
部屋の眺望、食事、屋上バー、アフタヌーンティサービス、スタッフの対応、どれも最高です。
特にホテル前のビーチに渡るとき、ホテルマンの方が誘導棒を持って横についてくれたので、安心して横断できました。
ロビーに入った瞬間、心地よい香りがして、きめ細かなサービスが出来ているホテルだと思います。
Negative_Review: チェックアウト手続き時、確認するのでお待ち下さいと言われ、しばらく待っていましたが、後から来た人が次々に完了していたので、問い合わせたところ、すでに済んでいたことがありました。

 한국인이 운영하는 스파도 도보 10분 이내

Positive_Review:

На завтрак не было кофемашины в зале, обычный кофе и чай в чайниках. Номер убирали только после запроса. Долго оформляли заезд. Отель не дотягивает до уровня 5*.

Positive_Review: スタッフも親切で、お部屋も清潔でお食事、サービスも良かったです。
Negative_Review: シャワーの水がトイレの方まで流れてくるので床が濡れてしまう所

RoomType: Phòng Grand Nhìn Ra Biển Có Giường Cỡ Queen Và Bồn Tắm - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: Petit déjeuner correct et varié.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: He estado en 8 hoteles en Vietnam, pero este es el mejor de todos. Unico. Confortable. La mejor relacion precio-calidad, pero lo mas importante: nunca he visto gente tan amable, amistosa y colaboradora como en este hotel. Te hacen sentir como en casa. 100% recomendado. De seguro que volvere. Felicitaciones al gerente, la administracion y a todo el personal. Son lo mejor!!
Negative_Review: Absolutamente todo fue excelente!!!
Review_Title: Unico, el mejor, inigualable. Si desea calidad, confort, calidad en los servicios, este es su hotel

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: Вид шикарный

RoomType: Phòng Grand Nhìn Ra Biển Có Giường Cỡ Queen Và Bồn Tắm - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: Det var ett modernt och fräscht hotell, det doftande ljuvligt i lobbyn och det var fantastiskt att kolla ut mot havet från rummet.
Negative_Review: lite kaos vid frukosten.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: Gostamos muito da limpeza, do atendimento, do café da manhã, enfim gostamos de tudo! O quarto é um pouco menor do que os demais que já ficamos (já sabiamos) mas é bem funcional. Destaque especial ao atendimento e à limpeza. Isto parece ser uma norma no Viet Nam.
Negative_Review: Gostamos de tudo.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
Très bel hotel.
Le personnel est très professionnel.

RoomType: Phòng Grand Nhìn Ra Biển Có Giường Cỡ Queen Và Bồn Tắm - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: موقع جميل فندق جديد طاقم العمل رائع سعر جيد

RoomType: Phòng Grand Nhìn Ra Biển Có Giường Cỡ Queen Và Bồn Tắm - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: Sehr freundliches und zuvorkommendes Personal. Toll ausgestattet. Sehr schöner Infinity Pool. Sehr gute Massage zu einem fairen Preis.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: Lage direkt am Meer & tolle Rooftop Bar
Negative_Review: Personal spricht leider nur gebrochen Englisch & es war etwas schwierig sich zu verständigen.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: Schönes Hotel am Strand in Da Nang. Wir hatten ein tolles Zimmer in den oberen Etagen mit super Aussicht, Frühstück war ok und Pool und Gym sind super.
Negative_Review: Check-out war etwas sehr mühsam, da man warten muss, bis sie das Zimmer inspiziert haben. Macht keine Spass, wenn das Taxi wartet.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: всё отлично! новый отель, хороший сервис, вкусные завтраки
Negative_Review: нет

RoomType: Phòng Grand Nhìn Ra Biển Có Giường Cỡ Queen Và Bồn Tắm - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
目の前が海で綺麗な景色を楽しめた。早い時間でもチェックインの対応をしてもらえたし、ウェルカムドリンクももらえた。
アフターヌーンティのインビテーションもあった。
Negative_Review:
フロントが狭い。外が夜の22時過ぎまでうるさい音楽がしていた。多分最上階のバーの音楽であった。
隣の部屋の窓の開け閉めの音が響いてきた。
朝食は普通。

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
Schöne Zimmer mit super Ausblick.
Personal war wirklich super freundlich und hilfsbereit. Auswahl des Frühstücksbuffet war sehr gut. + Barista Cappuccino der gut zubereitet war (Nicht selbstverständlich in Vietnam)!
Negative_Review:
- Wenig Liegen am Pool (Wir hatten kein Problem, da wenig los war)
- Safe müsste noch befestig werden
- Fitnessstudio winzig
Review_Title: Schönes Hotel mit guten Standard. 5 Sterne? Fraglich

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: きれいだった
Negative_Review: 特になし

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: Die Ausstattung war sehr neu, die Einrichtung geschmackvoll. Sehr hilfsbereites Personal; man bemühte sich sehr, uns bei Problemen zu helfen, trotz sprachlicher Probleme (richtig gut auf Englisch konnte man mit Mrs Tram sprechen). Im 27. Stock ist ein überragend schöner Pool und man bekommt einen kostenlosen Afternoon-Tea mit Leckereien gereicht
Negative_Review: alles perfekt

RoomType: Phòng Grand Nhìn Ra Biển Có Giường Cỡ Queen Và Bồn Tắm - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
人員接待態度親切，整潔沒問題,
面對沙灘好美的景觀。
Negative_Review:
床板很爛及床很怪，不平整！睡起來非常不舒適，還會有異音。
廁所衛生紙位置不理想，不便抽取！房間隔音不好。
Review_Title: 床板很爛及床很怪，不平整！睡起來非常不舒適，還會有異音。 廁所衛生紙位置不理想，不便抽取！房間隔音不好。

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
Keine federkopfkissen nur Plastik
Darum kein weitere besuch
Negative_Review: S o

RoomType: Phòng Executive 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: Gute Lage , freundliche Mitarbeiter,
Negative_Review:
Badezimmer beim Duschen „unter Wasser“
Eine Teesorte einfach viel zu wenig für ein 5 Sterne
Hotel, Spa Bereich sehr reduziert

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
Le petit déjeuner, le thé de l’après midi ainsi que la vue sont appréciables. 
La grandeur de la chambre et le confort de la literie également.
Negative_Review: Le bruit dans les couloirs, le nombre de personnes dans les ascenseurs (une usine), le fait que par rapport à ce nombre de personnes la piscine soit bien de trop petite (6 transats pour 100 personnes ?)
Review_Title: Vous pouvez sûrement trouver mieux ailleurs

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
-Infinitypool ist genial. 
-Gratis motorradparkplätze. 
-Security, der uns geholfen, die Strasse zu überqueren. 
-Die Freundlichkeit des Personal.
Negative_Review:
-lift ist immer besetzt.
-um 07:30 waren extreme viele Leute am Frühstückbuffet. Wir haben dann angefangen, immer spät zu essen, da es leer war.
Review_Title: Hotel ist super, wenn man auf einige Sachen vermeidet.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: キレイ
Negative_Review: お風呂場の換気扇の音がうるさい

RoomType: Phòng Executive 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
新しいホテルなのでどこもきれいで気持ちよく過ごせました。
朝ごはんもベトナムらしいお料理が並び、お野菜も豊富に頂けます。
Negative_Review:
室内がおしゃれ優先で機能的にいまいち。
タオルをかける場所がなく、汗をふいたハンカチをさっと洗おうにも干す場所もなく、困りました。
スリッパやアメニティもないので、持参することをおすすめします。
海岸沿いのホテルの中でも北に位置するので、ホイアンなど南部に行く方には不便かもしれません。
市内にはホイアンへのフリーバスがあるホテルもありますが、こちらにはそうしたサービスもありません。
自力でGrabなど使える方でないと、不便かもしれません。

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Biển - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: 수영장이 깨끗하고 시야가 밝아질 정도로 풍경이 멋졌습니다. 조식은 종류도 적지 않았고 맛이 먹을만 했고, 특히 김치가 생각보다 맛있어서 놀랐습니다.
Negative_Review: 위치적인 단점을 상쇄하려면 자체 셔틀이 있어서 좋을 것 같습니다.

RoomType: Phòng Grand Nhìn Ra Biển Có Giường Cỡ Queen Và Bồn Tắm - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: la piscine à débordement est jolie en rooftop mais très petite aux vues du nombre de chambres dans l’hôtel
Negative_Review:
le service d’un hôtel 5 étoiles n’y est pas. le nom « peninsula » est trompeur comparativement au The Peninsula bien réputé. trop cher pour le service proposé dans un pays comme le Vietnam. 
peu de choix au petit déjeuner.

RoomType: Phòng Grand Nhìn Ra Biển Có Giường Cỡ Queen Và Bồn Tắm - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
staff très pro
emplacement et look de l’hôtel
Negative_Review:
clientèle bruyante et indisciplinée 
petit déjeuner ambiance usine
Review_Title: impeccable pour le site mais la fréquentation pas très agréable

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review:
Rooftop y la vista.
Muy buen desayuno
Negative_Review:
Lo duro de la cama.
El tamaño de la habitación.
La tv

RoomType: Phòng Grand Nhìn Ra Biển Có Giường Cỡ Queen Và Bồn Tắm - Bao Gồm Trà Chiều
Positive_Review: la piscina y las habitaciones, además la atención de Thuy y todo el personal del hotel encantadores

RoomType: Suite Ở Góc 2 Phòng Ngủ
Positive_Review: The reception staff is exceptional. They are friendly and helpful. Personalized letters were printed, and essential information was provided. The spa was also outstanding, although expensive. The BBQ buffet was also excellent!
Review_Title: A nice hotel with beautiful bay and city views. Very clean and comfortable rooms.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Golden Bay Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Vịnh
Positive_Review:
Excellent service.Staff were always smiling and made our stay pleasant.
We visited the spa and my wife was happy with the services provided by therapist Tina.She was kind and courteous.
The hand written note by management to welcome us in the room was a special touch including the extra discounts especially the free afternoon tea.
The room was clean and well maintained with a great view of the bay.
Overall an excellent stay at Wyndham Danand Golden Bay.
Keep it up.

RoomType: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King và Ban công
Positive_Review: The location is not an issue. All the services at this hotel are excellent. They provide free airport pickup and complimentary afternoon tea. I was truly amazed by the stunning view of the pool, and I thoroughly enjoyed dinner at the F29 restaurant with the best view in Da Nang. I will definitely come back in the near future
Review_Title: My stay at the hotel was exceptional, from the excellent services to the breathtaking views

Facilities were great. The hotel provided lots of benefits to guests, like credits to the spa, free usage of sauna, shuttle bus services to city and airport, afternoon tea set.
Love the rooftop infinity pool as well!
Negative_Review: Location was a little isolated. There was nothing else to do within walking distance.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Golden Bay Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Vịnh
Positive_Review: The view from room was amazing! Along with food, which was delicious and reasonable rate for a 5 star hotel and had sufficient quantity in a serving. The best though, is the rooftop pool.

RoomType: Suite Ở Góc 2 Phòng Ngủ
Positive_Review: very beautiful hotel! pool is awesome. Food in the restaurant really delicious and European.
Negative_Review: we wanted to cut the cake but it’s not possible to get the knife. water in the sink in the kitchen drains very slowly.

RoomType: Suite Ở Góc 2 Phòng Ngủ
Positive_Review:
The beds were comfortable.
The rooms were spacious, with splendid view.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Golden Bay Có 2 Giường Đơn Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Vịnh
Positive_Review: Swimming pool, room spaces, Mrs Becky Exceptional professional
Negative_Review: Restaurant low variety of foods, lacks of communication skills, bad pillows, hards and too wide.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Positive_Review:
The property is neat and clean . The rooms are big. The bed is nice and soft. We slept well. Towels are neat and fresh. Although the toiletries are very average. 
The pool is nice. The High tea was great. We were given many options as vegetarians.
Negative_Review: The Breakfast for Vegetarians is HARDLY ANYTHING. Usually all hotels offer Services to make something immediately for their Vegetarian guests if the menu doesn't have options, but This hotel had no interest in helping. They denied that anything could be made. We just got a fruit plate for Breakfast. Very sad experience early in the morning at a hotel of this rating. We were disappointed.
Review_Title: NOT THE BEST AT THIS PRICE.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Golden Bay Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Vịnh
Positive_Review: The staff at reception were very helpful at check in and check out. The room was tired looking but clean. They also allowed us to check in a hour earlier which was really helpful as we needed to get ready for the event. There was no turn down service but I think they were just too busy.
Negative_Review:
Although the staff were helpful and tied their best it was way too busy and the hotel wasn’t equipped to deal with the tour group visitors and the foreigners coming for a major event. 
Breakfast was hectic. People pushing past you to get to the food. Tables jammed in too close to each other. It wasn’t peaceful at all. They had huge Asian tour groups so the food was catered to them mostly. No egg station for omelettes. Eggs were already fried and stacked in a pile so they were stone cold when you tried to eat. No fresh coffee which was the worst. Only Vietnamese coffee or instant powdered coffee. I wouldn’t recommend going down early for it. Huge lines for lifts to get to and from the rooms. 
They advertise an amazing roof top bar but literally only day we stayed due to the event on the US carrier and couldn’t get a quiet drink at the bar because they close it on Mondays!! I think given the event they could have considered keeping it open.
Review_Title: It was ok for a work trip and convenient for the meeting place but I won’t be back in a hurry.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Golden Bay Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Vịnh
Positive_Review: The only thing they're good at is photoshop. The photos of the facilities are a lie, especially the pool. The room was good, but that was the only positive. The restaurant on 1st floor almost sent my husband to the hospital. I informed them of his allergy and stomach sickness, and asked 5 times for a not spicy meal beforehand. They brought a flaming-red, most spicy ramen we've ever tried (which wasn't indicated in the menu), and instead of apologizing, they defended stubbornly and just changed the water of the soup, but kept the rest and the chilies on top, which was still very spicy. We were forced to pay, even though we almost had to go BACK to the hospital because of this "mistake". Anyone can make a mistake, but amend after, and the whole staff did the opposite. The restaurant on the rooftop was ok though, and informed about my husband's state.
Negative_Review: The hotel feels like a post-apocalyptic, post-communist war, ghost motel. We felt a really creepy vibe, especially in the pool (which is the reason most people go). Everything is rusted, old. The sun loungers are dirty and the towels have holes in them. The casino tv's in the lifts are super annoying. The staff is also incapable, they forgot one of our 2 big suitcases in the room when checking out, and defended themselves not believing there was another one, I was forced to go with to prove them.
Review_Title: Horrible ghost hotel, one of the worst! NOT recommended at all! Incompetent staff, creepy facilities

RoomType: Suite Ở Góc 2 Phòng Ngủ
Positive_Review: Przepiękny basen, piękny widok z pokoju- corner suite room na 25 piętrze- bajka! Voucher na poczęstunek w eleganckim lobby.
Negative_Review: Hotel najnowszy.nie jest, ocieka złotem. Trzeba lubić ten styl lub doświadczenie na 1 noc.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Positive_Review: Nos gusto mucho habitacion, comida, instalaciones, limpieza
Negative_Review: Un poquito lejos de centro de ciudad

RoomType: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King và Ban công
Positive_Review: "Wyndham Danang Golden Bay이에서의 즐거운 숙박. 픽업 서비스부터 잘 챙겨주셨고, 특히 옥상에 있는 골든 수영장은 내가 본 최고의 전망을 자랑합니다. 또한 29층에 있는 다이닝 레스토랑에서 맛있는 음식과 칵테일을 즐길 수 있어요. 좋은 여행을 준비해 주신 Chou 씨에게 감사드립니다. 곧 다시 방문할 예정입니다."
Review_Title: 완벽한 서비스, 멋진 전망, 그리고 즐거운 다이닝 경험으로 잊지 못할 윈덤 다낭 골든 베이 숙박.

RoomType: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King và Ban công
Positive_Review: 저는 Wyndham Danang Golden Bay에서의 숙박을 정말 즐겼습니다. 특히 따뜻한 무료 픽업 서비스와 F29 Golden Beef Sky Bar는 놀라운 경험이었습니다. 감사합니다!
Review_Title: 다낭 골든 베이, 훌륭한 숙박과 무료 픽업 서비스에 감사합니다

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Positive_Review: Alles außer dass Wetter😎
Negative_Review: Das Wetter, 3 Tage Regen, aber dafür kann das Hotel nichts. Das Hotel liegt etwas abseits, d.h. man muss für alle Aktivitäten ein Taxi nehmen.

RoomType: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King và Ban công
Positive_Review: 개별 손님으로서 Wyndham Danang Golden Bay에서 숙박에 만족했고 프리미엄 라운지에서 아침 식사를 즐기고 F29 Golden Beef & Sky Bar의 분위기를 좋아했습니다. 특히, 친절한 한국 스태프들이 한국어로 당신이 다낭에서 필요한 모든 것을 소개해 주는 점이 좋았습니다.
Review_Title: 긍정적이고 편안한 숙박이었습니다."가 될 수 있겠습니다

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Positive_Review:
Sehr aufmerksames Personal
Outstanding Pool!

RoomType: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King và Ban công
Positive_Review: Wyndham Danang Golden Bay에서의 휴가를 정말 즐겼어요.. 이 호텔은 인피니티 루프탑 수영장에서의 멋진 전망을 제공하며 셔틀 버스도 편리하게 이용할 수 있어 좋았습니다. 로비에는 K 마트도 있어 편의성을 높였고, 특히 F29 레스토랑과 바는 밤에 멋진 칵테일과 함께 최고의 식사를 제공했어요.
Negative_Review: Nothing

RoomType: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King và Ban công
Positive_Review: 저희의 Wyndham Danang Golden Bay에서의 휴가를 정말 좋아했습니다. 친절하고 따뜻한 환영 픽업 서비스도 좋았고, F29 스카이바와 레스토랑에서는 멋진 다낭 야경을 감상하며 칵테일과 다양한 음식을 즐길 수 있었습니다. 29층의 플로어에서 제공되는 이 멋진 경험을 꼭 추천하고 싶네요. 그리고 놀랍게도 2층에 한국 전통 Jimji Bang이 있어서 한국인 여행객들에게도 매우 호감을 줄 것 같아요. 다양한 세계의 매력을 알려주는 곳으로, 대단히 만족스러웠습니다.
Negative_Review: nothing

RoomType: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King và Ban công
Positive_Review: 身為一位台灣遊客，在凱悅峴港金灣酒店的住宿經驗非常愉快。令人驚豔的景觀、豪華的設施以及熱情的服務超乎我的期望。這是尋找難忘度假的理想之地。強烈推薦
Review_Title: 在這裡渡過的時光非常美好，服務一流，讓我留下了難忘的回憶。

RoomType: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King và Ban công
Positive_Review: 다낭 여행마다 나는 항상 골든 베이를 선택합니다. 서비스와 모든 것들이 훌륭하며, 아침 식사 음식은 맛있고 다양한 옵션이 많으며, 방은 아름답고 깨끗하며 향기로워요. 100점에 합당합니다
Review_Title: 무한 수영장은 다낭 시내 지평선을 간단하게 완벽하게 반영합니다.

RoomType: Phòng Superior với Giường cỡ King và Ban công
Positive_Review: 游泳池在黃昏時格外迷人，夕陽的餘暉映照在水面上，營造出一個壯觀的景色。而客房內的金色簽名裝飾讓整個住宿體驗更加奢華，賓至如歸。
Review_Title: 我很喜歡游泳池和房間的黃金簽名

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Positive_Review: Nagyon kedvesek , udvariasak , megleptek gyümölcskosárral és prémium reggelit kaptunk, egy alkalommal öt órai tea különleges finomságokkal . Tiszta minden , nagyon bőséges és változatos svédasztalos reggeli, Ázsiai és európai ételek voltak . A tetőn a.medence nagyon jó és a kilátás is pazar , ingyenes a szauna .
Negative_Review: Kicsit messze van a központtól.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Positive_Review: 入住就被贈送了兩客下午茶和兩次桑拿，房間也很大，剛好入住江景房，拍出去很漂亮。飯店對面的堤防似乎是看夕陽的好地點....
Negative_Review: 插座很多，但也很多都沒辦法使用！然後地點確實比較偏，附近也沒有什麼可以用餐的地方，只能搭車出去吃

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Positive_Review:
Zimmer mit super Ausblick aufs Meer.
Der Infinity Pool

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Positive_Review: É um hotel lindo. Todos receberiam um drinque gelado no balcão de check-in. O quarto é limpo e novo. A vista é maravilhosa. Você veria a cidade 360⁰, montanhas e água. A longa piscina infinita gigante no topo do 29º andar do hotel com uma vista fantástica. Tivemos um café da manhã gratuito com comida asiática e americana, com diversas bebidas e bar de frutas e saladas. O hotel está localizado no centro da cidade, próximo à praia. Se precisar de ajuda durante a estadia, pode falar com a Sara, ela vai ajudar com todas as suas necessidades. O atendimento ao cliente é excelente.
Review_Title: A longa piscina infinita gigante no topo do 29º andar do hotel com uma vista fantástica

Personnel courtois et souriant.
Negative_Review: Un peu excentré et rien à faire autour à pied, quartier en cours de développement.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Golden Bay Có 2 Giường Đơn Với Ban Công và Tầm Nhìn Ra Vịnh
Positive_Review: La calidad del hotel en general, el amplísimo desayuno (el más variado y exquisito que hemos visto nunca) y lapiscina superior.
Negative_Review: La neverita de la habitación no enfriaba. No había escobilla de wc. Preguntamos acerca del trasporte hasta Hoi An y nos informaron del precio, pero no de que debíamos reservarlo con una antelación mínima de 3h y para cuando fuimos, que faltaban 2h40min nos dijeron que no había disponibilidad.
Review_Title: Piscina espectacular en hotel de gran calidad

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố Có Ban Công
Positive_Review: Piscina infinita tem uma vista fantástica! o quarto é bastante bom e há uma boa relação preço/qualidade. O ginásio é muito espaçoso e bem equipado.

RoomType: Phòng Deluxe Golden Bay Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Vịnh
Positive_Review:
Väldigt hög standard på allt från faciliteterna till personalen och servicen rakt igenom, hela vägen från det jag anlände på flygplatsen till jag gick igenom säkerhetskontrollen för att åka igen. De hjälpte till med allt man kan tänkas behöva hjälp med.

När jag var på flygplatsen så insåg jag att jag glömt min iPad på rummet. Jag skrev ett mail till hotellet och hoppades på att kanske kunna återfå min iPad med leverans till Ho Chi Minh dit jag skulle åka. 

De svarade på mailet omedelbart och utan att tveka letade de upp min iPad på rummet och en i personalen satte sig i en taxi till flygplatsen så att jag hann få tillbaka min iPad 20 minuter innan boarding. 

10-star service av ett 5-star Hotel ❤️❤️❤️
Review_Title: Fantastisk och underbar, jag kommer tillbaka

RoomType: Deluxe Queen Room - High floor with Privilege Lounge access
Positive_Review: Our family had access to the Club Lounge, which we used for breakfast on one morning and joined the Happy Hour (including dinner) every night. The staff throughout the hotel are amazing, specially in the Club Lounge and the dining room. The rooms are spacious and very comfortable. The walk-in shower was much appreciated, as we had combined tubs/showers in the other three hotels that we stayed in. The food in the ground floor restaurant was amazing.
Negative_Review: The location of the swimming pool is a disaster. It is in full view of both a side road with pedestrians and traffic and the hotel reception foyer. There is absolutely no privacy for swimmers. Also,there is a drain running almost alongside the pool, and the odour from the drain does not make for an enjoyable experience for swimmers. We mentioned this to the hotel General Manager, and he undertook to investigate this matter.
Review_Title: Beautiful luxurious hotel, with fabulous facilities (except for the swimming pool).

RoomType: Phòng Superior có giường cỡ Queen Nhìn ra Sông
Positive_Review: The room was clean and comfortable with a spectacular view over the river. The staff were friendly, helpful and professional. Lan in the priority lounge was exceptional even helping a parent distract an over wrought screaming child to calm down. The breakfast was excellent. We stayed overnight but wished we had stayed longer. The location was set back away from traffic on a little island on the river with restaurants close by. We met the general manager who came over and chatted to guests which was a nice touch. They did have shuttles to locations in danang. Best run hotel we had stayed in the last two months away.

RoomType: Executive Suite with River View - High floor with Privilege Lounge access
Positive_Review: The staff were incredibly friendly and more than willing to help. The reception staff even took the time to sit and chat while I was waiting for one of my Grab taxis. My room was big enough and had a walk-in wardrobe and an area to store my suitcase out of the way. The executive lounge was big and spacious and overlooked the river and amusement park. Check-in and out were quick and easy.
Negative_Review: The wifi in my room kept dropping out. One of the lights in my room was faulty. However, this was of no concern to me. I had two television screens in my room. When I turned the one in the bedroom on, the one in the living area would turn on

RoomType: Phòng Superior có giường cỡ Queen Nhìn ra Sông
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff with good English in the lobby (less so in the restaurants). A comfortable, newly furnished room with a very good mattress and strong A/C helped. Cable TV was fine. Wi-Fi was strong. The breakfast spread is grand and very good. We enjoyed sitting in the lobby evenings and having a drink while people watching. (No one else did this, so we had personal bar service.) The GM wandered around the lobby and personally helped guests: quite an unusual touch.
Negative_Review: The location is about 1 km away from anything touristy (e.g. wet markets, restaurants) in a quiet area outside the city center. (This really wasn't a big deal as we enjoy walking and cabs are abundant and cheap.) The Vietnamese dishes in the coffeeshop were mediocre other than the excellent spring rolls (in all varieties).
Review_Title: Very nice base for a Danang Visit

RoomType: Phòng Superior có giường cỡ Queen Nhìn ra Sông
Positive_Review: Friendly lobby staff with good English, good Wi-Fi and a comfortable room. The GM is also hands-on and quite helpful.
Negative_Review: The Vietnamese food in the coffee shop is only average (other than the superb spring rolls) and takes a while to come. The hotel is off the beaten track 1-2km from the tourist spots.

RoomType: Phòng Superior có giường cỡ Queen Nhìn ra Sông
Positive_Review:
1. The hotel location is good; as from the hotel room, you are able to see the entire night view vividly, eg, the dragon bridge and etc. 
2. The hotel provides free shuttle bus to a couple of places free of charge.
3. The hotel environment and facilities are inviting; the lobby is very spacious, and there is plenty of room to roam about. 
4. It is value for money. It is very affordable for such a 4 star rating hotel.
Negative_Review:
1. The shower room has no door. It's hard to bathe without splashing some water outside. Water control is kinda out of control: hot and cold hard to navigate.
2. The shower area is visible from outside despite pulling down the blinder. Kinda translucent.
3. The bath toiletries are very limited for 2 pax; too small qty provided.
4. Breakfast spread is limited, almost similar food every other day; not much variety as well.
5. Staff is not as responsive and attentive enough for a 4-star rating hotel.

CustomerNational: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)
RoomType: Phòng Superior có Giường cỡ Queen và Nhìn ra Thành phố
Positive_Review:
- Extremely close to the airport, which is the reason why we booked here, since we had an early flight to Phu Quoc after our stay at Danang, it took us only 6 minutes to arrive at the airport.

- The room looks better than the photos. Satisfyingly clean. Bathroom has a modern design. Nothing exceptional but it felt very comfortable.

- We were given upon check-in a voucher for 2 complimentary welcome drinks at the bar, though we did not find the time to use it, it was a nice touch.
Negative_Review:
- Some staff were extremely petty and rude. We were staying only for 2 nights so we did not bother to have housekeeping clean our room. Instead, we called front desk in the late afternoon and asked only to replace the water (2 per room per night) and the petite little bottle of hair conditioner that we finished. The front desk staff at the phone only agreed to replace the water after what sounded to me like a rude interrogation with an unpleasant tone. ("We gave you water", "There is already water". "Did you see the 2 water by the sink?", "Did you finish the water?" and finally "Okay, I will mark down that we give you your 2 FREE water for today.") Which was already shocking to me, but she doubled down with telling me we can only get 1 bottle of hair conditioner for 1 room and refused to give me a new one or a refill. Is that the official policy of an international 5-star hotel? I have stayed in plenty of similar hotels all over the world and I have never heard of that before.

- Food from the breakfast was subpar. Most things were either too salty or tasteless. The whole fruits (Vietnamese apples, rose apples) were either rotting or rotten when you cut them open. Pre-sliced fruits were fine though.

- If you have a noisy neighbour in the connecting room, it can ruin your night of sleep. The Korean couple that stayed next to us had a big argument during one night of our stay and woke us up a few times.

- No one offered to show us our room or help us with our luggages when we checked in, even when the hotel staff did not look busy when we arrived. We are 2 grown adults who are perfectly capable of doing so ourselves but were very surprised it was not offered. We also had to ask when and where breakfast would be served since no one mentioned anything at check in.
Review_Title: Clean Comfortable Hotel close to the Airport, with Unprofessional Staff and Poor Breakfast

RoomType: Phòng Superior có Giường cỡ Queen và Nhìn ra Thành phố
Positive_Review:
Everything was alright, but nothing spectacular.
Good facilities and friendly staffs. Breakfast is alright too.

RoomType: Phòng Superior có Giường cỡ Queen và Nhìn ra Thành phố
Positive_Review: The staff are nice.. they are very accommodating specially the ones in the buffet area. The aircon is cold which I like. The area is also quiet which you will feel safe even if you walk around.
Negative_Review: There's not enough outlet next to the bed for charging. you have to unplug the lamp to charge your phone. The standing lamp is too far, and you have to standup to turn it off which is not convenient when you really feel sleepy. One thing I dont understand is I booked the room with a city view expecting that I will be having the dragon bridge view but they gave us a room without any sight of the city.
Review_Title: Just a so so experience... not extraordinary

Hervorzuheben ist, dass das Personal im gesamten Hotel sehr freundlich und äußerst hilfsbereit war. Wünsche, wie z.B. Anrufe bei der er Airline, wurden von dem Personal aufgenommen und zeitnah erfüllt.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 giường đơn nhìn ra cảnh thành phố
Positive_Review:
방 두개를 빌렸는데 둘 다 뷰가 좋았다.
부모님이 특히 뷰에 만족하셨다.
리셉션에 정장을 입고 있는 매니저가 아주 친절했다.
Negative_Review: 베트남 전통 의상을 입은 리셉션 직원이 체크인을 해줬는데 그 직원은 영어가 잘 안되고 자기가 못 알아들어놓고 얼굴을 여러 차례 찡그리면서 불친절하게 대했다. 친언니가 직원이 불친절하다고 나한테 짜증냈다. 다른 직원들은 다 친절하고 좋았다.

RoomType: Phòng Superior 2 giường đơn nhìn ra cảnh thành phố
Positive_Review:
La beauté du hall .
La chambre équipée et lumineuse.
Excellent buffet petit déjeuner très copieux.
Jolie vue sur la rivière.
Personnel affable et compétent.
Buffet fruits de mer du soir EXCELLENT rapport qualité prix.

Positive_Review: Tolle Lage in der Mitte von Danang. Das Personal war stets freundlich und immer hilfsbereit. Das gesamte Serviceangebot des Hotels stand zur Verfügung im Gegensatz zu vielen Mitbewerbern zur Zeit in Vietnam. Die Ausstattung des Zimmer ist sehr gut.

RoomType: Phòng Superior có giường cỡ Queen Nhìn ra Sông
Positive_Review: Es war ein schönes Erlebniss für uns Gast zu sein in diesem Hotel. Das sehr hilfsbereite Personal hat uns sehr gut unterstützt bei unserer Reise nach My Son und einen super Fahrer organisiert. Das Früstück war sehr lecker, wir hatten a la cart.

Positive_Review: Cảm ơn Golden Holiday Hotel & Spa. Chúng tôi đã có trải nghiệm thú vị tại Hội An và rất hài lòng khi lưu trú ở khách sạn đầy đủ tiện nghi với phòng ốc sạch đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện mà giá rẻ bất ngờ. Đây là điểm lưu trú xuất sắc nhất trong số 5 khách sạn gia đình chúng tôi chọn trong dịp Tết 2022 này. Hãy đến và trải nghiệm-bạn sẽ hài lòng như chúng tôi!

Positive_Review: Was a nice older building in good condition still but like a 70's style casino hotel. Nice spacious room on high floor with a great view. Breakfast was excellent with great staff. It was close to the nite markets, good Vietnamese local restuarants and the Champ museum. Best highlight of the trip along with My Son. Beaches were lovely but winter n rainy season. Like all Vietnam no sidewalks for pedestrians to walk and treacherous with rain on terrazo tiles everywhere.
Negative_Review: Xmas was disappointing at hotel but staff were lovely. They were quick to charge our card for the room full payment for the stay before we arrived and refused to refund n put on another card and insisted on a refund charge. Hotel in Saigon did the same early charging full payment but they refunded with no charge and let us use another card to pay with no issues!

Negative_Review: Un albergo pessimo. E soprattutto voi di Booking sul sito avevate messo le foto di un altro albergo sempre di nome Muang Thanh, ma a 20 metri dal mare che era l'albergo che noi avevamo scelto, ed invece ci siamo ritrovati in questa fogna indegna, in fase di ristrutturazione, dove c'era puzza ovunque, l'aria condizionata funzionava solo in camera. Avevamo prenotato 2 stanze ed abbiamo dovuto pagare un sovrapprezzo perchè in 3 non si poteva stare nelle camere. Alla fine della vacanza siamo stati accusati di aver rubato un'asciugamano per il viso, che ovviamente non avevamo preso. Una cosa scandalosa, mai successa in 40 anni di vacanze. Comunque la colpa è vostra, Booking, avete fatto una pubblicità ingannevole. Un albergo venduto come 5 stelle, ma se arriva a 2 è pure tanto....
HotelName: Muong Thanh Luxury Song Han Hotel
